0.content:
I'm starting a zero story option to open up avenues for specific shrinking scenarios on Disney and Nickelodeon TV Shows, example: "Wizards of Waverly Place- Alex shrinks her brothers(Justin & Max) so she can gain the upper hand in their family wizard competition." or "Zoey 101- Quinn shrinks the guys(Michael, Chase & Logan) to use them in her experiments as lab rats." placing a specific girl as the giantess in any scenario and a specific person as the tiny character. This doesn't have to be multiple characters that's just the way I wrote it out for the examples. There can be only one shrunken character if you prefer and they can be either male or female, or you can choose to shrink as many people as you'd like, you can even have non living things shrunk as well, such as buildings, vehicles, ect...

Crossovers will be a little different, character can be shrunken by characters from another show yes, but they have to be on the same network. No Nickelodeon characters on Disney shows and vise versa, only because thing can get easily twisted up and confusing. Very rare to see people pull off a good story like that so I'd rather avoid it all together.

There will be no options for TV Shows like the main story, as written above the TV Show and the characters meant to be involved in the interactive will be laid out in advance. As always I ask that you put actual effort into the additions you make, no short additions her and don't aimlessly make suggests if you don't plan on following up on it. If you're not sure if I'd be satisfied with your addition you can always run it by me first and I'll happily read it over and offer advice and possible editing to fit what I'm looking for. I can be a little high matinence in my expectations but only because I don't want the story to be dragged down by a host of unappealing quick adds, I write these stories for people who honestly enjoy reading the erotica and I get a fair amount of compliments from people in return which means a lot to me since I actually enjoy writing.

Thank you for reading the guidelines for this zero-story and I hope you enjoy the stories to come.

"But Mom, we are old enough to take care of ourselves." Dawn had protested, trying to avoid having another babysitter like their last one. She had made them all get in bed by 8 o clock every night, just so she could stay up and watch her stupid TV shows.

"Sorry Dawn, but you are all only 12 years old. You're not ready for that yet. But don't worry, I think you will really like the babysitters we found for you all. They come very highly recommended."

This was true. Sam and Cat had made quite a reputation for themselves as excellent babysitters and had excellent reviews online. Sam's rowdy and grumpy nature always amused the children, and Cat acted so much like a child that she could go along and play games with them like she was still a child herself. But what the quadruplets didn't know was that Cat had been shopping on Sky Mall lately, and had gotten her hands on a shrink ray. 1111.content:
Justin was hot on the path to becoming the Russo family wizard, practicing to master his two-thousandth spell.

He wanted to get the upper hand on his siblings before the final stages of the competition, even though Max and Alex were slackers.

The eldest of the Russo siblings was busy developing a form of instant teleportation, possibly one of the most useful spells he could learn.

He prepared to practice it for the very first time in the wizard lair, only attempting to teleport himself across the room for his first trial.

“Over here, over there, transport me through the air.” he said aloud, waving his wand over his head.

Green smoke sprayed from his wand in the form of a cloud, covering his body from head to toe as the spell took effect.

Justin could feel as his body was decomposed and reconstructed in another location, it was a weird first time using the spell to feel your body separated.

In the span of only three seconds the transference of molecules was completed, although he was still in for a big surprise as he opened his eyes.

He could clearly see that that his spell had teleported him, yet not to his intended location but a different location.

As he looked out into the room he could see that everything in comparison to him was gigantic, that’s when he thought to examine his wand.

He noticed that his splinter sized wand was cracked in half and then taped back together, no doubt the work of his younger brother.

“Max! Wait till I get my hands on that irresponsible little…” he said, stopping as he was distracted by a dark shadow behind him.

Justin turned in shock to see__________

Choices:

1) Alex's barefoot hovering over him, looking around too see that he had been teleported onto his younger sister's flip-flop.

2) That he was on a seat in his vampire girlfriend Juliet's home that she was about to sit down on top of.

1112.content:
Max's eyes fluttered open. Instead of lying on the warm, soft bed that he grown accustomed to when waking up, he found himself lying on a hard, cold surface. He sprung up, attempting to reach for his blanket, but grabbed nothing, but open air. The young wizard struggled to comprehend what happened. He looked around. Instead of being greeted by his usual belongings, he was greeted by a vast, empty space.

Max got up and began to walk around. Was this a dream? The young wizard pinched himself to make sure. After releasing a short yelp and rubbing his arm, it quickly became apparent to him that this was a dream.

"What the heck happened?" Max shouted up at no one in particular. Whatever was happening to him was freaking him out and he did not like it one bit. As Max continue to walk around the empty room, he came across a brown piece of plastic lying haphazardly on the floor. The youngest of the Russo siblings began to inspect it and saw the word "SNICKERS" in giant blue letters on the other side of the piece of plastic.

It was a candy bar wrapper. Max stepped back, taken aback by what was right in front of him.

"There's no way that's real, right?" he asked himself. "This has got to be some form of a prank."

Max began running in the opposite direction when tripped on a huge piece of metal sticking out from the ground. Max hit the ground with a thud and after dusting himself off, began to inspect what it was he tripped over. The piece of metal didn't seem to originate from anywhere on the floor. In fact, it looked like it was its own stand alone item. Max continued to inspect the piece of metal, walking around it, trying to piece together what it was.

Then it hit him.

It was a paper clip. Only several times bigger than it would be at normal size.

Max fell down, finally realizing what had happened. He had somehow shrunk himself. And with no wand in sight or even the slightest idea of where he was, there no was no chance of him getting back to normal size anytime soon.

Suddenly, the door to the room opened. A feminine figure wearing flip-flops entered the room, calling for Max's name. With nowhere to hide, all Max could do was look up and wait for the figure to get closer to him. After a few thunderous steps, the feminine figure turned out to be...
1112.title: Max's Big Suprise

11121.content:
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/wiza...

Max was speechless to say the least as he looked out across the room to see his older sister Alex Russo entering the wizard lair, her height now rivaling that of a majority of New York's many skyscrapers. Each footstep she took into the room clearing the distance of two or three city blocks at a time, reminding Max that he was not only small, everyone else in the world was now a giant by comparison.

The black haired teen made her way across the room slowly, looking bored as always meaning that she was up to no good. She often liked using spells on ordinary humans to assume herself, not always prepared for the consequences of revealing magic if she were discovered.

She approached the other end of the table Max was standing on and opened the Russo family's spell book, containing thousands of spells with many different purposes in it's pages. Normally Alex would simply make up a spell on the fly, a special talent many wizards possessed that she especially excelled in.

Max not having a wand of his own decided to rely on Alex for help out of his current situation, she could use or make up a spell to return him to normal size with ease. Of course Justin being the brightest of the three children would have been ideal, Max didn't want to give him any satisfaction of helping him out.

The shrunken wizard ran across the table towards his towering sister as she turned through the pages, looking for anything that might quell her boredom. Although each page she crossed seemed to only hold spells for helping people, none that when even used in concept with her devious mind would make for a good prank.

"Alex, hey down here! Can you give me a hand." Max yelled, forgetting his size.

"Ew, how'd a bug get in here?" Alex spat, sounding disgusted as she raised her naked palm over her shrunken sibling.

"A bug, where? I don't see any, ohhhh." Max said, realizing that he himself was the bug in question. Alex's palm narrowly missing his minuscule body as it slapped the table, leaving Max standing between her middle and ring fingers.

"Not what I meant when I said 'give me a hand' but I'll take it." Max joked, as if he didn't understand the fact that he was nearly crushed like a bug under his own sister's palm.

Alex having time for her sight to adjust realized that it wasn't just any bug on the table before her, it was her very littler brother Max.

"Max, what do you thing you're doing? I could have crushed you." Alex pointed out, though she had to admit she wasn't bored anymore.

"I don't know. Heck, I just woke up like this five or ten minutes ago." Max said, unknowingly dooming himself to what came next.

"Really, so nobody else knows your shrunk?" Alex asked, already thinking of several fun activities she could do with a shrunken brother. Hell, she knew the shrinking spell herself, she could just as easily catch Justin off guard and force him to join in on her fun.

"Nope, why?" Max said, not understanding where Alex's mind was going with all this.

"No reason. Hey Max, you want to come have some fun with your big sis?" Alex asked, playing off Max's stupidity as a weakness.

"Um sure, but you're gonna grow me back to normal size later right?" Max asked, willing to spend some time at an inch tall. Unlike most people he didn't seem to have a problem being bug sized, just means he could explore the filth of his room on a new level.

"Yeah, sure. Why not?" Alex answered, not actually sure if she wanted to return Max to normal anytime soon. Guess she'd just have to enjoy her fun and find out later, her hand rising off the table and scooping up Max in her fist.

"First I think we should___________."

1. "...play a game." Eager to quench her boredom, Alex insists upon a game where her and Max compete for some kind of reward.

2. "...play a prank on Harper." Alex uses Max to play some kind of prank on her best friend Harper, hitting two birds with one stone by finding a way to make the experience worse for her shrunken brother.

3. "...bring Justin in on our fun."Alex smiles, already having the perfect plan that would allow her to catch Justin off guard and shrink him to Max's size.

111331.content:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

It was a normal Thursday at Tribeca Prep High school for Principal Laritate, or so he thought as he called his usual twelve o'clock meeting with Alex Russo to discuss the trouble she had caused over the past week.

"Ahh Miss Russo, so nice of you to join me." Mr. Laritate said, pulling out a seat for the part Latina, part Italian Wizard as she confidentially entered his office.

"So what's got your bolo tie in a twist today Sheriff?" Alex asked the principal as he took a seat in his cow skin chair, looking over some of the complaints he'd received about Alex over the past week.

"Let's take a look at why you're here today. Among other seemingly impossible pranks you somehow managed to shrink the cheerleader outfits, just before the start of our last basketball game. How exactly did you pull that off young lady?" Mr. Laritate asked, sounding more annoyed by Alex than he ever had before.

"I don't know, maybe they all shrunk in the wash. Cheerleaders aren't exactly the braininess people around here." Alex teased mockingly, despite the fact that she had recently quit the cheerleading team. She had cast a shrinking spell on her own outfit to make it a bit tighter on herself, but the effects spread to all the outfits by mistake. She had tried to fix t at the time but was unable to think of a spell before the rest of the team arrived to discover that their clothes were too small to wear.

"That's it Miss Russo, I've had enough of your sarcastic attitude. Those uniforms were school property and as the principal it's my job too come down on you like a ton of bricks for there loss." Mr. Laritate said, raising his voice as he stood up from his chair.

"What? What are you talking about?" Alex asked, not liking the direction in which the situation was leading her.

"I'm sorry Alex, but as of today you are expelled from Tribeca Prep!" he explained, pointing the young teenage girl towards the door.

“I’m what?” Alex asked, already thinking of a spell that could fix her current situation. The McReary Timereary spell would only stall her expulsion, and she could remember the lines to recent memory erasing spell either. That when she remembered the spell that got her into this mess in the first place, panicked by the thought of being expelled Alex whipped out her wand from her boot. The tip glowing as she waved it around in circles, leaving the large adult male stunned by this shocking turn of events.

“What are you do…?” Was all he could ask before Alex’s lips uttered the words that would change his life from that day on.

"Shrink-a-dink, Shrink-a-Dynk, Shrink-a-dunk!" Alex said, casting a shrinking spell on Mr. Laritate as a blinding flash of light appeared from the tip of her wand, hitting him in the chest.

Suddenly Mr. Laritate found himself watching from the air as the impossible happened right before his eyes, his office along with Alex Russo were both growing at an extremely alarming pace. Soon he was no bigger than three feet tall, then one foot tall, before he could even blink he was floating in the air at no taller than 6 inches tall and still shrinking. Finally his body began falling back onto his chair when his body reached one inch tall, the size of a bug on the New York City streets.

Alex slipped her wand back into her right boot, knowing she very well couldn’t have two people discovering her family’s secret in one day. Exposing the existence of wizards is a huge violation and could very well could cost Alex her status in the competition to become the family wizard. Knowing that Alex decided she could very well leave her inch tall principal to roam the halls of her school, he'd tell every student in the school that Alex shrunk him and that she's a wizard.

"Mr. Laritate I am so sorry about this, but I can't let you expel me." Alex said, walking above the principal's seat to get a closer look at the shrunken man. Her face becoming very intimidating at his new size, each of her glossy pink lips now bigger than a school bus, all thirty two of her pearly white teeth bigger than an average sized door. Her eyes looking down upon him like two Hollywood floodlights, her nostrils big enough to inhale a small sports car. With all these features put together Mr. Laritate began trembling on top of his seat, the young giantess becoming even more intimidating as she rose to her full height above him. By the looks over Alex could easily step on the shrunken teacher and crush him like a bug under her boot clad foot, or even worse sit on him since he was conveniently standing on top of an admitably comfy looking seat.

"This is outrageous Mrs. Russo! You grow me back this instant or else I'll, I'll...I'll um..." Mr. Laritate yelled, coming up short with a threat that could elicit a reaction from a girl Alex's size.

"You'll what?" Alex asked placing a hand to her ear, actually intrigued to hear what pathetic threat he might try to impose on her.

"How's this for a threat, you're gonna behave yourself for as long as your this small or else I'll crush you like the bug you are, or better yet I'll let you loose in the halls and let one of the other girls in this school do it for me." Frightening the older man beyond belief, causing Alex to realize that she actually preferred Mr. Laritate in his shrunken form.

"That's much better, now let get going. ________________."

1. "I want to test some more spells on you as soon as possible." Alex teleports back to her room with Mr. Laritate in hand and decides to see what other kind of spells she can use on him.

2. "I have class and you have to hide." Alex drops Mr. Laritate into her cleavage, telling him not to move around too much or he'd surely suffer the consequences as a result.

3. "Reader's Choice."

Tyler walked into the living room of the Jennings/James household, his parents on a two week long road trip to advertise and raise sales of Bennett's new book on child psychology based on his three children Chloe, Tyler, and his step daughter Avery. Shortly after taking a seat on the couch to watch the BMX championships which Tyler soon hoped to find himself competing in, Chloe started racing down the stairs. The ten year old girl who usually acted very silly and sassy smiled holding her hands to her cheek and batting her eyelashes, letting Tyler who was acute in reading body language knew that the young girl wanted something from him.

"Tyler, could you bring me up to the store so I can get some more candy?" she asked in a sing song voice knowing that she could usually get her older brother to do whatever she wanted if she asked him nice enough. Although Tyler didn't exactly answer as Chloe expected "Sorry Chloe but you know what mom and dad said your gonna need to cut back on the sweets or else you'll get cavities." making Chloe upset.

"I'm not gonna get cavities!" she pouted stomping her feet as she made her way back towards the stairs climbing them with heavy footed steps, Tyler didn't see this as much of a problem Chloe got distracted easily so she'd probably forget about the whole thing sooner or later. Avery passed Chloe on the stair and like her younger sister had come downstairs to ask her step brother Tyler for a favor.

"Hey Tyler could you drive me and Lindsay to the mall?" she asked sweetly thinking she would get a yes as an answer but what she heard wasn't exactly the answer she was expecting. "Sure Avery after the BMX championships he smiled." upsetting his 15 year old step sister "But by that time the cute boy Max was telling me about won't be there anymore." she argued making no effect towards changing Tyler's mind.

"Look I'm sorry Avery but the answer is no right now, if you still want to go in two hours I'll take you both to the mall." Tyler said and Avery ran up the stair to her room upset with Tyler. "Great!" Tyler smiled now that his two sister were upstairs he could focus on watching the BMX finals as he began to daydream about what it would be like to be in the championships himself, actually falling asleep in the process.

Tyler's dream came to a quick and sudden halt as he sat up on the couch to realize he had missed the last half of the BMX championships while he was asleep and that nearly two hours had passed seemingly in the blink of an eye. "Wow I don't remember having a flat-screen." Tyler said to himself as he looked towards the now gigantic TV "Wait a minute that doesn't seem right." Tyler said looking around to realize that it wasn't just the TV that had gotten bigger, everything in the entire Living room had gotten much bigger than him.

"I'm tiny, how did this happen?" Tyler asked himself as he stood up on the couch and looked around before ________ made her way down the stairs.

"Good now that you know your place, I think this would be an excellent time to _____________."
112111.title: Avery In Charge

1121111.content:
“What?” Tyler asked confused, not sure if Avery was joking or not with what she was asking him to do for her.

“You heard me, I’m gonna put you down and you’re going to rub my feet.” Avery confirmed, holding Tyler confidently in front of her chest.

“Avery, you can’t be serious. What could I possibly do at this size?” he asked, making a fair point. But Avery didn’t care, she wanted to make a point to Tyler stating that she was large and in charge.

“I don’t know, why don’t we find out.” Avery teased, leaning down and placing her hand a few inches above the coffee table. She then released her grip on Tyler, allowing him to fall onto the flat wooden surface as she continued to tower over him making no attempt to hide her black panties from her tiny step-brother.

“Now, let get these boots off.” Avery giggled, knowing full well that the next few minutes were something that Tyler would never be able to either enjoy or forget.

Meanwhile on the coffee table Tyler watch powerlessly as Avery sat down on the couch, unbuttoning her tall black boots. The sound of each snap echoing in his eardrums as he recalled how bad Avery’s feet smelled on occasion. In fact they were so bad that only Stan their talking dog liked the smell.

“Ahh, that’s so much better! They were practically melting inside of my boots.” Avery giggled, raising her bare feet over the coffee table, wiggling her toes in delight. However for Tyler this sight was anything but delightful as she came to the harsh realization that Avery wasn’t wearing socks inside her boots, meaning the sweat and stench of her feet would be even worse than usual.

“Now…” Avery paused, slamming her right barefoot down on the coffee table in front of Tyler. The force of which was more or less equal to an earthquake as the table shook from the impact, only to be followed by a second strike from her left barefoot, knocking Tyler onto his ass below her towering feet. “...start rubbing!” Avery commanded, finishing her statement from earlier, flexing her toes as she awaited her massage.

The power she had over him at his current size was too great, he knew she could crush him at her lesser and decided that it was best he comply with her demands until he could think of a way out of this mess. He staggered to his feet, looking up at the towering walls of flesh before him. Still he was unsure as to how Avery expected him to rub her feet like this, he simply approached her heel. Thinking he could start small and try to work his way up from there.

“I can’t believe I’m doing this.” Tyler said to himself as he pushed his palms against Avery’s heel, doing his best to rub them in a circular motion. The slick sweat dripping down her feet from her soles and toes actually aiding him in his attempt to rub her feet.

“Hmm, I’m impressed. That actually doesn’t feel half bad, keep that up and I might have a few uses for you at this size.” Avery teased, upholding Tyler’s belief that the giantess blonde had no intentions of helping him return to normal size.

Nevertheless Tyler continued rubbing her feet, fearful of what might happen if he suddenly stopped. Avery might get so pissed at him that she’d make good on her threat from earlier and stomp on him. As much as he hated rubbing her feet, he was sure he’d hate being crushed underneath them even more.

“That’s a good little bug, put some muscle into it.” Avery giggled, looking down at tyler between her feet. She’d never before felt such power and control over another human being, she hadn’t even meant to call Tyler a bug. It just slipped out because at this size he simply reminded her of one, scurrying beneath her feet in fear of being squashed. Logically speaking there was little difference between Tyler and a common insect, except for the fact that he could be trained to do her bidding.

"Now, get the other heel." Avery demanded, wiggling the toes of her right foot to signal him.

Tyler quickly shuffled over to the bratty teenagers opposite foot, not sure how she'd react if he moved to slowly. He only hoped that she'd get tired of this soon and ask him to stop, maybe even taking her attention off of him long enough for him to escape.

As he placed his hands on Aver's right heel Tyler asked himself how he ended up in this position, forced to serve his brainy step sibling, rubbing her feet at the size of a fly. The question still remained to be answered as too how he shrunk in the first place. He hoped this was a dream, but it all felt so real. Plus he would never dream about Avery's feet willingly, if this was just a scenario he was experiencing in his sleep than it was definitely a nightmare.

What happens next?

1. Avery decides that Tyler is doing a good job of rubbing her feet and wants him to continue doing so, lowering her soles so that he can reach them.

2. Avery isn't completely satisfied with Tyler's performance, thinking he can do better with the proper incentive. Therefore she finds it appropriate to punish him so he has a reference of what he has too look forward to should he ever fail her again.

3. Chloe walks in on Tyler massaging Avery's feet and wants a turn herself, climbing onto the couch next to Avery and placing her barefeet up on the coffee table next to Avery's. Avery would then insist that he start massaging Chloe's feet instead of her own.
1121111.title: Tyler Rubs Avery's Feet

112112.content:
Tyler realized the consequences his actions would have before he even made them, holding himself back from biting Avery's exposed flesh, the last thing he wanted to do was to give the 14-year-old Titaness yet another reason to be pissed off at him. Instead, Tyler allowed himself to be swallowed up inside her wedgie as Avery continued to twist her butt in a downward spiral.

He told himself he would escape when Avery finally stood up, and then seek therapy for his experience with his step-sibling's giant butt when he returned to normal. Meanwhile, the blonde was finally beginning to settle down, bouncing lightly on the couch cushion as opposed to the violent twisting motion she was performing earlier.

Finally, sinking between Avery's cheeks inside of her wedgie, Tyler felt the walls of butt flesh through the cloth, pinning his arms to his side. He could hardly move at all and was already struggling to breathe under Avery's intense weight. However, Avery wasn't about to start making things easier for him yet as she scooped the remote off the couch and kicked her feet up on the coffee table, shifting even more of her full onto Tyler in the process.

"Stupid bike races." Avery pouted, changing the program to a documentary playing on the discovery channel. She was always eager to learn about something new and hoped that an engaging presentation would help put her nerves at ease so she could move past her anger towards Tyler. A mature decision for someone her age.

Of course, Avery might have had an entirely different outlook on the situation if she realized where Tyler was. Helplessly confined inside her wedgie, barely able to move so much as a finger in the limited space he filled between her buttcheeks. His strained breathing made the surrounding area increasingly hot, recycling his limited oxygen supply as Avery made herself comfortable.

In a matter of moments, her weight seemed to increase by half what he'd endured so far as the teenage girl settled the majority of her body weight on the cushion. Tyler was already struggling and had begun to feel faint, no longer understanding which way was up as the couch pushed him up from below. Meanwhile, Avery's malleable ass pressed down on him from above, attempting to fill every available nook and cranny.

Tyler's had his position made much worse thanks to the inescapable laws of physics. Something Avery could have told him caused her ass to press not only down and out, but in as well. A fact that brought the band of her panties to be restricted firmly between her rear cheeks, dragging Tyler along for the ride.

"Avery!" Tyler yelled, giving up all hope inside the blonde's wedgie, not capable of thinking of a worse situation than he was in now. Sweating profusely and at a loss of breath, squirming around the best he could as the sound of his screams echoed in his ears. The heat was unbearable, he couldn't feel his legs, and his mouth had gone ceaselessly dry, all within only fifteen minutes since Avery first sat down.

Opportunely, Avery noticed him again, after multiple attempts screaming her name, but she was unable to recognize him as a living thing, in her mind the itch had returned. She tossed the remote to the side and lifted herself a few inches off the couch, releasing a majority of the pressure off Tyler's body as he felt himself falling forward. It was at this point he realized that at some point he'd gotten turned around under Avery, while she ran her hands up her thighs and buttcheeks.

The massive blonde girl felt around her backside for her panties, surprised by how far they'd sunk into the abyss of her buttcrack just from sitting down. And while Tyler had suffered for nearly half an hour inside the tangled cloth, Avery was able to pull it loose with a single tug. Blinding the shrunken boy with a sudden outburst of light as his body began to fall back towards the couch, all without alerting Avery to his presence.

His body flopped on the cushion, first on his stomach, then rolling forward to lay on his back facing up. However, the first thing he saw when he opened his eyes moments later was hardly a pleasant sight as Avery's panty-clad ass dominated his vision. Her fingers had just let her underwear go, resulting in a snap that sent ripples across Avery's butt flesh. As if her buttocks were teasing Tyler, letting him know they were ready for round two.

No longer detecting the presence of an itch, Avery allowed her body to lean back towards the couch, prompting Tyler to flee for his life. He pushed himself up and tried to stand so he could run away. Unfortunately, his legs were still numb from earlier and couldn't support his weight, falling out from under him as the bookworm's shadow grew darker by the moment. He closed his eyes, not wanting to look as the inevitable crash approached.

What happens?

1. Avery's butt covers Tyler for a second time, only now he's trapped under one of her butt-cheeks. Forced to endure her weight for the second time in a location where he can be easily noticed.

2. Avery misses Tyler with her butt, sitting further back and trapping Tyler between her thighs while she continues to watch TV.

3. Avery's butt bounces on top of Tyler, sticking him to her flesh first and them pulling him into her panties when she settles into her seat for the second time.
112112.title: Wedged Between Avery's Rear Cheeks

11212.content:
Tyler could hear the sudden quick steps of his youngest sister Chloe rush down in rapid succession, she only either did this when she was really happy or really angry with someone or something making Tyler hope for the first.

As she walked around the couch Tyler looked up towards her face to see that she was smiling, he also noticed that she had changed outfits since he saw her earlier when she asked him to bring her to the store to get candy.

Chloe was now wearing a pair of black boots that reached almost as high as her knees, blending into a pair of black leggings that she was wearing under a matching black mini skirt, and finally a dark purple shirt.

Chloe walked around the couch seemingly not even noticing Tyler shrunk on the middle of the couch cushion as she turned her back towards her, Tyler thinking Chloe was about to sit on him tried running towards the next cushion.

But taking a second look up at the young redhead from behind Tyler could see that she was leaning forward and bending over to grab the TV remote off the coffee table, deciding not to continue running to the next cushion and not thinking two steps ahead.

While Chloe was bent over exposing the back of her leggings under her short skirt to Tyler unknowingly, the shrunken boy below could make out every detail of the young girls plush rear end through the tight fabric.

Of course he didn't mean to look at Chloe's butt, however given her size compared to him it was hard not to look a the young girls posterior commonly referred to as her moon when it was actually seemed to be as big as the moon.

He was so distracted by the very sight of the young girls butt that he failed to realize that she had actually began to sit down over him, and this time it was too late to run away as she fell towards him.

While this was a common and rather simply action for Chloe just taking a seat, Tyler saw it from a different perspective and began running helplessly away from his youngest sister's bottom not wanting to end up a stain on her skirt or leggings.

Tyler stopped to stand his ground once Chloe got close enough hoping that he could at the very least push back or stop Chloe's rear end from advancing further, his body meeting the skin tight fabric under her skirt as he tried to slow her down.

Although Chloe didn't even seem to notice his existence as her weight overpowered her older brother completely humiliating him as she landed with him sprawled out on his back under her legging clad butt-cheeks on top of the inside part of her skirt.

Chloe then proceeded to try and make herself comfortable on the couch noticing it was a bit more lumpy than usual, twisting her butt along with her body from left to right.

While this again seemed to be yet another simple action taken by the young redhead, it proved nearly disastrous for Tyler suffering under her weight as the titanic twin mounds shifted from side to side on top of his body.

"Man I just can't seem to get comfy on this couch, I wonder if I'm sitting on something." Chloe said strangely as if something was amiss, causing Tyler's heart to sink as he realized it to be Chloe's bad acting voice.

Did she know he had somehow been shrunk down to an inch tall in height? Was she the one responsible for making him this small? If so, then why would she purposely sit down on him at his size?

With so many question running through his mind Tyler began to feel his head hurt not being used to deep thought, luckily he would soon be given answers to his questions as he heard Chloe's voice once more.

"Maybe I should check under my butt and see what's there." trying to hold back her giggles, as she slowly lifted herself up from the couch thinking that Tyler would be left in her butt-print on the cushion's surface...he wasn't.

Tyler himself was relieved to feel the crushing pressure of Chloe's rear end subside, regardless if this had been a prank hosted by the young girl Tyler would just be happy that he no longer had to be trapped under Chloe's large bottom.

However when he reopened his eyes having them shut as a result of enduring a extraordinary amount of pain, saw that he had become stuck to the inside of the redhead's skirt in the short period that he was under her.

"Chloe, back here!" Tyler screamed out as the nine year old girl turned over the couch, bending over the mark in the couch she had made with her bottom searching for Tyler atop the cushion.

"Tyler? Where did you go?" Chloe said genuinely confused as she bent over further not seeing the shrunken boy anywhere, Tyler's suspicions about Chloe knowing he had shrunk confirmed as he found himself watching Chloe's rear extending out towards him as she bent down to look for him.

The shrunken boy was then reminded of what it felt like to be pressed against Chloe's butt at his size, as the tremendous cheeks pressed up against him body while he was unable to move of fight back being stuck to her skirt.

It was at that same moment that Chloe felt a strange tingling feeling as something brushed against the surface of her left cheek, coming to the realization that Tyler had never left her ass since she first sat down on him.

"There you are!" Chloe announced jumping to her feet and spinning around making Tyler feel nauseous, as if he was riding a roller coaster at full speed as the young girl turned around.

Chloe then reached back under her skirt blindly using her small fingers to feel for Tyler, her nimble finger squeezing around his body as she plucked him from inside her skirt and up to her smiling face.

Of course after being sat on by this colossal child's plump rear end the journey from her hips to her face in only a few seconds seemed pretty normal, It was then that Tyler finally found himself under Chloe's gaze as she smiled down at him.

"Chloe what did you do to me?" he asked wanting to get straight to the point, still thinking that he was in charge of the young giantess many times his size.

"I shrunk you, that's what you get for not taking me to the candy store when I asked." Chloe giggled doing all of this for some petty childish reason, making herself the boss of Tyler as a form of poetic justice after not getting her way once.

"Chloe change me back, now!" Tyler said setting Chloe up to show him exactly who was in charge at this point, her giggles turning into laughter as he tried to boss her around at his size.

"Nope, at-least not until we've played all the fun games I made up for you and me to play at your size. Lucky you, I've been looking for a new doll to play with." Chloe laughed basically referring to Tyler as her toy.

Tyler tried to object but was quickly shutdown by Chloe's voice "Now, come with me to ____________ where I set up our first game.

1. ...the kitchen (Chloe has set up several bags of candy on the table along side a spinner to determine which one she eats and when, Tyler's job is to hide in one of the five bags while Chloe closes her eyes not to see him. After which she spins to see which Candy she gets to eat for five rounds, if Tyler's in the bag she spins then she gets to eat him. If he survives all five round then he get to play another game.)

2. ...my room (Chloe takes a small piece of paper and scribbles a few words on it before folding it up, she then tells Tyler that she wants him to get it back for her before the timer of 2 minutes runs out. Chloe takes off her boot and drops the note inside near the toe section and places the boot in front of Tyler before starting the clock.)
11212.title: Chloe's Act

112122.content:
“Let’s go up to my room where I’ve set up a little game for you too play with me.” Chloe said clearly not giving Tyler much of a choice when it came to being her shrunken living toy, making him wonder how long he’d be tasked with entertaining Chloe by playing her games before she’d end this cruel and unusual punishment and grow him back to normal size.

“Chloe how long do I have to be this small for? I don’t like the idea of being bug sized around you and Avery.” Tyler asked not wanting Chloe or Avery to accidentally crush him underfoot while they walked around the house or worse while he was the size of a common insect.

“I’ll make you big again once we’ve played all the games I can think up for us to play.” Chloe laughed leading Tyler to wonder if he would ever be able to return to his normal size, after all Chloe was an imaginative little girl with nearly unlimited creativity meaning that she could make up games to play with Tyler for days or maybe even weeks before she even started to get bored of him.

Of course this wouldn’t bother Chloe in the slightest since her life would never be in any danger while she played with her shrunken brother, as she continued walking up towards her room holding Tyler just below her smiling face as she climbed the stairs while continuing to hold Tyler at chest level.

Soon the young redhead made it to the top of the stairs and quickly turned down the hall towards her room, being extra careful to look around and make sure that Avery wasn’t walking out of either the bathroom or her room so she wouldn’t see Tyler.

Chloe then entered her room and proceeded to close and lock the door meaning that he and Tyler wouldn’t be experiencing any unwanted interruptions that might spoil the fun of her first game with her new toy.

Chloe slowly lowered her shrunken brother down to the carpeted floor of her room, each strand of fabric reaching above his knees making him realize just how tiny he had become. Although looking up at Chloe towering overhead the shrunken boy began to wonder what a taller girl might look like as his size, picturing Avery as a giant that could tower over an entire city based just off how big the 4’7 Chloe was.

The first thing that Tyler noticed upon setting eyes on the gigantic redheads room was that everything inside including her clothes and toys were several times bigger than him, and gave new possibilities for the many games Chloe would inevitably make up for him and her to play with her.

Chloe then turned to her right and lifted up a long brown boot(http://i.stpost.com/lamo-fotowear-sheeps...) that Tyler had seen Chloe wearing when she last had her friend Darcy Stewart over.

Chloe then dropped her near knee high tall boot down onto the floor in front of Tyler, the shrunken boy finding the size of the young girls footwear to be a bit overwhelming as it stretched up to a height taller than their house at normal size making him nervous about what Chloe might do next.

The young redhead then moved her hand towards her hips and pulled out a small piece of paper from the waistband of her panties, obviously already having something in mind for it during her first game, and while it wasn’t a very big piece of folded paper it was still slightly bigger than Tyler.

It was then that Chloe effortlessly dropped it into the boot and turned her attention back towards Tyler, whom she expected to retrieve the piece of paper from her boot but not before tilting it with her foot so Tyler would have to work extra hard to retrieve it from the toe section of her boot.

“Hey Tyler would you be a dear and get that piece of paper for me?” Chloe asked in a cute tone giggling at the thought of her shrunken brother climbing into her boot, prepared for any comeback he might come up with to get out of playing her game.

“No way Chloe, you must be crazy if you think I’d willingly climb into your smelly boot!” Tyler said playing right into Chloe’s plan as she looked down upon the one inch boy with her hand placed on the sides of her hips.

“Fine have it your way but if you’re not gonna play my game I might just decide to keep you trapped in my panties until you want to play my games.” Chloe said patting her crotch under her skirt and laughing at Tyler as he instantly began to reconsider his options.

Out of all the things Chloe could do to him at his size, Tyler couldn’t believe the Chloe would threaten to do the absolute last thing he’d ever want her to do with him so soon and quickly made a run towards the boot thinking that the smell of her feet would be a light slap on the wrist compared to spending even a few minutes trapped in the front of Chloe’s panties.

“I thought you might see things my way little bug.” Chloe teased while looking down towards the floor to see that the shrunken boy was fast approaching the rubber heel of her boot before climbing the outer stitching like a ladder up the towering structure.

Tyler couldn’t help but feeling as if he were some kind of trained monkey listening to Chloe’s instructions, making his way up the outer stitching oh the young redheads boot beginning to remind him of gym class where he had been forced to climb rope before he had quickly reached the top.

Looking down inside the smelly boot Tyler failed to see the bottom of the seemingly endless hole, the only thing he could see was actually the white stuffing that covered the first few feet going down into Chloe’s boot followed by normal fabric making him wonder how he’d safely get down or climb back out after entering the odorous footwear.

“Get in there.” Chloe laughed waving her hand behind Tyler and flicking him on the butt with her pointer finger, sending him falling down the center of her boot without anything but the insole below to cushion his fall.

Unfortunately the insole of this particular boot was anything but a comfortable landing zone for Tyler’s falling body, instead he landed on the hard worn down insole of Chloe's boot in a tiny puddle of sweat meaning that Chloe had clearly been wearing them recently.

"I'm getting bored waiting for you to get my note back for me so I'll give you thirty seconds to get it back to me starting right now, tick-tock." the young girl said giving Tyler a set time limit to finish her game not sure of what would happen if he were to lose.

Slowly Tyler rose to his feet feeling the damp insole of Chloe's boot swish and release sweat as his hands and knees pushed down on the surface before he continued walking towards the pitch black toe section of the boot.

Suddenly the outside of the boot grew quite and Tyler began to wonder what Chloe was doing outside the boot, had she left momentarily to start preparation for the next game, considering if he should turn back an attempt an escape before she returned.

Ultimately Tyler landed on the decision that this would be a losing strategy, after all if Chloe were still in the room and saw Tyler trying to escape who knows what she might do to him as punishment.

Therefore he continued to march into the shadow hidden toe section of Chloe's boot, not seeing anything until he had almost reached the end and while it was barely visible Tyler could see a white surface about half his size which he soon verified to be Chloe's note.

The shrunken boy picked up the note the best her could, the weight similar to that of a wooden chair at the dinner table, making it difficult to carry and run with simultaneously as he found himself stopped at the end of Chloe's boot with little light shinning in on him.

Tyler looked at the note and wondered what made this piece of paper so important that Chloe would ask him to get it, was it a clue to the next game or possibly a 'get out of game free' coupon that would free him from having to play one of Chloe's games.

Will Tyler's curiosity get the better of him or will he climb out of Chloe's boot first and worry about it later?

1) Tyler stops to read the paper which says something like "smell my feet", giving Chloe a chance to run down the time and slide her foot in the boot. Chloe would then walk downstairs to answer the door where her friend Darcy Stewart will be waiting for her(having used Tyler's phone to call her earlier).

2) Tyler hurriedly climbs out and manages to get over the edge just before Chloe shoves her foot in making her very unhappy, as a result she makes the next game much tougher, taping him to her chair while she lowers her butt down & giving him and offering a bad reward he wouldn't want if he won.
112122.title: Boot Tower Search

1121221.content:
Trying his best to ignore the foul odor produced by his youngest sister’s boot, Tyler stop on a large imprint at the end of the shoe where Chloe’s heel would rest.

A light flooding in from above offering him an opportunity to read the note Chloe had written, unfolding the small piece of paper only to see that a single word was written across the blank canvas.

“Gotcha!” was inscribed on the white sheet of paper, causing Tyler to panic as he realized he had willingly walked right into a trap.

He tried to make a climb for the exit but a dark shadow hovered over the entrance, soon realizing that it was Chloe’s foot held in a damp pink sock.

They must have been considerably old judging by the looks of them, the bottoms of the socks near the toe section had begun to darken, and there was a small hole that exposed the ball of her foot.

Behind this enormous foot threatening Tyler was the gargantuan child it was attached to, her face peering into the boot passed her foot.

“Looks like somebody’s not a very good listener.” Chloe smiled, placing her hands on her hips the same way she had seen Ellen and Avery do hundreds of times when talking down to someone else.

Chloe thoroughly enjoyed teasing Tyler as he stood inside her boot, picturing him as a little ant trapped in her boot that she could stomp with every other step she took.

The young redhead very slowly slid her toes into the boot first, wanting her shrunken brother to know how much power and control she had over him at her size.

Tyler tried making a run for the toe section of the boot hoping to avoid Chloe’s lingering toes for as long as possible, the smell of the young girls feet becoming more potent by the second.

“Where do you think you’re going little guy?” Chloe asked, knowing Tyler had nowhere to run as her foot wander through the inside of her boot.

It was so dark after a few more moments had passed that the shrunken boy could no longer see where he was going, running head first into the end of the boot.

Tyler watched helplessly as Chloe’s socked foot pressed down completely into the sole of the boot, finding himself trapped under the red haired girl’s big toe.

The stench of sweat and old cheese poured into his nostrils and Chloe rocked back from her heels to the tip of her toes, wanting to test how good of an insole Tyler was before taking him out for a test drive.

Just as Chloe was about to have some real fun with Tyler by jumping up and down she heard the sound of the doorbell, meaning somebody was at the door.

“Oh good, our surprise guest has arrived to play with us.” Chloe teased, exiting her room and making her way towards the front door.

The young redhead’s first few steps weren’t so bad, her largest toe casually pinning Tyler underneath it from head to toe.

Then things quickly took a turn for the worst the moment she exited her room, twisting her foot in an instant before increasing her walking speed.

Chloe laughed, purposely trying to hurt her shrunken brother before jogging towards the stairs.

Now the amount of impacts and the pain received from them were increased nearly ten fold, putting Tyler in constant pain.

It only got worse from the second the nine year old girl’s feet made contact with the first step of the stairs, followed by several fast paced steps.

While outside the boot it looked like Chloe was just a normal child going down the stairs, she was actually increasing her pace on purpose to torture Tyler.

The quiet thuds of her feet on the steps were like loud, thundering earthquakes to the shrunken boy forced to deal with the tremendous pressure of his sisters foot beating him to a pulp.

The young ginger giantess had to admit that her boots were actually much more comfortable with Tyler padding the toe section, making a swift turn halfway down the stairs.

Soon suffering the same torment that he had only moments earlier after Chloe made the sharp turn, her foot pushing down from the toes specifically as she took the last few steps.

Finally she reached the bottom of the stairs and rushed to the door, swinging it open to reveal her friend Darcy Stewart on the other side.

While Chloe was sassy, perky and rather energetic for her age, Darcy was feisty and manipulative, often getting people to do what she wants without them knowing.

The young nine year old girl has medium length brown hair, is about two or three inches taller than Chloe and has a small crush on Tyler.

Although all that Tyler could remember about Darcy was that she faked not liking him, and that she had a fondness for the taste of strawberries.

"Hi Chloe, are you ready to___________."

1. "... play in the backyard" Chloe leads Darcy into the backyard where she planned to jump rope, play tag, ect, but before she can say what game their going to play Darcy makes a comment about Chloe's boots and easily convinces Chloe to trade footwear with her, unfortunately for Tyler she is wearing flip-flops without socks.

2. "... show me your shrunken brother, I bet he looks so cute at his size." Darcy is aware that Chloe had shrunken Tyler, she was even the one that had convinced Chloe to do so.
1121221.title: Message Recieved

11212212.content:
From his prison inside of his little sister's smelly boot, beaten and battered by her wet socks, Tyler somehow still found himself surprised as Darcy mentioned his size. Chloe had only just shrunken him and she had been to busy trapping him inside her boot to have called and told her close friend about her brother's new found size. For a moment he hoped that Chloe wouldn't be able to get her boots off, maybe then he'd evade the two evil little girls. Although another whiff of Chloe's cheesy foot funk, made him reconsider that wish.

With a pop, Chloe managed to pull her right boot off. She tilted it over her hand, causing her big brother to tumble out and land in a heap on her palm. As the shrunken boy stood upright, he found the two girls staring at him, their faces within mere inches.

"Ewwww," Darcy suddenly recoiled as she caught a whiff of her friend's boot, "That's so mean," she added with a giggle.

"Sure!" Chloe replied excitedly, her hand closing around Tyler before he could voice his refusal, "What'd you want to do?"

"That sounds fun!" Chloe replied as the two girls walked into the living room.

1122.content:
Karl Fink had managed to infiltrate the James/Jenning's household in order to spy on what they were up to manly Avery and Chloe who was usually nice to him on, this time he had used a special device he had dubbed the shrink ray to shrink down to a small size and easily sneak into their home. This also helped him escape his on home since he was grounded for doing exactly what he was doing now, spying. He entered the home through the back door which was left wide open as usual, he saw Ellen who was just cleaning up after making the lunch her daughter Avery and her two step children Tyler and Chloe who were all eating at the table.

Once Ellen had finished cleaning she heard her husband Bennett James call out to see if her and Tyler was ready to go, most likely to the high school to discuss Tyler's poor GPA in comparison to Avery's. Chloe stayed at the table reaching onto a nearby chair and grabbing a bag of skittles to munch on now that her parents were gone, after all she had always had a sweet tooth and candy hidden throughout the house. Avery on the other hand left to go to the living room and do some studying, Karl had always had a bit of a crush on Avery and thought that this would be a perfect opportunity to get closer to her since she wouldn't be able to see him sneaking up on her.

Who will Karl attempt to get closer to in order to spy on?
1122.title: Shrunken Spy

11221.content:
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Bpog_eAIQAIa...

Personal interests aside Karl decided that spying on Chloe first was the optimal choice given his current situation. Sure he'd love to get closer to Avery and find out her interests, but it wasn't exactly like he could accomplish such a goal while she was in the middle of her studies.

His first move was simply the action of running across the kitchen floor, though at his size no activity was considered simple. Each tile taking him nearly a minute each to cross on foot, something that would take a normal person less than a second to accomplish. After reaching the table Karl immediately choose to hide himself behind the closest leg, looking upwards to if the gigantic Chloe had managed to spot him.

"Whoa, she is quite big now. I had no idea the shrink ray would make me this small." Karl said to himself aloud, taken back by the young child's size. Even her brown laced boots which reached only halfway up to her knees rivals the size of two houses standing side by side, reminding him of the story about the elder women who lived inside a shoe.

Switching his attention back to the red haired girl, Karl noticed he couldn't quite make out Chloe's face from down here. Quickly coming to the conclusion that if he wanted to properly spy on Chloe at this size he'd have to do it up close and personal with her, meaning he'd have to first climb her body.

With a new primary objective set for himself Karl ran underneath the table unseen towards Chloe's feet, jumping onto her toes and running to climb up her bootlaces. Luckily he was so small now that he could handle be felt doing this, much like an ant or other small insect.

Karl prayed Chloe remained ignorant of his presence as he continued to climb to the top of her boots, reminding him of the one time his mother forced him into rock climbing. However without a harness secured to his abdomen one mistake likely meant that his body would meet the hard tiles below with a *splat*.

Try as he might to push these thoughts far from his mind, they neither disappeared or softened as each movement he made brought him further from the ground. Soon the little spy found himself latching onto the rough denim of Chloe's jeans, moving up her leg with very little to hold onto.

"Why did I need to make myself so small? I could have gotten around so much better at five inches tall instead of one." Karl pondered to himself out loud, knowing fully well he wouldn't be heard. It took him a minute or two but he finally managed to reach the young girl's slanted knees, finally giving him a flat surface on which he could walk normally.

Looking up from the young giantess's thigh, Karl realized he could finally see Chloe's face clearly. She appeared to be chewing on something, thoroughly smashing it to bits as she moved it around her mouth with her tongue. He assumed it was some kind of candy, through his past investigations he learned Chloe had a real reputation in the Jame/Jennings household as a sweet tooth. That being known he was never able to identify what flavors she favored the most, or even what brands of candy she enjoyed the most. If only he could get himself onto the round surface of the kitchen table, then he could identify first hand what kind of candy Chloe liked most.

What happens next?

1. Chloe reaches for something across the table, unknowingly knocking Karl between her thighs where he is sure to be discovered. Though her reaction might also attract the attention of her step sister Avery.

2. Chloe stands up to get a drink from the refrigerator, knocking Karl onto the surface of her seat. With no way down he attempts to abandon his mission and call out for help before he is sat on by Chloe.

3. Karl continues climbing Chloe without any issues, even making it onto the table without being seen. However with nothing to hide behind he must quickly climb into one of Chloe's candy bags before he is spotted.

Meaning that she wouldn't be moving as much as Chloe, thus making her the safer choice for him to spy on. Clearly Avery was the better option among his two choices, Chloe was simply to unpredictable for him to approach at this size. So with his mind made up Karl decided to walk across the kitchen to spy on Avery, even though she was further away from him.

-5 Minutes Later-

Karl had crossed the kitchen with ease, able to walk across the floor undetected like a lone bug. Happy that at no point did Chloe decide to stand up, realising how easily she could have mistaken him for a bug and crushed him underfoot. But that was one of the trade offs he had to accept when deciding to spy on the Jennings/James household at this size. Besides, as long as he was careful that would never happen.

However he quickly shook these thoughts from his mind, he shouldn't ruin his reputation as a spy trying to find such pervy answers. Although it wasn't like he'd get caught if he only took a peek, right? Not like anyone would ever be able to find out, he was so small nobody could say they saw him doing it. Even Avery, provided he stay out of her line of sight that is.

What answers will Karl seek?

1. What material is Avery studying? Karl walks behind her stack of Textbooks where he is discovered by Avery, who caused enough of a commotion to attract Chloe who at first believes that Karl is only a toy and that Avery was pulling her leg.

2. What's Avery's shoe size? Karl walks down the length of Avery's body towards her feet, hoping to find out her shoe size. However when she kicks off her clogs he becomes trapped close to her bare feet. Grabbed and squeezed by her toes numerous times while she absentmindedly plays with Carpet fuzz as she continues studying.

3.What color are Avery's panties? Karl gives into his desire to learn what color Avery's panties are, promising himself that he'd resume spying discretely after finding out the answer. 11222.title: Spying on Avery

11223.content:
Karl decided that Avery was the better of the sisters to spy on. Not only was she closer in age to him and considerably prettier, but he had a feeling she would be more interesting than watching Chloe eat Skittles. Besides, watching candy not much bigger than him disappear into the giant little girl's mouth was rather terrifying. He couldn't imagine a worse fate than having a distracted Chloe accidentally grab him in a fist full of Skittles and send him to the depths of her stomach.

For all of these reasons, Karl jogged into the living room where the blonde beauty was studying. He came to a stop standing before the enormous flip flop clad feet of his neighbor as she sat at the table, no doubt hard at work on some school assignment. However, Karl made a crucial mistake as he stood in awe of the gigantic Avery: he was standing in plain sight, making no attempt to conceal himself should she decide to look under the table.

Unfortunately for Karl, that is just what she did. A loud boom echoed right next to Karl as a large object fell from the heavens onto the floor next to him. Looking at what was apparently a large pillar, his heart stopped as he read the characters written on the side: "No. 2". It was Avery's pencil! And as Karl turned back towards where Avery's feet had been, he now saw the giantess on her hands and knees, looking down at him in utter shock.

"Karl? Is that you?" Avery asked in disbelief.

Karl decided that being found at this size was not going to end well for him, so he took off sprinting as fast as his legs could carry him away from Avery. Unfortunately for Karl, that wasn't very fast at all. Within seconds his feet were flailing in midair, no longer able to touch the ground as Avery's enormous fingers wrapped around him and dragged him up into the air. When his ascent halted he found himself looking into the eyes of a very angry looking Avery with an evil smile on her face.

"Chloe! Get in here!" Avery shouted into the other room.

In a few moments, the young red head joined the predator and her prey in the living room. "What is it Avery?"

"Check out what I found" Avery said, unfurling her fingers and leaving Karl resting on the palm of her hand.

"Is that Karl? He is so tiny! He looks like a little gummy bear!" Chloe exclaimed, always having candy on the brain. "I wonder if he tastes like one too." Chloe continued, licking her lips. The sight of the young girl contemplating devouring him nearly stopped Karl's tiny heart. He turned back up to Avery and began to beg, hoping she would protect him from the hungry little girl.

"Avery, I'm sorry! I know I shouldn't have spied on you guys again! Please don't let Chloe eat me!" Karl begged, more terrified than he had ever been in his life.

"Don't worry Karl. I won't let Chloe eat you. At least, not yet. Right now, I think you need to be taught a lesson for spying on us girls. Don't you think so Chloe?" Avery asked.

"Yeah! Avery and I are gonna teach you what happens to people who spy on beautiful girls like us!" Chloe shouted, excited to help her older sister punish the tiny boy.

"What are you going to do with me?" Karl asked, not really wanting to know the answer but relieved he was safe from Chloe's gullet for the moment.

"It's simple Karl." Avery explained, "We are going to do the same thing you have probably watched us do hundreds of times before. I'm going to walk Stan, and Chloe is going to ride her bike behind me as I do so. As for you, you'll be accompanying us...."

"...taped to my flip flop." Avery said with a smile. Karl immediately began pleading and begging for Avery to reconsider.

"Taped to your flip flop!? You can't be serious! Look, I'm sorry for spying on you. Just please turn me back to normal and I can assure you that this situation will never happen again."

Avery put her finger to her lips and began to bounce her head from side to side as if she was pondering the situation. There was no way she was going to pass up a situation where she would practically have a living insole, but she wanted to inject Karl with false hope.

Avery smiled to herself and begin to move her arch up and down, slamming her warn, slightly sweaty sole into her arch rival, causing Karl to scream and beg for mercy yet again.

The next 20 minutes were utter Hell for Karl as his body was taken to the fullest limit. With each step Avery took, his body grew weaker and weaker. More injured and drained of energy. "Hmm...
112231.title: Getting Attached to Avery's Footwear

112232.content:
Avery grinned as Karl stammered out some gibberish in the palm of her hand. She didn’t give the tiny boy much time to form an argument though, instead turning to her younger sister.

“Here you go, Chloe,” Avery said with a grin as she handed the shrunken spy off to her little sister, “Get him ‘buckled up’, while I grab Stan’s leash.”

Karl gulped as he looked at the younger girl. Curly redhead looked back down at Karl, barely able to contain her giggles as a wide grin covered her face. She wouldn’t have thought of something as fun as using Karl as her bike seat, but that was one of the reasons she loved her big sister so much. Karl meanwhile struggled against and pounded on the titanic eight year old’s fingers, begging for escape. Chloe wasn’t about to let him out of her grasp.

Without any more time wasted, Chloe scurried out into the garage where her bike awaited her. It was a light shade of pink with a red seat and white handlebar grips, perfectly matching how she looked on this particular day. Red hair as always, pink sundress, and white sandals. Chloe stopped besides the back and held her hand over the worn seat, releasing her grasp on Karl. The tiny boy feel with a yelp, before landing on the soft surface of the bike seat. Chloe looked down at him and giggled, thoroughly enjoying the idea of turning the shrunken spy in to a bit of extra seat cushioning. However, she suddenly got a confused look on her face, recalling her big sister’s instruction to get Karl “buckled up.” Her eyes soon lit up as her own idea came to pass and she ran back into the house.

Karl was left alone on the field of red. It was still a bit sweaty from Chloe’s ride yesterday which, true to Avery’s prediction, he actually had been watching. Of course, it was that very same session of spying that had gotten him grounded. He looked over the edge of the crimson plateau he had been confined too. The hard cement floor of the garage was at least a hundred feet down. A jump like that was likely to break his leg, and even if it didn’t he couldn’t see anywhere to run or hide before Chloe got back. That and considering the punishment for spying was being sat on by Chloe during her bike ride, he realized that an attempted escape would only make things worse. Avery might even decide that he should instead be strapped to the bike’s peddle and slowly crushed beneath her little sister’s thick sandals. With that terrifying and painful though in mind, he stayed put. Though as soon as Chloe returned, with a three foot length of string, he began to regret his decision.

“I found your seatbelt,” the little girl said with a giggle at her own joke.

Karl didn’t say anything in response, best not to give her anymore satisfaction at hearing him beg, question, or try to command her. Karl watched as Chloe crouched down besides the bike and tied the string to the underside of the seat, attaching it firmly to some bar or spring below. He was starting to become curious about her intentions, but still refused to dignify the little girl’s actions with any response. He quickly learned what Chloe intended though when her massive thumb pushed down on him, forcing him onto his back and his arms down beside him. He struggled to breathe as Chloe used her other hand to wrap the string over him, under the seat, and then back over again. She continued this three times until, the string wrapped over Karl’s waist, legs, and shoulders. Then she did it twice more to be safe, crisscrossing the string in an X over his body before she tied the end into the tightest, most complex knot she could manage. Karl found the “seatbelt” highy effective, much to his displeasure, he could only move his fingers, toes, and head with the way the string ran tightly over his body. For him though, it wasn’t mere twine, it looked like thick woven ropes and felt like iron wire as it dug painfully into his skin. Looking from side to side, he saw that the seat itself wasn’t even spared as the string created indents on the seat edged. By this point, Karl wasn’t worried about giving Chloe satisfaction. He simply yelled for help, hoping that someone might free him.

Chloe paid him no mind as she opened the garage and wheeled her bike out. At the edge of the driveway, she spotted her older sister, waiting with their pet dog. Chloe smiled as she swung one leg over the bike so that she stood astride it, but didn’t sit on it. She wanted Karl to be able to get a good view as she sat on him. Karl felt a wisp of fabric fly across his face as Chloe’s sundress flew by. As he shook off the feeling, he looked up to see Chloe standing before him, back to him. Though Avery had seemed like a skyscraper standing before him when he had first shrunk, now that he was tied down and helpless, Chloe somehow seemed to stand even taller. He looked the massive girl up and down, following the red curls at the top of her head down until they stopped just above her hips, which were currently dancing back and forth, ready to be seated. As if sensing, that Karl had taken in the full, horrifying view, Chloe moved to sit down, but about halfway down, only a few feet from Karl, something stopped her. The tiny boy watched the young girl’s behind hang above him like a cloud in the sky, a very low, heavy cloud that is. Without warning, Chloe used one hand to flip up her dress so that it covered her bike seat like a circus tent, leaving Karl inside staring up at Chloe’s white, panty-covered butt in the dim light. Karl let out one final cry for help, this one a scream of terror before Chloe’s butt resumed its descent, slamming down on him and silencing his cries for help.

With a smile, Chloe continued on her way, almost as if nothing was different. She let her bike coast to the end of the driveway, where she met up with her sister.

“Hi, Avery!” She said excitedly, “I’m all ready for a normal bike ride, just like I do everyday,” Chloe said, holding back laughter.

“Really?” Avery asked, playing along with the young girl’s joke, “Nothing’s different.”

“Nope, nothing,” Chloe replied as she felt Karl scream into her panty-covered behind, “I hope that Karl isn’t spying on us, he can be such a pain in the butt,” Chloe said with a laugh.

Her big sister also chuckled at her joke before replying, “Don’t worry, I’m sure he has more pressing issues than watching us.”

The two girls giggled as they began their daily routine as if Karl wasn’t currently tied down under Chloe’s butt. For Karl though, it was far from his normal day’s activity. Chloe didn’t seem like that heavy of a girl, even if she probably did chow down on candy more than most people her age. Unfortunately at an inch tall, the weight of an eight year old with a love for candy felt less like ‘not that much’ and a lot more like ‘ten cement trucks stacked up on top of each other’. To make matters worse, Chloe wasn’t just sitting on him, she was literally riding him. Each pump of the pedals lifted one side of the redhead’s immature, candy-loving, baby fat-covered ass into the air a few inches, while pressing the other half down onto Karl’s body. Then as she continued through the pedaling motion, the process reversed. The half of Chloe’s posterior that was lifted in the air would slam down and press into him as if it was trying to squeeze the juice out of a piece of fruit. Meanwhile the other buttcheek would rise up into the air, like a medieval weapon ready to strike. The process was slow and deliberate to, with Chloe riding at a leisurely, winding pace behind her big sister. As a result of this, Karl was forced to watch as Chloe’s ass shifted back and forth, one cheek slowly driving into him and then continue to push until he was flattened into the seat, the other cheek lifting into the air to wait its turn. This even meant that at some points, Karl was nearly suffocated when Chloe’s minimal speed caused a few seconds to pass with both butt cheeks pressing onto him, one in the process of lifting, the other in the process of falling, and Karl in the middle without anywhere to get fresh air from.

The ride continued on for eternity, with Karl experiencing the same torture for what felt like hours on end. He had once told himself, sometime in the past, that this repeated torment would eventually become something he was used to, something that wouldn’t bother him so much after a while. But it wasn’t something he had gotten used to, it was something that he was now trying to scream away. His muscles and bones ached in pain, a combination of crushing force from the eight year old controlling his world and his own feeble attempts to rebel against the tight strings. His voice had gone horse from futilely yelling into the impenetrable wall of panty-covered butt flesh lying before him. Fortunately, he soon felt Chloe stop riding and stand up, leaving him untouched but with her behind hanging above and her sundress draping down around him. His ears were the only sense that hadn’t been assaulted since he was dropped onto the seat, so they were in perfect working condition to hear the conversation above.

“Why’d we stop, sis?” Chloe asked Avery.

Avery turned and responded by saying, "I think that we should….”

Choice 1: “Head home, I have homework to finish” (Chloe and Avery head back to the house, where Avery continues Karl’s punishment by using him as a stress reliever while she works on math homework)

Choice 2: “Stop and get a snack” (Chloe and Avery stop by a candy shop and buy a snack, they insist that Karl joins them while they enjoy it)

Choice 3: "Take Stan for a jog to the park, think you can keep up?" (Avery jogs with Stan while Chloe is forced to pick up the pace and break at intersections, making Karl's situation even worse under her.)

It was the middle of Summer in the Jennings/James household, meaning it had been months since Stan first spoke on live TV and became a world famous star.

The whole family and a few family friends had gathered in the backyard of their home, celebrating that nobody would ever experiment on Stan again.

Ellen, Bennett, Chloe, Tyler, Max, Nikki, Avery, and Karl had all shown up, the backyard feeling very lively in the mix of constant conversation between a few small parties.

“...and I was like ‘good one Ellen’ and everybody totally laughed” Ellen said, having just finished explaining a story from nearly a year ago to Karl Fink.

“Haha, it’s always delightful to hear your stories Mrs. Jennings, please tell me another.” Karl said, trying to be the polite young man he had always acted like towards the older woman.

Although in the past he had only acted this way towards the mother of the family so he could spy on Avery, Tyler, and Chloe he now seemed to actually enjoy Ellen’s company.

Meanwhile Bennett was busy talking off Max and Nikki’s ears off about his latest book, which had several articles of his experiences with ‘Stan the talking dog’.

Of course nearly Nikki or Max ever found out that stan could talk until they saw it live on TV, both young girl looking over towards Avery, Tyler, and Chloe having a conversation of their own.

“I can’t believe everything actually worked out so well, I just wish Stan could be here.” Avery said, sad that stan couldn’t be in attendance for a party they were hosting in his honor.

“Yea, but he’s all the way in California this week, you have to remember that he’s a big time celebrity now.” Tyler commented, walking away to join Ellen and Karl’s conversation.

“Don’t worry about it Avery, we’ll have fun today with or without Stan today.” Chloe said with a smile, turning to the fourteen year old blonde girl she looked up to as her big sister.

“You know what, you’re right.” Avery said, walking to a small table Ellen had set up for snacks and drinks and grabbing a cup of the punch her and Chloe had made earlier that morning.

“Hello! I’d like to thank you all for coming here to wish Stan the best of luck with his new lifestyle. And, while he can’t be here to thank you all, I know Stan really appreciates this. To Stan.” Avery smile, raising her cup.

“To Stan!” the group said, raising their own cups and taking a drink of the punch giving the four year old dog(28 in dog years) a toast.

Soon after taking a united drink of red liquid the entire group began to feel strange, watching as everything grew around them as their bodies began to dwindle away in size.

Only after a few seconds later everyone had shrunken down to the size of Chloe, in fact they were exactly the same size as Chloe except for Avery who stood at her normal height above all.

Was it taking longer for one of them to shrink since they had their drinks after everyone else, or were they not shrinking at all?

Who will remain towering over everybody else when they finish shrinking?
