It had been nearly a year since Lucas Friar moved from Texas to New York, hanging out in the halls of John Quincy Adams High School.

In that time Lucas had really come to like his new group of friends, which included his best friend Farkle Minkus and close friend Riley Matthews and Maya Hart.

Although he had previously dated both Riley and Maya the young Texan tried not to let it affect their friendship, which proved difficult at times.

It was nearly 4pm on a thursday when Lucas was planning to work on a science fair project for extra credit, looking for some kind of hidden message for Mr.Matthews class.

No doubt he must have been expecting it since Lucas was only doing this for a higher letter grade, rather wanting an A+ instead of a B+ for a science grade.

While it was only a simple experiment on static cling and how well it can stick two object together, the young Texan was about to have his experiment go south real fast.

Lucas was in a small workshop that was available for students who wanted to work on assignments in peace, although at the time he was the only one there.

He was in the process of setting up different methods in which static electricity is formed, rubbing two balloons together or dragging her socked feet across a carpet.

Lucas was in the process of testing which of the two built a stronger amount of static electricity when his phone buzzed.

He went to pick his phone up on instinct forgetting about the charge his body had gathered, receiving a small but violent shock from his phone.

Suddenly the room began to spin as Lucas took a seat on his chair try and clear his head, the room appearing to be growing in size.

”...be there soon.” was all that Lucas could remember reading from the text he received, wondering who could be showing up.

After all the only people he could remember telling that he’d be working on his science fair project was Riley and Maya.

Although who had texted him seemed like a rather small concern to his current predicament as Lucas realized he was shrinking in size.

“Whats happening to me?” he asked himself as his body shrunk passed the point where his feet no longer reached the floor, still getting smaller by the second.

After only thirty short seconds Lucas found himself at an even smaller height when his feet didn’t even extend off the cushion of his chair.

Finally his body stopped shrinking at about 1 inch tall in height, coming to his scenes as he examined the room for a way of getting help.

However before he could look for a way of getting help he'd have to get off this chair, which would prove harder than he thought as he realized he was stuck to the chair.

"Someone, help!" he yelled, before hearing the sound of someone turning the handle to the door on the other side of the room.

The door swung open followed by the sound of a feminine voice calling his name, but what was she calling him? " Hey___________, are you in here?"

following a series of footsteps approaching the station he was working at making him increasing nervous that he might be accident sat on by the giant girl if she didn't notice him in time.

1. Lucas- Riley Matthews

2. Ranger Rick- Maya Hart

3. More choices(Could be Topanga, another girl from their school, or both Riley and Maya at the same time.)

Cory began to feel very tired, he told himself he'd head to the teachers lounge and make himself a fresh cup of coffee to help himself wake up. Only fifteen or twenty minutes could have passed before Cory Matthews opened his eyes once again, though his classroom had changed dramatically over the past few minutes. Everything was still roughly the same and for the most part everything was still perfectly in its place. However one major aspect had changed, the size of his classroom. Hard as it was for him to believe Cory came to accept that he'd somehow been shrunk to only an inch tall in height, too small even to pick up an ordinary piece of chalk. Jake leaned back against the table and stated that he was ready for the young girl to snap a picture of him, whipping his hair to the side not wanting to look bad in even a single picture.

"Say cheese." the young girl smiled mischievous as her finger came down on the button, releasing a small flash of light that made Jake feel strange as everything around him started to change.

"I'm shrinking!" he said noticing that the room, the table behind him, and most importantly the girl in front of him were all growing in size, while he dwindled down in size until he stood no taller than one inch in height.

The girl who had used the camera on Jake to shrink him wasted no time in rushing over towards him to pick him up, luckily since the event was almost over not many people were left and nobody seemed to have noticed the young girl shrink him.

The young blonde girl stomped her silver platform heel inches away from Jake, nearly crushing him in the process as he tried to run away from the towering preteen.

"Where do you think your going little man?" she asked bending over to pick him up, a twinkle appearing in her eyes being the first person to ever shrink a celebrity down to doll size.

The titanic sized ten year old wrapped her hand around Jake and swiftly enclosed him in her fist, struggle as hard as he could Jake could even budge the giant girls fingers wrapped so tightly around his body.

The unnamed girl then brought Jake to her smiling face as she walked towards the exit "Well she was right that was easy, now all I have to do is bring you to her and I get my contest passes for the next year." giggling.

"Wait who are you bringing me to?" Jake asked not getting an answer from the girl as she had brought him to the other side of the room to strap him in for the long walk she had to take to get to her destination.

Slipping off her right shoe the girl simply giggled at the one inch tall boy and said "Try not to get too smushed under my foot, I can't get my prize if your not alive when we get there." dropping Jake onto the silver surface, outline with an imprint of the young girls foot.

Powerless to stop her Jake attempted to run off the 2 inch tall as she stood up before having his body eclipsed by her shadow as she her foot came down from above him.

Jake could only reach the toe section of the young girls footwear before finding himself quickly pinned beneath her warm sweaty toes, on the hottest day of the week no less.

Her foot already hot and sweaty the young girl began a seven block walk to a Hannah Montana concert going on across town, being trapped under the young girls naked toes Jake quickly began to feel Nautilus.

Time again he was stomped between her foot and the hard surface of the raised flat, until about halfway there he passed out from a combination of the smell, sweat, and unbearable pain.

---1 hour later---

Jake awoke on a warm fleshy surface under a TV the was doing a report on him going missing, however he would be more surprised as he turned around to find out that he was being held in ____________ hand, after the little girl from earlier had delivered him to her.

11533.title: Miley, Lilly?

115331.content:
Miley Stewart started her day not as her superstar alter ego, but as a normal teenager walking into school. The halls of Seaview High abuzz with the chatter and gossip among students, teachers held up in their classrooms awaiting the anticipated sound of the bell to clear the halls.

She approached her locker in the south hallway, half expecting to find her best friend Lilly Truscott waiting for her when she arrived. Miley had been worried about her these past few days, not hearing a peep from her since the Hannah Montana concert on Saturday night.

Instead Miley found an unwelcomed surprise waiting for her close to her locker in the shape of her and Lilly’s school rivals, Amber and Ashley. The Asian and African American girls leaning against the wall with there arms folded over their respective chests.

Miley considered turning back now before they spotted her, not like she needed her science textbook for class anyways. A bad grade hardly seemed like something to worry about when compared with the possible social humiliation she’d likely face at the hands of Amber and Ashley without Lilly here to back her up.

Their combined attention suddenly turning towards Miley as both Amber and Ashley laid eyes upon the brunette girl on route to her locker. The two sharing a glance, agreed now would be a could time to spring into action against their common enemy.

“Hey Miley, what’s wrong?” Amber said aloud, giving an opening for her Asian counterpart to mock Miley.

“Where’s your shadow?” asked Ashley, stepping in Miley’s path. Stopping her from continuing further down the hall. Her comment obviously referring to Lilly’s absence.

“Oh, hey Amber, Ashley! Didn’t see you there. You know, since you’re both so little.” Miley teased, Holding her hand at eye level. Attempting to defend herself with witty banter. Sure, Amber and Ashley were shorter than Miley, but the differences in their sizes was hardly a few inches. In truth Miley was simply taller than most girls her age.

“Oh yeah, well it’s not our fault your freakishly tall Stewart.” Ashley replied first, leading the path for her darker skin toned friend to follow up.

“So true, plus guys hate it when girls that are taller than them(unless they’re reading this story). Guy’s like Zeke Ackerman.” Amber commented as Zeke strolled passed the trio of girls.

“Hi Zeke!” Amber and Ashley said in unison, talking in a flirtatious and waving their hair as he walked by. He turned and waved back, displaying a friendly smile as he continued to walk by. This upset Miley, knowing full well that Amber and Ashley recalled her having a crush on Zeke.

“We’ll be seeing you later Miley, for now we’re gonna catch up with Zeke.” Amber smiled, turning to Ashley and taping the tips of their fingers together. “Ooh tss.” the two girls reciting their signature phrase between them.

Miley walked off in a huff as the bell rang, the halls quickly clearing of all students. “Great!” she thought aloud, her confrontation with her and Lilly’s rivals making her late for class.

Moment’s later she arrived at her locker, reaching up to enter the combination when she noticed that the dial was higher up than usual. What’s more is that the hallway also appeared to be a bit wider and taller than usual. Miley simply chucked this up to her mind playing tricks on her, that is until she tried to enter her combination.

As she reached up to her top locker, Miley found it getting higher and further away from her. She couldn’t deny what was going on any longer, some way, some how she was shrinking.

Miley turned and looked for the nearest classroom, hoping somebody could help her. She panicked, running for the closest classroom, the height of the handle already exceeding her size at her diminished stature. It seems that becoming aware of herself slowly shrinking away did nothing to stop it from happening, instead it seems to have increased the rate at which she was dwindling away.

Before long, she reached a foot tall in height. Accepting that she would likely continue shrinking for a bit longer, moving closer to the wall as she became only a few inches tall. Hoping to avoid being crushed beneath the stomping feet of her classmates as they re-entered the hallways.

Finally at about one inch tall in height it all just stopped, no longer did the halls get any larger. But the damage was done, she was almost bug sized and nobody knew that she’d been shrunken down to such a tiny size.

That’s when __________ started walking down the hallway towards her.

121.title: Liv and Maddie

1211.content:
Joey Rooney was out in the backyard during a sunny day in the middle of spring, they had time off from school for the week and he was feeling kind of bored.

Parker was out with his friend Dump-Truck from school, while his older twin sister's were too busy with personal things to hang out.

Maddie was tremendously focused on practicing to play basketball in her senior year, she wanted to end her high school career with her team as the division champs two years straight.

Liv on the other hand was preparing for the season finally of her new show Voltage, where she finally encounters a main villain in the series known as Dr. Speck.

Dr. Speck was also one of Joeys favorite comic book villains, the character was an inch tall scientist with the most engenius brain on the planet. He was capable of creating dangerous traps and outwit Voltage at every turn.

He wasn't sure who could possible play the role of Dr. Speck or even who would be playing him, a character that small would be hard to make for her series even with special effects.

Joey took a second to close his eyes, wondering what the best use of his time would be for the day when suddenly he felt strange.

The middle child of the family was extremely surprised to find that a large boulder had somehow been transported in front of him, or rather that's what he thought it was.

Looking closer at his surroundings Joey was quickly able to distinguish that the large rock in front of him was a mere pebble, he had been shrunk to the point where his body was only an inch tall.

"What... is... happening?" he asked himself, both confused and intrigued by what was happening. One minute he was thinking about Dr. Speck and the next thing he knows he is standing at the villain's exact height.

Was it possible he had somehow gained the power to shrink himself?

He didn't have much time to consider his situation much before he felt strong vibrations occurring in a pattern, they were getting stronger and occurring in a pattern, almost like footsteps.

In fact they were footsteps, belonging to non other than _________ as she walked into the backyard.

1. Maddie- Unaware that Joey had been shrunk, she's holding a basketball and wearing her uniform. Alerting Joey to the threat that she had most likely come outside to practice, until he could get her attention he'd have to dodge both her feet and the bouncing ball.

2. Liv- Shrunk him on purpose using a special device, she then tells him that the reason that she shrunk him was so that he could play Dr. Speck on her show. Once there and in costume she will explain what type of scene they'll be shooting.
1211.title: Shrinking Superpower?

12111.content:
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-OG-jOfeRByY/Ue...
https://www.movietele.it/files/images/ga...

Standing at only an inch tall, Maddie's height widely surpassed Joey's highest expectations as she exited their home, dressed in her uniform with a basketball in hand. He jumped up and down, waving his arms as he called out the name of the blonde giantess, gaining no response from her as her sneakers struck the concrete with earth shattering force.

"Maddie, Maddie, look down!" Joey continued, hoping she might take notice of him as more than a bug on the ground before she kicked off her practice for the afternoon. Although these hopes fell upon deaf ears as Maddie rolled the orange sphere along the curves of her palm, her large silver sneaker casting a shadow over him.

Realizing he was about to be crushed under his sister's foot like one of the countless insects she likely stomped into oblivion before him, the shrunken began running as fast as his short legs could manage, though it didn't help that he wasn't exactly the athletic type. Luckily he was near the end of her her foot's shadow, saving him indefinitely as he narrowly escaped the space where foot and stone met.

Though he had escaped death it was not without injury of any kind, the seismic event created from the blonde's footstep sent him back roughly fifteen to twenty feet in front of her. Leaving his skin scraped and cut, his clothing ripped in certain areas as Joey struggled to rise to his feet.

However, his problems did not stop there as the shrunken boy focused his attention upwards just in time to see Maddie begin her practice session. Her palm grasped the top of the ball, trusting it down to the ground below in front of her feet, landing close to where Joey had been standing. The sound created by the house sized orb nearly deafening him at such a close range before it reversed direction towards Maddie's waiting hand.

Joey, not wanting to relive his latest experience of nearly being crushed under his sister's footwear started running in the direction of the lawn, think he might be safe in the tall grass for the time being.

"Maddie Rooney, lines up the shot." The blonde giantess announced, narrating an imaginary game as she tossed the ball into the air, bouncing it off the backboard and into the net.

"She scores! Bam, what?" Maddie cheered, following up her statement with her own catchphrase as she jumped up and down excitedly. Meanwhile Joey's world was quite literally turned on it's head as his sister shook the ground itself under her feet, creating conditions similar to an earthquake for the one inch tall boy.

Luckily the experience was a short one as Maddie quickly regained her composure, though it was hardly over from Joey's perspective as he continued feeling tremors at a much slowly pace. Looking forward he could clearly see Maddie's feet were planted firmly on the ground, meaning something else was the cause of this aftershock.

Looking back over his shoulder Joey quickly came to the conclusion that it was Maddie's basketball bouncing back towards her, unfortunately for him he was in it's way and the giant rubbery ball had no quarrels with crushing any bug that got in it's way.

"Maddie, Maddie please! You have to help me!" Joey yelled, hoping that his words might reach his sister's eardrums. However his screaming was being completely drowned out by the sound of her basketball as it bounced along the concrete.

Before he even had time to move the dark orange sphere was hovering overhead, seemingly motionless for a moment as it reached the peak of it's bounce. Within seconds it was coming right for him like a fiery meteorite, threatening to wipe him of the face of the planet, he closed his eyes expecting the worst but nothing happened.

Looking up he saw Maddie lifting the ball into the air, having caught it just before it crushed Joey, unaware that she had just saved her very little brother in that moment. He had never been so scared in all of his life, needless to say he was no longer intrigued by the idea of shrinking, not after realizing how dangerous it was to be so tiny.

Being in a world where he was small meant that everyone was as tall as Maddie or bigger, suddenly he realized he could do anything at this size. If he tried to make food in the kitchen his mother Karen might accidentally bake him into something for herself or his gigantic sisters, he couldn't even watch Voltage on TV without fear that Liv would sit on him just to see herself on the show.

That's when Joey decided that he wanted to be big again by any means necessary, but first that meant escaping to the tall grass so he wasn't accidentally stepped on by his big sister.

Joey began running towards the lawn as fast as he could, hoping now that he could only make it there in one piece. That being said Maddie stepped forward, her foot passing over Joey as he continued running in the same direction, allowing him to see every thread under her sneaker, some area's nearly worn down to the point that they were flat. He could only estimate how many games Maddie must have worn them through, but seeing as how he can't remember the last time she got new shoes he didn't have to guess to know it was a long time.

Her foot came down hard in Joey's path, though it was far enough that it didn't cause him any harm as he ran passed her. Each sneaker was roughly the size and length of more than four school buses parked in sets of twos,terrifying Joey as he realized just how small he had become, he might as well be ant sized compared to Maddie at this rate.

Meanwhile, still oblivious to her shrunken brother's situation Maddie tossed the ball at the backboard a second time. The ball bouncing off the rim, then the garage, rolling until it blocked Joey's path. Now Maddie was coming towards him, though not under the terms he's prefer given her current size.

Will Maddie notice him?

1. Yes. Maddie notices something standing in front of her ball and through her glasses is able recognize the insect sized person as her brother Joey.

2. Yes. Maddie see him, but not as her brother Joey. Through her eyes he is nothing more than a common bug, though that doesn't mean he's safe as Maddie decides to psych herself up with a little warm up game against this bug. Taking the fact that it's standing between her and her ball as a challenge.

3. No. Maddie picks up her ball and continues her practice while Joey escapes into the grass where he'll encounter another female character.
12111.title: Maddie's Basketball Practice

choices: Maddie decides to torture her brother in her bra.
Maddie takes her brother out and asks what happened.
121111.content:
Maddie sighed as she missed the shot. With poor shooting like that, there was no way her team was going to go to the state championship, let alone make the regional tournament. She walked over to the bright orange sphere to pick it up, completely unaware that basketball practice would take an unconventional turn in a few seconds.

Joey on the other hand was stuck at a crossroads. The giant basketball not only towered above him nearly blocking out all sunlight, but the sphere was wide enough to completely cut off his path. The size comparison just drove home how small Joey was now and this was his new reality.

Beyond the sports ball, Joey could hear the thunderous footsteps of his older sister coming toward him. Joey thought it would be wise to run away from his oncoming massive sister, but as soon he turned around, he was staring at the dense, green foliage that was his lawn. There was no telling what unknowns were lurking in those tall numerous plants. The only option was for Joey to stay still and hope he could sprint past Maddie before she crushed him.

Maddie finally approached the basketball and picked it up off the ground. Joey could hardly believe his eyes. After the basketball was removed by the goddess-like hands of Maddie, he was staring up the unbelievably gargantuan that was his sister. It was bad enough that he was already dwarfed by her coliseum sized shoes, but her thin tall legs stretched into the abyss and the young man could barely make out anything past Maddie's waist.

"What the?" Maddie said as she looked down at the minuscule creature at her sneaker-clad feet. The exclamation caused Joey's tiny ear drums to nearly rupture. Maddie quickly bent down to pick up the tiny thing, but to Joey the whole thing happened in a slow, but fluid motion.

As if she were clumsy giantess, Maddie entire body moved awkwardly. As she bent down, Joey could finally getter idea of Maddie's figure. Her fabric from her basketball jersey hung loose off of her thin, but well-toned body. Her basketball shorts looked as if they were about to slip off. When Joey was picked up by the right index finger and thumb, he was felt as though he had shot up into the sky flying. The grass and other items that dwarfed him were now assuming their normal size as he was lifted up by the gigantic Maddie.

Maddie brought her younger, minuscule brother up to her face. Joey was taken aback by how humongous his bigger sister was.

"Joey, is that you?" Maddie asked as she squinted her eyes. A minty-smelling blast of wind washed over Joey, nearly freeing him from Maddie's grasp as she talked.

"Yes, yes. It's me." Joey shouted.

Maddie was taken aback by the suddenly speaking Joey and dropped her tiny brother. The tiny teen screamed as he plummeted downward. Joey closed his eyes and expected to be splattered across the gravel outside his home, but found his landing much softer than he imagined.

"Oops!" Maddie said as she realized Joey had slipped between her breasts. Joey opened his eyes and found himself looking up at his older sister through a pinhole created by her breasts surrounding him.
121111.title: Noticed By Maddie

121112.content:
Maddie walked over to pick up the ball. Her sneakers smacked against the concrete, causing ever-intensifying violent tremors for poor Joey. His sister finally stopped. She remained a good distance in front of him, but that was no comfort for the tiny boy in front of her enormous feet, because he knew she could close that distance and crush him like a bug in a heartbeat. Maddie bent over and extended her arms to grab the ball, and was about to scoop it up when a flicker of movement caught her eye. Joey looked up, and saw his titanic sister hovering over him, looking straight at him. The glare from one of his lenses flickered into Maddie's eye, and she mistook it for the glitter of a carapace. The slightly curious expression was changed to one of competitive mischief.

Her voice boomed out at nearly point-blank range, and as such it almost deafened Joey. "And it looks like the star player for the opposing team has the ball now! What will Maddie Rooney do?" Then she yanked the ball out from behind Joey, and held it to her chest, never taking her eyes off of the puny "insect" in front of her. "Oh, and she makes the steal! And now she lines up her shot --" Maddie extended her arms, and her gaze flickered to the basket as she gauged her throw, then snapped back to Joey. "--but she's being blocked!" The enormous basketball player lifted her worn-out sneaker and slowly moved it over her "competitor", then brought it down at lightning speeds. Joey screamed...and was still alive. The monolithic sneaker hovered inches from his body. "Fake shot..." Another flash of silver. "Fake shot..." Then Maddie carefully moved her shoe over, planting it on the ground. She aimed again and threw the ball at the basket.

It didn't even touch the rim as it sailed through.

The ball landed heavily on the concrete, bounced twice, then hit a pebble and rolled back to Maddie. She grabbed the ball and slammed it back on the ground, yelling, "Bam, what?" Then she turned her attention back to the "other side". She planted her sneakers on either side of Joey and crouched low. "That's Maddie one, bug zero."

The rest of Maddie's warm-up was Joey desperately dodging Maddie's feet and the enormous orb of death that was her basketball as she dribbled and shot it. Every single one of her shots went in. Finally, Maddie called the game -- at a score of fifty-three to none -- and put the basketball under her armpit. Joey tried to scamper off, but was blocked by his giant sister's foot. He turned in time to see Maddie reaching down to grab him. "Not so fast little guy. You helped me start scoring baskets, so I've got a special treat for you." She put him in her palm and walked inside, curling her fingers to make sure her "bug" didn't fall out, also concealing the view Joey had of the house. When she uncurled her fingers, she dumped him onto something soft. It was a sofa cushion. In front of him stood Maddie, who was turned around. Her uniform was slightly stuck in her buttcrack, and she wiggled her hips. She said in a booming yet high-pitched voice, "I want to watch TV. Oh, I know, I'll just sit right here." And with that she plopped down right where Joey was. Thankfully, she was just a bit in front of him, so he wasn't crushed, but he still slid into the depression made by her weight. Then, to his surprise, the giantess athlete lifted off of him. "That was just a taste of what my sister will do to you if you stay here when Voltage comes on in three minutes. It's either her or..." she took off her sneaker and held it invitingly. "...you be my good luck charm during the game I'm going to. Your choice."

What did Joey choose?
121112.title: Maddie VS The Bug

121113.content:
Joey's heartbeat quickly accelerated as Maddie's spiked sneakers were felt pounding the ground from a distance, the shrunken boy mustering all his strength in an attempt to remove the large orange sports ball from his path before she reached him.

"Oh crap!" Joey yelled, the large sphere before him refusing to move even one inch as Maddie's footsteps became predominantly noticeable behind him. Looking back Joey spotted his sister's silver footwear as each massive sneaker landed on either side of him, blocking off any potential escape route he might have if Maddie spotted him.

Completely oblivious to Joey's predicament and struggles he had endured thus far to avoid being crushed like a bug under her feet Maddie bent down to recover her basketball. Preferring to remain unseen by his gargantuan sister, Joey stood completely still as her hands reached down towards him. Her immeasurable size making Maddie more than a little intimidating at such a close distance, her goddess sized fingers wrapping themselves around the obstacle blocking Joey's path with ease.

Maddie then easily lifted the house sized orb off the ground, making the task look so simple that it might as well weigh nothing to the blonde giantess. For Joey this was a devastating blow to his already low amount of self esteem, forcing him to come to grips with the reality of how small he'd become. If he couldn't move something that Maddie could easily lift with only a fraction of her strength, then what was he compared to her. The only answer that came to his mind being a bug.

Much like a bug Joey quickly retreated into the grass as Maddie walked away from him, dribbling the large orange ball as she prepared to continue her practice session. Joey left alone in the grass, attempted to make his way out far enough that Maddie would not be able to reach him, even if her ball managed to bounce of the rim again and roll into the grass.

The weather outside was abnormally hot, even for Steven Point in the middle of the summer. Though it did make perfect sense since all of Wisconsin was currently experiencing a state wide heat wave, making Johnny Nimbus's news show just a bit more boring where weather was concerned. Everyday he'd predict the same thing with one hundred percent accuracy. Temperatures exceeding ninety degrees fahrenheit, sunny days best spent at the beach, and worst of all high levels of humidity statewide.

These three factors are what caused Joey to quickly begin sweating as he pushed away tens of the thousands of blades of grass that covered his families backyards, each blade standing slightly taller than him. After some time he began to wonder when the yard was last mowed, realising in the end that it was his own chore to do so.

"This is crazy, the whole backyard is like it's own forest." Joey pointed out, barely able to see the roof of his own home from the backyard. Though it hardly made any difference, even if Joey could somehow make it inside his family's house at this size he still had no idea's for how he should go about getting their attention.

Just then a shadow appeared over Joey, who was it.

1. Liv, she's wearing a bikini and holding a towel. Preparing to lay down in the backyard to tan.

2. His mother Karen. Joey realizes her foot is coming straight towards him, accidentally forcing him to flee in the direction of her garden. Where she collects Strawberries and other fruits/vegetables, along with Joey.
121113.title: Into the Grass Forest

12112.content:
http://www.teenidols4you.com/blink/Actor... <-Liv

Joey turned around quickly, shocked to see two large black walls standing before him at over ten feet tall each.

On top of these walls he noticed five large white digits wiggling around, each as big as his whole body if not bigger.

Looking up further Joey saw two large golden towers, stretching towards the sky like twin skyscrapers.

Although even these building like structures supported a much larger figure, a womanly torso with breasts the size his house.

That’s when he began to realize who it was towering over him, casting her shadow over his body like a goddess, one of his own sisters.

The luscious pink lips, her curly blonde hair, a pair of sparkling green eyes looking down at him like two bright emeralds.

Clearly this was Liv looking down at him, not his other sister Maddie.

“Liv down here, help me!” Joey asked, fearful that the gigantic blonde TV star might step him by accident. Crushing him into a bloody pulp underneath her high heel footwear.

Joey was actually glad that it was Liv who walked outside and not Maddie with her basketball, picturing himself running for his life while she practiced.

“He-he, don’t worry Joey. I see you, in fact I’m the one who shrunk you silly.” Liv giggled, tapping her heel against the concrete.

Joey struggled to stand as Liv’s foot created seismic tremors, finding it difficult to understand why Liv would shrink him.

“But why? Why would you do this too me?” Joey yelled, having to strain his voice if he wanted it to reach Liv’s eardrums.

“Because the studio gave me the power to choose a certain character for Voltage.” Liv smiled excitedly, knowing how much Joey loved the comic book series of her show.

“Oh my god! What…is…happening?” Joey said, realize what this meant .

“You want me to play Dr. Speck, like on TV?” unable to belief his older sister would present him with such an opportunity.

“That’s right little bro.” Liv giggled, placing extra emphasis on the word ‘little’ as she bent down to pick up her shrunken brother.

Of course initially Liv was set on shrinking her boyfriend Holden Dippledorf, but was worried the super cute boy might distract her on set no matter how small he was.

Although she still had the shrinking device the studio gave her to shrink Joey sitting in her right pocket, she could always shrink him later too if she wanted to have fun with him.

Liv’s thumb and index finger pushed into Joey’s chest and back, lifting him off the ground and up her rather enormous and imposing figure.

While being lifted up her body Joey noticed how tight Liv’s pants were, able to see every single detail of her long enticing legs.

It was long before he found himself under the magnificent gaze of Liv’s emerald like eyes, which were positively awe inspiring to say the least.

“Wow! You’re so tiny like this, I wonder how Tess never accidentally crushed this Dr. Speck.” Liv teased, frightening her one inch tall brother.

“Well Dr. Speck’s particles are so close together that he’s nearly indestructible.” Joey said, sharing his comic book knowledge.

“Then you’ll be happy to know that the device I used to shrink you follows the same properties.” Liv smiled, rolling her hand into a gentle fist.

The blonde teen girl then walked down the driveway towards her car, since she was a much better driver than Maddie.

After opening the driver side door Liv opened her palm to ask Joey where he’d like to spend the ride, the interior of her car looking like a beige palace.

“Ok little man, you’re too small for a seat-belt so I’ll let you pick where you sit.” Liv smiled, giving him a chance to decide for himself where he sat.

“I mean, I don’t know. I never really thought about where I’d sit in a five thousand foot long car.” Joey responded, looking around.

“Well I guess I could just let you sit in the driver’s seat with me, or rather under me.” Liv teased, frightening Joey with the idea of being flattened under her ass while she drove.

“Please Liv, anywhere but there! I’ll ride in your cup holder.” he begged, getting on his hands and knees.

“Relax, I was just kidding.” Liv smiled, bringing her hand over the cup holder closest to her seat and quickly dropped him inside.

Liv spent the next fifteen minutes driving to the studio across town, encountering little traffic along the way.

The blonde giantess then carried Joey from her car the the set where they’d be shooting the first scene with Dr. Speck.

He was surprised by how vast the set was compared to him, it even rivaled the size of Steven’s Point itself.

Liv walked away while Gemma walked into to explain the scene to Joey, getting on her hands and knees to look him uncomfortable close in his eyes.

While at normal size this would simply be the director’s way of invading people’s space, at Joey’s size it proved to be terrifying.

“Ok little buddy, are you listening to me? Cause this is how it’s gonna go down…” Gemma said, continuing to explain in detail what he’d be doing.

About five minutes later Liv returned in her costume, ready to start her day of acting with Joey.

https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CORci1fUcAAZ... <-Costume

Liv’s large blue boots came crashing down in front of Joey, creating massive quakes, almost crushing him accidentally as she looked around to see if he was in place.

“Joey? Are you ready yet?” Liv asked, forcing Joey to crane his neck upward only to see his sister cloak in a skin tight body suit.

“Liv, down here!” Joey yelled, attracting the blonde giantess’s attention.

“Opps, there you are. Almost crushed you there.” Liv laughed, not phased by the fact that she almost annihilated the tiny boy under her foot.

“Anyway’s I hope your ready for a fight, because I don’t plan to go easy on you.” Liv said, taking a fighting stance and bouncing back and forth lightly, displaying a playful smile towards the floor.

“Liv, stop messing around before you actually step on me.”Joey said, trying to avoid the slightest movement of Liv’s boot clad feet.

“Ok, ok, but you should start calling me Voltage til we're done shooting, otherwise we’ll have to do a second take.” Liv said, still smiling but sounding very serious.

As a professional actor Liv naturally hated having to do things twice do to other(s) incompetence, she might not be so forgiving if he made a rookie mistake on her set.

Now what kind of scene are they shooting?

1. Fight scene- Dr. Speck(Joey) uses levers placed before him to try and halt Voltage’s(Liv) progress as she makes her way across the room. Each lever controlling a different trap that would help him win, but her character might not be so happy with these traps if she makes it to her arch nemesis.

2. Spy scene- Dr. Speck(Joey) invades Tess’s(Liv) home after discovering where she lives, attempting to gain Intel that he could use against her, doing his best not to be spotted. Luckily Tess would not be looking for him after she returns from fighting a different criminal.

3. Climbing scene- Tess(Liv) has a key around her neck that she took from Dr. Speck(Joey) after their last encounter, which Joey must try to snatch from her without being detected by climbing her body.

12131.content:
Parker Rooney was standing on the floor of the Ridgewood High robotic lab, cleaning out his ears after his most recent invention literally blew up in his face.

He could hear a distinct ringing as smoke from the explosion began to clear, revealing the landscape of the floor tiles to him.

As expected a single floor tile was now large enough to enclose the entire Rooney household on top of, garage, basketball court, and all.

Parker had been experimenting with the concept of shrinking existing matter down to near microscopic size for a variety of reasons.

Storage, transportation, and sneaking around were only some of the uses he could think of for his new invention.

Instead his device short circuited and turned on him, rapidly shrinking him to an inch tall in height within the span of only several seconds as the room expanded around him.

"Well that's just great! Now what do I do?" Parker asked himself, knowing that nobody he knew had his natural talent when it came to dealing with electronics.

Sure Liv and Joey were smart but neither of them had the knowledge necessary to fix a device that Parker was able to create.

He knew that his best hope to get help would be to slip into the halls since this classroom would still be empty during the next two school periods.

Of course being accidentally stepped on by a high school student wasn't a better alternative, but he didn't exactly have a lot of options to choose from.

Eventually a swarm of students would come stomping into the room like a stampede, likely trampling his body into nothing more than a stain on the ground beneath their feet.

With that mental image in mind he ran underneath the large wooden door into the open hallway, traveling alongside the wall like an ant to avoid detection even if someone were to walk by.

Unfortunately this plan didn't work well as he found himself standing in the dark shadow of a giant girl standing over him.

Who was it?

1. His sisters Liv&Maddie. (Liv on her way home and Maddie on her way too basketball practice.)

2. South Salamanca. (In town to visit Liv, but is pleasantly surprised to find her shrunken brother in the halls.)

3. Someone Else.

Parker stopped dead in his tracks as he found himself standing in the still shadow of a normal sized person. No, it was more accurate to say he was standing in two overlapping shadows of two girls that were nearly the same height.

Wait a second, he knew two girls who fit that description perfectly that just so happened to go to this very school. Parker hoped that his hunch was right as he turned around to see two very different but familiar pairs of footwear. One was a pair of spiky silver sneakers with overlapping blue and purple laces and long white socks stretching out of them, the other was a pair of light blue wedges that started at his height and rose to about five times that.

"No way, is that what I think it is?" a familiar voice asked, confirming Parker's suspicions as he looked up to see that it was Liv who was talking over him with Maddie right behind her looking down at him.

"It can't be, Parker? Is that you?" Maddie asked, her green eyes fixating on the one inch tall boy from behind her enormous glasses, each lenses several time bigger than a bus windshield at his new size. It was quite intimidating for him to see his big sisters literally tower over him at what he estimated to be a few hundred feet tall in comparison to himself.

"Thank god! Maddie, Liv, you need to help me." Parker yelled, waving his arms up in joy by the fact that he was found so quickly by people he had known his entire life.

"What's that? We need to do what?" Liv giggled, taking a slightly more superior tone as she took a step to the side, allowing Maddie to take a step forward. In a quick and rather simple motion Maddie's foot came slamming down onto the hallway floor, covering the distance of an entire basketball court in only one step.

"I think he wants us to help him with something." Maddie teased, following Liv's lead by taking a superior tone with her one inch tall little brother. The athletic giantess got down one one knee, lifting Parker up into the air between her fingertips and dropping him onto her waiting palm.

"This is serious! I built a shrink ray, but it malfunctioned and shrunk me. Now look at me, it would take me forever to walk home by myself." Parker said, as he was brought below his goddess sized sisters gaze. All four of their eyes locking in on him st the center of Maddie's palm, making him wonder what they planed to do next.

"So that's how you got so tiny." Liv giggled, surprised by the fact that Parker could build something straight out of science fiction all by himself.

"Well if that's the case, then I have an idea that will solve this..." Maddie smiled, leaving Parker to wonder what she would say next as she allowed herself a moment of silence.

What is Maddie's idea?

1. "My game is about to start, so I'll just keep you inside my sneaker till the first half ends." -Maddie makes a false promise to Parker that she'd bring him back to his shrink ray to fix it after the first half of her game against her high school rivals, the Ravens.

2. "Since your so worried about walking home, why don't you just catch a ride on Liv. I'm sure she'd be happy to walk you home." Maddie hands Parker to her twin, then when Maddie leaves them alone Liv hides Parker inside her clothing so nobody sees him as she walks or drives home.

3. "I think we should fix your shrinky thingy right now, that way you can come to my game and watch me crush those Ravens." Hiding her true objective of actually shrinking her opponents and playing a game against them by herself.

She had made it about halfway to where the party was located when she felt something push up against her spine from behind, she only could assume that it was a gun of some kind based off how it felt. 3. Nap- Emma falls down on her bed and quickly falls asleep with Jessie in her panties, leaving her shrunken servant at the mercy of her body's whims over the course of her nap.
12232113.title: Emma's Awakening

1223213.content:
“Well you’re much too small to serve as our Nanny now Jessie, in fact I think it’s about time you were reassigned.” Emma taunted, bringing the shrunken woman to level with her hazel green eyes.

“What you do mean reassigned?” Jessie asked, sure that she was about to become the exclusive seat cushion for Emma’s ass. Unable to imagine a fate worse than that given the current scenario, however Emma did always process the creative mind to prove her wrong.

“In fact, I think you’re way too tiny for me to be around all day. I might squash you accidentally.” Emma teased.

“That’s why I won’t be the one watching over you for now, instead I think I’ll leave that task up to Zuri. Sure, you're probably a fraction of the size of even her smallest doll but I’m sure she’ll play with you carefully until I want a turn with you.

And there it was, even when Jessie assumed her situation couldn’t get any worse, Emma finds a way to make the impossible happen.

“Emma, please I’ll do anything! Anything at all, just don’t leave me lying around for Zuri to find!” Jessie begged, not wanting to be crushed or accidentally injured somehow.

“Lying around, who ever said I’d just put you down on the floor so you could run around the apartment at your size. I know you can slide under doors and through tight spaces at that pathetic little size. That’s why I’m gonna put you in a place where you can’t escape from, inside Zuri’s dollhouse.” Emma announced, adding to how horrible the situation was from Jessie's point of view.

Not only would she be left in Zuri’s room at an inch tall, but she’d also be locked inside Zuri’s dollhouse which she imagined would look like a fortress compared to her. The spoiled Ugandan child owned a custom made doll house with a total of twelve floors, each of which was still too large at this size for Jessie to live in.

“What’s with that face Jessie, no need to look so scared. Anyone being paid at your salary would jump at the chance to live in their own building in New York, even if it meant becoming bug sized to get it. I’m just granting that wish for you.” Emma teased, before making her way upstairs with Jess held firmly between her fingers.

“Enough talking, I better get you into your new home before Zuri gets back.” Emma giggled, already imagining the look on her adoptive sister’s face when she encounters their shrunken Nanny.

A few minutes passed and Emma entered Zuri’s room with Jessie in tow, being careful to conceal Jessie in her fist prior to entering incase Zuri was already in the room.

“Okay you little nuisance, I don’t see her anywhere. Are you ready to see your new home?” Emma smiled, looking down at her closed fist. Able to feel Jessie kicking in a futile attempt to break free.

Sure Zuri would be somewhat smaller than Emma given the fact that she was already shorter to begin with, but just thinking that the ten year old girl’s size could rival that of her sixteen year old adoptive step sibling terrified her. If Emma was capable of being this mean towards her, what would the mischievous Zuri do with her if Jessie fell into her possession.

“Here we are, you can live in the penthouse. Just like we do.” Emma teased, making it out to sound like she was actually giving Jessie a reward in some way as she inserted her fist into the top floor of the dollhouse. She then placed her fist on the ground with her palm facing down and slowly opened her hand so that Jessie would fall safely onto the floor before she pulled her hand out.

“Wait, please Emma. You don’t have to do this!” Jessie yelled as she attempted to run towards the window, everything around her still three or four times too big. The bed, the dresser, even the window in front of her were still too large to be considered normal sized for her. Making her feel even smaller than she already was.

Suddenly Emma’s eye appeared in the window, looking down at Jessie. “Now you behave yourself in there and try not to get crushed by Zuri. I’m being really nice by letting her play with you first, don’t make me regret it by getting squished before tomorrow.” Emma mocked before walking away, as if Jessie’s life had little value in her mind.

Before Jessie could get a word in edgewise, Emma was gone. Leaving Jessie trapped in the dollhouse with no foreseeable method of escape. The best she could hope for was to get herself down to the first floor so that she could leave before Zuri got back. But even this mild hope was soon crushed as she heard someone enter the room, Zuri had returned.
1223213.title: Trapped In Zuri's Dollhouse

12233.content:
It was a normal day at the Ross family penthouse in New York City, or at least as normal a day as usual for the four kids, Nanny, and Butler living there.

Although the events that would soon come to pass would make this day one to remember in a bad way for five of them.

"Jessie! Zuri keeps taking all of my glitter for her stupid dolls. How am I suppose to run a fashion show with any glitter?" Emma yelled, walking downstairs in the hopes that the Nanny could help her.

"Yeah, well miss fashion queen here keeps stealing all my pink fabric I use to make my dolls clothing." Zuri said, following quickly behind Emma.

Meanwhile Jessie was already busy handling a completely different situation in front of the couch between Luke and Ravi.

"-You can not honestly be thinking of letting him get away with this, he has stolen my science fair project!" Ravi yelled, pointing out that Luke was holding a bottle containing a strange purple liquid.

"-I told you! I thought it was grape juice." Luke said, trying to make up a lie on the spot.

"Ravi calm down, I'll handle this. Emma, Zuri, I'll take care of you in a minute!" Jessie yelled, losing her composure amongst the yelling taking place.

"You do not understand, that is an experimental growth formula that I plan to use so that we can end world hunger." Ravi said, trying to warn everyone that his science fair project could be dangerous in the hands of someone as reckless as Luke.

"Really in that case maybe Jessie should take a sip." Luke joked, imagining the twenty-two year old Nanny towering over people in the city streets.

"Oh fighting, it's a good thing I made popcorn." Bertram said, walking into the room holding a container of popcorn in his hand, sitting down on the couch behind Jessie to watch the arguments up close.

"How about instead of just watching, you do your job for once and either help me out or clean something!" Jessie yelled, having had enough of dealing with the Butler's lazy attitude.

"-That's it Zuri, I've..." Emma started saying before Zuri tackled her onto the couch, the two girls beginning to wrestle back and forth.

"So, quick question. What would happen if I added this to your little science fair project?" Luke asked Ravi, hoping to get back at him for not helping him with his own science fair project.

"No! If you do then there is no telling what the results would be." Ravi said, seeing that Luke was also holding a veil of orange liquid that could potentially reverse the effects of his growth serum.

Suddenly Emma and Zuri knocked Luke to the floor, causing the bottle and veil to hit the ceiling and mix, spilling onto everyone with the exception of________.
12233.title: Penthouse Shrinking

122331.content:
http://i.imgur.com/dwiYrJF.jpg

In the blink of an eye the two separate chemicals hit the ceiling and merged to become one, raining back down over everyone in the penthouse.

Emma’s quick actions would keep her safe as she rolled onto the floor, pulling Zuri who she was busy fighting with until only a moment ago over herself like a human shield.

While this action was only meant to save her outfit, they would quite possibly end up saving her life as everyone else was splashed by the new chemical.

“Oh no, this is very, very bad. Quick, everyone take of your clothes!” Ravi panicked, unbuttoning his shirt as fast as he could.

“What? No way!” Jessie yelled embarrassed, covering her C-cup breasts with her arms.

“Jessie you have too or else…” Ravi paused, looking around the room in horror to realize that it was already too late.

“I kind of feel funny.” Luke said, holding his stomach as everyone else began to feel the effects of the new chemical they accidentally created.

“Great Shiva, we’re shrinking!” Ravi yelled, allowing everyone in the penthouse to realize what was going on.

Suddenly Emma realized he was right as Zuri became lighter and lighter on her stomach, it wasn’t long until the little girl was the size of a rabbit on her chest.

“Wait, Emma why aren’t you shrinking?” Zuri asked, continuously shrinking as her step sister’s B-cup blocked out her her face.

Eventually they all stopped shrinking when their bodies reached an inch tall height, forcing all eyes in the room to turn to Emma who was still normal sized.

But that’s not how the newly shrunken people saw her, to them Emma was now a giantess whose height surpassed the building they lived inside.

Zuri who had shrunk down to the size of a bug struggled to stand on top of the giantess blonde’s belly button, suddenly noticing a dark shadow overcome her.

“Emma wait!” Zuri yelled, thinking that Emma was about to crush her puny body since they were just fighting only a minute ago.

Instead the tiny dark skinned girl was surprised to find herself being lifted into the air between Emma’s fingers.

“Well aren’t you tiny, almost like a little doll.” Emma smiled, sitting up tall on the floor as she examined the tiny girl up close.

Meanwhile only a few feet away Jessie had gathered Luke, Ravi, and Bertram to her side to figure out what had happened.

“Ravi, what the hell is going on here? I thought that was suppose to be a growth formula, not a shrinking one!” Jessie said, obviously not happy with her new size.

“Honestly, I had no idea. The contents of the orange veil was meant to neutralize my growth formula, not reverse it.” Ravi explained, his thick Indian accent making it difficult for his friends to take him seriously.

“Well in case you haven’t noticed we’re the size of ants and Emma’s as tall as a skyscraper!” Luke said panic, watching from afar as the blonde girl rose to her feet.

“Guy’s I think we should be less worried about our size and more worried about our lives.” Bertram said, pointing up as the goddess sized Emma walked in their direction.

Emma’s feet cleared the distance between her and the four remaining tiny people in only two steps, nearly crushing them under her heels into the carpet during her second step.

“Well, well, it looks like I’m in charge of you little bugs now.” Emma smiled, clearly feeling superior to the tiny beings in front of her wiggling toes.

“Scatter!” Luke yelled, running underneath the couch in fear of being stepped on by his older step sibling.

Emma curled Zuri into the confines of her fist and placed the backs of her hands on her hips, while Bertram ran for his live through the carpet.

This gave Jessie and Ravi a perfect look under her red leather skirt to see a pair of matching red panties hidden underneath.

“Just where do you think you're running off to?” Emma said coldly, lifting her foot into the air over Bertram and bringing it down hard to block his path.

“You're not going anywhere, in fact none of you are.” the blonde giantess continued, feeling superior to all the tiny beings looking up at her.

Effortlessly she bent down and scooped of Jessie and Ravi in the same hand she was holding Zuri in, forcing Ravi’s face into Jessie’s bosom and Jessie’s face into Zuri’s young butt.

Emma then used her free hand to scoop the tiny butler up into the air, turning her attention to the couch where she saw Luke flee.

“Don’t think you're getting away so easily either Luke.” the shrunken boy heard, followed by several powerful tremors.

Luke finally escaped the underside of the couch, only to be faced with Emma herself crouching down over him with a sadistic smile.

“...and now you're mine, little boy.” Emma teased, picking up Luke with the same hand she was holding Bertram in.

Emma then brought both handfuls of shrunken people up to level with her chest, her tremendous bosom stretching out from her body towards them.

“Now you all belong to me, and I have so much in store for all of you. Especially you Luke and Bertram for trying to escape me. Oh and of course I haven’t forgotten about you Zuri, I’m still mad at you for stealing all my glitter. So the first thing I’m gonna do with this new power is__________.

1. “...use you all as supplies for my fashion show Kitty Couture.” Emma walks up to her room and drops everyone inside a container, except for Luke who she turns into a toe ring as punishment for running away from her. leaving the other four shrunken people to wonder what she has in store for them.

2. “...enslave all five of you, it’d be nice to have some real servants for once.” Emma finds some use out of the tiny people, putting them to work on different parts of her body.

3. “...have some fun with you now that you’re so tiny.” Emma develops some kind of game to play with the five tiny people that offers the winner some kind of reward.
122331.title: Dominant Giantess Emma

123.content:
Who will shrink?

Zack, Cody, Someone Else?
123.title: Suite Life On Deck

1231.content:
Zack came out to the front deck in the middle of the night to get a good look at the ocean. He couldn't go to sleep and calm visions of scenery was always a way to calm him down. He rested his head on the bar separating him from the ocean. He missed the Tipton. It was like home. He still liked studying at sea, because it allowed him to see more of the world, but at the same time, there's still no place like home.

Zack closed his eyes and let the gentle waves below him lull him to sleep. In his dreams, he dreamed the Tipton, especially his friends he left behind including Max.

***

As Zack rested, a mysterious female figured quietly walked up to the identical twin. Armed with a rag soaked in a weird formula, the woman carefully placed the rag up to Zack's nose. The woman smiled as Zack and his clothes began to dwindle in size. The blonde teenager grew shorter and shorter until his unconscious body was nothing but a bug at her high-heeled feet. The woman then laughed as she picked up the tiny teenager and took him back to her room.

Several hours later in the midst of an early morning at sea, Zack awoke on a spongy, fleshy surface. It almost felt like he was on the surface of a large hand. Zack peered off the edges of the surface and saw the wooden floor of the deck below him. He immediately looked away.

"It's about time you awoke," a feminine voice called out. Zack turned to the source of the voice and saw the giant face of ____ addressing him
1231.title: Zack's Midnight Kidnapping

12311.content:
"Ugh! It's about time you woke up, you poor people take such long naps." Said the all too familiar voice of London Tipton, a voice Zack recognized almost instantaneously.

"What, London what's going on?" Zack asked rolling onto him back, still dazed from being unconscious.

"Come on Cody, get up already." London said, her loud voice resounding in Zack's eardrums. He told himself it couldn't be true, what he saw last night before he passed out must have been a dream. Right? Little did he realize that he was in for a BIG surprise.

"I'm not Cody, London it's me ZaACCK!" The young teen yelled out as he opened his eyes to discover that he was laying under the gaze on a gigantic London Tipton. The Asain heiress's eyes looking down at Zack as if he were comparable to a bug in the palm of her hand.

"Uh oh, I shrunk the wrong twin. Knew I should have asked Bailey first." London said out loud.

"Wait, why would you want to shrink either of us? How could you do something like that?" Zack asked believing up till this moment that him and London were friends.

"Well Portia Tanenbaum has been doing so much work in magazines, bikini shoots, yada yada yada. All while I've been stuck at this stupid Sea School. So I had Daddy's scientists put together a shrink ray so I could have something she never could. A tiny person as my pet." London declared, stating her reason for wanting to shrink Zack. No matter how petty a reason it was.

"Your pet, you can't be serious London." Zack argued.

"Of course I'm serious, otherwise I wouldn't have shrunk you silly." London teased, as if Zack was somehow stupid.

"That's not what I meant London. You can't just shrink people like this!" Zack yelled, standing up in the center of London's palm.

"Again, of course I can. I'm rich which means I can do whatever I want." London countered, putting up the defensive argument of a child to explain her actions.

"Now, Because you belong to me I want to see how useful you can be to me at that tiny little size." London continued, teasing Zack with a smile spread across her large lips.

"What do you mean?"" Zack asked, sounding concerned by London's tone of voice.

"Oh that's easy, I'm gonna__________."

1. Use you as a seat cushion for my butt on those uncomfortable plastic chairs they make me sit on in class.

2. See how you look as a toe ring.

3. Find out if you can add a little protein to my daily diet in a milkshake.
12311.title: Possession of the Heiress

choices: Attack of the Fifty Foot Girlfriend
1232.content:
Cody was in the process of working on his newest scientific breakthrough that he was sure would revolutionize modern technology and even end world hunger, the concept once science fiction device was to miniaturize and person or object significantly in size.

Cody’s idea for the device was have people enter a restaurant where they could be shrunk and seated by their waitress who would serve them normal sized food, this would allow people to eat less food while ultimately filling their stomachs faster.

This concept could also be applied into the concept of making theme restaurants and attractions that could never exist without the existence of his shrink ray, such as an old style ‘Attack of the fifty foot woman’ diner or roller coaster.

“...and that should do it!” Cody said as he finished tightening the last screw on his newest invention to make sure that it worked as planned with pinpoint accuracy, after all what good would a shrink ray be if it shrunk anything other than what you wanted it to.

Thinking that his device was fully operational Cody prepared his room for a quick test that could be done before his date with Bailey later that night, he only wished that his girlfriend could have been there to see his scientific breakthrough in action.

Cody then picked out something he could shrink that wouldn’t be missed if the device failed to return it to normal size, deciding to shrink Woody’s dresser since he hardly ever changed, washed, or put his clothes anyways.

The smarter half of the two twins aimed down the dresser from between his and Woody’s bed and immediately opened fire, unfortunately for him he had made the last screw to tight which caused a backfire effect that forced the full power of the device back at him.

In a sudden flash of light Cody was thrusted into the air above his bed while rapidly shrinking, forcing him to watch as his only hope of growing back to normal flew away from him onto Woody’s bed.

Within a few short moments Cody had been shrunk to the size of a mosquito fish which grew up to slightly longer than 1 inch long in length, at this size Cody’s room looked as if it was big enough to hold the whole S.S Tipton inside like a cargo bay.

“Great now how am I gonna get back to normal?” Cody asked looking over towards Woody’s unmade bed to see that the shrink ray was no longer in sight, most likely lost somewhere in his messy roommates unmade bed sheets and blanket.

Just then his thoughts were interrupted by the sound of a familiar female voice coming from outside his room, just then he heard his door knob turn and remembers that he forgot to lock it behind him when he came in, just then...

1. London enters the room and almost immediately spots Cody on his bed trying to wave her down, Cody would try to talk London through reversing the polarity on his shrink ray to help him grow. London wouldn’t understand a word of what Cody explains to her and asks him why he should help him get back to normal, which only leads to more trouble for Cody.

2. Bailey enter’s Cody’s room and looks everywhere for her boyfriend while remaining blissfully unaware that he was shrunk on his bed, with each minute that passes she become more and more upset with him being late for their date that night. Finding him shrunken down probably would be the best thing for him with Bailey being so massive.

3. Mrs. Tutwiler knocks on the door and enter moment’s later to return Cody’s essay that he put a lot of work into, obviously graded with a perfect score not including his bonus points. The adult woman then places the stapled papers on Cody’s bed where he would be able to get her attention, she would look at her tiny student with a smile on her face and tell him all about how cute he was at this size like a little mouse. The teacher would then decide to make the cute shrunken boy her personal pet.
1232.title: Cody's Backfire

12321.content:
http://images4.fanpop.com/image/photos/1... <London’s Outfit

London Tipton burst into the room without a care in the world, feeling as if she could walk in on Cody at anytime she pleased since her ‘daddy’ owned the boat.

“Cody, where are you? I need your help with something. You’re smart right?” London asked, looking for the smarter of the two twins.

The shrunken blonde boy saw opportunity and decided to go for it, waving his arms up and down in the direction of the gigantic Asian beauty.

London quickly noticed Cody on the bed, mistaking him for some kind of insect that could it’s way on board the S.S Tipton.

“Eww stupid little bug, how dare you invade my daddy’s boat!” London yelled, disgusted by Cody’s mere presence in the room.

Her hand swiftly came down on the mattress, knocking the shrunken boy to the floor in front of her designer brand heels.

“Owe, London why would you…” Cody said, pausing as her noticed London sliding her feet to his sides, blocking him in.

“I doubt many bugs get the opportunity to be crushed under nine hundred dollar heels, I guess that makes you one of the lucky ones.” she teased, slowly lifting her foot into the air.

Cody realized how serious London was and immediately began running through her archway like legs, hoping to avoid her stomp.

“Just try not to get your disgusting bug guts stuck to me sole.” London spat, bringing her foot down with a ruthless stomp.

The shrunken boy was barely lucky enough to escape with his life, narrowly avoiding death as he rolled out of the way between several carpet strands.

“No fair, get back here now so I can crush you!” London said angrily, worried that the bug might escape and lay eggs.

Cody wasn’t looking forward to being crushed by London, but he couldn’t exactly leave the room with hundred of other people on the ship as big as the rich Asian walking around.

He’d simply have to think of a more inventive way of getting her attention while she searched for the bug stranded somewhere in the carpet.

The tiny teen crouched down low to avoid detection, making his way across the room to find a hand held mirror on the floor.

“Excellent, with this I can get London’s attention.” sure that London would be able to distinguish him from a bug this time.

Using all his strength Cody lifted the mirror lightly, attempting to redirect the ceiling lights into London’s eyes.

The Asian giantess quickly noticed this and followed the light back to the source, noticing a tiny creature under the mirror.

“Wait, that’s not a bug.” London realized, bending down to see that the bug almost look human.

“No way, is that Cody?” She yelled, surprised to see that the bug sized creature was the young boy she had known for years.

"Yes London, now please I need your help to..." Cody said, interrupted by London mid-sentence.

"Yea-yea, whatever. I came here to ask for your help in fixing something for me first." London pouted, seeing her problem as more important no matter how minor it might be in comparison to Cody's.

Cody would have tried to argue but he know how London could get, not wanting to see what might happen if he tried arguing with her at his size.

"Ok, ok, I'll help you. But then I want you to grow me back to normal." Cody said, trying to be as clear as possible when giving his conditions.

"Glad you see things my way, now I want you to fix_________."

1. "...my thong."- London broke the thin layer of fabric that would run between her butt-cheeks this morning while putting them on, tying the ends around Cody's arms and legs to repair it.

2. "...my necklace." While not a necessary part of her outfit, London can't afford to be seen without at least one accessory. Forcing Cody arms into an adjustable chain, leaving him to spend the day between her massive breasts.

3. "...farm girl's insole." London promised Bailey that she's have her personal shoe guy take a look at her converse high top's worn down insole, but apparently he took a "day-off' and she needs a stand in.
12321.title: Towering London

123211.content:
"Your thong?" Cody asked, incredulous. That was just about the last thing he expected London to ask him to fix.

"Yep. It snapped when I tried to put it on this morning. Guess it couldn't handle my beautiful curves." London said in a huff, tossing the broken thong down in front of him on the bed.

"Why don't you just wear a different one?" Cody asked. "You only wear most outfits once anyway."

"Don't be ridiculous Cody! I have never worn this before! I can't get rid of it without wearing it all! It's an Arturo Vitalli thong. It cost me over a thousand dollars!"

Cody just shook his head in annoyance at London's ridiculous spending habits. He knew she was rich, but he still could not believe how much money she wasted. And based on the ripped thong, he figured it was safe to say that she wasn't exactly getting extra quality for her money. "I don't know how you expect to fix this London. I have glue, but that will probably make it pretty uncomfortable to wear. Sewing it won't help either, since it'll probably just rip again if it's too small for you. Without some extra fabric there's nothing I can do. Now, can you please bring me to Bailey so I can get help?"

"So you're saying that if I find some extra fabric to add to the thong, you'd be willing to help me?" London asked, completely ignoring Cody's question.

Cody sighed in frustration, wishing someone who was less of a dimwit had found him. "Yes London, I'd help you if you had some extra fabric. But since you don't..." Cody replied, only to be cut off by London suddenly snatching him between two of her fingers.

"Oh but I do Cody. In fact, you just volunteered to help me out." London said, quickly bringing Cody over to the thong and knotting the ends around his wrists and ankles.

"What's the big idea London?" Cody asked, not liking where this was going.

"I thought you were supposed to be the smart one Cody! You told me I needed something extra to fill in my thong, and I think you're just the right size..." London said, before lifting her thong up into the air and giving it a little shake to check that Cody was tied tightly.

Being held up by only his arms and legs, Cody almost felt like he was laying in a hammock. However, with nothing to support his back, he could already feel his muscles straining to support his weight.

"Ooo I think you're gonna work perfectly!" London squealed with delight, before casually dropping her newly repaired thong down onto the bed, as though it did not contain a tiny person bound in its threads.

Unable to escape his ties, Cody was forced to lay on his back and watch as the Asian giantess lowered her white pants, revealing she was not currently wearing underwear at all. He was met with the sight of her giant bare ass in its full glory. As he saw the dark valley that lay between the giantess's butt cheeks, he began to scream up at London.

"This is crazy London! You can't wear me as clothing! Just bring me to Bailey!"

"Are you kidding Cody? That farm girl probably wears sandpaper thongs! She can't appreciate a designer one like you. Though maybe after nice worn you a couple times I'll donate you to her. I have a feeling you'll be begging to come back to my booty after today though." London said with a giggle as she grabbed the thong off Cody's bed. Without further ado, she brought the thong down towards her feet and stepped through it, as though there was absolutely nothing special about it.

For Cody however, this was anything but ordinary. London's giant foot rubbed against him as she slid it into the leg hole, giving Cody a horrible image of being crushed under London's foot, as he nearly had been earlier. That was quickly pushed out of his thoughts, however, as she began to pull up her thong. Cody felt as though he was on one of those "Tower of terror" rides at the amusement park that carried you high into the air and then dropped you down. Unfortunately, he didn't think London would be dropping him down anytime soon, as he was quickly drawing closer and closer to her expansive ass.

All light vanished suddenly as Cody crossed the threshold of her butt, quickly becoming buried between her planet sized butt cheeks. He could feel her warm flesh pressed against every exposed piece of skin on his body. It was almost as though he were being buried alive, but instead of dirt, he was being drawn into the warm embrace of Lodon's butt. Fortunately for Cody, the lazy rich girl did not exercise very often, and as a result her butt was very soft and forgiving. If London made good on her progress to donate this thong to Bailey, he had a feeling his girlfriend's posterior would not be as forgiving.

"Oh this is perfect!" London squealed with delight, turning her thong clad butt to the mirror. She gave her ass a little shake as she admired its image, which did not go unnoticed by Cody. He was quickly and mercilessly battered by her doughy buttocks, while the air headed heiress simply enjoyed the feeling of Cody squirming between her cheeks. "You feel great back there Cody! I've never had a living thong before, but it's like having a little massage all the time! I always knew poor people must be good for something!" Cody screamed angrily in response, but for London this was just a small tickle on her butt cheek.

Satisfied with herself, London bent down to pull up her pants. As she did so, London inadvertently ended up pulling Cody deeper into her ass. Normally she hated wedgies, but with Cody squirming inside her butt she found the sensation quite enjoyable. She staid bent over for a moment, keeping her cheeks hugged tight around Cody, until finally relenting and pulling up her pants. They weren't particularly tight, which was fortunate for the tiny thong repairman, but London was already imagining it might be more fun to slip into some yoga pants to see how Cody would fare.

12333.title: The Whole Boat?

123331.content:
(Title isn't great, going for a pun on "Sinking Feeling". Haha. I tried guys.)

"What do you mean we changed course?" Bailey asked angrily as her ditsy roommate strutted across the boat's deck.

"It means the boat is going in a different direction now. Duh." London explained, looking annoyed. "I thought you were supposed to be the smart one."

"No London I want to know WHY we changed course! We were supposed to be visiting Crete!" Bailey shouted.

"Isn't it obvious Bailey? I ran out of shoes! I've almost worn every pair of shoes that I have on this boat, and there's no way I'd be caught dead wearing the same pair over again. What if a reporter saw me?" London said, sounding concerned.

"WE ARE ON A BOAT. THERE ARE NO REPORTERS!" Bailey yelled, losing patience with the spoiled heiress. "Crete is an important part of Greece's history!"

Meanwhile, London hopped off the enormous cruise liner that bore her name and headed for the Tipton villa where her shoes were housed. Cody expected his brother to be kidding, but what he saw was exactly what his brother had said. The palm tree seemed to be growing taller and taller with each passing second. However Cody noticed something his brother didn't: it wasn't just the palm tree. The entire island seemed to be growing!

"Zack, I think the boat is shrinking!" Cody yelled, faced with a problem that seemed right out of an episode of the Twilight Zone.

The two boys stood in awed silence as their cruise liner continued to dwindle in size, until eventually the shrinking came to a halt. It was hard to get a bearing on just how much the boat had shrunk without a frame of reference. Luckily, Cody would be getting one shortly.

BOOM!

"What was that?" Zack asked, looking towards the island where the massive sound originated.

BOOM!

BOOM!

BOOM!

The sound was growing louder each time.

"Whatever it is, it's getting closer!" Cody responded.

With nowhere to flee too, the boys could only watch in terror as the source of the sound emerged from the trees. However, never in their wildest dreams did they expect to see a giant _______ emerge from the undergrowth.

Using all her strength Bailey pulled a heavy metal chest across the floor from the other side of the room, inside were all London's clothes from last week, which she would never wear again anyways. Once it was out in the open Bailey picked up her shrink ray and turned the dial to about 90% on shrink, so that the chest would be reduced to a fraction of it's current height and width.

"Here goes nothing." She told herself as her finger eased down on the trigger, a purple light appearing at the tip of the device as it began charging. Following this a purple ray of light washed over the chest, forcing it to be reduced in size before Bailey's eyes until she could no longer see it.

"This is amazing!" Bailey announced to herself as her brown eyes examined the miniaturized clothing, each piece of fabric too small for even a doll to wear. Meanwhile as she was distracted her device powered back up on it's own, still adjusted to the same settings she'd used to shrink the chest.
