12522.content:
Gabe was in the kitchen on a Sunday morning, munching away on his favorite breakfast cereal, Frosted Munch-Os. As Gabe noisily chewed and crunched his way through various sugar filled bites, he turned the cereal box out in front of him and began to read it.

"NEW recipe, same great taste!" Gabe rolled his eyes. The new recipe was good and all, but it definitely changed the flavor of the cereal and it for sure didn't stack up to the original recipe. He still kept buying the cereal, though. He was a faithful consumer until the end. As Gabe swallowed his 57th spoonful of sugary cereal, he began to feel funny. He dropped his spoon into the soggy flaky cereal and nearly choked. He put his hands on his neck and fell down to the floor. He was about to perform the Heimlich maneuver on himself when he realized he could breath just fine. However, instead of choking like he was expecting, the young boy was about to go undergo a dramatic transformation that he didn't even think was possible.

His body slowly began to dwindle rapidly in size. The chair he was sitting on was getting taller and taller until it completely towered over him like a wooden god. The kitchen marble floor he was laying on was now expanding to greatly that he found himself in a vast white field. And the ceiling light hung above his head so high that it was almost as if it were the Sun itself.

Gabe began to panic as he realized what happened. If he was ever going to get back to normal, he was going to sue the cereal company for millions because this happened to him. However, before he could develop that thought of litigation further, he felt thunderous footsteps. A female figure slowly walked into the room and looked around.

Gabe gulped as he realized the female figure was __________.
12522.title: Shrink O's

125221.content:
https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564...

Gabe's mouth open wide as he saw his older sister, standing in the doorway over him like an omen. She was wearing a denim jacket with a purple shirt underneath. To match her denim jacket was a denim short skirt with purple high heels and white socks rounding out her wardrobe. Her hair cascaded down her shoulders like a waterfall. She looked like a goddess on Earth.

Gabe straightened up and began jumping up and down erratically, desperately trying to get his older sister's attention. Teddy, on the other hand, was looking around incredulously, trying to determine the source of the sound that she heard earlier.

"Gabe," Teddy asked, taking a step into the kitchen. "Are you in here? Are you ok?"

Teddy looked around, but except for a bowl full of cereal and a milk covered silver spoon, she found an empty kitchen.

"Gabe, if this is some type of joke, I'm going to get you."

Teddy proceeded to walk into the kitchen, shaking the ground underneath Gabe with each step she took. Gabe stopped his frantic call for attention when he realized that Teddy was quickly approaching his position without noticing him. Gabe dove underneath the kitchen table, just a mere couple of seconds before Teddy's sharp purple heels would have impaled him.

"Come on, Gabe, this isn't funny. If you sounded like you were choking. Do you know what I would do if you died?"

Teddy looked around but saw no trace of Gabe. The blonde teenage huffed slightly and picked up the spoon. As she bent down to pick up the abandoned silverware, she a saw small moving creature underneath the table.

"Hmm, what's this?" Teddy asked herself as she extended her hand forward to grab the strange object. Gabe jumped for joy as he let Teddy's hand grab him.

"Teddy, it's me! Gabe! That cereal shrunk me!"

Teddy grabbed Gabe and held him up to her face. A warm, minty blast washed over Gabe as Teddy looked over him like a goddess passing judgement. Teddy moved her face closer to the object she held in her hand and immediately recoiled in surprise after realizing what had happened.

"Gabe, is that you? How did this happen?"

Gabe frantically pointed to the bowl of cereal that remained stagnant on the counter.

"It was that cereal," Gabe shouted. "Something was in that cereal that shrunk me."

Teddy looked at the bowl of wheat still floating in the milky substance and a small smile appeared on her lips. The smile was quickly followed by a gentle laugh which grew into a light chuckle. The experience was very unnerving for Gabe.

"Why are you laughing?" Gabe asked. "This isn't funny. I'm an inch tall because of their shoddy product."

Teddy quit laughing and responded,

Choice 1: "It looks like my shrinking serum worked." -Teddy confesses that he shrunk Gabe to this size as punishment for a prank he pulled on here over a week ago.

Choice 2: "Sorry. You just look so cute at this size." -Teddy picks Gabe up, talking about giving him to their younger sister Charlie as a new toy.

Choice 3 "So, I'm the only one who know's you shrunk?" -Teddy decides by herself that nobody else should find out that Gabe has been shrunk down to this size, dropping him down her boot where he quickly becomes associated with her foot.

1252211.content:
"It looks like my little shrinking serum worked." Teddy said, giggling at the tiny form in her hand.

"Shrinking serum?" Gabe squeaked, shocked this his sister had done this to him.

"Yup, bought it out of the back of a truck behind the high school. I was skeptical it would work, but it was too good an opportunity to pass up."

"What do you mean? Why did you shrink me?" Gabe asked.

"Remember that little prank you pulled on me last week?" Teddy asked.

Gabe remembered it well. He had been in charge of doing some laundry while he was grounded, after Teddy had ratted him out to their mom. When she ratted him, out he had told her she ought to keep her fat ass out of his business, but she had laughed it off, unphased. So when he had gotten to her laundry, he had decided to to get back at her. Taking a scissor, he had cut most of the way through the back of several of her thongs. The next day, when she tried to pull one of them on, she was surprised to find it rip as it was pulled against her round butt cheeks. Still, it was only one, and it was only a little strange. When the second one broke, she had looked in a mirror and wondered if she had gained weight, but her butt looked just as taut and perky as it always had, so she shook the thought out of her head. Only when the third thong broke did she remember Gabe's comment, notice the cuts, and storm angrily to his room to find him laughing hysterically. Little did Gabe know at the time, that's when the seed of revenge was planted in her mind.

"Since you ruined my thongs, I decidedthe best way to get you back was to make you help me fix them." Teddy explained.

"How am I supposed to do that? In 2 inches tall!" Gabe yelled. "I can't even hold a sewing needle."

"Oh Gabe, that's not what I need you for. I'm going to handle most of the work. I just need you to help make them a bit larger. Can't have my fat ass ripping through them again after all." Teddy said, before furling her giant fingers over Gabe, wrapping him in the dark confines of her fist.

Gabe squirmed and pushed against his sister's fingers as she carried him through their house in the darkness of her fist. He didn't know exactly what she had planned, but it sounded like she was going to make him help fix her underwear, which he had no interest in doing. He needed to get away from her and find someone who wasn't too mad at him to help. Who would that be though. His only idea was his mom, as PJ and his dad were both out of town on a fishing trip. Who knew how she would handle it though? She might just panic and do something stupid. And that's assuming he could even get to her. He'd have to get away from Teddy first, plus avoid Charlie on the way. Charlie was completely unpredictable to him at this size. She might think he was a bug, or a doll, or worst of all, a snack. He shuddered at the thought of his youngest sister eating him alive. His thoughts of that were pushed away however, when Teddy opened her hand. When she did, he saw she was holding one of the thongs he had cut.

"I still don't understand what you want me to do. Just grow me back!" Gabe yelled.

"Don't worry, I'll show you." Teddy held Gabe's squirming body in one hand and the broken thong in the other so that both ends of the cut strap rested in her palm. She dropped Gabe down into her palm as well, and set to work.

Gabe punched and kicked at his giant sister's fingers, not sure what she was planning but certain it would be terrible. He was no match for her though. She used her pinky to hold him down while the rest of her fingers went to work on his legs. He couldn't see past her giant hand, but he felt his legs suddenly go taut as they were tied together by some unseen fabric. When Teddy lifted her hand, he saw what had happened: she had bound the newly cut edge of her thong around his legs, tying him to it. Suddenly, everything became crystal clear.

"Teddy this is ridiculous! I'm not going to be a part of your thong!" Gabe yelled, already feeling her giant fingers working the other end of the fabric around his arms. When she was done, she allowed him to drop down off her palm. He screamed as he fell, expecting to crash all the way down to the floor. Instead, he was suddenly caught by the thong his limbs were tied to. He hung like a human hammock, with body sagging in the middle as his arms and legs were pulled upwards. Above, he saw that his sister was still holding onto the waist part of the thong, preventing him from falling.

"It's a little late for that Gabe, seems like you already are." Teddy said, admiring her handiwork. She had been a girl scout when she was a young girl, and this showed in the knots she tied. Gabe wouldn't be escaping these anytime soon. She didn't let her eyes linger too long though, as she was too excited to try out her repaired underwear. She lowered the repaired panties down towards her knees, beneath the edge of her fuschia dress. Before he could get used to the changes all around him her giant foot shot past him, gracefully slipping through the gap on his left side. Before he knew it, her right foot shot through as well. The rocking hammock of her thong settled, and suddenly Gabe was looking directly up at his sister's humongous bare ass. She wasn't wearing any panties.

"Please don't do this Teddy! I'm your brother!" Gabe yelled.

"Are you though?" Teddy taunted, bending over to look at Gabe's struggling body between her legs. "I remember my brother being a pain in the ass, but I think you're going to feel great in my butt."

Gabe didn't get another word in before her thong shot upwards, carrying him with it towards the giant butt crack that was racing towards him. His screaming provided no help in preventing her butt from claiming him. The avalanche of butt flesh that hit him enveloped him completely, leaving him surrounded on every side by warm, pale, squishy booty. He immediately began to kick out his tied up legs, but bound as they were it only managed to lightly jiggle Teddy's ass cheek.

"Oooo Gabe, I like that." Teddy said, addressing her squirming little brother as he tried to free himself from her ass. "I knew you couldn't be my brother anymore, you feel amazing back there. You're just a thong now, and that means you belong in my butt. And you're going to be perfect for what else I have planned today..."

125231.content:
PJ Duncan drove up to his childhood home, eager to collect the last of his belongings from his former room. Gabe was happy enough to help pack his things, knowing it would give me more room to expand his own room.

First grabbing the spare key his mother Amy kept hidden under a flower pot, then opening the front door. “Hello, is anybody home?” he asked out loud, his voice echoing through the empty household.

“I guess not.” PJ said out loud, walking across the living room after he had closed the door behind him. Halfway to the kitchen he nearly tripped over some of Charlie’s toy blocks, catching himself on the couch before it was too late.

“Whew, that was close. Charlie needs to learn how to clean up after herself, someone could get hurt walking over these.” He said, kicking several more multicolored blocks from his path.

Proceeding into the kitchen PJ noticed a plate full of chocolate frosted cupcakes, resting in a circular formation on top of a clear glass plate.

“PJ, please help yourself. I took Charlie to the park, will be back soon. Love mom.” the young Culinary student read aloud. He might have been able to bake for himself but he always loved when his mom made him and his siblings cupcakes growing up.

"Don't mind if I do." PJ said, lifting the cupcake closest to him of the plate and taking a bite. Surely his stuff could wait for him upstairs just a little longer he thought to himself, at least until after he finished a few more cupcakes that is.

Although he quickly realized that he might not ave a chance to finish more than one. His head began to spin counterclockwise to the room, his stomach turned upside down in a matter of moments.

"Ahh, something in that cupcake isn't agreeing with my stomach so well." PJ stated, unaware of what was really going on inside his body. Suddenly the room began to look distorted in his mind, objects appearing to stretch to twice they're normal size right before his eyes. No, they quadrupled in size only moments later.

Soon even he was forced to face the harsh reality of his situation. The objects weren't just growing in his mind, they were actually getting bigger from his point of view because he himself was shrinking down in height with each second that passed.

In less than a minute he was standing at roughly an inch tall at the center of a ceramic kitchen tile, his height resembling that of a common insect. He had to get out of the kitchen before someone walked in and stepped on him.

However it was too late for PJ, someone was home. The only question was who?

1. Teddy, coming in to make herself something for lunch. Leaving PJ at the mercy of her stomping feet as she walks by, giving him only a brief opportunity to get her attention.

2. Charlie, the young giant girl walking right to wear PJ shrunk. Her feet landing on either side of him, blocking any attempt at escape he might make. She'd take notice of him and recognize him as her shrunken brother, her young mind and imagination able to believe shrinking is easy and even normal.

3. Amy, his mother enters the room after returning home from the park. Calling for PJ but when he doesn't respond she decided to get some cleaning done, starting with sweeping the kitchen floor.

Xander was out in the woods writing his most recent song for his crush Emma who was also a C.I.T at Camp Kikiwaka.

He was going through the notes on his guitar, humming the lyrics in his mind as he tried to picture what Emma would think of every line.

About twenty minutes into brainstorming lyrics Zander began to feel lightheaded and laid his back against the dirt, looking up at the sky before falling asleep.

The musically gifted camp counselor staggered to his feet, rubbing his eyes before opening them to the sight of his guitar leaning up against a tree.

The wooden instrument now towered over him like a gigantic skyscraper, like the ones in New York City where Emma lived.

Growing up in Maine he had never really seen a huge skyscraper towering over a city, but his guitar was surpassing his highest expectations at the moment.

"What happened to me?" he asked himself aloud, finding himself standing at no taller than an inch tall on the hard dirt of the forest.

"I have to get back to camp and find Emma, maybe she can help me." Xander said, trying to think of ways out of this strange situation.

With Emma's family wealth she might be the only person he know who could help him get back to normal, Zuri was a close second but he'd rather trust someone closer to his age.

Not only that but he didn't exactly like the idea of being this size around the twelve year old Ugandan girl, the preteen girl might be quick to think of him as some kind of toy at his size.

"Great, which way was the camp again?" he said looking from left to right, wondering which direction he should start heading in before he was discovered by a wild animal.

However he might have decided too late on which direction to head in as footsteps could be felt approaching his location, he feared it might have been a large deer or the Kikiwaka itself heading towards him.

He was relieved to see five toes resting on top of a large black surface as __________'s flip flop sandal came out of the wood in his direction.

The last thing he wanted was for for the blonde giantess to reduce him to a stain on the earth under her foot, ironically crushed by his crush.

Her black flip flip creating a small sandstorm, impacting the dirt with the force of a 6.0 magnitude earthquake.

However these statements seemed to have had the opposite intended effect of Xander, sure it was easy for Emma to laugh it off. But these were things that could have actually happened to him! Being shrunk wasn't going to be easy, even with the help of Emma and her cabin mates.

Shortly after, Emma got quiet as she stepped foot on the campgrounds. Not wanting to be seen talking to her hand, thinking someone might find Xander in his shrunken state if she were stopped by a passerby. Luckily nobody even tried talking to her as she walked up to her cabin door.

"Hehe, you feel kind of nice back there." Emma giggled "Maybe I'll put you down there more often." giving her butt a nice shake, looking over her shoulder to make sure there was no imprint of his body shown on the back of her shorts.

Luckily she saw none and continued on her walk thought the woods with Xander held firmly against her buttocks.

12532.title: I Didn't Do It

125321.content:
Logan was hanging out in the basement of his and Lindy's home chewing his favorite 'Dare 2 Chew' hoping that some worthwhile dares would help cure his boredom.

Without his friend Garrett, his girlfriend Jasmine, or even Garrett and his sister Lindy to hang out with there wasn't much else Logan could do to keep himself entertained.

As he pulled the green wrapper of the stick of gum he wondered what kind of dare he'd get, some were easy, some were hard, some were quick, and some took a long time.

"Chew this piece of shrinking gum & spend the entire year being 1 inch tall." he read aloud, laughing as if he was reading joke gum instead of dare gum.

"Yea right, like I'm gonna believe that." The drummer said, crumpling up the wrapper and tossing it onto the couch next to him.

He fearlessly tossed the piece of gum in his mouth and began chewing, not expecting that it would actually shrink him down to any size.

Although is wasn't long after he started chewing that he realized the obvious effects of the gum on his body, the room shooting up in size expediently.

He tried spitting out the gum before he reached microscopic size, but he realized it was too late to stop the effects once he looked up.

The room was now bigger than he remembered his house being, it might have even been as big as the school as he rose to his feet on top of the couch cushion.

The crumpled up gum wrapping that he had tossed to the side earlier was now twice his size, serving as a reminder that he had been warned of what would happen if he accepted the dare.

Just then he heard a noise coming from nearby, someone must have been back at his and Lindy's home sooner than expected.

He was only concerned with who it was and if they would be able to help him in any way, turning around he saw that it was__________.

1. Lindy walking in front of the couch to sit down.

2. Jasmine walking in through the side door.

3. Delia walking downstair
125321.title: Dare 2 Shrink

1253211.content:
http://cdn01.cdn.justjaredjr.com/wp-cont...

Logan looked up in horror to see his twin sister Lindy towering high above him like the Statue of Liberty itself.

She looked around the room as if she had lost or misplaced something, walking in Logan’s general direction.

“That’s weird, I could have sworn I heard Logan down here just a minute ago.” Lindy said to herself, walking in front of the cushion her shrunken brother was sitting on.

“Hey! What are you doing? Look down here!” Logan shouted, becoming cloaked inside his sister’s extensive shadow as she turned around to sit.

The sheer magnitude of her voluminous ass was impressive to say the least, even if they were siblings.

At his size each cheek had grown to be the size of houses, each big enough for a family to live inside or be crushed under.

Unfortunately for Logan he was about to experience the latter of the two, forced to watch as Lindy hovered above him with no way of escaping.

“Oh well, I’m sure he’ll turn up eventually.” Lindy continued, allowing herself to unknowingly fall back onto her brand new seat cushion.

“Whoa, Lindy wait! I don’t think I’m ready for this!” He yelled, hoping to get her attention before he was crushed like an insect under his female twin’s bottom.

Inevitably her rear made contact with the sofa cushion with tremendous force, causing her to bounce of her shrunken brother’s puny body.

While this was a rather simply action for Lindy to execute, Logan was forced to writhe in agony underneath her massive ass.

“What?- Hmm I guess it was nothing.” Lindy said, hearing her tiny brothers voice before he was engulfed by her purple jean clad rear.

The size of her rear made it increasingly difficult for him to breath in fresh air, covering every section of his body in rough denim.

The blonde giantess exhaled deeply, stretching out her arms and kicking her feet up onto the nearby coffee table.

“Ahh, I don’t know why but this couch seems unusually comfortable today.” Lindy smiled, relaxing her full weight onto her tiny twin.

“God, she’s he-heavy.” Logan struggled to say, trying to break free from the weight of his sister’s gigantic rear end.

What will happen next?

1. Logan bite’s Lindy in the hopes of getting her attention, but she might not be so forgiving when she finds out it was him.

2. Logan crawl out from Lindy’s butt, only to have Delia sit down on top of him.

3. Lindy’s weight proves to heavy for Logan, while she gets comfortable and drifts off to sleep.

12533.title: A.N.T Farm or Cory In The House?

1253311.content:
It had been a year since Chyna Parks started the A.N.T. Program at Webster High, where she met her two best friends Olive Doyle and Fletcher Quimby.

Being in the A.N.T. Program allowed every student a free period to develop their natural talents, we join Fletcher during his own free period.

The twelve year old artist had been working on yet another drawing of Chyna from memory, adding Olive in so nobody would question his obvious obsession.

Although unlike Chyna he had a more difficult time remember the blonde brainiac’s facial and body features, trying to recall some from specific memories as reference.

One of the first memories that came to mind while focusing on Olive’s body, was the time she dressed in a more mature fashion for Lexi’s party.

He remembered this because it happened right after they met Chyna, and because she had expanded her bosom to meet unrealistic standards for a girl her age.
- http://www.childstarlets.com/captures/vi...

This made it more difficult for him to finish his drawing, eventually deciding to make them only slightly bigger than he’d drawn Chyna’s.

“There we go, all done.” Fletcher smiled, putting down his brush to examine his work.

“Excellent, I can’t wait to show this to Olive and Chyna.” Fletcher said proudly, hoping the young african girl would finally fall for him.

He took a seat on the couch and waited for the end of the period, kicking up his feet on the coffee table to relax.

Naturally it didn’t take long for the young artist to get comfortable, soon drifting off to sleep.

When he woke up Fletcher found himself resting on top of a large bed like surface, it was so soft that he felt as if he was resting on top of a cloud.

When he opened his eyes Fletcher noticed an immediate change in the A.N.T. Farm, mainly that it appeared to be many times bigger than he remembered.

“Wow, what the heck happened to me?” he asked, jumping to his feet on the sofa cushion.

“This would make an awesome concept drawing.” he said to himself, looking across the room to see how big his drawing pad was compared to him.

The drawings of Chyna and Olive looking down at him like two goddesses from within the canvas.

“But, I’m too small to draw anything for normal eyes.” Realizing he couldn’t remain an inch tall and still be a recognized artist.

Of course this also gave him the opportunity to make a flawless drawing, able to work out every flaw with perfect accuracy. But that could take months, maybe even years at his size to complete.

Just then his concentration was broke as ________ walked into the room.

1. Chyna- The young musician would walk past the shrunken boy to pick up an instrument from her corner, sitting on him accidentally without even checking her seat before beginning to practice.

2. Olive- She would walk into the A.N.T. Farm holding a book she borrowed from the library that was for people who could read at the level of an 11th grader, checking her seat before sitting down to see Fletcher shrunk(possibly mistaking him for a bug at first.) after remembering an article she read that stated ‘the average person accidentally sits on over 20 bugs a year’.

Who will shrink?

Cory, Newt, or a large group inside the White House?
125332.title: Cory In The House

1253321.content:
http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMT...

Cory was walking around The White House looking for something to fuel his next get rich quick schemes when he noticed Sophie Martinez exit a room he’d never been inside before.

The teenage boy took cover behind a corner to spy on the young girl, certain she hadn’t seen or heard him nearby.

She was rubbing her hands together mischievously, obviously hiding some kind of evil scheme from everybody.

Sure she was known as America’s Angel, but Cory knew that was only an act to hide her true nature as he leaned in to hear what she was saying.

“Ohhh this is gonna be so good, I can’t wait to see the look on Cory’s face.” the teenage boy overheard, coming to the conclusion the Sophie had some kind of surprise for him hidden in that room.

“Great it’s probably some kind of prank or trick, no doubt.” Cory said under his breath, trying to remain quiet and avoid detection.

“I can’t wait to play all kinds of games with him.” Sophie smiled, skipping down the hall away from him.

“Games, what does she mean by games?” Cory asked himself, assuming Sophie to be some kind of demon child who would enjoy torturing him.

Once she was out of sight Cory ran up to the door and turned the handle, surprised to find that it was unlocked.

He slipped inside the room unnoticed, finding that it was dimly lit with strange mechanical devices held on top of shelves and podiums.

“Wow, what is all of this?” Cory asked, noticing a strange gun like device in the center of the room marked ‘Property of Sophie’.

He could only assume that this was the surprise she had in store for him, picking it up gently from its podium.

“Really? This is Sophie's big surprise for me, a toy gun?" Not able to realize exactly what he was holding.

Cory pointed the device across the room towards an empty corner of the room, pulling down on the trigger a few time.

The only thing he noticed was the device lighting up near the barrel of the device, with no other noticeable reaction.

"What a stupid toy." Cory said mockingly, pointing the gun towards himself and accidentally pulling the trigger.

In an unexpected flash of light Cory found himself feeling strange, noticing as the whole room grew around him.

In a matter of seconds he had shrunk to a mere fraction of his normal height, the whole room now big enough to contain a small city.

“Dang! What the heck just happened to me?” the fourteen year old boy asked himself, turning around to face the gun that shrunk him.

On the side of the device he read tiny words that could only been seen by someone of his size.

‘Caution, shrink ray: Please use responsibly, signed the CIA.’

“Man, that’s just great. You’d think they could emphasize that a bit better.” realizing he had no way of returning to normal.

He began running back toward to door he walked through to get inside this room, which now towered over him like the washington monument.

Crawling underneath the door only to find a pair of feet waiting for him on the other side, judging by the girl’s footwear it wasn’t hard to come to the conclusion that it was _________ standing above him.

1. white flats with black polka dots- Meena > http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090...

2. black school shoes- Sophie > http://celebrityimages.org/images/436199...

3. long black boots- Candy > no reference available
1253321.title: Executive Shrinking

12533212.content:
Cory's heart sank into his stomach as a familiar pair of black school shoes came crashing down onto the floor in front of him, nearly obliterating him from the face of the earth as they sent vibrations throughout the floor. Inside these shoes were a pair of white thigh high clad socks that traveled over one feet up the young Spanish-American girl's legs, cutting over just before her blue panties that matched both her shirt and skirt.

"Well, well, well. What do we have here? I was wondering who would be dumb enough to set of my security system, but it looks like it was just a stupid little bug." Sophie smiled, swinging her hips from left to right with a sinister smile spread across her face. Clearly Sophie knew Cory wasn't a bug based off how she was acting, towering above him with a sense of superiority in her eyes.

"So-Sophie, you need to change me back to normal size. Right now!" Cory demanded, taken back by how massive the young child was compared to him when he started speaking.

"What's that? Did that little ant just ask me for help?" Sophie teased, moving her feet to Cory's sides to prevent him from escaping her.

"Sophie this is serious, I need you to help me!" Cory yelled, watching as Sophie bent down over him. The enormous eight year old girl reaching down towards him, pinching him between her fingertips and lifting him into the air in front of her billboard sized face.

"Yeah right, and why on earth would I do that? After all the trouble I went through having those CIA scientists make a shrink ray to make you this small." Sophie smiled, her lips parting enough to reveal her front teeth, each almost as big as Cory himself.

"Wait, you mean you were already gonna do this to me?" Cory asked, dumbfounded by why Sophie would even want to make him the size of a bug.

"Of course, I'm so bored of playing with the same old dolls in my room. I need a toy that I can interact with, plus I really love torturing you." Sophie giggled.

"Now I just need to hide you so that nobody else can see you." Sophie said, looking down at the outfit she was wearing.

Where does Sophie decide to hide him?

1. Inside of her shoe to serve as her insole.

2. In the back of her panties, firmly held against her soft rear.

3. Between her thigh and her tall white sock, leaving only his head exposed.
12533212.title: Sophie's Master Plan

125332123.content:
With Cory in hand, Sophie peeked her head out into the hallway, not so subtly making sure there was no one coming. Seeing that the coast was all clear, Sophie began to lower Cory down towards her hips, while at the same time hiking up her skirt with her free hand. Cory's field of view was immediately filled with the panty clad butt of America's Angel.

"Are you crazy Sophie? You can't put me in your panties!" Cory yelled, horrified at the thought of being pressed against the spoiled young girl's rear end.

"Funny, I hadn't even considered that. I bet squishing you into my butt would be pretty fun. Thanks for the suggestion, but we'll have to save that one for later." Sophie said, giggling at the plans that were already racing through her mind. She brought the hand containing Cory down past her butt to where her thigh high socks ended, giving Cory a better idea of where he would be staying. He struggled in her grip as her nimble fingers went to work, her thumb managing to pull the sock away from her thigh while her remaining fingers unfurled into a slide, allowing Cory to roll down into place. Before he could slip too deep, Sophie released the sock, allowing the fabric to snap back against her leg, now with a tiny boy in between.

Cory could not move his arms or legs at all with them sandwiched between the tight fabric of Sophie's socks and the warm flesh of her leg. Only his head stuck out above the cuff of the sock, allowing him the luxury of bending his neck a bit to get a view of his surroundings.

"Sophie you can't just keep me in your sock like this!" Cory yelled

"Of course I can Cory. With my skirt down no one will see you squirming around on my leg. But, if you'd prefer, we could try to come up with a more concealed location. Perhaps I could let you slide all the way down to the bottom of my sock so you can get introduced to my toes? Or we could switch over to that butt idea you suggested? Then again, if we really want to make sure no one can see you, I could always carry you up to my room in my stomach. Of course, that would still leave me with the problem of how to carry you from the bathroom to my room once you got out of my tummy..." Sophie teased, intentionally trailing off. She knew Cory would not trade his current position for any of her suggestions, so she dropped her skirt back into place with a shrug.

Cory's view of the world around him immediately vanished, replaced with the light blue fabric of Sophie's skirt. He didn't object at this point, too terrified by the alternatives to risk complaining. Instead, he simply braced himself for what would inevitably be a very bumpy ride.

He was not disappointed. As Sophie stepped out of the room, Cory's world became a non-stop hurricane of movement. He was strapped by her sock to the outside of her right thigh, just below her hip. With every step she took, he was rocked back and forth, as though he was attached to a giant, fleshy pendulum. Her skirt swayed with her hips as she walked, resulting in it frequently swinging into him, brushing up against his face with every step.

Suddenly, the swaying came to an abrupt stop, though it was far too early to have been Sophie's room. Cory wondered what was going on for only a moment, before the smell of fresh baked cookies reached his nose and everything became clear: Sophie had stopped at the kitchen.

"Hello Mr. Baxter! Can I have some cookies please?" Sophie asked sweetly, hiding her mischievous nature behind a well practiced angelic smile.

"Sure you can angel." Mr. Baxter said with a smile, preparing a plate. "By the way Sophie, have you seen my son?"

A master liar, Sophie didn't even flinch at the question. "Sorry, can't say that I have. But if I do, I'll be sure to share some of my cookies with him!"

"That's very kind of you Sophie. Just let him know I was looking for him." Mr. Baxter said, handing the young girl the plate of cookies.

Cory couldn't believe he was only a few feet away from his own father, but this little devil's skirt was able to completely conceal him. He considered crying out for help to get his attention, but before he could work up the courage, she was on the move again. As she walked, the possibility of escape briefly crossed his mind. If he could get out of her sock, he'd have to climb down it to get to the floor. He looked downwards, able to see only the shiny black shoes of his tormentor clapping against the ground with every one of her steps. The image of falling down from her sock, landing on the ground only for one of those shoes to slam down on top of him, instantly wiped any thoughts of climbing down from his mind.

"Hey Sophie. Have you seen Cory?" boomed the voice of Meena, Cory's long time crush. Though he could not see her, the sound of her voice calmed him somewhat, if only for a moment.

Sophie didn't even stop walking to reply to Meena's question. "Sorry Meena, just saw him leave." Sophie called over her should, subconsciously fixing her skirt as she did so, pressing her hand against her tiny toy in the process.

Cory was still reeling from being struck by Sophie's hand when she suddenly quickened her pace, clearly wanting to get away from Meena before she could question her further. Looking upward, Cory could see the evil girl's butt rising and falling with her steps, cheeks grinding together all the while. Sophie's threat to put him in there returned to him, and he couldn't help but imagine being caught between those titanic hills as the swung up and down, rolling him in between them like a piece of lint.

Cory was snapped back to reality once again as Sophie came to a halt, this time outside the maid's quarters. He could hear Sophie's saccharine sweet voice: "Excuse me miss, do you have a needle and thread I can borrow?" He couldn't hear the maid's reply, but he knew the answer was yes. No one would say no to "America's Angel". He wasn't even surprised she managed to obtain a shrink ray from the CIA considering how many people he'd seen her manipulate in the past.

Sophie's walk began once more, cookies and sewing kit in tow. Cory couldn't even begin to wonder what the sewing kit was for, as he was too busy contending with the fact that he was beginning to slip deeper into her sock. It took all of his energy to hold onto the sock with what little control of his limbs he had, desperate to keep his head about the cuff of her sock. The thought of suffocating inside Sophie's socks was so embarrassing to Cory that he didn't even consider it a possibility. He knew he would survive this walk, even if whatever Sophie had planned next would be a death sentence.

Finally, fortune smiled upon the shrunken teen, as Sophie's fingers shot up under her skirt, fetching him from his hiding spot in her sock. Cory was cut off from light as her fingers wrapped tightly around him, entombing him in her surprisingly tight grip. Within a few seconds though, her fingers unfurled, allowing him to come to a rest on the carpeted floor of Sophie's room. Once again, he laid before the feet of the cruel goddess, though now, he was completely on her turf. He was alone with Sophie completely at her mercy, as the conniving pre-teen considered the possible things she could do with him.

What is in store for Cory?

1. Sophie wants to play "Paddle-butt", which involves her tying Cory to the end of a string wrapped around her waist and trying to see how many times she can bounce him against her butt in a row.

2. Meena bursts in, wanting to further question Sophie. Sophie shrinks Meena as well, and has Cory play "Save the Princess", where he must climb Sophie to save Meena, who will be trapped in Sophie's mouth

3. Sophie prepares an obstacle course, where Cory must navigate through her room while avoiding being crushed under her as she plays.
125332123.title: Thigh High Ride

1253321232.content:
Sophie had no intention of wasting any of her time with her new toy. The anticipation of finally getting to play with him had built up as she walked to her room, feeling him fighting against her thigh in her sock. It was time to play, and she had a perfect game in mind to break him in. "So while I was walking up here, I thought of a game I think will be a lot of fun. It's called Paddle-Butt, and it involves-" Sophie began, only to be interrupted as the door to her room swung open and Meena stomped into the room.

"Is there something you're not telling me Sophie? You said you saw Cory leave just now, but Mr. Baxter said you claimed you haven't seen him at all." Meena said as she entered, her furious steps making it hard for Cory to keep his footing. He tried to cry out for her attention as her sandal clad grew closer to his position on the floor, sure that he was about to be a stain on the Bahavian beauty's sole. Fortunately, her feet came to a stop just short of Cory's position, leaving him face to foot with his long time crush. "Newt said he overheard you asking his father about a shrink ray. Does that have something to do with where Cory is?"

"Why don't you see for yourself?" Sophie replied, gesturing down towards the older girl's feet.

Meena's eyes followed Sophie's gesture down to her own toes, exposed in her open toed sandals. At first she didn't see anything, but when she looked a bit harder she saw her tiny friend standing on the carpet, a few mere inches from her feet. "Cory!" Meena shouted, dropping to her knees to bring her face down towards the shrunken teen. Her knees hitting the ground caused a small earthquake for Cory, who was thrown onto his back by the shaking, leaving him looking up at the goddess sized girl of his dreams. "Are you ok Cory?" Meena asked, her voice thunderous at such close proximity. Still stunned by her size, the best Cory managed to do was answer with a nod that Meena could barely make out at his size.

"Sophie this is insane! How could you do th-" Meena began, turning her gaze back towards the spoiled girl. Meena's eyes widened in fright as she saw Sophie, shrink ray in hand, pointing the device directly at her. Before Meena could make a case for herself, a beam of light struck her directly in the face, blinding her temporarily as she was rapidly reduced in size.

Cory jumped to his feet to help his newly shrunken friend, running over towards her position laying on Sophie's carpet. However, before he could reach her, Sophie's hand grabbed her away from him.

"Cory!" Meena shouted, reaching towards her friend on the ground as she was pulled away from him, not knowing what cruel fate awaited her in Sophie's demonic hands.

"Sophie give her back right now!" Cory yelled, distraught at the sight of the love of his life in danger.

"You want her back? You'll have to win this next game." Sophie said, addressing Cory but eyeing Meena hungrily. "I call it 'Save the Princess', and it's quite simple." Before explaining, Sophie sat down on the floor in front of him, her legs crossed Indian style forming a towering wall separating him from the giant preteen who currently held Meena captive. "Meena here is the princess, trapped in a tower by an evil queen. You're the knight coming to rescue her, and I'm the tower."

"What do you mean you're the tower?" Cory asked, already not liking the sound of this game.

Rather than answer, Sophie simply smiled before opening her mouth wide, allowing her tongue to hang out of her mouth. Meena screamed as America's Angel raised her up above her mouth, giving her a view down into the inky blackness of her throat.

"Sophie please I'm sorry I yelled at you just please let me go!" Meena begged, not wanting to be devoured by a little girl.

"If you insist." Sophie said, before releasing the Bahavian girl from her grip and allowing her to fall with a splat onto her tongue. Before Meena could even stand up Sophie pulled her tongue back into her mouth and slammed her lips together, cutting off Meena's screams for help from Cory's ears.

Cory could not believe his eyes. The sight he had just witnessed was more than he could bear. "Sophie, how could you?! You ate Meena!"

"I dibnt eat er" Sophie said, her words garbled by the girl she was currently sucking on. "But she tathes very good."

With every word Sophie spoke, Meena was tossed across her mouth as the young girl's tongue moved in an attempt to articulate the words. Meena was constantly in the way of the slimy appendage, getting slapped up against the roof of her mouth and into the hard enamel of her teeth as it flicked around her maw. She could barely see where she was in the dark cavern, though flashes of light occasionally snuck in through Sophie's lips when her mouth opened to speak. Meena was coated from head to toe in Sophie's saliva, and every flick of her tongue somehow seemed to soak her further. Her movement was greatly impaired by her now waterlogged clothing. And this did not even take into account that Meena was hearing every word at point blank range, blasting her ear drums with the high pitched sound of Sophie's voice.

After a few moments of silence from the giant girl, Meena allowed herself to briefly hope that Sophie was ready to spit her out. It became clear that this was not the case when the young girl's tongue suddenly tipped her to the side, allowing her to fall between Sophie's teeth and tongue into a massing pool of saliva and out of the way of Sophie speaking.

Now free to speak clearly, Sophie once again addressed Cory. "Now, like I said, you are a knight here to rescue Meena from me. You'll have to climb up my body to my lips and pull Meena out to save her. And you'll have to do it in the next five minutes, because I am getting hungry and I love Bahavian food."

At this point Cory knew better than to assume Sophie was bluffing. He leapt into action immediately, running towards Sophie's position on the floor in order to save his friend. When he reached her, he found himself facing his first obstacle: Sophie's stocking clad feet. Even standing near them was unpleasant as the smell of a long day in her black school shoes overwhelmed Cory. He shook away any reservations and grabbed onto the fabric covering her sole, knowing he had no time to waste to save Meena.

Sophie couldn't help but giggle at the feeling of Cory climbing along the underside of her foot. Every time he used a tiny wrinkle in her sole as a hand or foot hold, it was all she could do not to burst out laughing at the ticklish sensation. Her foot reflexively twitched a result, making the climb especially hazardous for Cory as he struggled to hold on to her stockings.

Once he reached the top of foot and found himself standing on her ankle, he wasted no time running up the long path formed by her leg, quickly reaching her knee and turning onto her thigh. It was surreal to think minutes ago he was bound to her thigh as she traversed the White House, and now he was running across it to save Meena's life. This time of course he remained outside her skirt, climbing along it til he reached her stomach, where her skirt ended and her shirt began. With strength he didn't know he possessed, he grabbed onto the sky blue fabric and began to pull himself upwards.

Just as Cory passed Sophie's bellybutton, a sound like thunder echoed within the young girl's gut. "Sounds like my tummy's getting hungry." Sophie taunted, her tongue taking a brief break from harassing Meena to speak. "And you're down to two minutes.

Cory redoubled his efforts to scale Sophie, knowing his time was fast running out and he still had a ways more to go. Deciding to have a bit of fun with Cory as she watched him climb, Sophie maneuvered Meena to the front of her mouth and pursed her lips, allowing Meena's head to peek through like the beginnings of a bubble gum bubble, the giant girl's lips firmly pinched around her neck.

"Get me out of here Cory! She's gonna eat me!" Meena yelled, her voice choked with tears of fear. Cory could tell she had been through hell, her hair was matted and soaked, her make up had been smeared, and eyes were welling with tears. Unbeknownst to Cory, Sophie's tongue was lapping at Meena's legs within her mouth as she savored the flavor of her Bahavian treat.

"Everything is gonna be ok Meena." Cory yelled, trying to sound reassuring despite the circumstances as he approached Sophie's neckline. Grabbing a strand of hair hanging in front of her, Cory began to climb for her mouth. Ignoring the burning pain in his arms, Cory kicked off Sophie's neck as hard as he could, using the momentum to swing up around Sophie's chin. The giant brunette tipped her head back slightly, turning her face into a platform Cory was capable of standing on. He landed hard on Sophie's chin, but rolled through the impact and hopped to his feet, making a last ditch run for Meena. His friend had managed to extend her saliva soaked arm out of between the giant pink lips, reaching for her "knight' to pull her free.

What happens?

1. Cory successfully pulls Meena free.
2. Cory grabs Meena's hand, and is pulled into Sophie's mouth along with her.
3. Meena is slurped into Sophie's mouth like a spaghetti noodle at the last second, and swalloed.

1253322.content:
http://es.tunes.zone/poster/person/full/...

Newt arrived at the White House same as he did everyday, on the roof via his families helicopter. Greeted by members of the Secret Service who checked his guitar and bag for explosives or other form of weaponry, one man stepping to the side and speaking into his earpiece.

"He's here, would you like us to escort him in?" the tall imposing man asked, stepping off further so he could speak without being heard. A few minutes later after Newt had been completely checked in, his family's helicopter left the roof of the White House and the man returned saying "Follow me." before leading Newt into the building.

Some time later Newt found himself entering the far right wing of the White House on the second floor, a section of the White House he'd yet to venture into since first meeting Cory. Soon after entering the hallway the man stepped to the side against the wall, pointing Newt towards the direction he was supposed to be heading.

Unsure of what to do next Next said "Okay dude, whatever you say." Walking down the hall with his guitar held in his right hand and turning left at the end. He wasn't really sure of what he was supposed to be looking for, that is until he saw a door partially open on his left side.

Allowing his curiosity to get the better of him Newt proceeded forward, pushing the door wide open to reveal what appeared to be some type of lab. Surrounding him on several pedestals we're gun like devices that appeared to be pulled straight from science fiction and comic books. However here they were in real life, causing Newt to wonder if any of them actually worked.

Although he didn't have to wait very long to figure out first hand as some odd noises could be heard coming from behind him, the blonde teen freezing up as the chilling sound entered his eardrums.> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H7fHGRda...

Just as the sound came to an end he could feel a beam of energy connecting with his back, causing him to experience sudden bursts of dizziness and nausea. He believed for a second that he was dead or dying at the very least, but a quick examination of his body revealed that he was completely intact, or so he thought at least.

It didn't take even Newt very long to look at his surrounding and come to the obvious conclusion that something wasn't right, everything surrounding him including his own guitar case was simply gigantic in comparison to the shrunken blonde.

"Perfect, this hunk of junk actually worked." Spoke the voice of a certain little girl, the President's daughter Sophie Martinez. Of course she'd be responsible for all of this, the so called 'America's Angel' was always up to no good when the camera's weren't focused on her.

Newt was shocked by how tall she had become now that he'd been shrunk, it was almost like looking up at the Washington Monument towering over D.C. You know, if the monument was a not so little girl instead of a stone tower that is.

She was dressed in her rather usual attire, a blue dress and skirt, a pair of thick white stockings that stretched out from the pair of Mary Jane's she was currently wearing extending all the way up under her skirt, her hair on the other hand was worn in curly pigtails that reached down to her shoulders.

"I'll admit, this CIA shrink ray made you a lot smaller than I thought it would honestly. I thought you'd be the size of my foot, not the size of a little fly. Although this might work out even better for what I have planned" Sophie admitted to Newt, walking towards him with a joyful smile spread across her face. Sophie's powerful Mary Jane's shook the floor beneath her feet every time they connected with the floorboards beneath her, sending out impressive (almost) earthquake like vibrations that nearly knocked Newt of his feet.

"Wait, Sophie? I'm confused, why did you shrink me?" Newt yelled, his voice barely audible to the eight year old's eardrums.

"Silly, I did it because I wanted to. Now you belong to me." She answered, as if the situation was that cut and dry. Although in her mind it might as well be, whenever she wanted something she got it. That's the lifestyle that comes with being the President's daughter.

Soon Sophie's feet landed in front of Newt with thundering impacts, successfully knocking Newt onto his ass as he looked up at Sophie from the floor. Now he had a good idea of what it must be like for an ant to look up at even a child, and it was clear that he didn't like it one bit. He didn't even want to imagine how tall someone older than Sophie like Meena or Mrs. Samuels would look from this perspective.

"What are you waiting for, let's get going my little love bug." Sophie giggled, referencing her crush on Newt as she took a short step back and got on one knee. Her large hand equivalent in size to a tank as she reached down to pick him off the ground, luckily her young fingers were rather nimble. Allowing her to capture and lift Newt up between her thumb and pointer finger with ease, no matter how hard he struggled to escape her grasp.

"Don't fight it little guy, I'm holding back now. But if you move around to much I might accidentally squish you like a bug between my fingers." Sophie teased, tightening her finger's grip on him just enough to show Newt she meant business. Soon after Newt's body went limp as he allowed himself to be carried by the gigantic eight year old girl, now wanting to literally experience death by her hands.

"Good boy, I think you'll make a great pet slash future boyfriend if you continue to behave like that. But for now I need to keep you hidden until I can get to __________, so I'll be keeping you in my __________ for safe keeping. Try not to have too much fun in there." Sophie teased, horrifying the shrunken blonde with what she had planned.

1. The Kitchen/ Stocking: Sophie, grabs a nearby chair and sits down on it so she can take of her white stockings, possibly holding Newt under her thighs while explaining to him that she has a fun game in mind for them to play, however she needs something from the kitchen first to play and can't have anyone spotting Newt while she goes to grab it.

2. My Room/ Panties: Sophie teases Newt with the idea of hiding him in the back of her panties till she can reach her room on the opposite side of the white house. Telling him she's sure he'll enjoy it because 'big kids'are apparently obsessed with each others butts. Figuring that since she is now the biggest kid ever that her butt is the perfect place to hold Newt temporarily.

3. The Sleepover/ My Mouth: Sophie pushes Newt inside her mouth after announcing that she will be taking him to some kind of sleepover as a special guest, keeping him hidden underneath her tongue to reduce the risk of swallowing him along with her own saliva while also toying with him every now and again using her tongue. The chapter would end with Sophie hiding Newt somewhere in her room to be discovered later during the sleepover.

12533313.title: Mr. Moseby, Both Twins?

125333131.content:
Mr. Moseby had retired into his special suite after a long day of chastising twins, taking care of a spoiled heiress and managing a hotel staff of hundreds. The days were slowly wearing on Marion. Every day he was caught up in the same rinse and repeat scenario. The day starts off normal. The twins make a mistake. London does something clueless and it seems like reality is about to unfurl until some last-minute situation returns everything to the status quo for the next day. It's as if his entire life was scripted on some comedy television show.

Marion sat down a grabbed a nearby cup of water. He took a swig of it and gulped it down hard. It didn't taste like normal Tipton Hotel water. Marion peered into the cup to see if the twins had pranked him. But the only thing his eye spotted was a cup full of water. Marion shrugged and down the rest of the bitter water before getting ready to don is pajamas.

Suddenly, a warm feeling coursed through Marion's body. His heart began to beat faster. He grabbed his heart and fell down to the ground. He became coughing and choking.

"Help," he said in a raspy voice. "Help!"

Marion completed his fall to the ground. As soon as his head hit the carpeted floor, he blacked out.

***

Several hours later, Marion woke up in a daze. The pain in his heart was gone and his body felt much cooler than usual. He got up and walked toward the thermostat when he noticed that everything in his room was a thousand times bigger. His king-sized bed. His wardrobe. His television set. Everything. He looked down on the ground and found that the regal pattern on his floor was now much bigger and spread out across the room. He looked up and saw his special chandelier hanging above him as if it was the sun itself.

"What on Earth happened to me?" Marion said as felt his body in a panic. Before his brain could process any sudden information, the door to his private suite opened. Marion's jaw dropped as a humongous figure dressed in pajamas walked in. The figure belonged to no one other than...
125333131.title: Mr. Moseby's Night Time Surprise

125333132.content:
Zack and Cody were inside their Tipton hotel room after being grounded for breaking the chandelier in the ballroom.

Even though this was mostly Zacks fault, Cody who was present at the time received an equal amount of blame for his brother’s actions.

Zack was keeping himself entertained by playing his Gameboy Advance, ready to conceal it at a moment’s notice if their mother Carrie walked in.

Meanwhile Cody was doing something more productive with his time, working to improve his science fair project in the hopes of beating his Asian girlfriend Barbara.

“Yes, I'm almost there! Only a few more minutes and I'll be the first player to ever make it to level one hundred.” Zack said excited, pacing back and forth from the living room and kitchen.

“Quiet, who cares about your stupid game? You gonna make me mess up my invention.” Cody said, obviously annoyed by his twin brother.

“What are you so uptight about?” Zack asked, sounding relaxed about being grounded as he continued to play his game.

“I'm ‘up-tight’ because you broke thatchandelier and got us both grounded.” Cody replied, leaving his screwdriver inside the control panel of his device.

“It was your fault we were there in the first place, if you hadn't gotten gum in Ivana’s fur then I wouldn't have had to do that.” Zack said, forcing the blame back onto Cody.

“No, we wouldn't have been caught if you didn't go to such extremes, and London still found out about the gum in Ivana's fur.” Cody reasoned, giving a short bio of how they got grounded in the first place.

“Fine so we’re both to blame.” Zack admitted, willing to be reasonable and share the blame if it meant he didn't have to take it all by himself, besides he was no stranger to being grounded.

“You act like such a kid. When are you gonna grow up? We're fourteen now and in high school.” Cody said, acting as if this meant anything to his brother.

Meanwhile as the brothers continued to argue, an immense amount of energy escaped Cody’s device through the control panel.

This swelled up into a beam of energy that fired directly through both Zack and Cody, forcing them to shrink rapidly in size as their hotel room grew around them.

The furniture they once sat on, the device which might have been their only means of returning to normal size, and even Zack’s Gameboy all became huge as they shrunk down to only an inch tall in height.

“Apparently never, but it does look like I'll shrink down.” Zack joked, answering Cody’s question from earlier in the hopes of diffusing some tension between the two.

“What? Oh no my shrink ray shot us, we're the size of bugs.” Cody said worried, struggling to move through the waist high carpet fibers that proved difficult to navigate.

“No! My game, now I'll never reach level one hundred!” Zack yelled, finding something more concerning to him than the thought of being stepped on like a common insect.

“How do we get back to normal?” The slacker twin asked, thinking that if they acted quickly that he might still be able to beat the game before the batteries died.

“Well, I'm too small to do anything useful. I could take me years, our only hope is to get help from someone else to fix my shrink ray while I tell them what to do.” Cody confirmed, looking at the door standing tall and far away from them.

Both brothers made their way towards the door as fast as they could, when suddenly _________.

1.Their mom Carrie returns, opening the door fast enough that a gust of wind sends Zack & Cody flying to different corners of the hotel room. Obviously she be upset, thinking that they skipped out of their grounding as she walked around the apartment.

2.They make it under the door, only to be faced with four gigantic feet waiting for them on the other side. Noticing that both types of shoes were similar they look up too see Jessica and Janice towing high above them. The British twins would quickly notice them and tease them for being so tiny on accident, thinking they shrunk themselves as some kind of weird American game.

3. They make it under the door to see London waiting on the other side for the elevator, and while she's not the best person to talk to about technology they jump on the elevator with her in the hopes of getting her attention or even ride down to the lobby to get help from Maddie the candy girl.
125333132.title: Double The Shrinking

1253331322.content:
http://waytofamous.com/images/milly-ross...

The shrunken twins wasted no time in getting under the doorway. Fortunately, they were just small enough to fit under and into the hallway, granted that would likely be the only advantage their sudden size change. As the two crawled out from beneath the door, they were immediately confronted by two pairs of completely identical feet, clad in black flats. As they craned their necks up, they began to make out of the figures of two girls whose long platinum blonde hair made it easy to indentify them as Janice and Jessica, two British twins who occasionally visited the Tipton Hotel. Each girl was wearing a plaid summer dress, identical save for color, teal for the Janice and magenta for Jessica. From the tiny boys' position, it wasn't hard to see that the each girl wore panties that matched their outfit. Cody did his best not to stare up the girls' skirts, opting to look at the ground instead, while his brother Zack was seemingly transfixed by the sight. Between the two of them, neither took note of the British twins were currently looking down at them, until Jessica spoke up.

"Are those bugs, Jessica," The magenta twin asked, her accent coming out thickly.

"No, Jessica, I think that's Zack and Cody," The teal twin responded.

At this point both boys looked up to their female counterparts, happy to be noticed so quickly. They were about to start explaining what happened when the twins continued talking as if they weren't there.

"They're so small," Jessica said, smiling slightly as she extended her flat-clad foot out and gave Zack a littke tap, knocking him backwards.

"Really, really small," Janice echoed, as she mirrored her sister's motions perfectly, giving Cody a nudge with her own foot.

The twins each fell backwards, watching as the toe of their respective girl's shoe hovered ominously overhead. Neither dared move for fear of being crushed, not even the more brazen Zack who sat shaking at the thought of getting crushed underfoot by one of the girl's he'd been crushing on.

"And they're so tiny," Janice began, moving her foot away from Cody as she bent over to pick him up.

"Really, really tiny," Jessica added, her tone slightly more demeaning than before as mirrored her sister and knelt down to pluck up Zack.

Zack and Cody were relieved that the threat of a messy death under a girl's flat had passed. Although each couldn't help but notice that Jessica and Janice were keeping a rather firm grip on the boys as they stood up to full height. The saw Janice and Jessica look too each other, each baring an identical smile.

"Still, they are pretty cute," Jessica started, giving Zack a wide grin.

"Really, really cute," Janice added as she disrupted her and her sister's rhythm by instead winking at Cody.

"So, why are you so small?" Jessica asked, apparently deciding she was done teasing the boys.

Both Zack and Cody opened their mouths, trying to tell conflicting stories that shifted the blame onto the other. Neither girl seemed to hear as Janice followed up her sister, her voice drowning out the two shrunken boys.

"I bet they shrunk themselves," Janice suggested, not too far off base.

"For some sort of American game," Jessica finished, deviating from why the twins actually shrunk.

Cody and Zack both started talking once again, each trying to explain in his own way that they hadn't shrunk to play around. Unfortunately, the British twins already seemed to have their minds set on that idea.

"A game sounds fun," Janice began, looking down at the shrunken boys with a smile.

"Really, really fun," Jessica finished, as was customary.

The two girls began to walk to their rooms, smiling to one another as they seemed to communicate mentally. As they reached their door, just down the hall, one girl spoke up naming the game she wanted to play with the shrunken pair.

Which girl was it?

Choice 1: Jessica, suggesting a game of cat and mouse (Janice and Jessica set the twins loose in their apartment after blocking the door, then allow them a few seconds head start before giving chase. They explain that the boys will be competing against one another, with the winner getting rewarded and the loser getting punished. For this game, the reward will be spending time in the front of one girl's panties and the punishment will be spending time in the back of the other girl's panties.)

Choice 2: Janice, suggesting an obstacle course (Janice and Jessica trap the twins in a jar while they set up a surprisingly complex obstacle course using various items from around the house. They explain that the boys will have to work together in order to get through and will only win if they complete the course in a certain amount of time. For this game, the reward and punishment will be greater. If the boys win, the girls will allow them to choose what they do next. On the other hand, if they lose the boys end up being eaten by the girls.)

Choice 3: Both girls, thinking so very much alike would agree to game that play's to their strengths over the shrunken twin, namely their size. The twin giantess would then set up think of several rigged games they can't be beaten at simply due to the fact that Zack and Cody are two small. Planning out a different penalty for each loss that relates to the challenge they were faced with, promising something in return the twins can't deny at any size.
1253331322.title: Giantess Twins

1253331323.content:
Zack followed Cody's lead as he began crawling under the door, hoping his twin brother had a good plan for getting someone's attention to help them. He was mostly focused on getting back to normal size so he could finish playing his game, but he had to admit that it was pretty cool seeing things from this size.

He met his brother Cody on the other side of the door, realizing how tiny they might be compared to a normal sized person give the height of the hallway. Nevertheless he followed Cody towards the Elevators around the corner, both brothers being careful to run along side the walls in order to minimize the risk of being stepped on.

Once they reached a turn in the hallway Cody got as close as he could to look around for both threats and assets, spotting a simply gigantic London Tipton waiting for the elevator.

http://www33.patrz.pl/u/f/50/07/69/50076...

"Ugh, I hate having to wait for these stupid elevators! Why can't there be one that's just for me, daddy has the money to buy me one!" London boomed, acting like her usual stuck up self. She continued being impatient by pressing the button continuously for the next 30 seconds until it finally arrived on their floor.

Zack and Cody ran towards London the moment they heard the elevator ding, hoping to catch a ride down to the lobby if they couldn't get London's attention. Although she was pretty dim and the last person Cody would want to rebuild his invention, she'd likely get bored and give up.

Cody jumped the gap onto the elevator floor, barely making the jump to the other side successfully. Zack being the more athletic of the two brothers easily made the jump, running to the side London was on as she pressed the button.

The two steel doors closed behind them, trapping the fourteen year old twins inside the elevator alone with London. From their position they could clearly see that London was heading downstairs to the lobby instead of upstairs towards her penthouse apartment.

Zack looked up from where he was stand, his cheeks beginning to blush as he came to realize that London was wearing a skirt. Underneath which she wore a pair of black lace panties, by the look of them they were designer underwear, much like everything else she wore. In fact it was quite likely that her panties like any other piece of clothing she dawned was only worn was before being thrown away for good.

London tapped her foot subconsciously, shaking the floor of the elevator as Cody wondered about their next move. Should they try to get her attention, or would that be too risky given the fact that they got gum stuck in her dog Ivana's fur? Would London turn on them if she caught them at this size, or would she try to help?

Cody had a plan in mind, turning to tell Zack only to see him_____________.

1. already climbing London, meaning they had no choice but to try getting her attention or risk being separated.

2. holding onto London's boots in the hopes that she'd walk up to the candy counter where Maddie works.

3. waiting by the door to escape into the lobby when London exit's the elevator, thinking the same way as Cody for once.
1253331323.title: Hold That Elevator

choices: Their Mom Carey Getting on the Elevator
12533313233.content:
Cody turned around to see his brother waiting in front of the imposing metal doors next to the gigantic London as she impatiently tapped her boot clad foot against the floor of the elevator.

"I really need to convince daddy to get me my own elevator, these poor people elevators are just too slow." London whined, looking up too see that she was almost at the lobby.

Zack waved over at Cody telling him to join him on the other side of the elevator to avoid being stepped on by London when she walked out of the metal box. Cody walked over to where Zack was standing and stood behind his twin brother as a loud *ding* resounded throughout the elevator, followed by the titanic metal walls separating to reveal the lobby.

"Finally, it's about time. Now I can finally go shopping!" London smiled, clapping her hands together before saying her catchphrase "Yay me!" and exiting the elevator. With London gone and the fear of being stepped on minimized to half, Zack and Cody jumped over the gap onto the floor of the lobby.

"Okay, we got down here. Now what do we do?" Zack asked, looking around the lobby for a sign of anybody they could go to for help.

"I think we should try hitting the candy counter, Maddie's smart. Maybe she can help us."Cody said hopefully.

But just before they started running towards Maddie, a large foot landed on the floor only a few inches away from them.

Who was it?
