125333331.title: Once Upon a Time shrinking

1253333311.content:
Raven Baxter was waking up on the couch after accidentally falling asleep on the couch the night before. She had been exhausted from working, cooking, cleaning, and even disciplining her daughter Mia by taking away her smartphone for getting a bad grade.

She accidentally rolled to her side, remembering at the moment that she was in the living room last night went she fell asleep, expecting her body to drop onto the hardwood floor below. But, no such drop occurred. Instead, there was just more couch to support her, way more than should be possible.

Raven's eyes shot wide-open, taking in the now-massive landscape that was now indistinguishable from the memory he had of her living room just 10 hours ago. "Aw snap, what the heck is going on now?" Raven asked, almost believing that she was in the midst of some crazy dream. However, because of her clairvoyance, her dreams in the past were usually about things that could happen. Finding it hard to believe that she could be the size of a bug.

She began pacing back and forth, trying everything she could think of to wake herself up, but as time passed she slowly began to accept the trust, and while it didn't make any sense she was forced to accept the fact that she was now tiny. Her mind was racing, what could she do at her size, how was she expected to survive? Her Daughter Mia probably towered overhead like some kind of human skyscraper, how was she expected to act as a mother to someone over 50 times her size?

Just then her concentration was shattered by the sudden appearance of a dark shadow, eclipsing all light around her body. She stumbled back, locking up to see none other than _____________.

1. Her daughter Nia's denim skirt, falling towards her. https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/disn...

2. Her best friend Chelsea's Jean clad buttocks, racing to pin her to the couch. https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/rave...

3. Mia's best friend Tess's faces, looming just above Raven after noticing the tiny woman. https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/disn...
1253333311.title: Raven's Sudden Shrinking

12533333113.content:
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/disn...

Raven fell back on her ass, her very tiny ass that is, as she looked up to see an enormous version of their neighbor, who also happened her daughter's best friend, Tess O'Malley, who was already looking down at Raven on the couch. The urban tomboy's face alone was wider than the side of a building as she laid her green eyes on the tiny African American woman who was now a fraction of her size. Her mouth hung wide open, displaying her sharp teeth, her tongue, and even her uvula, remaining speechless for a few seconds before deciding to break the silence.

"Yo, Ms. B. What's going on here? How do you get so puny?" She asked, her normal speaking voice resounding loudly in Raven's ears at such a close distance. The young teenage girl's face dominated nearly her entire field of vision, as Raven considered her options. Luckily, Tess found her rather quickly, saving her the risk of trying to get around the apartment by herself. Not finding it hard to see the dangers of being stepped on by an unaware Chelsea, or somehow falling into Nia's sneakers while trying to get off the couch.

"Tess, thank goodness. Your timing couldn't be any better. Quickly, I need you to bring me to Chelsea and nobody else! And please, don't let my Baby Girl see me like this." Raven said, putting her faith in Tess.

"Ms. B, I don't know how to tell you this. But Ms. G left for the day already. Just don't worry little momma, I got you covered." Tess replied, coming up with a plan to follow Raven's instructions.

"Little momma, who're you calling? Oh, snap!" Raven said, interrupted by the sight of Tess lifting her body to stand at her full height. The cushion the Raven was standing on, reaching up to the towering teenager's kneecaps. Meanwhile, the rest of Tess's body ascended high above the shrunken woman like a variety of human skyscraper. Becoming the most intimidating person Raven had ever met in the process, as her eyes settled on the center of the couch cushion.

Tess smiled "Yo, that's crazy, Mr.s B I can barely see you down there, I guess it's a good thing I saw you huh, you could have been sat on, by me, or well anyone. Now come here, Nia's almost done getting ready, we gotta go." Tess announced, reaching down for Raven with her right hand.

"Whoa, hold up! What are you planning?" Raven asked the giant girl, right before Tess ran her thumb into Raven's rib cage, pushing her back towards her waiting index finger. Tess pinched Raven's body between her fingers and lifted the tiny woman with ease, not even noticing her struggles at first.

She couldn't believe how easy it was to squeeze her puny body, not even feeling any resistance as she watched Raven try to push her fingers apart, realizing her grip might have been a little too strong. She wasn't trying to hurt Raven or squeeze her brains out, just carrying her up to her face to have a better look at her to explain her plan.

She brought Raven within a few inches of her face, right in front of her nose so her eyes could focus on every detail of her tiny body. "Alright Ms. B, here's the deal, since you don't want Nia to see you like this, I'm gonna have to keep you hidden until we meet up with Ms.G later. I mean, I don't see what the big deal is, it would be kind of awesome to have a parent the size of a bug." The wild child mused, thinking about how much easier life would be if all adults were the size Raven was now, she could do whatever she wanted.

Raven winced at the thought of Nia having that kind of power over her, deciding to skip over that part entirely as she replied. "What do you mean by keeping me hidden, Tess? What are we talking about here? Are you gonna drop me in a drawer or something till you get back from school or what?" Raven asked, concerned about how she'd be spending the day.

"Nah, Ms. B you got it all wrong, you're gonna be coming to school with me, I figured you'd be real bored sitting around here by yourself all day. Now I just need a place to keep you." Tess announced, already deciding Raven's fate without considering the shrunken woman's opinion. Looking down her body, and her clothes for a suitable place to keep her secured till the afternoon. Her pockets were no good, Raven could easily fall out and get lost that way. She needed something more secure, maybe even a place where she could feel her absence if she got loose.

"Yo, I got it. I hope you don't mind tight spaces, Ms. B cause I got the perfect place for you at this size." Tess announced ____________, as Raven looked down to see that Tess planned to keep her inside of her___________.

1. Sliding her foot out of her hi-tops / Converse sneaker. (Tess sits back on the couch kicking off her converse footwear and dangling Raven over the old sneakers, saying that it was the best idea she could come up with. Raven demands that Tess put her anywhere else but the sound of Nia's door closing forces Tess to act, tossing Raven inside and jamming her foot in on top of her.)

2. Unbuttoning her jeans / Panties(back). (Tess decides on keeping Raven in the back of her pants, ignoring the tiny woman's discomfort with her decision and reminds her that she was doing Raven a favor. So she could do one for her by making the school desk chair more comfortable for her in return. Ultimately forcing her will on Raven.)

3. Pulling her shirt out / Training bra. (Tess informs Raven that she is close to failing her homeroom class, deciding to keep Raven in her bra so that the mature woman could help her get her grades up by acing the pop quiz her teacher would no doubt be hosting for extra credit.)
12533333113.title: Tess's Tiny Find

131.title: ICarly

1311.content:
It was a routine set up day for Freddie Benson as he arrived at his best friend and long time crushes apartment Carly Shay, greeted at the door by her older brother and inventive artist Spencer Shay who aloud Freddie to take the elevator up to the studio where Sam, Freddie and Carly usually hosted their webcasts of ICarly. There he worked along on something that he thought was pretty cool for a segment of "Tech Time With Freddie" and while the segment was usually a boring one he was sure that people would go nuts if they saw a working matter transporter.

However while working on this new device he crossed two wires that weren't meant to cross circuits and got himself shocked in the process "Ouch that hurt!" Spencer was up late at night trying to finish a sculpture that had been specially requested to make, the last thing he needed to do was make sure the electronic half was operational.

The young aspiring artist always found that work on a sculpture seemed to help relieve stress, and after today this was exactly what he needed.

First he ripped his favorite pair of socks that his buddy Socko gave him, completely ruining them to the point that they did even function properly.

Then Carly got mad at him for denying her the right to go to the Cuttlefish concert on Saturday, only because she got a bad grade in one of her class and he thought she should study.

After that she stormed off angry at him to the Groovy Smoothie with with her best friend Sam Puckett, not talking to him at all later on in the night when she returned.

Lastly to end his day Spencer spent a majority of the day dealing with the very sculpture he was working on now, which while stressful itself was the only thing keeping him sain.

He had almost completed wiring the mechanisms to do exactly what he wanted them to do, but unfortunately for Spencer his horrible luck with electronics was about to get him into a world or trouble.

A sudden electrical shock ran up his arms starting from the tips of his fingers, coursing through his body completely.

He couldn’t quite describe what was happening but it was definitely weird, he had been shocked hundreds of times and never before had he felt like this.

It was as if an electrical wave had passed right through his heart, it made him feel weak as he exited the room and tried to get help.

His vision was one of the first things that faded as he began to pass out, everything in his path was a blur causing him to use his hand to identify where he was.

The next thing to go was Spencer’s muscle control functions, his arms suddenly knocking stuff over unwillingly thanks to several spasms that occurred in the next few moments.

Not only that but the walk into the living room seemed to be taking longer than it normally did from his room, as if everything was further away than it was normally.

Soon Spencer found himself tripping over an object on the floor, falling face first onto something soft which he couldn’t identify without his senses of sight and smell.

When Spencer woke up he realized that he had shrunken overnight, the whole apartment was enormous to the minuscule artist.

Although being one inch tall hardly seemed to be his main concern as he felt small quakes approaching his location, most likely the footsteps of a normal sized person.

He knew it was most likely either Carly or Sam who probably spent the night with Carly, but that wasn’t his only problem as he came to realize where he had fallen asleep.

There was no mistaking that he had slept_____________, realizing he must have been shrinking while he navigated his way through the apartment.

1. On the couch, in the exact spot Carly like to watch TV in the morning and it’s nearly time for her show.

2. Inside Sam’s Converse sneaker, just as the Tomboyish blonde came over her footwear.

3. On the carpet in front of four bare-feet, looking up to see Carly and Sam looking down at him in their pajamas.
1312.title: Spencer Shrinks

13121.content:
http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/icar...

Spencer turned in both shock and awe to the sight of his monolithic little sister Carly towering over the back of the couch in her pajamas, of course she quite as ‘little’ as he remembered. She let out a powerful yawn, stretching one of her building sized arms into the air while using her free hand to cover her mouth.

“Spencer, are you down here?” Carly boomed, her voice nearly shattering Spencer’s eardrums as she walked passed the elevator into the kitchen. After she disappeared from his line of sight Spencer could only tell what his younger sibling was up to by sounds he heard coming from the kitchen, such as the cabinet closing or her opening the refrigerator door.

A few moments passed and Carly reentered the living room with a tall glass of orange juice held in her right hand, walking towards Spencer on the couch. She stopped in front of the coffee table facing the TV with her rear end hovering above Spencer as she recited Cuddlefish lyrics, probably still annoyed that she had to miss their concert last night.

The giantess webshow host bent over to place her glass of OJ on top of the coffee table, extending her butt out towards the couch and Spencer as she reached for their TV remote. The shrunken artist covering his eyes to avoid looking up at his goddess sized sister’s massive behind, not wanting to see his own sibling from this angle.

“Carly! Carly, I’m down here!” Spencer yelled as loud as he could, hoping Carly would turn around and spot him on top of the couch cushion. The aspiring artist turned away, trying to find something else in the room he could focus on besides his sister’s gigantic butt. At first he was worried about being shrunk, but this experience had actually given him a lot of really cool idea’s for sculptures he could make, if he ever got back to his normal size that it.

“Sweet, the new episode of Girly Cow’s about to start.” Carly said, looking across the room to see that it was nearly 7AM. That’s when Spencer remembered where he was standing, Carly always sat down on the couch during the morning to watch TV and he was in her favorite spot.

Looking up he noticed that Carly’s ass hadn’t stopped increasing in size since she first bent over to pick up the remote, meaning that she was about to sit directly on top of him. Spencer began running towards the open end of the couch, not looking forward to the idea of being Carly personal butt cushion for the rest of the morning.

“Carly, wait! Don’t sit here!” Spencer yelled, remaining unheard as Carly allowed the full weight of her rear to impact the couch cushion Spencer was trapped on top of. While this was a relatively simple motion for the teenage webstar it proved almost life threatening for Spencer at his minuscule size. In truth if he had been standing on top of a tall wooden chair then being sat on by Carly would have meant almost certain death.

Part of Spencer was relieved to discover how soft and squishy Carly’s rear cheeks were compared to most girl her age, meanwhile another part of him wished that he didn’t have to be so close to her ass in the first place to discover this fact. The unaware brunette giantess resting her spine along the back of the couch, forcing the full brunt of her weight directly towards Spencer under her buttocks as she propped her feet up on top of the coffee table.

Suddenly Spencer’s already limited range of motion became even smaller, as Carly’s massive behind continued to overpower him, threatening to crush him out of existence unless he took drastic measures. Panicked, the shrunken artist did the only thing he could think of, opening his mouth just wide enough to fit around a section of Carly’s pajama clad butt cheek and biting down with all he had.

“Ouch!” Carly jumped, landing on her feet between the couch and the coffee table. “What the fuck was that?” Carly asked herself angrily, making Spencer immediately regret his decision as Carly brought her face over the couch to find what she had sat on.

Spencer immediately rolled onto his hands and knees, looking to escape his angry giantess sister before he found himself under the gaze of her cold brown eyes. He was just about to escape between the couch cushion when a large pale hand slapped the couch, knocking him back a few feet.

“Well, well, what do we have here? If it isn’t my big...oops, I mean little brother Spencer.” Carly teased, her pink lips curving to form a delighted smile as her eyes caught sight of her tiny legal guardian.

“Carly this isn’t funny, I need your help to get back to normal. Right now!” Spencer yelled, hoping she would listen to reason if nothing else.

“What? No way! I don’t know how you got so pathetically small, but you deserve this. In fact you deserve everything that’s coming your way from now on, like this.” Carly smiled, pinching Spencer’s inch tall body between her thumb and index finger before lifting him up in front of her billboard sized face.

“You know, you really shouldn’t have bitten my beautiful ass. I think you should tell it you're sorry.” Carly giggled, pulling her pants and panties down underneath her curvy posterior. She then laid down across the entire couch with her exposed buttocks facing the ceiling.

“Why don’t you two kiss and make up.” She laughed, bringing Spencer above her now exposed butt cheeks and releasing her grip on him. His whole body landing on top of Carly’s mountain sized right butt cheek with a bounce, sending vibrations throughout her fleshy rear end.

Spencer then got on his hands and knees, knowing that he wouldn’t be able to maintain his balance for long is he tried standing on Carly’s ass. Meanwhile those words echoed in his mind, what did she mean by “..kiss and make up.” she couldn’t possibly expect him to…

“What are you waiting for, either kiss my ass or I’ll crush you under it next time I sit on you!” Carly spat, confirming Spencer’s worst nightmares. He was actually about to be forced to kiss his own little sister’s ass under the threat of death by her butt.

Spencer swallowed hard, knowing he would almost definitely regret what he was about to do. Puckering his lips Spencer forced his face into Carly’s tush, finding it difficult to breath as her flesh overwhelmed him. Even while he was standing on top of her ass, it was useless for him to fight against it. Finally he pulled away, foolishly assuming that the worst was over, little did he know how wrong he was. This was only the beginning.

“That was pitiful, you call that a kiss?” Carly yelled, giggling under her breath as she enjoyed her newfound power over her older sibling. “Do it again, and this time don’t hold anything back.” Carly demanded, giving her aforementioned rump a nice little shake to tease Spencer.

Spencer had trouble believing what Carly just said, she actually expected him to kiss her ass a second time. He nearly risked suffocation once in kissing her gigantic butt, and now she expected him to repeat the process with more force.

Still in a state of duress under Carly threat of squishing him like a bug under her rear Spencer complied with her demands, shoving his face into the doughy flesh of her right ass cheek once more. It was by far the most humiliating thing he had ever been forced to do, but not nearly as humiliating as having his life ended under the same butt he was being forced to kiss.

“That’s more like it, don’t stop or else I’ll have to…” Carly trailed off allowing a moment of silence to fill the room before *Slap* Carly’s hand collided with her left cheek, sending vibrations through her rear that could be felt from all the way on her other mountain like butt cheek where Spencer was busy kissing her flesh.

This did exactly what Carly hoped it would do. Prompting Spencer to kiss her ass with more passion than before, and at a greater pace. In a few moments it almost felt to Carly as if Spencer was literally making out with her ass, when he wasn't coming up for air that is.

"I think your enjoying this a bit too much." Carly teased, laughing at how pathetic Spencer was on top of her naked ass. A few more moments passed and Spencer continued appeasing Carly's demands, willing to do whatever it took to survive this experience. He dug his full face into her ass cheek, kissing her magnified pores in the hopes that she'd tell him he could stop soon.

Finally after holding his face against Carly's bottom for nearly a minute, Spencer came up for air. Only being granted a short reprieve before he noticed an ominous shadow cast over him, looking up he saw___________.

Choice 1- Carly's fingers, flicks Spencer down between her cheeks, telling him he can spend the whole day in her ass.

Choice 2- Sam, who slept over at Carly's, wakes up and enters the living room, seeing Spencer kissing Carly's ass. Sam decides she wants to play with Spencer as well.

Choice 3- Carly's hand, grabs Spencer and sneaks upstairs to where Sam is sleeping, planting him somewhere on her sleeping body.
13121.title: The Dominant Sibling

131213.content:
Carly's hand quickly swooped over her exposed backside, grabbing Spencer and lifting the shrunken artist into the air as if he were nothing more than a Hershey’s Kiss. Within moments of his capture Carly’s hand reached her face, opening into a flat palm with Spencer at breast level.

“I told you to try harder or suffer the consequences of your actions.” Carly declared, her loud words nearly sending Spencer over the edge of her flattened palm.

“What? I did exactly what you told me to do.” Spencer argued, ignorant of his position from Carly’s perspective. Leaving her no choice but to enlighten him on how insignificant he was too her at this size.

She could just as easily blow him off the surface of her hand and allow him to fall hundreds of feet to his death, or crush him under the full weight of her naked heel. However Carly had something else in mind to make sure that Spencer would learn his place.

The giantess web star suppressed her laughter, slowly curling her hand back into a tight fist with Spencer at it’s center. The five towering walls of flesh enveloping his body completely, leaving no room for escape.

“Sounds like someone needs to be taught a lesson. Perhaps some time in one of my shoes with teach you your place, or maybe a week or two in the freezer will give you enough time to cool off.” Carly joked, enjoying the sensation of her shrunken brother struggling to break free of her control.

“I know, since my ass wasn’t enough for you. Perhaps you’d enjoy someone else’s ass more.” Carly teased, already having selected the perfect candidate for the job. Remembering that her best friend Sam had spent the night and was still upstairs sleeping in her bedroom.

“Carly! Let me go!” Spencer yelled, desperately trying to escape his younger sister’s clutches as he heard mention of him getting close to yet another teenage girl’s bare ass.

“What’s that, you want me to throw you into Sam’s panties.” Carly smiled, knowing that Spencer had said something completely different. Also stating the fact that she had convinced Sam to start wearing panties, even though her tomboy friend hated the mere mention of the word because they were too girly.

“No, Carly please!” Spencer howled, gaining no sympathy from the teenage giantess as she began walking upstairs, swinging her arms gently while she shuffled up the steps. Although from Spencer’s perspective nothing his massive sibling did could be classified as gently, her swinging arms mimicking the effects of some twisted carnival game. All the fluids inside his body rushing to his feet then towards his skull and back again, making him feel as if he were about to vomit.

Luckily for Spencer his not so little sister only lived one floor above the living room, making his trip a short one. Carly creeping around the door slowly to confirm that Sam was still sound asleep, laying face down against her mattress where she left her.

Once this had been well established, Carly tiptoed into her room. The black haired girl trying her best to remain quiet before her blonde friend could catch her in the act of tossing Spencer into her clothing.

“Ready or not, here you go.” Carly whispered as she gently peeled Sam’s jeans and panties away from her butt cheeks. Revealing the rear mountains to the miniaturized artist as Carly opened her palm to show Spencer where it was exactly she’d be sending him.

“Enjoy your stay.” Carly whispered, her shrunken brother able to understand every word she said clearly due to his small size. A flick of her wrist sending him flying forwards in a well placed shot by Carly, landing him between the fleshy mounds which immediately caught and trapped his body in their warm embrace.

“Whoops, that looks embar-Ass-ing.” Carly taunted, making one last joke before she slowly closed Sam’s panties until Spencer was locked in near absolute darkest, with the exception of some blue light fading in through Sam’s azure colored panties. With her mission accomplished, Carly then exited the room, making a mental note to write her jokes down for the show if Sam found Spencer before the next episode of ICarly.

With his younger sister gone, Spencer tried to break free of the blonde giantess’s ass. Struggling every which way he could manage, pushing the doughy flesh back far enough to regain some leg movement.

Although at that exact moment his plans for escape were ruined as Sam_________.

1. Awoke- Sam sits up and on Spencer, only to feel something struggling in her ass. She reached into the back of her panties, surprised to find a shrunken Spencer hiding out in her butt. He’d then try his best to explain the situation and how his being there was entirely Carly’s fault.

2. Rolled over- Sam feeling a itch between her cheeks subconsciously rolls onto her side, followed by her back. Making Spencer’s position worse and worse while she sleeps.

3. Touches herself- In the midst of her dreams Sam is overcome with a sense of power, allowing Spencer to break free of her ass cheeks as she mindlessly dry humps Carly’s bed. Although before Spencer can fully escape her falls back between Sam’s legs and winds up under her crotch while the blonde enjoys a nice wet dream about who...Spencer.
131213.title: Planted on Sam

choices: Sam hears Spencer's cry for help
Sam doesn't hear Spencer and puts on her shoe
13122.content:
With his senses fully returned to him, the first thing that caught Spencer was the smell. On instinct he covered his nose with his shirt to prevent it from worming it's way into his nostrils further.

That proved useless as the stench was much too powerful. It was as if he'd been locked in a room with stale cheese and old sweaty gym bags. It burned his eyes and made him want to gag. Miraculously he didn't puke.

The next thing that caught his attention was the damp and slimy surface he was sitting on. It appeared to be the source of the foul smell. It only made the question about his location much stronger.

Looking around he noticed there was a bright light above him and to his right was what appeared to be a cave of shadow. Wait a moment. Cave? Light from the ceiling? Awful smell?

No!

No, it couldn't be!

Spencer didn't want to believe it but what his eyes showed him was true. He was in a shoe. It couldn't have been his as surprisingly he took pretty good care of himself. It wasn't his sister Carly's as she was very much the same.

That only left one person... Sam! He was in Sam's shoe. No wonder it smelled like something died in here. Sam's personal hygiene left a lot to be desired.

The footsteps outside were getting closer and that made the shrunken man's heart go erratic. If Sam and Carly were coming this way then that meant they were probably on there way out. If that happens then...

"OH MY GOD I HAVE TO GET OUT OF HERE!" Spencer shouted.

Spencer jumped up towards the light but he wasn't tall enough. If he didn't get out of this place then Sam would put her shoes on and he'd be crushed. Just thinking about being turned into a stain at the bottom of the blondes foot gave him all the motivation in the world to escape.

This time he tried to scale his way up the sides but the walls of the shoe were just so spongey from Sam's sweat that he just slid off. It made him feel gross, but at the moment he didn't care.

The footsteps grew louder and now he could hear the sound of their booming voices. They were here! He was out of time. He could try calling out for help but would they hear him?

He had to least try, right?
13122.title: Sam's Sneaker

choices: Carly still wants to help Spencer
13123.content:
Spencer looked up past the four bare feet to see the two individuals looking down at him. Based on the wideness of their eyes and the way their jaws seemed to dangle, he guessed they were stunned. Understandable considering the last time he saw them he towered over both. Now he barely stood above their big toes, he really felt small now.

Wanting to break the awkward silence that consumed the room, Spencer waved to both girls. "Hellooo! A little help down here!"

"Dude. What the heck happened to you?!"

"Oh my god! How did you get so small?!"

Spencer was forced to cover his ears when they spoke in unison. Their shouts of shock were just so loud. If he didn't know any better he would assume they were hooked up to a loud speaker on full blast. "Not so loud please, I don't think my eardrums can take it!"

"Sorry." Carly whispered as she gently lowered her hand down for him to hop on. "What happened to you?"

"Yeah dud you're all bite sized!" Sam added.

Spencer winced at the comparison but chose not to comment on it. "I don't know. The last thing I remember was working on a sculpture and getting zapped. The next thing I know I'm inch tall and ran into you two."

"That's freaky my guy."

"Sam... Not helping! Do you know if there's anyway to fix this?" Carly asked.

"I'm not sure and I don't want to go anywhere near that sculpture right now." Spencer answered.

"Then what are supposed to do?"

That was a good question. What were they supposed to do? It wasn't like they could call 911 and request some assistance. What would they even say, Oh hello we need an ambulance my brother just shrank and I don't know what to do? People would think she's crazy.

Maybe they could call Freddie and have him look at the sculpture and look at it. That sounded like a good idea. But what if he shrank too? Carly put Spencer down on the kitchen counter and tried to think. Sam on the other hand had other ideas on the brain seeing Spencer's diminished state.

"Hey Carls. let's talk in private for a minute." Sam said as she pulled Carly to the far side of the room. Said girl didn't know what Sam wanted to talk about but was more than willing to listen.

"What do you want to talk about Sam?"

The blonde grinned. "We have to take advantage of this."

Carly was so confused now. "What are you saying?"

"Just hear me out. Right now Spence is puny and you're not. You can do whatever you want and he can't stop you. You're literally large and in charge now." Sam smirked.

What Sam said made frightening sense, technically she was in charge now since her older brother was out of commission. She could do whatever she wanted now with his word having no authority over her. He can't ban her from concerts anymore or interfere with her dating life. That last one made her smile.

That smile soon faded however when she realized how appealing this all sounded. But she couldn't leave Spencer like this just for some personal fun, could she? She looked back at her brother and then back to Sam.

"Well Carls?" Same asked. "What do you want to do?"
13123.title: Spencer The Tiny

1313.content: Well we could have Gibby shrink. Or maybe a a large group of people are shrunk by Carly and Sam to play with on an episode of iCarly?
1313.title: Someone else from iCarly shrinks

13131.content:
With Freddie out of town Carly and Sam were in need of a replacement technical producer for their webshow ICarly, luckily Freddie had already taught their friend Gibby all he'd need to know about the controls for a full length webcast.

He arrived at Carly's apartment two hours early to get himself settled in before the show, hoping he could get in a last minute rehearsal before the show actually started. Carly hadn't exactly been specific with the details over the phone, but she definitely wanted Gibby's help on a new skit.

"Hey Spencer, Carly here?" Gibby asked as he walked in on Spencer building his latest sculpture, an octopus with sixteen arms instead of eight, and baby doll hands in place of the suction cups.

"I think so, she said you could go right up when you got here." the young artist said, putting down a hammer. and walking into the kitchen for a drink.

Several minutes later Gibby entered the ICarly studio via elevator.

"Hello, is anybody here?" Gibby asked, before noticing that the room was in fact empty. With no sign of Carly or Sam being anywhere in the room, Gibby sat down in a large bean bag chair thinking that the two girls were just getting dressed in Carly's room.

A few more minutes passed and Gibby got tired of waiting, so tired that he actually fell asleep before Carly or Sam arrived.

* 1 Hour Later *

Gibby awoke groggily rubbing his head "Man, how long was I out?" he asked, opening his eyes to notice that there was something different about the ICarly studio. Namely that fact that it was big enough to house 200 foot tall giants, he laughed it off and told himself he was dreaming. He often had dreams that he himself were a fairy tale character, this weeks dream must have been Jack and the beanstalk.

Although he couldn't deny that his situation was beginning to feel less and less like a dream and more like reality, everything about this just felt so real to him.

Suddenly a shadow cast itself over him, looking up Gibby saw__________.

1. Carly's barefoot- Gibby had slid off the bean bag chair while sleeping , leaving him on the open floor in front of the massive Carly's favorite seat. He'd successful dodge her foot at first, but he is unable to make it to a safe distance from her feet as she begins to mindlessly play with him while reading the script for ICarly.

2. Sam's ass- Having shrunk on top of the bean bag chair Gibby was practically invisible to Sam as she turned around and hovered her butt over the seat. Gibby of course would try desperately to escape, but the imprint he made by sitting down had made it too difficult for him to escape as Sam's ass drops down on him from above.

3. Carly and Sam's smiling faces- Gibby asks the two web show hostesses what happened too him and they reveal that the real reason they wanted him to come on ICarly was so they could shrink him and use him as a prop. They didn't ask up front because the shrinking is permanent and they knew he would say no. The two towering teens then grab Gibby and prepare to start the show, telling the fans about their first skit.
13131.title: Gibby Shrinks

13132.content:
Carly's Outfit- http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/3...
Sam's Outfit- http://trendybynick.uol.com.br/wp-conten...

Freddie had spent months developing the one piece of tech that had recently been forever shunned by world renowned scientist as something that could never happen and would only be seen in science fiction, a special device that could shrink any object he pointed it at with the simplest of ease. Freddie had even managed to configure the device so that it could effect a large area if the user saw fit, that's right Freddie Benson had successful created a live working shrink ray.

However Freddie unfortunately made the mistake of telling non only Carly about the working device just laying around in the ICarly studio but also Sam who might and did come up with a daring plan to use the device for her own amusement. But of course young Mrs. Puckett couldn't stop there... no, not with the plan that she had thought up ready to be set into motion, she'd need some help.

Sam went to Carly the night Freddie told them about the shrinking device and began telling her that if they were to shrink alot of people they could use them in segments to increase their viewership. Sam had even managed to convince Carly to shrink her brother and their technical producer and inventor of the device so they'd have extra people just in case.

Carly know that given their size anyone they shrunk would be at huge risk of being crushed in several segments but Carly didn't care, Spencer was really annoying her lately and Freddie's constant flirting had made her begin to wish he wan't around that much. "Ok lets do this." Carly said surprising Sam with her rash decision proving to be very unlike the best friend she had know for year, and so the two teenage girls decided to call everyone together for the next show in two days.

---Two Days Later---

After Two days Carly and Sam meet before the show the shrinking device hid in a separate location near the car in their studio for quick convenient access, while everyone else gathered shortly over time. Freddie, Spencer, Gibby, Mrs Benson, Principal Franklin, T-Bone, Carly's ex boyfriend Griffin& surprise guests Nevel Papperman, Francine Briggs, and Mr. Howard who had already been persuaded to show up after Sam tested the shrink ray on them.

Sam had stashed the three shrunken special guests hidden behind a curtain trapped under plastic cups as if they were steel cages, making a grand total of ten people for the teenage web stars to use for the segments they had come up with together since hatching their little plan. Everything they would need for the night was already in the studio so that only left the two girls to do one more thing, shrink everybody.

Carly walked over towards when her and Sam had hidden it and quickly pulled it out for everyone to see, which from a normal perspective would make it look like she was holding them all at gunpoint. "Hey hey hey what are you doing with my shrink ray? Freddie asked trying to step forward and disarm Carly but Sam pushed him back into their selected group on the floor.

"What, a shrink ray?" T-bone asked turning his attention towards Carly, "Like in episode 3 of Galaxy Wars?" Spencer said showing his inner nerd without realizing the severity of the situation. The rest of the group was standing back in silent terror to afraid to say anything that might push Carly into pulling the trigger and shrinking them down to size.

However what they failed to realize was that this attack was pre-planned meaning that nothing would stop her as Carly designated the area and fired shrink all seven people down rapidly until they were easily no bigger than an inch tall in height each. "She actually shrunk us!" Principal Franklin said surprised that one of the highest GPA students at his school would do something like this.

Sam then picked up an empty plastic bin from inside their car prop's front seat that had the words "Live Props!!!" Written in magic marker by non other than Sam herself, of course Freddie was the only one who seemed to notice this little detail as Sam placed the bucket on the floor. "Ok now I'm gonna give you all just one chance to get in this bucket or else I'll step on you(lifting her foot above the tiny people and pointing back between them and her boot.) ants, boot!" she laughed as they all rushed inside.

Once they had all been successfully detained Sam tilted the box upright and slid it over towards the wall with her foot making it seem for the tiny people in the plastic bin that an earthquake had suddenly struck. Then Sam got her 'surprise shrunken guests' and scooped them all from under the cups she was holding them in and scooped them into one.

Nevel, Mrs Briggs, and Mr. Howard's screams for help quickly got on her nerves "Shut up in there or else I'll drink you!" Sam yelled playfully teasing bringing the cup to her lips as she cleared the last few feet between her and the bucket. Sam didn't care if she hurt them or any of her and Carly's 'props' so with a smile displayed across her face Sam simply dumped them into the bucket where they landed ok on top of the others bringing all ten together.

Carly then called Sam over and told her she was about to start broadcasting, the two girls raced into position with excited smiles as they began streaming "Hello tiny people of the internet, I'm Carly." Carly said kicking off the show before shortly being followed up by Sam "... And I'm Sam 'and this is ICarly!'" Sam continued as Carly joined in.

"Ok now hold onto your seats because tonight your gonna see something never before seen on ICarly." Carly said gleefully, walking away from the camera momentarily to retrieve the box. "Right you are Carls in fact, I don't think you've seen anything like what we've got in store for you tonight" Sam said as Carly came back on screen before both joined in unison to say "Shrunken people!" nearly deafening all ten of their 'props' as they faced the tiny people at the gigantic camera lens, all embarrassed to be seen in such a state.

"So Sam, what Else will we have on the show tonight?" Carly asked following a pre-written script. "Well Carly it just didn't seem right to show our fan our shrunken people if we didn't plan to use them for our show which is why we're gonna use them in all of our skits and usual games tonight!" looking into the bin to see the tiny people scared faces.

"And what will the first thing we do to kick of this special episode of ICarly." the darker hair colored girl of the two asked in excitement.

Sam took the camera and decided to

1. Whisper to the fans that Griffin and Carly would be playing a new game called "Who Am I Sitting On?" so that Carly wouldn't hear her and blindfolds her best friend before taking Griffin out of the box to put on Carly's chair.

2. Yell out that her(Sam) and Mrs. Briggs would be riding 'The Wedgie Bounce!" with two people for the very first time on ICarly and gives her least favorite teacher a seat up close and personal with her butt in the back of her panties before she straps herself in.
13132.title: I-Shrink Icarly

choices: Find the marble in the breast-stack
131321.content:
Carly walked over ICarly’s famous dubbed 'chair of sitting' standing with her back faced to it as Sam walked behind her and tied the blindfold over her eyes so the people watching from their laptops could see that she wasn't cheating. Shortly after blindfolding her best friends Sam focused her attention inside the box she had trapped her so called live props inside, her attention grabbed by Carly's ex boyfriend Griffin standing in the corner.

"Come here pretty boy, Mama thinks you should be the first to step up and play one of our games." reaching in and pinching his puny body between her large fingers, making him feel as if he was a stuffed animal in a claw game. Ironic given his love of peewee baby stuffed animals as the gigantic blonde carried him over to the hand shaped chair, being extra careful not to say his name and give his identity away to Carly before the game began.

Sam dropped the tiny boy down at the center of the hand shaped chair that sunk down in the middle giving him no way to run, although looking up he saw that he had a much bigger problem than not being able to escape the chair. Carly eager to begin the game had already positioned her jean clad ass over the seat, bending over causing the denim of her jeans to become held tightly against her rear.

"Whoever you are, I hope you like the view of my 'big' butt." Just as she predicted the little bad boy was quaking in his boots felling intimidated by the size of Carly's ass thinking he'd be crushed for sure if she sat down on him.

Sam smiled as she moved the cam into view on the side of the chair to get a good view of Griffin so the fans could watch each and every moment that her but made contact with the tiny boy. Then she explained the rules to the fans "Ok, now Carly will use only her butt to try and discover who she is sitting on, without using her hands or removing the blindfold for 60 seconds, and go!" Sam said starting the clock.

Griffin turning away from the camera turned his attention back to Carly's behind, his eyes widening upon looking upward to see that Carly had already began moving to sit down upon him at the mention of the word 'go'. Griffin screamed out for mercy as he saw the jean clad ass of the teenage web star descend at an alarming pace towards him, like an asteroid on a collision course with the planet.

There was no time for time or way for him to move, meaning he was powerless to stop the massive ass threatening to crush him in one foul swoop, making an ill-minded attempt to stop her by throwing his arms up in the air. But nothing he could have done would be powerful enough to stop Carly for a second or even slow her down as her butt bulldozed right over him in an instant, plopping onto him with her full weight.

With a heavy bounce Carly caught Griffin under her sizable rear, trapping him between her mountain like butt-cheeks under neath her butt crack. The thing making his life a living hell as Carly moved about on top of him was the only thing keeping him alive, unaware that he would have been crushed in an instant if he had fallen victim to one of Carly's tremendous butt cheeks.

"Hmm your kind of strong for a little guy." Carly said mocking the little person trapped under her butt as she used brute force as her first method of finding out who was trapped under her butt, identifying them as a male within the first few seconds still having fifty five seconds left to find out more specifics. Then all hell broke loose as Carly began to twist her butt from left to right on her seat, causing a seismic event for the shrunken boy under her mountainous cheeks.

The shrunken boy being in a bad place at the time received cuts on the surface of his exposed skin as a result of the denim on either side of his body as a result of the rough denim of her jeans on either side of him. "Huh tough skin for a little guy." Carly said making another comment about the tiny boy she was sitting on, getting a better idea of who he might be as the clock ran down with about thirty seconds remaining.

Carly decided to get creative, lifting her butt off the chair ever so slightly to give the tiny boy underneath her a chance to move before rolling her hips from side to side to try and find another distinctive quality about the tiny boy. Griffin however finding himself under Carly's right butt-cheek at the moment decided to try running for safety by thinking her could grab her jacket hanging loose on the side of her left butt-cheek on the other side of her butt.

Griffin got on all fours and began crawling as fast as he could against the the surface of the chair, barely out of the reach of the black haired girl's butt hovering just above him. Carly noticed his absence just as he decided to start crawling underneath her butt crack "Awe where did you go?" Carly teased lowering her jean clad ass a tiny bit hitting Griffin with the inner half of her left cheek.

Carly sat back down fully upon feeling the tiny boy underneath her other cheek, keeping track of his movements she remembered him being under her right cheek. "Wow your Kind of fast for a little guy." leaving only Freddie and Griffin as the obvious choices who who she now kept trapped under her voluminous rear end, however knowing Sam could have picked either one of these boys to place on Carly's seat for a number of reason Carly decided to try one more tactic to find out which of her two ex's she was currently sitting on.

"20 seconds remaining!" Sam said with a smile as she enjoyed watching the one inch tall boy struggle to survive under her best friends gigantic bottom. At the same time Carly leaned back in her continued desire to win the game at any cost even if it meant crushing the tiny boy underneath her ass in the process, meanwhile for Griffin life wasn't as good at the moment as Carly weight sitting on his body seemed to somehow double in intensity as she lifted her feet of the ground.

Carly couldn't help but to laugh as she felt the pained screams of the tiny boy tickle her rear as he screamed out begging her to stop and spare him knowing that if she continued this she would surely crush him. His ribs cracking in anguish in response to Carly's weight "Almost got it..." she said looking at the camera with a seductive wink.

Carly grabbed the edge of the chair and pulled her self down to get a better feel for the tiny boy's body under her butt-cheek, this put an enormous amount of strain on his body instantly bringing his struggles against her to a screeching halt. "Oh he's kind of soft, just like a pee-wee baby." Carly teased figuring out that it was Griffin trapped under her ass with only 5 seconds remaining.

But Carly didn't get up just yet, in fact she wanted to enjoy every last moment of her tiny ex's struggles against her rear unsure if he would survive much longer trapped underneath her. "5...4...3... will Carly figure it out?" "Is it Griffin." Carly said taking off her blindfold and looking down at her seat only to see a bloody stain that nearly mixed in perfectly with the dark red surface of the chair.

Carly not seeming to care very much jumped for joy at the realization that she had been right all along "Whoops." she said to the camera as her only response to having just killed someone under her but. 131321.title: Who Am I Sitting On

1313212.content:
"The game you and our little friend Gibby here are gonna play is called Spaghetti Taco Escape, featuring my brother Spencer's famous spaghetti tacos." Carly said with a smile as Gibby turned to face the blonde girl in horror of just hearing the games name.

As he shuddered to think of what the girl who was cruel enough to torture him with ease at normal size could do to him at an inch tall he couldn't help but notice that she was in the process of licking her lips while staring at him.

Gibby could only assume that this had to do with the game Carly had just reference thinking back on the name causing his heart to sink in response, if this new ICarly game involved spaghetti tacos(A food which Sam loves to eat...then.) he shuddered to think any further.

Carly then turned to grab the camera that Sam had used to film her sitting on Griffin in the last segment ‘Who am I sitting on’, taking Gibby’s eyes off of Sam while she did god knows what in preparation for her game with the shrunken boy.

She couldn’t have been turned around for any longer than a minute but when she turned back around Sam was already holding an X-Large tortilla shell in her hand folded into the shape of a taco with a plastic bin of pre-cooked spaghetti and meatballs on a table next to her.

Carly wanting to carry on with the games and segments in the hopes of getting to all the people they have shrunk in this very special webcast of ICarly, dropping him inside the folded crisp tortilla held in Sam’s hand force to look up into her cold blue eyes.

Gibby was terrified at the very thought of being eaten by Sam thinking by now that he fully understood the game that he would be playing, this left only one question as Sam scooped up some saucy spaghetti and brought it over him and that quest was whether or not Sam would let him survive.

Hot steamy pasta began to fall on top of him from about covering his puny body in a moments notice, the red tomato sauce burning his entire body from head to toe causing him to scream out in pain as Sam reached down and picked up two meatballs each three times bigger than Gibby.

“Ok Carls so why don’t I explain this little game to the people watching at home, I’m gonna eat this here spaghetti taco with three meatballs and all Gibby has to do is try and get out before I finish it.” Sam said looking down at Gibby still struggling to escape from the stringy pasta.

While at normal size the thin food item would cause him little trouble, although given his new size the thin pasta seems more like thick rope as was spread out all over his body “And if he doesn’t make it he’d be sent on a one way journey to the center of your stomach, and did you say three meatballs?” Carly asked only noticing two in the shell.

“Gibby’s still meat.” Sam simply said teasing the shrunken boy she knew would have no chance of escaping her even if it meant she would have to cheat, terrifying him after she just commonly referring to him as ‘meat’.

Carly positioned that Camera above Sam’s head just high enough that each and every fan of their webcast watching would be able to see get closer and closer to swallowing Gibby’s puny body, his movements barely visible amongst the tangled spaghetti.

With everything in place Sam saw no reason to delay the inevitable and moved forward with the game bringing the tortilla shell towards her open mouth, sauced dragged across her lip as she sucked in a long string of spaghetti and *Crunch* she had taken her first bite.

Gibby looked up in horror at the sight of Sam chewing the once large area that he could have built a house on top of inside her mouth with a joyful smile, Gibby panicking pushed spaghetti to the side one string after another.

He had broken free just in time to look up at Sam and watch as the blonde giantess swallowed what could have been a hundred tiny people his size *Gulp* watching a small bulge descend down her esophagus from the outside imagining if he had been caught up in her first bite.

Not wanting to live through the experience himself Gibby shook these thoughts from his mind and saw both paths he could take blocked by a boulder sized meatballs, one leading away from Sam’s mouth and the other towards her pink lips.

While the meatball leading towards Sam’s mouth would be easier to climb having been bitten in half by the gigantic girl herself would clearly be the easier route to climb Gibby knew it was too risky a path to take as Sam licked her lips preparing to take her next bite.

Her wet lips hovered above parting slowly as she maintained eye contact with Gibby as he desperately climbed the meatball furthest from her in some hopeless attempt to escape her, after all she didn’t want to risk ending the game too soon since she was enjoying every moment of it.

As he climbed the meatball in front of him Gibby felt as strange presence approaching from behind him and soon found himself enveloped inside a large shadow, looking back he only saw a large pink cave with white sharp rocks hovering above the entrance quickly coming to the realization that it was Sam’s mouth opened wide behind him.

Gibby terrified by the sight of her large sharp teeth dangling overhead like piercing stalagmites hanging down from the top of a cave, her hot breath washing over him as her teeth came down on where he was originally trapped with the other meatball laying on her tongue.

Sam knew she hadn’t caught Gibby inside her mouth which was exactly the way she wanted it...for now,of course since she had let him get away this time there was no way she could let him win especially since she knew that she had plenty of other people to play with on the show.

Gibby looked back in horror thinking that he had made the right choice as he looked back into Sam's months as she chewed seeing the meatball he had almost climbed laying there on her tongue almost able to see himself holding onto it for dear life, trying to continue moving forward hearing more crunching and a gulp meaning that Sam's lips would soon return.

Surely enough by the time Gibby had climbed to the top of the house sized meatballs they did looking larger than ever as her teeth came over the meatball in an attempt to eat it along with Gibby in one bite, the small boy finding himself under the blonde tomboys teeth began running as fast as he could running for his life and diving through the small opening just before her top teeth met up with bottom which cut through the shell beneath him like butter.

Gibby landed in the last few strings of spaghetti getting tangled up in the process, although not so bad that he couldn't escape given a few seconds. His heart sinking from his chest to his stomach as the familiar sound could be heard above of Sam swallowing the contents inside her mouth *Gulp* leaving only one big for the gigantic girl to take.

"Mhm Mama's gonna enjoy this." Sam said with a smile and a short laugh her voice booming through Gibby's eardrums as she taunted him so casually, this gave him the much needed adrenaline rush he would need if he even hoped to stand a chance of escaping as Sam's lips approached one last time just after he had broken free of the spaghetti ropes that held him down.

Gibby was nearly at the end ready to jump when suddenly Sam decided to even the odds a little bit by literally tilting them in her favor, leaning her head back and opening her mouth wide she brought the spaghetti taco up closer to the tilted camera allowing the fans to get a perfect few of Gibby from only a few inches away.

The fans watching from their laptops and computers could see everything going on as Gibby grabbed onto the edge of the tortilla shell holding on for dear life, Sam's cave sized mouth in the background getting closer by the moment as her tongue seemed to dance in joy at the sight of the last morsel of it's meal.

The fans few was then suddenly blocked by the back of Sam's hand as she put her palm against the taco shell and began to slid it inside her mouth with ease, sounds of her saliva squishing around in her mouth watering around as the teen girl wondered what Gibby would taste like as her tongue rounded the shell.

Gibby was trapped by Sam's hand forced to acknowledge that even if he was able to climb at this point his situation was helpless since he would be stopped by Sam's fleshy palm, this would end one and only one way at this point...Sam's way, and with that fact accepted Gibby seemed to disappear into Sam's mouth as her palm met her lips.

Sam pulled her hand away from her mouth and began to chew slowly crushing the contents inside her mouth to mush, her tongue escaping her mouth once to lick some sauce off her upper lip, hundreds on fans commenting that they think they saw Gibby's body alive and kicking as he was toyed with by Sam before she finally swallowed one last time *GULP!*.

"Mhm tasty." Sam said opening her mouth once more to show that fans that Gibby was gone, still alive in her stomach after she kept him out of harms way by using her tongue "Now on to the next game...".

Carly’s next game/segment involves…? Outfit reminder- wearing this (http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/3...)

1. Spencer, Nevel, and a horse sculpture Spencer had made that simulates what it would be like to actually ride a horse, almost like a mechanical bull, she tapes each of them down separately to the saddle with Spencer under her denim clad rear of his younger sister which Griffin had met his end beneath, and Nevel up front under her crotch as she rides.

2. Mrs. Briggs, Mr. Howard, Principle Franklin, and her boots, drops her two least favorite teachers down into her boots and puts them on leaving Principal Franklin in front of them too watch, then she begins chasing him around for fun trying to stomp him under her boot while her two teaches are slowly crushed under her socked feet inside.

13133.title: Carly or Sam Shrink?

131331.content:
"Are we ready?" Carly asked for the umpteenth time. Freddie's only response was to stifle a massive yawn. Unfortunately for him, he was still on West Coast time but his peppy girlfriend was on Italy time. While he loved that she was back for the summer, these first few days were going to be hell.

"Look Carls," He moaned, rubbing his eyes. "My mind has turned to sludge, I can't focus on anything right now." He took her in an embrace and planted a kiss on the slightly shorter girl's forehead. "We'll pick this up in the morning 'kay?"

"But our broadcast is in a week!" Carly whined. "And we still have to line up our guest stars, our skits, our-"

"Babe." Freddie cut her off. "It's in a week and I'm like 90% done with the set-up. We'll finish this tomorrow."

"K." Carly smiled. Freddie kissed her cheek before he made his way to the elevator. "And Carls? Don't. Touch. Anything." He warned as he disappeared down the shaft.

It was hardly behaviour that Carly Shay, of all people, indulged in but when any teenager was told not to touch something, their mind wanted to do only one thing.

"Poke." Carly smiled as she touched the set-up. She briefly returned her attention to the studio where so many of her misadventures had began before she gave the set-up another mischievous poke.

This time however, a whine began emanating from the equipment. Carly raised a brow. Sure she'd gotten some of her dad's military tech for use in iCarly's special anniversary broadcast but it wasn't supposed to whine.

Unsure of what was happening, Carly made her way towards the equipment so she could unplug it before a bright light shined out from it and the whining died down.

Getting back to her feet, Carly gave a groan "Oh man. What did they put... in... that?" The brunette trailed off as she saw the equipment cart towering above her like a skyscraper, even the wheels were far above her head. Somehow, against all logic, she'd wound up an inch tall.

"Ok. Calm down." She said. "You've been through worse. You just... you just have to get to Freddie. Yes. Just get to Freddie and he'll help you fix this. Just... go down three floors. And get across the hall. In the dark. Dodging all sorts of bugs and get to Freddie's room. Do all that... while being an inch tall." She said in a slightly manic tone as the sheer hopelessness set in. A trip she'd made countless times in her life and, if all went well, now it would likely take her all night to make it.

Just then, Carly heard the elevator ding and open. Bending her head forward, Carly saw-

1) Sam, here early from L.A. With no one around, the hedonistic blonde decides to just watch TV leaving Carly to try and get her attention.

2) Shelby Marx, one of their guest stars, here to drop off some props she'll need for the show, and unknowingly walking right towards Carly.
131331.title: Carly Shrinks

1313312.content:
Carly gave a rather mouse-like squeak of terror as Shelby's Marx mile long legs, a term that had never been more accurate, stomped out of the elevator her, her high heels looking more like great columns that could pulverize Carly like she was nothing. Granted, Shelby was already taller than all of her friends, but this was insane.

"Uh... Carly!?" The MMA fighter called, looking around for her friend. "Just here to drop off some stuff. Freddie and Spencer said it was "Cool beans." They said it like it was a real thing people actually say."

Even if Carly's tiny voice could have reached Shelby's ears, Carly was too dumbstruck by the utterly gargantuan size of the Tori Vega lookalike to even attempt to muster a response. Idly, it occurred to Carly that she'd yet to ask either Tori or Shelby if they were related to each other.

Carly was jolted from her musings when Shelby's massive feet began moving again. Unable to move in time, Carly simply curled herself up into a ball as Shelby's massive foot passed over with wind disturbances equal to a passenger plane. Following her friend, Carly was treated to the sight of the fighter's impossibly skinny jeans tightening over her firm rear end as she threw down her duffel bag of props. "Ok." Shelby called out "Just leaving my stuff here. Now I'm heading out. Cause this kinda feels like Twilight Zone. The original that is."

"Oh how right you are." Carly muttered before a gust of wind lifter her upwards as Shelby speed walked back to the elevator. "No. No. Shelby! Shelby! Help!" The webshow hostess called out as she waved her arms frantically. By sheer dumb luck (though good or bad, Carly wasn't sure), her right hand found purchase on the back of Shelby's right heel and she managed to steadily pull herself upwards.

"This is great." She cursed. "An inch tall and on Shelby Marx's high heels how could... wait. She has to go down. And to get to the main elevator, she has to pass by Freddie's. YES! Thank you Shelby." Carly cheered as the MMA star entered the freight elevator. Soon she'd back to normal and who knew? Maybe if Freddie got the shrink ray working, then the little man could spend time in his girlfriend's giant panties. Or maybe Carly could experience life at 8 feet tall.

Unfortunately, in her great haste, Carly had neglected to both account for the elevator's effects on her tiny body or keep watch on Shelby. With a jolt, the machine lurched into action, causing the miniaturized girl to slip and get her foot stuck in-between Shelby's heel and her shoe. "Damn it." She cursed as she tried to shake herself loose. "Wait. Shelby!" She cried, looking upwards, only to be greeted by the sight of her friend's bubblebutt wiggling back and forth, a headphone cable sticking out of her back pocket. "Damn it." Carly repeated as she tried desperately to not only free her foot but stabilize herself on the Latina's swaying body.

As if the universe had it out for her, the elevator dinged and Shelby exited into the main floor of Spencer's apartment. "Adios Spence!" She called.

"See ya!" He called from somewhere.

"Spencer!" Carly futilely called as Shelby exited. "Come on. Come on. Come on." Carly muttered trying ever harder to break free even as she saw Shelby casually pass by Freddie's apartment and make for the main elevator.

And again, Carly's heart dropped as the doors opened and Shelby hit the lobby button.

Now Carly didn't like swearing, but sometimes, only a swear could suffice for a situation. "Aw fuck." She spat, tiny foot still imprisoned.

What happens next?

1) As Shelby strolls through the lobby, Carly is shaken free. As the hostess tries to figure out how to get back up to her floor, she's picked up, literally, by her insane stalker, Nora.

2) Carly can't shake herself loose and when Shelby returns to her hotel room, she finds her little stowaway.
1313312.title: Athlete's Foot

131333.content:
How many people from the ICarly gang should shrink?

Just the basic members- Carly, Freddie, Sam (With the possibility of either Carly or Sam remaining normal sized.)

Extended members included- Carly, Freddie, Sam, Spencer, & Gibby (With the possibility of either Carly or Sam remaining normal sized.)
131333.title: Shrinking ICarly Gang?

1313331.content:
http://images5.fanpop.com/image/photos/3...

"...Look Freddie, I just don't think this is the way we're gonna get more viewer's." Carly said, unsure about her technical producer's plan for their next broadcast.

"Why not? You and Sam decide just about everything we do on ICarly." Freddie said, standing up to his crush instead of merely agreeing with her like he had done in the passed.

"Listen here Fredweeb, nobody cares about you're little Nerd Minute With Freddie skit." Sam teased, purposely saying the name of Freddie's one time segment wrong to elicit a response from him.

"It's called Tech Time With Freddie, you see what I have to deal with here." Freddie said, turning to Carly in the hopes that she might be on his side.

"Look I have to agree with Sam on this one, our viewers just aren't interested in that stuff." Carly said, stepping closer towards Sam to symbolize that she had chosen her side.

"Are you serious? Who wouldn't be interested in this mini camera? It's so tiny that an ant could wear it, not only that but it has over four hours of recoverable data space that can be backed up to your laptop." Freddie stated, expecting a better reaction. However the two girls remained stone faced.

"Cool, so now I can see what it's like for a fly when I swat it onto the floor and step on it?" Sam asked aloud, emulating false excitement and joy.

"Listen Sam, I've got half a mind to..." Freddie started before being cut off by Sam.

"What, What are you and your little playthings gonna do?" Sam said, mocking Freddie's love of science.

"Quit it, both of you!" Carly yelled drifting back into neutral territory.

"What did I do?" Sam asked, shocked that Carly would leave her side so quickly.

"You're always picking fights with Freddie, even though those camera could be helpful in other skits. They're so small we could easily set them up almost anywhere for Messin With Lewbert. Not to mention we could use them like you said if we ever wanted to do some kind of bug skit." Carly stated, bring up reasonable points.

"Wait, so does this mean I get to do Tech Time with Freddie?" the technical producer/cameraman asked hopefully. Meanwhile Sam shrugged.

"Well Maybe if you have something else as cool at these cameras." Carly announced, not wanting to back-peddle too far on her original opinion of Freddie's skit.

"Oh I know, how about this nano-tech battery I bought from Japan? It's strong enough to power this entire apartment for two days and two nights and its small enough to fit in your pocket." Freddie declared, pulling out a normal looking battery.

"Doesn't look so special too me." Sam quickly stated, snatching the battery from between Freddie's fingers. She then brought it under her gaze to discover that it was somewhat smaller than a normal battery, on top of that it was cracked.

"Think you might have gotten the short end of the stick on this deal Fredweeb. Doesn't seem to be anything special about this thing and it's got a crack in it. Now let the professionals handle the skit's around here." Sam announced, causing Freddie to panic as a result.

He rushed Sam "Quick, give it here! I need to put it back in the box before it breaks anymore." he paniced, trying to retrieve the battery from Sam's hand.

"Hey, get off!" Sam yelled, accidentally dropping the battery towards the floor as she tried to push Freddie back.

It all happened so fast that nobody could have stopped what happened next, although Freddie was the first to try. He dove towards the floor trying to catch it before it met the wooden floor, but he was simply too slow.

The battery bounced of the floor with a metallic *Cling* noise. The battery's crack quickly expanded from one side to the other and in the blink of an eye it burst open, emitting a white hot light that nearly blinded everyone in the ICarly Studio.

A few second's later the worst appeared to be over as the dust clear around Freddie, he wiped the dirt from his eyes as they readjusted to the natural lighting of the room. He prepared a speech for Sam about being careful with his tech, but moment's later he realized his problems might be even bigger than he thought.

The entire ICarly studio was absolutely massive, a realm fit for giants whose height would easily exceed three hundred feet tall. He feared the worst, was he the only person shrunk or had Carly and Sam suffered the effects as well. Not wanting to imagine the horrible things a three hundred fifty foot Sam could do with him. Either way the show was about to begin.

He turned around to see that________.

1. Him and Sam were shrunk, leaving Carly normal sized towering over them.

2. Him and Carly have shrunk, meaning Sam was still normal sized.

3. Both Carly and Sam had Shrunk with him. They try to do the show while being shrunk using Freddie's camera's until a surprise/unwanted guest joins them in the studio.
1313331.title: Smallest Show Ever

13133312.content:
Looking to his right side Freddie was easily able to detect the outline of a female presence in the smoke as it began to clear, it was Carly who had shrunk along side him while attempting to pull Freddie away from the explosion.

"Freddie, what in the name of Yakima is going on here? What happened to us? Why are we so tiny?" Carly panicked, the room she had once known made unrecognizable by it's now massive proportions.

"I don't know, there was a chemical reaction between the elements in the air and those in my Nano-Tech battery escaping through the crack in its hull." Freddie explained, not making any sense too Carly who had nearly failed science earlier that year.

"In English‽" Carly exclaimed loudly.

"The concentrated elements once released into the air created a chemical agent that was somehow able to shrink our bodies." Freddie explained again, giving Carly a more coherent answer to her question than he had before.

"Wait, where's Sam?"Carly asked, not seeing her co-host as the smoke around them thinned into near nothingness.

"I thought she was with you, weren't you behind her?" Freddie asked, thinking hopefully that Sam had been hit by the blast as well.

"No, I pushed her out of the way." Carly answered, looking around further in search of a shrunken Sam.

"Well, if she's not down here with us then. Oh no!" Freddie said coming to the only obvious conclusion that Sam hadn't shrunk with them.

"What do you mean 'Oh no'? 'Oh no' isn't good right?" Carly asked following the direction of Freddie's gaze as he looked up at the ceiling. However instead of a roof hanging about their heads the two tiny teens were greeted by the sight of a rather gigantic Sam looking down at them with a smile spread across her pink lips.

"Freddie, 'Oh no' Is bad isn't it." Carly asked, looking up at the towering tomboy with wide unblinking eyes and a hanging jaw. Her best friend's size comparable to that of a tall building like the Bushwell Plaza tower that her and Freddie lived it.

"Yes Carly 'Oh no' is very bad!" Freddie panicked, unable to control or handle Sam when he was slightly taller than her. Now she could do whatever she pleased with him, anything and he'd be absolutely powerless to stop her.

"Wow, your so tiny." Sam smiled, getting down further on her hands and knees to inspect Carly and Freddie up close. She brought her face down close to the floor, finding difficult to get over how small her best friend and former boyfriend had become in comparison to her. Hell, she'd eaten things that had produced bigger crumbs than these two.

"We noticed!" Carly yelled, hoping Sam could hear her at such a puny size as she approached her friend's billboard sized face.

"This is all your fault Sam!" Freddie suddenly interjected, pushing his way in front of Carly between the black hair girl that stood at an inch tall like himself and the blonde girl whose massive size in contrast to Carly essentially made her a goddess.

"Oh really, and how do you figure that little man?" Sam mocked, knowing that even if Freddie was right it didn't matter. With such a proportionate differences in their size, she held all the power and could not be held accountable for her actions.

"You were too rough with my battery, which caused it to crack upon and shrink me and Carly!" Freddie continued yelling, taking out his frustrations of the massive blonde in spite of how scared he actually was at this size.

Sam's vision took some to time to readjust to the sudden influx of light filling the room. The blonde tomboy rubbed her eyes and began scanning the room making sure that the room wasn't too badly damaged from the exploded laptop. The small computer in question was a smoldering piece of medal with smoke slowly rising out from underneath the keys in the keyboard. The white thick foam covered the laptop, putting an end to the rising smoke. Sam put the fire extinguisher down and looked around the room again. Aside from some minor debris scattered throughout the wooden floor and a burn marks on the desk from where the laptop was lying, everything seemed relatively normal.

"Boy that was something wasn't it guys!?" Sam called out to the room. The young woman paused as no one answered. "Guys?" Sam began to walk forward, wondering what happened to her friends.

***

Carly got up and brushed her shirt free of the dust and debris that had accumulated on her person.

"God, that was a close one. Is everyone ok?"

Carly turned to her side and saw Freddie, Spencer and Gibby getting up and inspecting their bodies to make sure no significant damage was done.

"Yeah," Gibby said while holding on to his head, still wearing his stereotypical Englishman garb. His fake fuzzy mustache had been blown off in the explosion. "I don't know what the hell happened, but everything seems to be alright with me."

The couch that he sat on time and time again was now 300 times bigger and what looked to be miles away. His camera equipment hung high above him as if it were a satellite in far space. The room itself seemed more spacious. It was almost as if they were shrunk.

"Um guys, look around. We're still in Carly's room aren't we?" Freddie asked the group, his voice beginning to quaver. Everyone else looked around. Everything seemed to be in place. The bright pink shelf filled with various nicknack's, the pink, fuzzy ball of light that illuminated Carly's room and of course, the loud purple and pink walls that surrounded them every time they walked. That's when it hit them.

"Oh crap," Gibby shouted. "We've been shrunk! How did we get this small?"

"It must have been when the computer exploded after Sam messed with it," Freddie responded angrily.

"Sam! Where is she!?" Carly shouted.

As if on cue, thunderous footsteps could be heard in the distance. All four turned to the directions of the loud, deep sounds and saw a giant pair of black booths slowly coming toward them. The quarter raised their heads simultaneously to track the source of the humongous ebony moving towers only to see that they belonged to the person who was the reason for their diminutive size: Sam Puckett.

The entire group broke out of their collective trance and began running away from Sam just seconds before Sam's black boot slammed down on where they were. Sam stopped as she spotted sudden movement in her peripheral vision. It looked to be four little insects running away from her. Sam, not being one afraid to touch bugs with her bare hands, quickly snatched up the colorful-looking minuscule creatures. Carly and her friends were powerless to stop Sam.

"Hello, you little things. I thought we sprayed for you." Sam said as she opened her palm and took a closer inspection at the insects in her hand. "Hey wait a minute..."

"Sam!" Spencer shouted while jumping hysterically. "We're not bugs! It's us! Freddie, Carly, Spencer and Gibby! We shrunk somehow!"

"Oh my God," Sam yelled flabbergasted. "How did you all shrink!?"

"It wasn't 'somehow,'" Freddie snapped. "It was because of your carelessness. Dammit Sam, I've told you time and time again not to mess with my equipment and now look what has happened. You're going to find a way to turn us back to normal or so help me."

"Calm down, pipsqueak," Sam said dismissing her tiny friend, already familiar with how empty his threats could be, even more now so given his new stare. "We'll find a way to get you back to normal, but first....
