“I’ll be right back, Sam you watch the girls!” Cat said , running off without grabbing her coat and leaving Sam in the hands of the worst people possible to look after her one inch tall roommate.

“All right, now that she’s gonna whacha say we have some real fun?” Ruby asked, her attention turning to the shrunken blonde in her sister’s palm.

“That’s right ‘little’ girl, now we’re in charge of you.” Gwen clarified, closing her hand into a fist around Sam’s squirming body.

“Aye Ruby what do ya say we_____________” Gwen smiled, frightening Sam with her idea as they entered her apartment and closed the door behind them.

1. Shrink her more, one inch is too big for a bug like her. (Gwen grabs the shrinking ray Cat had used to make Sam so small) causing Sam to panic and run as she remember the device only shrunk things, not grow them. Ruby would take great pleasure in holding Sam down as her sister shrank the would-be sitter down to 1 cm in height.

2. Become profession babysitters ourselves. (Gwen and Ruby take turns babysitting Sam until Cat get back by literally sitting on her. First Ruby since she’s the youngest, then Gwen since she’s the oldest. I’ll leave it up to the writer of the next addition to decide how far to escalate this. (Removing a layer of clothing between their butt’s and Sam each time they switch, or finding more intense ways of sitting on Sam, ect.)
132121.title: Attack of the Giant British Brats

1321211.content:
Sam gulped as the words left Gwen's mouth. She was already a mere inch tall, a size comperable to the height of the shoes currently standing before her. If the two British preteens stood taller than skyscrapers at her current perspective, then how daunting would they look if she was reduced any smaller. Her fear quickly turned to relief though. The sisters couldn't shrink her, Cat was the one with the shrink ray. Her relief was short-lived though. She soon saw the older of the two girls lifting the bizzare-looking gun off of the couch. In Cat's rush to get her bibble, she hadn't even bothered hiding the shrink ray. And now Sam was going to suffer for her dimwitted nature. Without giving the girls a chance to even turn back to face her again, Sam took off across the carpeted floor. She was pushed on by adrenaline as the fear of being reduced even further flared up yet again.

"Go grab her, you'll have to hold her still while I shrink her down to.....one centimeter tall," Gwen commanded her younger sister, pausing a moment as she fiddled with the size setting on the shrink ray.

Ruby happily complied, stomping off towards the fleeing minuscule babysitter. Sam's flee was spurred onward as she felt the ground quaking beneath her feet, nearly tripping her up with every booming shake. The sadistic giggles of enjoyment from Ruby helped motivate her further. Sam saw the ground ahead of her darken as a shadow fell over her. Looking over her shoulder, she saw the black sole of Ruby's flat, lined with dirt, dust, and debris, came crashing down towards her. Within a split second of being smashed out of existence, Sam managed to dive out of the way.

"Careful!" Gwen shouted in response to her sister's misstep, "We don't want to squash the little bug." After a moment she added, "...yet", in a quiet whisper.

"Sorry," Ruby replied, as she bent over to grab the shrunken babysitter.

Disoriented from the deafening smash of Ruby's foot coming down and thrown off her feet by the last minute dodge, Sam was helpless as Ruby snatched her up. Her hand closed around her body, gripping it tightly and immersing her in utter darkness. The tight prison shock back and forth as Ruby dutifully returned to her older sister. When light returned, Sam found herself falling towards the ground once again. As she was about to stand up she was quickly pushed back down by Ruby's fingers as she pinned the shrunken girl to the ground with her thumbs. Looking up, Sam saw Ruby squatting over her, her orange panty-clad butt only a few feet from her. Further on, passed the canopy-like hem of her dress, she saw Gwen standing. In one hand she held the shrink ray, though in the other she was holding a heavy book labeled "Sky Store Shrink Ray User's Manual". Judging by the smirk on her face, whatever she was reading in it was highly entertaining.

"Well, well, well," she began, glancing down to the shrunken Sam at her feet, "Isn't this interesting..."

"What does it say? What does it say?" Ruby asked, bouncing up and down excitedly.

Gwen cleared her throat before quoting a warning in the book, "The Sky Store Patented Shrink Ray can only shrink objects. Shrunken objects cannot be grown back to normal size. Sky Store does not currently sell Growth Rays."

Gwen began laughing, knowing that Sam would be stuck at whatever size they left her at. Ruby joined in after a second, as she realized what that meant. Sam, on the other hand, responded with a fearful scream. Cat had already mentioned that she couldn't be grown back to normal size, but somehow with the two British brats laughing about it, the concept seemed so much scarier.

"Please don't shrink me more," Sam yelled, making one last plea.

Gwen simply smiled, taking careful aim, and fired the shrink ray at Sam. A beam of light impacted the already tiny girl in the chest and she was forced to watch as the world shot up around her. Her arms slipped out from beneath Ruby's thumbs as she dwindled in size, the large digits slowly growing to the size of houses. Further above, the young girl's massive butt grew into a pair of incredible mountain peaks, hanging awkwardly in the air. Her skirt became an orangish colored sky as the ceiling drew impossibly far away, to the point that it became blurred in the distance. Looking forward though was the most daunting of all the sighs, Gwen herself. The ten year old was impossibly huge, stretching up into the sky higher than any skyscrapper or mountain. She looked so tall that her face was blurred in the distance, although a smug grin was still easily visible.

Sam's fear-inducing view of the world was cut off abruptly as Ruby picked her up. Unlike at an inch tall, when she was held comfortably in her palm, Ruby had to pinch up the centimeter tall girl between her thumb and index finger. The motion almost smashed the miniscule girl like a car in a compacter as the two walls of flesh utterly consumed her world. Fortunately, at such a tiny size, Sam was quite durable and was not swiftly executed by the attempt at simply picking her. As she was lifted into the air, Sam shivered in fear. The feeling of being pinched between the titanic twerp's fingers at this size was no different from being scooped up in her palm.

Sam would soon be faced with something that caused her to become somehow even more terror stricken. Ruby's fingers parted, allowing Sam to drop down, landing square in the center of her older sister's palm. Looking around though, it took Sam a few seconds to recognize her new surroundings. A vast plateau of flesh stretched out on all sides dotted with ditches and ruts formed from the normal lines in the girl's palm. Sam looked around and quickly fell on her behind as she saw Gwen's face hanging over her. The young girl laughed, her hot breath sweeping by in a powerful gale. The British girl's face looked like the moon would to an astronaut approaching its surface. Her mere features becoming daunting as she stared into the abyss of her nostrils and mouth, both of which could effortlessly engulf her without a second thought. Even the girl's brown eyes seemed terrifying glass windows through which she was observed, the occasional blink covering them faster than Sam thought possible.

"AWWW....LOOK AT THE LIL' BUG," At this distance, Gwen's voice came out deafeningly loud.

Sam ended up falling to her knees and covering her ears in response. Both girls laughed as they saw her cower.

"I CAN'T BELIEVE THIS TINY THING USED TO TRY AND BOSS US AROUND," Came Ruby's voice from just behind, her volume just as loud as her older sisters. Sam didn't dare turn around to see how large the smaller girl looked.

"She's too small to babysit now," Gwen began, finally lowering her voice to a quieter tone, cruelly not wanting the shrunken girl to lose her hearing before she was finished 'belittling' her.

"Maybe we should put her in an ant farm," Ruby finished, following suit in lowering her voice.

"But then we couldn't have any fun with her," Gwen brought up.

"You're right, but what are we going to do with her now?" Ruby questioned, curious about what her big sister's plan was.

"Oh that's easy," Gwen replied quickly, a plan already having formed in her head, "We're going to..."

Choice 1: "...make her even smaller" (Not content with her being the size of an ant, Ruby and Gwen use the shrink ray to reduce Sam down to a mere millimeter in height.)

Choice 2: "...introduce her to our feet." (Dropping Sam on the floor, Gwen and Ruby remove their footwear, each of which is now big enough to house a city. The girls then command Sam to start rubbing their feet. If she takes too long, the girls plan on dropping her into either Gwen's flat or Ruby's sock.)

Choice 3: "...give her back to Cat." (When Cat returns from buying her bibble, Gwen and Ruby drop the now centimeter tall Sam into her bag of popcorn-esque snacks. Cat is too distracted by her snack to think about Sam and continues devouring it while babysitting, likely eating Cat as well.)
1321211.title: Sam Becomes Ant Sized

13212111.content:
Outfit Reminder- https://samandcatnews.files.wordpress.co...

Size measurements: (Gwen- 4'3 feet tall, Ruby- 3'11 feet tall, Sam- 1cm about to be 1mm)

1 foot= 12 inches, 1 inch= 2.54 centimeter, 1 centimeter= 10 millimeters.

"YES! We can shrink her to the size of dirt." Ruby yelled, the shock-wave created by her voice alone rising above the power of any earthquake.

Sam couldn't believe what she was hearing, having been shrunk to a point where the ten year old girl's palm was equivalent in size to an entire town. How much smaller could these British brats want to make her?

"That's right Ruby, now let us put this bug in her place." Gwen laughed, her vibrating voice nearly deafening the shrunken blonde girl as she turned to face the couch.

"I heard skydiving is fun, you should try it." The brown haired girl continued, feeling superior to Sam in every way imaginable as she tilted her hand over one of the cushions.

"No you little bitch! Stop this now, I could be killed!" Sam begged as she tried to get a hold on Gwen's flesh, her voice remaining inaudible to both girls.

Sam was sent falling to the couch below her and Gwen turned her hand completely horizontal, unable to slow her descent as Gwen and Ruby watched her crash into the cushion.

No matter how comfy the couch was Sam felt a sharp pain upon landing, turning back to see the already immense girls looking downward with the shrink ray pointed directly at her.

"I have this set to the smallest setting. I wonder if it will shrink you out of existence?" Gwen teased, already finding it hard enough for her and her sister to spot Sam.

The ten year old giantess wasting no time in thinking about what would happen next, pulling down on the trigger releasing a beam of light that shined down on Sam like the sun.

Blinded the blonde girl attempted to cover her eyes as she felt herself whither away, until she was only a tenth of her already diminished size.

Gwen's new height calculated- 5'3*10= 52'6*2.54= 133.35*51= 6,931 feet tall from Sam's point of view.

Ruby's new height calculated- 5'3*10= 52'6*2.54= 133'35*47= 6,388 feet tall from Sam's point of view.

As this light faded Sam cringed at the very thought of what the two British girls looked like now, of course when she opened her eyes she realized her situation was much worse than she ever could have expected.

Gwen stood over the couch at approximately seven thousand feet tall while the smaller of the two was standing at a staggering six thousand five hundred feet tall.

Never in her life could she have possibly have been prepared for this moment, two little kids towered over her at height greater than that of the world’s tallest building.

The two mega giantess girls were now large enough to crush an entire city if they so desired, Sam standing on the mile long couch cushion at one twenty fifth of her original diminished size of one inch tall.

As she looked up Sam noticed that every detail of these two colossal British girls had become enhanced greatly after becoming even smaller, every pore of the skin and the stitching of their purple & orange dresses/panties were now completely clear to her.

Any move these two made to try and play with her further would almost definitely end her life once and for all, the only thing she could do now was hope they’d make her death as quick as possible.

Although the two preteen girls had something else in mind for Sam, rather than end her life quickly they’d want to make it slow and degrading to embarrass Sam one last time before she died at their hands.

“AWW WOULD YOU LOOK AT THE LITTLE SPECK OF DIRT, I CAN HARDLY SEE HER I CAN!” Gwen smiled, her shadow stretching out widely over Sam.

The ten year old girl’s face eclipsed the sky, almost as if this little girl was as powerful as a god to Sam and given her substantial height difference over her that might as well have been true.

"SHE'S SOOO CUTE I COULD JUST EAT HER UP LIKE A PIECE OF SUGAR." Ruby said, following her older sisters lead in belittling Sam to the lowest degree possible.

Even while trying to keep their voices low the two little girls voices sent powerful shock-waves through Sam's eardrums, their voices warped due to their immense size.

"ALRIGHT GWEN, HOW SHOULD WE FINISH THIS LITTLE SPECK." Ruby smiled, holding up a pair of tweezers to pick up and transport Sam with her own idea to torture the teeny tiny girl.

"I KNOW JUST WHAT'LL FINISH HER OFF! HOW BOUT ____________" Gwen says, causing Sam's heart to sink as she faced certain death.

1. "... I SEE IF SHE MAKES A HALF DECENT SEAT CUSHION." Gwen turns around and asks Sam how she likes looking at her gigantic butt, teasing her relentlessly while lowering herself and lifting herself away from the cushion Sam was on top of until she finally sits down.

2. "... YOU TAKE HER FOR A SWIM." Ruby picks up Sam using her tweezers and picks up Sam, walking into the kitchen where she pours herself a drink. She'd then hover Sam over the glass and drop her inside, letting her try to swim while swirling the water inside with her finger before drinking her.

3. "... WE HAVE CAT STEP ON HER." The girls use Ruby's tweezers to pick up Sam and drop her on top of Cat's football stadium sized flip-flop, each of which are radiating heat and sweat mimicking the aspects of a desert. The girls would issue Sam a challenge to try and escape before Cat got back and put them on.
13212111.title: Sam The Speck

132121111.content:
Gwen stepped up to the couch cushion Sam was standing on, the ten year old girl standing at a simply massive height of nearly seven thousand feet from the shrunken blonde's point of view. Her shadow eclipsing all light around Sam as it was cast over the couch, Gwen and Ruby both having to squint just to see any trace of Sam's presence. Of course they knew exactly where she was at the moment, but that wasn't going to stop the bratty girls from having their fun.

"HOW'S THE VIEW FROM DOWN THERE LITTLE GNAT?" Gwen asked, knowing that she must look absolutely gigantic from Sam's perspective if the older blonde was so tiny in comparison to her. Although being compared to the smallest living creature she could possibly think of didn't help in making her feel any less small.

"You giant brat's better return me to normal size right now or I swear that I will make you regret the day you were born!" Sam yelled at the top of her lungs, but it no longer mattered. She was so small that neither of the gigantic towers known as Gwen and Ruby could hear a word she said, she might as well have been just another bug for them to crush.

"WHAT'S THAT, I CAN'T QUITE HEAR YOU FROM ALL THE WAY UP HERE. CARE TO SPEAK A LITTLE BIT LOUDER?" Gwen teased, taking another step towards the couch. Her purple panties coming into view underneath her skirt, leaving Sam awestruck by how large even the young girls underwear was in comparison too hear. She was so taken back by this observation that she failed to must a response to Gwen who continued to tease her from above.

"HEY RUBY DID YOU HEAR THAT?" Gwen teased, looking back at her younger half with a smile spread across her face. A wicked Idea forming in her mind as too how she should dispose of Sam in a way that would be truly humiliating for the shrunken babysitter.

"YEAH, I THINK SHE SAID SHE WANTS YOU TO CRUSH HER." Ruby said, playing along with Gwen's idea. These words hitting Sam like a ton of bricks, they couldn't be serious right? She knew the British brats were evil but to actually contemplate killing her at any size was worse than anything she could have even expected.

"WELL, IF THAT'S REALLY WHAT SHE WANT THEN I'LL BE HAPPY TO GRANT HER REQUEST." Gwen teased, as if she were going to be doing Sam a favor by squishing her like a bug.

"HOW ARE YOU GOING TO DO IT?" Asked Ruby, the two girls discussing Sam's fate as if she were no longer in the room. Meanwhile the shrunken blonde just stood there looking up at the two goddess sized children, knowing that running was a futile effort at her current size.

"ISN'T IT OBVIOUS? SHE'S A BABYSITTER, RIGHT? SO IN ORDER TO CRUSH HER, I'M GOING TO SIT ON HER." Gwen laughed, her voice resounding in Sam's eardrums as she announced her plans for the shrunken blonde.

Before Sam could scream out her obvious objects to having her life brought to a quick and abrupt end underneath the bratty ten year old's fat butt, Gwen had already turned around and positioned herself over the couch cushion Sam was standing on. Her large rounded bottom floating over the seat, the fabric of her purple panties stretching to contain every ounce of flesh held in her gigantic butt as she bent over.

"DO YOU LIKE THE VIEW FROM DOWN THERE YOU LITTLE BUG? HOW DOES IT FEEL TO LOOK UP AT MY PERFECT LITTLE BUTT?" Gwen asked, teasing Sam with how big her butt was in comparison to the shrunken blonde. In fact she was so large that the young girls moon was comparable to the real one, easily able to extinguish all life wherever it sits.

"WHAT, NO COMMENTS?" Gwen asked, looking over her shoulder at the couch cushion. Not even able to spot Sam, making her wonder if her and Ruby actually managed to shrink her out of existence.

"HOW ABOUT THIS, SINCE I'M A FAIR PERSON. I'LL GIVE YOU TEN SECONDS TO RUN FOR YOU PATHETIC LITTLE LIFE." Gwen announced, signalling to Ruby that she would be the one counting.

Sam took this opportunity to run, even though she knew it was a fruitless effort. At her size ten seconds wouldn't be enough time for her to escape Gwen's rear in a jet, less on foot. But she didn't care, she wanted to live at any cost telling herself that she'd be a nicer person to Cat, Dice, Goomer and even Nona if she returned to normal size.

"10, 9, 8, 7 YOU BETTER HURRY UP." Ruby teased, knowing Sam wouldn't be getting very far at her size. Meanwhile Gwen inched her butt closer to the seat it would soon occupy, the large hills easily willing to roll over Sam's body to get comfortable.

"6, 5, 4, 3, 2 HER BUTT'S GETTING CLOSER, IT'S GOING TO SQUISH YOU." Ruby continued, picking up the pace a little bit. Excited to see Gwen crush the shrunken babysitter underneath her full weight.

"No, keep your fat butt away from me!" Sam screamed at the top of her lungs, not like it mattered. Neither girl was listening to her at this point, nor did they care how she felt about being smothered and crushed by Gwen's butt.

"ONE!" Both girl's shouted in unison as Gwen allowed her full weight to fall back into her seat, where her new seat cushion awaited her. Suddenly Sam was overtaken by darkness, blocking out all light from the outside world a mere fraction of a second before Gwen's ass met the cushion comforting it from below. The soft surface conforming to the outline of her doughy rear, dragging Sam's minuscule body along her panty clad bottom until it could no longer handle the intense weight of the seven thousand foot tall giantess. Her body popped like a grape beneath Gwen's ass, the ten year old girl unable to feel a thing as she got comfortable.

"You know what, you're actually not that bad of a seat cushion." Gwen proclaimed victoriously, hoping to tease Sam if by some miracle she survived being sat on.

"Well that was fun Gwen, what do you think we ought to do next?" Ruby asked, taking a seat on the couch next to Gwen."We still have the shrink ray. Should we use it on more people?"

Just then __________walked in giving the British Brats someone new to shrink.
132121111.title: Microscopic Seat Cushion

132121113.content:
Size measurements: (Gwen- 4'3 feet tall, Ruby- 3'11 feet tall, Cat- 5'1 feet tall, Sam- 1 millimeter tall)

1 foot= 12 inches, 1 inch= 2.54 centimeter, 1 centimeter= 10 millimeters.
Sam being 5'2 at normal size means that every centimeter is 52 feet tall to her.

Gwen- 129.54 X 52= 6736 feet tall

Ruby- 119.38 X 52= 6207 feet tall

Cat- 154.94 X 52= 8056 feet tall

“I THINK WE’RE HAVING TOO MUCH FUN RUBY, WE OUGHT TO LET CAT FINISH HER OFF.” Ruby said, her voice forcing Sam’s heart to sink.

Being tortured by the two gigantic British brats was one thing, but being unknowingly snuffed out of existence by her own roommate would be a completely embarrassing way to go.

“I THINK THAT SOUNDS LIKE A PROPER IDEA INDEED. BUT HOW SHOULD WE HAVE HER DO IT?” Ruby asked, forming a devilish smile is response to her elder sister’s cruelty.

Sam then closed her eyes and gritted her teeth, hoping that the two evil girls wouldn’t be able to think of anything that would kill her off.

Of course it didn’t take Gwen long to spot the perfect way to dispatch of Sam, a pair of flip flops often worn by Cat when she went outside the apartment for a walk.

https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/c...

“PERFECT.” Gwen stated to the shrunken blonde, snatching the tweezers from her younger sister and reaching down to pick up Sam up off the sofa cushion.

The metal clamps came down controlled by the nimble fingers of the goddess sized girl, easily lifting Sam from the couch like a speck of dirt being sucked up by a vacuum cleaner.

“LOOK AT YOU NOW, YOU'RE AS THIN AS A STRAND OF HAIR. I BETTER BE CAREFUL OR ELSE I MIGHT CRUSH YOU ON ACCIDENT.” Gwen laughed, continuing to belittle Sam further.

The older of the two British brats them walked across the room slowly, holding Sam at level with her chest nearly a mile over the hardwood floor.

Wind rushed passed the shrunken girl’s body with the force of a hurricane, simply caused by the movements of Gwen walking across the room.

“Put me down you giant bitch!” Sam yelled, her voice going completely unheard by the enormous child as she arrived at Cat’s flip flops.

“WELL ERE WE ARE, DOWN YOU GO.” Gwen smiled, lowering Sam down as closer to the center of the right flip flop as possible before releasing her.

Sam then landed face first on the damp insole, smack dab in the middle of where the ball of Cat’s foot would rest while she was wearing them.

The brown surface was wet and drenched in sweat as a result of constantly being worn, still emanating heat from when the ditzy girl was wearing them earlier.

Hundreds upon thousands of pieces of dead skin that had fallen off Cat’s bare feet surrounded Sam everywhere she looked, making her feel as if she had been teleported to a desert.

But two looming threats reminded her other wise, looking up to see both Gwen and Ruby towering over her at heights that exceeded a mile tall each.

“LOOK AT HER DOWN THERE, SHE LOOKS LIKE A BUG.” Ruby smiled, taking off her shoes and socks.

“NOW THAT YOU MENTION IT, SHE DOES RUBY. AND BUGS OUGHT TO BE CRUSHED RIGHT QUICK TO PREVENT AN INFESTATION.” Following her younger sister’s lead for a change by removing her own shoes and socks.

Sam looked around for any possible way out of this mess, but her roommate’s pungent smelling footwear stretched out over a hundred feet long in either direction she looked.

Finally she looked up in horror as the ceiling lights high above her were blocked out by two enormous shadows, quickly realizing it was Ruby’s right and Gwen’s left barefeet high above the brown flip-flop.

Although her situation was made even more terrifying by the fact that at her size Sam could see every inch of their young feet in extreme detail.

“YOU KNOW BUG, IT’S AWFULLY HOT ERE IN THE STATES. MY FEET HAVE BEEN SWEATING LIKE CRAZY ALL DAY, I BET A SINGLE DROP OF MY SWEAT OUGHT TO BE ENOUGH TO DROWN YOU.” Gwen teased, and from what Sam could see she wasn’t joking.

Fortunately Sam would be spared the horror of the giant British brats feet as the door clicked, finally Cat had returned home.

But this only assured Sam’s ultimate destruction, Gwen and Ruby running to sofa and taking a seat as if nothing was amiss.

“UGH, IT'S SOOOO HOT OUTSIDE. WHY DID I EVEN WEAR SNEAKERS TODAY?” Cat yelled upon entering the apartment, nearly deafening her shrunken roommate.

Looking up at Cat the shrunken blonde finally endured ultimate terror, Gwen and Ruby might have been massive beyond believe. But Cat was in a league of size all her own, standing at a height over eight thousand feet tall. Standing nearly two miles over the earth’s surface on just her barefeet.

“ALL THAT AND THEY DIDN’T EVEN HAVE ANY DELICIOUS BIBBLE.” Cat said upset, taking over her sneakers and socks next to Gwen and Ruby. Cat’s footwear obviously much bigger than the two young girls.

Cat then dropped her sweat soaked socks onto the hardwood floor next to her flip flops, allowing enough sweat to fill a small lake to pour out.

“SO WHERE’S SAM?” Cat asked, Remembering that she had left her friend in the care of the two little girls. Unaware of the actions she had taken against the blonde teen.

"Um, we put her outside." Gwen smiled, coming up with a lie on the spot.

"Yea, she said she wanted to have an adventure in the tall grass." Ruby said, following her sister's lead.

"OH, THAT SOUND'S LIKE FUN. I'LL GO FIND HER AND MAKE US LUNCH." Cat said, dimwittedly believing their lie.

With that being said Cat turned her attention to her brown flip flops on the floor at her feet, unaware that Sam was standing on top of it’s surface at near microscopic size.

*GULP* Sam swallowed hard as she looked up in absolute horror to see Cat raising her foot over her body, while Gwen and Ruby watched the same scene at normal size with much more excitement in their eyes.

The shrunken blonde teen turned and began to run as fast as her minuscule legs could across the desolate landscape, hoping to escape to a place where Cat’s foot wouldn’t crush her.

But this was easier said than done as Cat’s toes approached from behind like a stampede of bulls, mindlessly tapping on the back of the footwear. Creating earthquake like vibrations for the millimeter tall Sam as she ran underneath the strap that secured the sandal to Cat’s foot as she walked.

She had almost made it to safety behind the strap that separated Cat’s big toe from the rest when the ball of her giantess roommate’s foot suddenly dug into the sandal knocking Sam down onto the space usually occupied by the redhead’s big toe.

The shrunken girl rolled onto her ass and looked up to see Cat’s toes surround the strap, each appendage large enough to crush an entire city block with one swift movement.

“This is it, this is how I die!” Sam panicked aloud, finally broken by the terror of being a speck sized human being at the mercy of a world millions of times bigger than herself.

“I WONDER IF SAM’S HAVING FUN RIGHT NOW?” Cat asked, still thinking she was outside in the backyard.

Then with one swift motion Cat brought her toes down hard, turning Sam's puny body into an unnoticeable pile of blood and guts.

"Ok, I'll be back in a minute." Cat said turning around, only to see Gwen and Ruby standing in front of her with the shrinking gun that started this mess in hand.

"Poor stupid Cat, you should have known better than to leave us here with Sam. Now she's dead and best of all, you were the one responsible for her demise." Gwen said, ready to pull the trigger and shrink Cat to gain a new toy.

"Wha-what do you mean? I didn't crush Sam, she's outside." Cat said,not realizing that she had been duped.

"You actually bought that? How dim are you? We shrunk Sam further and dropped here on you Sandal." Ruby admitted, causing Cat to look down as she realized that she must have crushed Sam if what they said was true.

"That's right and now we're gonna do the same to you." Gwen said, aiming the device at Cat and easing her finger down on the trigger.

Will they succeed in shrinking Cat or will she find a way to turn the odds in her favor and shrink the British brats?
132121113.title: Flip-Flop Desert

13213.content:
"What? You can't keep me in there I'll freeze to death!" Sam yelled out already feeling a shiver run down her spine just thinking about being trapped in the freezer for hours on end.

"Don't be silly people only freeze outside, during the winter." said Cat who giggled childishly at Sam's stupidity, as she began walking to the freezer in the corner of there apartment in the kitchen.

Sam tried with all her strength to break free from the red haired girls tightly enclosed grip, feeling as if she was trying to break free from iron chains as the naive 17 year old reached the kitchen. Meanwhile Sam hadn't given up in her escape attempt's just yet as she was held at chest level with Cat's breasts, the giant girl using her free hand to open the freezer door. Never before had Sam assumed that she'd be so earlier defeated by her childish roommate.

"In you go." Cat giggled as she shoved her fist along with Sam inside the freezer on the top shelf, letting her go in the coldest part of the freezer. Sam began looking around as freezing winds rushed passed her body causing her to shiver as she watched Cat close the one and only exit.

"Damn it!" Sam yelled out knowing that she would freeze in here if forced to endure the cold winds for hours, of course that was before she noticed every frozen food she enjoyed lined up behind her in spades. Frozen fat cakes, pizza, and chicken, all the things Sam loved most including three tubs of ice cream(Chocolate, vanilla, and cookie dough).

Sam knew full well that she'd need to find a place that she could be safe for the next hour or two before Cat came back to retrieve her from the freezer or else she'd end up frozen in ice.

Sam following her love of ice cream climbed up on a box of frozen pizza's and pushed the top of the chocolate ice cream tub off just enough for her to fit inside. The shrunken blonde girl took a step back and got a running start, sliding between the top and the tub causing her to land in a half full tub of chocolaty delight.

"Perfect Mama loves ice cream." Sam said upon landing inside now safe from the freezing wind until Cat came back to take her out of the freezer, the only question was when she would return.

20 minutes- Wants to make an ice cream sundae to help herself cool down, but Sam gets caught up in her frozen treat.

2 hours- Cat suddenly remembers that she left Sam in the freezer and rushes to get her out, Sam climbs out of the ice cream contain shivering as she see's the gigantic Cat open the door.
13213.title: Sam Cools Off

132131.content:
After twenty minutes of silence, eating the Chocolate ice cream around her, Sam had become coated in it’s frozen deliciousness to the point where she blended in almost perfectly with the brown landscape around her. "So what's this thing supposed to do exactly?" Lola asked, minimally intrigued by the strange device Quinn was toiling over. Even thought it was spring break, many of the students chose to remain on campus since they already basically lived on a beach. But watching Quinn tinker away with another one of her inventions was hardly what Lola had in mind when she thought of spring break.

"It's a shrink ray." Quinn explained. "The idea is that if we can successfully shrink matter and grow it back when we need to, we can create a world with infinite storage space and cargo that is virtually weightless. Not to mention the fact that if we could ever safely shrink people, we could end world hunger since normal sized food would seem giant in comparison."

"Why not just grow the food?" Zoey asked, biting into an apple and imagining having dozens of tiny people crawling all over it scavenging for food.

"That would certainly be ideal, but infeasible. Giant food would take up far too much space, and there would always be a desire to make it even bigger so that more people could be fed and more profit could be made. Adding that much biomass to the could also be dangerous to the environment. And besides, that wouldn't solve the cargo transportation problem." Quinn continued, fine tuning the strange looking device with a screw driver. "If this thing works, I am a shoo-in for the Nobel Prize. You guys ready to see a test run."

"I don't know... Is it safe?" Nicole asked, backing away a little bit, not liking the look of Quinn's device or Quinn's track record with past inventions.

"Of course it's safe. However, as a safety precaution, we spray this." Quinn said, procuring a bottle of what looked like sunscreen. Before the girls could object, Quinn had sprayed them with the aerosol, covering them in the mysterious spray.

"What the hell was that Quinn?" Lola asked, clearly annoyed.

"If everything in here is shrink proof, then what the heck are you going to test it on?" Zoey asked.

13333212.title: Where Is Everybody?

133332122.content:
“What the- I think I’m lying on something.” Nicole said, using her elbows to push her upper body up off the couch so she could look under her stomach.

This movement forced her crotch down further into the couch cushion, nearly turning the shrunken Chad into a red stain on the front of her pink and yellow striped panties.

He soon figured that if he was to get out of this position he’d have to take full advantage of her feeling for him, struggling against her womanhood the best he could.

“Oh my god! I think it’s moving!” she yelled, jumping to her feet and leaving Chad on the couch while Brad remained stuck to the back of her panties.

“What? Is it a bug?” Lola said following Nicole’s example, looking down at the couch where Nicole was just laying for signs of a small living creature.

Soon she found one as Chad staggered to his feet, looking up at the two towering beauties looming overhead.

Nicole who had been lying on the couch saw him raised her hand above her head and slammed it down towards the couch, nearly crushing Chad who escaped between her fingers.

“Nicole wait, I don’t think that’s a bug.” Lola said, pulling the boy crazed girl back before she had a second chance to strike.

“Wait a minute, Chad? Is that really you?” Nicole asked, surprised to see a 1 inch tall boy looking back into her eyes.

“It must have been Quinn’s Shrinky thingy.” Lola jumped in, trying to give an explanation to what Nicole was seeing.

“Please Nicole, don’t hurt me. You sat on my brother can you help him?” the tiny boy yelled, watching as Lola walked behind Nicole.

“Holy crap, he’s right. You sat on the little guy.” Lola smiled, lifting Nicole’s skirt up a teeny bit and peeling the shrunken Brad from her friends right cheek.

Lola tossed the tiny boy back onto the couch, turning her attention back towards Nicole before she started going boy crazy over the two cute teens.

“Nicole, I’ve Quinn’s device shrunk these two it might have worked on everybody else.” Lola said, pointing out that they were the only normal sized people left on campus.

“OMG Zoey!” Nicole yelled.

“What about Zoey, she was in the room with us so she should be fine.” Lola laughed, not realizing while Nicole was worried about.

“No, she went to the boys room to check up on them. She might accidentally squish them!” Nicole followed up, running out of the room.

“Oh yea, that’s bad.” Lola said in a joking manner as she followed Nicole running out of the room, leaving the shrunken twins by themselves.

The two girls quickly ran across campus at their top speed, creating quick violent earthquakes for any tiny person unlucky enough to be in their path.

One shrunken girl was unfortunate enough to fall down upon feeling the vibrations and looked up to see a pink tennis shoe coming down on top of her.

She tried to yell but it only took a second for Nicole’s footwear to turn her into a stain on the concrete, the giant girl taking notice of how easy it was for them to crush people.

“Whoops, sorry!” she called out, although it didn’t do much good since the girl’s life had been brought to a quick and painful end.

It didn’t take long for them both to reach the boys dormitory, being careful not to try and step on anybody else as they ran through the halls.

Finally they saw the boy’s room with the door wide open, seeing that Zoey was sitting on the couch.

“Hey guys, what’s up?” Zoey said in a nonchalant tone, clearly not aware of what had happened to the rest of the students.

“What do you mean, ‘what’s up?’ everyone at PCA is an inch tall!” Lola said, using air quotes as she re-spoke Zoey’s question.

“That’s impossible, you saw that Quinn’s shrink thing didn’t work.” Zoey said, finding it hard to believe that Quinn shrunk everyone at PCA.

Although in the past she had knocked everyone out at the same time during the boys versus girls prank war, so shrinking everybody wasn’t impossible for her.

“We saw them, we’re the only people who are still normal sized.” Nicole said, hoping it wasn’t too late.

“Well I’ve been sitting on this couch since I got here, if the guys were just shrunk then why didn’t they try to get my attention.” Zoey teased, still not seeming to believe her friends.

“Zoey, get up! Quick!” Lola yelled, running over to Zoey and pulling her off the couch to see Chase, Michael, & Logan left in the crater of Zoey’s butt imprint.

“Oh my god, are you guys ok.” Zoey said, unable to believe that she was actually sitting on all three of them at the same time.

By the looks of it Michael and Logan had been trapped under the tremendous weight of her jean clad buttcheeks, while Chase had been caught under her buttcrack.

“Yea, we’re fine. Don’t worry about us.” Chase said, quick to forgive his crush for nearly crushing him.

“Speak for yourself, that blonde bimbo nearly smothered us to death.” Logan said, his honesty ending him up on Zoey’s bad side as usual.

“Bimbo?!?” Zoey yelled, nearly deafening the three boys as she took offense to Logan’s comment “...you know I could still step on you, like a cockroach.” reminding him that she was still bigger than him.

"I'll be good, just need a second to breath." Michael said trying to diffuse some of the tension between his shrunken buddy and the blonde giantess.

"That's it, I'm talking to Quinn about this. Lola, can you go check up on Dustin for me and make sure he's ok?" Zoey asked, wanting to get away from Logan before she was tempted to stomp him out of existence.

"Yea, sure. I guess that leave Nicole to watch the boys." Lola said, walking toward the door with Zoey.

"Cool." was all Nicole had to say about being left in charge of the three tiny boys, looking down at them as she licked her upper lip.

Zoey and Lola gave each other worried looks as they exited the room and headed off in opposite directions, leaving the boy crazy girl alone with Chase, Michael, and Logan.

Who's path will you follow? Nicole's, Lola's, or Zoey's?

Choices:

1- Nicole is left in charge of Logan, Michael, and Chase causing her boy crazy tendencies to act up. As soon as Zoey and Lola leave the room she begins openly talking about what immoral things she plans to do with them.

2- Lola keeps her promise to Zoey and walks straight to Dustin’s room to make sure that he’s ok and babysit him while the blonde girl talks to Quinn. Although she might have decided to take the term ‘Babysitting’ too literally.

3- Zoey goes back to the room to find Quinn smothering a shrunken student between her toes, having already found out for herself that her invention actually worked. Although she has trouble both conducting the test and recording them herself and asks Zoey to conduct some for her.
133332122.title: Race To Zoey

13333221.content:
Zoey Brooks had recently and rather reluctantly agreed to help her friend Quinn Pensky with a scientific experiment in order to bring up her grade in chemistry from failing to a D. This would allow her to pass the class for the semester and continue her studies in the spring, provided that she survived whatever crazy and likely life threatening experiment Quinn put her though.

"Hey Quinn, are we ready to go?" Zoey asked as she stepped foot in Quinn's room, not at all surprised to see her hunched over on the floor picking up what looked like ants.

"Zoey no!" Quinn yelled, the blonde girl stopping her next step from hitting the floor as she looked down to notice two or three ants caught in the shadow of her foot. "You have to be more careful, you almost crushed Jamie, Janice, and Eli!" Quinn pointed out as she picked up each individual ant away from Zoey's feet.

"Quinn, relax! They're just ants, they don't matter." Zoey pointed out, thinking Quinn's compassion towards weird animals and insects was kinda funny. Meanwhile Zoey would have crushed them without a second thought, even if she had seen them in her path, it would have been their fault for getting in her way.

Nevertheless she let them survive what would have been a fatal stomp from her white sneakers because she knew she needed Quinn's help to pass her science elective. That was until she felt a puny little ant climbing up her bare thigh close to her shorts, not even thinking about the tiny insects life as she raised her hand outward.

Her shadow eclipsed the insignificant little bug within seconds, a firm loud slap echoing throughout the room as she smeared it's guts down her thigh. For Quinn she realized exactly what this meant, her favorite little ant Peter loved climbing her legs specifically her thighs, and Zoey had just crushed him like it was nothing.

"Zoey! What did you just do?" Quinn asked her blonde friend, concerned by her actions towards her ants. First she had nearly crushed three of them under her foot at once and now one had been crushed between her palm and leg.

"Quinn, they're just ants! Can we please start the experiment?" Zoey asked, a hint of laughter in her voice as she repeated her statement. She couldn't count the amount of ant's that she had possibly crushed since coming to PCA, whether they had invaded her room or simply because they fell under her feet while she walked around the campus, meanwhile Quinn appeared to treat them as if they were people.

"Ugh, fine." Quinn said frustrated, handing Zoey a orange medical bottle which contained several unmarked red and blue pills. "You're gonna want to take one of these every morning for the next week, then I'll record the results by checking in with you daily." Quinn explained, placing a handful of ant's into her ant farm and closing it.

"Okay, and what do these do exactly?" Zoey asked sounding worried, watching as Quinn headed towards the door.

"How the heck am I supposed to know? They could do just abut anything." Quinn answered before leaving the room to go to the bathroom, wanting to wash her hands before her next experiment.

"Oh well, how bad can it be?" Zoey asked herself, nervously twisting off the cap and proceeding to swallow just one of the capsules inside before placing the container down on a nearby shelf. Little did she know how fast the effects would kick in, her head spinning, her knees shaking. What kind of crazy pills had Quinn given her?

Within a few seconds the effects subsided and Zoey almost felt normal, that was until she opened her eyes to see that nothing about her current situation was normal. "Quinn!" she yelled, but went unheard as she had been shrunk down to one inch tall, nearly two times bigger than the ant she had crushed earlier.

She knew she had to make a decision and fast. Should she wait her for Quinn and ask her to return her to normal size, or should she crawl under the door and run to her room next door where she might find Lola or Nicole hanging out between classes? Would she even make it back to her room at all, or will someone spot her in the halls and stop her?
13333221.title: Zoey's Lesson In Irony

133332212.content:
Whether Quinn had knowledge of the pills ability to shrink Zoey or not quickly became irrelevant in the back of her mind, if she was found at this size Quinn would either want to take revenge for her ants Zoey mocked earlier or use her new size advantage over the blonde girl to conduct some experiment.

Neither scenario worked out in Zoey's favor, giving her the idea of leveling the playing field by getting someone normal sized to confront Quinn on her behalf. That way the nerdy giantess couldn't strong arm her into doing whatever she saw fit for reasons of revenge or scientific exploitation.

"I have to get out of here!" Zoey panicked as she ran towards the tall wooden door separating her from the halls of the girls dorms, not wanting to end up squished under Quinn's socked foot in a similar scenario to the ants she had nearly crushed underfoot earlier.

Even at her diminished size it didn't take Zoey long to reach the towering door, though she did move admittedly slow in comparison to any normal sized person, taking her nearly three minutes to walk only five or six feet. "

Suddenly the doorknob clicked and the large wooden surface swung over her with tremendous speed and force, whipping up nearly hurricane force winds and Zoey ducked to the floor and grabbed hold of some carpet strands to keep her anchored down. However the worst had yet to pass as she looked up to see Quinn towering overhead like some kind of nerdy goddess.

Her feet landed on either side of her, supporting Quinn's legs which seemed to go up for a nearly a mile before disappearing into her jean shorts in the completion of a massive arch above Zoey's head. Over her torso she wore a thick orange shirt that left part of her belly exposed, giving Zoey a glimpse of a white bra hidden underneath. The only thing she couldn't see from this angle was Quinn's face, blocked out completely by her upper B cup breasts.

"Oh my god, she's huge!" Zoey exclaimed, Quinn's immense size surpassing her wildest expectations, especially when taken into consideration Quinn was the shortest of her friends.

Even so, Zoey still knew that she couldn't risk a one on one encounter in her current state, the risk that Quinn was somehow behind this was still very real. So as Quinn entered the room Zoey made her exit, running between the giantess nerds towering arch like legs into the hall.

Now she only needed to travel three doors down in the direction of the west wing, simply right? Wrong, as Zoey was soon to discover that nothing at this size would ever be considered easy.

Just outside Quinn's room, dozens of girl's roughly the size of Quinn or taller roamed the halls, blissfully unaware of Zoey's existence at their feet.

The first girl who approached Zoey was actually her friend Vicky(http://zoey101.wikia.com/wiki/Vicky) who she met when she first started attending PCA. The Japanese girl was wearing a pair of plain white tennis shoes that shook the ground with the force of a miniature earthquake given each step she took towards the shrunken blonde girl.

“Vicky! Hey, down here! Vicky please, Don’t step on me!” Zoey shouted at the top of her lungs, her voice easily drowned out by the chattering gossip of teenage girls as they passed her by. Vicky in particular paid her no mind, her pale footwear raising high above Zoey’s head, enveloping her completely in the shadow it cast.

Given her quick reflexes and natural athleticism Zoey was easily able to dodge her friends foot as it came crashing down onto the carpet below her, forcing her to watch as her own friend carried on have almost crushed her like an ant underfoot.

Nevertheless Zoey carried on, realizing she was nearly a quarter of the way to her room already before another familiar face made an appearance. Millie turned the corner wearing the same red flats she had used to crush a spider in Micheal’s room last week (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Mrxedh8...), the so called eighty five pound girl by Micheal’s estimation caught zoey off guard as her feet stopped on either side of her.

“Ugh, another one. This school must have a bug problem.” Millie announced to herself, frightening Zoey beyond belief as she lifted her foot high above her. Accidentally being crushed under Vicky’s foot was one thing, but Millie was going out of her way to take on the role of PCA's personal exterminator, and unfortunately for Zoey she was the only bug in her way.

Zoey didn't say a word in protest of being stepped on, she learned earlier that her words weren't loud enough at her current size to reach Millie's eardrums. Instead she decided to flee in the interest of preserving her own life, running passed Millie's foot as her toes met the ground, grinding into the carpet as Zoey turned the corner behind her. She pressed herself up against the wall, exhaling sharply as she peaked around the corner just in time to see Millie lift her foot.

"Did I get it?" She asked, almost sound excited as she lifted her shoe and checked the treads for any crushed remains. "Awe, where did it go?" she inquired, doing a full three hundred sixty degree scan of her surroundings as Zoey pulled herself back against the wall.

"Darn it, must have scurried off somewhere. Stupid little bug!" Millie said, hoping to stomp another bug under her shoe again soon as she walked off.

With Millie gone Zoey was free to carry on towards her room which was now in clear sight, she just had to make it across the hall and her troubles would be over, or so she thought. Just as Zoey started running towards her dorm yet another familiar female student made her presence known, and in Zoey's mind she might be the worst yet.

Walking down the hall was none other than sixth grader(for the third time that is.) Thisha Kirby who dated her younger brother Dustin for a brief period of time. Following which she tried to date Chase who talked her away from Dustin at Zoey's suggestion. http://zoey101.wikia.com/wiki/Trisha_Kir...

The massive blonde teen walked down the hall wearing a pair of orange converse sneakers, their looked filthy, worn out, and had a piece of chewed bubble gum stuck to the sole. What's worse is that she was heading in Zoey's direction as the last obstacle she'd have to overcome to gain access to her own room. Suddenly two other girls turned the corner walking in the opposite direction which meant standing still and waiting for Trisha to pass was not an option for Zoey as the dirty blonde's footsteps got closer and closer.

Zoey gritted her teeth and ran towards the door as fast as she could, watching in horror as the sneaker with chewed bubble gum stuck to the bottom rose above her shrunken form. All she needed to do was avoid Trisha's foot once to gain access to her dorm, can she do it?

1. Yes- Zoey makes it into her room where she finds Lola reading a magazine on the floor, from there it's only a simple matter of walking in front of her to gain her attention.

2. Yes- Zoey narrowly avoids Trisha's foot as it slams down on the carpet behind her, sending her under the door where she finds the lights turned off and Nicole sleeping on a bean bag chair in the corner. Zoey quickly decided that if she want's Nicole's help, she'll have to climb her sleeping body and wake her up.

3. No- Zoey trips and falls victim to Trisha's footwear, getting caught in the chewed mass of bubblegum underneath her foot as she walks to an unknown destination.
133332212.title: Run To Room 101

1333322121.content:
There were many instances in history where human beings have experienced bursts of physical ability due to fear. Mothers lifting cars lightly to protect their children, people with broken legs moving unhindered, the list went on. So while an inch tall teenager nearly being crushed by the bubblegum under the sole of a repeated failure wasn't quite a textbook example, the fear did give Zoey the burst of speed she needed to escape being crushed.

Unfortunately, her minuscule size didn't quite allow her to escape the impact area. Trisha's foot slammed into the ground with the force of a hurricane, sending the tiny blonde tumbling forward and under the door of Room 101.

Lying on the ground, Zoey took slow steady breaths as her ears rang. "Stupid. Failure." Zoey cursed as she shakily got to her legs, clutching her left arm. "When I'm back to normal, I swear I'll-" Zoey trailed off as she took in the size of her monolithic bed. Now that she wasn't in any immediate danger of being crushed, it actually was kind of cool to experience the world from this angle.

Before Zoey could do more exploring, she heard a page being turned and turned to see Lola lazily reading a magazine on the floor, the Latina's miles long legs hovering aimlessly in the air.

Zoey let out a relieved sigh. As scatterbrained as Lola could be at times, her status as Quinn's best friend meant she should have no trouble forcing Quinn to restore Zoey's size. Well theoretically. No one could ever make sense of Quinn and Lola.

As Zoey made her way towards the gigantic Latina, Lola suddenly perked up and threw away her magazine before she began reaching for her bunk, grunting every now and then as if trying to use the Force.

"What the hell?" Zoey asked. Her question was suddenly answered as Lola shrugged and let herself fall forward, sending more gale force winds at Zoey, settling in for a nap.

"You lazy-" Zoey muttered as she picked herself back up and made her way to her roommate. Thankfully Lola was sleeping on her stomach, allowing Zoey to come near her eye.

"Lola. Lola. Please wake up. I need your help." Zoey cried, poking at the eyeball only to be backhanded by a massive tanned hand. With a moan, Lola turned over, her head facing Zoey as she continued to try and get comfortable.

"Not getting rid of me that easily Martinez." Zoey muttered as she returned to Lola's billboard sized face. Rather than poke the eyeball, Zoey placed her hands on the eyelid and did her best to force both halves open.

Not for the first time today, Zoey's athleticism paid off as the eye opened an inch before the lid moved too fast for Zoey to keep up with, forcing her on her shapely ass.

It was almost surreal for Zoey to watch Lola's giant eye open, allowing her to see all the blood vessels in great detail, as the pupil darted back and forth, rather like Sauron's eye, to find who had disturbed its owner. The pupil passed over Zoey for a moment before it stopped and slowly returned, dilating to ensure it saw what it thought it saw.

With unbelievable speed, Lola shot back up with a scream, scooting away from Zoey as she took deep breaths.

"Hi Lola." Zoey squeaked. Still staring, Lola lowered her palm for the inch tall blonde to climb onto, bringing her up to her face.

"What... uh... happened?" The teen actress asked. Zoey glared in response. "Lola, I know you're the newest member of the gang but what do you think happened?"

"In increasing order of likelihood, I'm either on some pretty powerful hallucinogenics, this is an unusually vivid dream or-"

"- Quinn." Both girls said at once. "I love that girl but she really needs to sign onto animal testing." Lola sighed before she user her free hand to fondle Zoey's breasts and butt. "You're so cute." The Latina laughed.

"Stop it!" Zoey cried. "Just... please. Take me back to Quinn so she can turn me back to normal. Please." Zoey begged, turning on her puppy dog eyes and sounding as sincere as she could.

What does Lola do?

1. "Yeah no prob." Lola smirked. While Lola takes the tiny Zoey to Quinn's lab, it's only so she can force feed Quinn a shrinking pill, leaving her two tiny friends to play with.

2. "Can we do one thing first?" Lola asked with a smile. Following her giant eyes, Zoey would see Lola had been reading a Playboy before she was dropped into the sexually aroused giantess' panties.
1333322121.title: Lola's Suprise

13333222.content:
Lola Martinez was hanging out alone one night in the girls lounge, reading the monologue for PCA's latest production of the play Our Town. She was interested in playing the role of the main characters Emily Webb, having memorized more than half the character line in only a few short hours.

Unfortunately spending the majority of her day reading the script had left her exhausted, robbing her of even the energy to walk back to her room. So instead of wasting the effort on trying to return to her room, Lola simply closed her eyes and told herself she'd only be resting them for a minute or two. Of course this was a lie she had told herself too often, whether she was studying for a test or memorizing lines for an audition.

About six or seven hours later Lola stretched her arms out over her head, arching her back up as she stretched out her entire body. She then rolled onto her side, using her arms to balance herself as she got up on all fours. "Wait, that's not right." she told herself, realizing that she didn't even have enough space on her own bed to stretch in the morning. How would she have more space on the couch in the girls lounge?

Where had she woke up? How did she get there? These questions and more ran though Lola's head as she quickly sat up, surveying the room. Naturally she had already made the assumption that she had woken up in some place other than the girls lounge, but she was even more surprised to discover that she was still there.

Although she quickly noticed a few key differences as she looked around the room, the most astonishing of which was the fact that everything was over fifty times it's normal size. This included the sofa cushion that she was currently standing on top of, the soft doughy surface that once gave way to her ass now held up her entire body without so much as leaving an indent.

"This is bad, I'm the size of a fly." Lola said, beginning to panic, part of her still wanting this to be part of some crazy dream. Although she rarely had dreams this realistic or scary without the influence of watching a scary movie the night before, coming to terms with the fact that this might be real. If so her main objective should be to get Zoey's help, her blonde friend always seemed to know just what to do in situations like this.

"...and if Zoey can't help, then I'll go to Quinn, wait Quinn!" She yelled, reaching a conclusion that most people at PCA would come to if they had been in her position. "That bitch, she shrunk me!" Lola concluded, decided that it only made sense for the Eccentric young scientist to be behind shrinking her. Whether she used some kind of shrinking formula or shrink ray to do so was beyond her knowledge, all she could conclude was that Quinn definitely had something to do with this.

Looking out the window Lola determined that it was about seven o'clock in the morning, meaning the rest of the girls would surely be waking up sooner than later. At first she thought of this as a good thing, but then realized that it might not be such a good idea to have a few dozen giant girls towering above her, nearly stepping or sitting on her puny body as they made their way around the room.

Suddenly she looked at the entrance to see________ walking into the room.

1. Quinn- She would be walking in the room to collect skin samples off the couch, but would find herself making an even greater discovery as she finds Lola calling out to her from on top of a couch cushion. She would then proceed to accuse the giantess nerd for her current situation, possibly saying something to land herself on Quinn's bad side.

2. Zoey- Lola would be joyful to see the exact person she was about to go looking for enter the room, calling her name as she walked towards the couch. Then her heart would sink as she realized Zoey couldn't see or hear her at this size and was about to sit on the couch herself to relax before her classes later in the day.

3. Someone Else.
13333222.title: Lola's Shrinking Monologue

133332222.content:
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/zoey...

Lola’s grim future of being stepped on or sat on by every girl student in her building suddenly seemed unlikely to come to term as the shrunken teen actress caught sight of her friend Zoey Brooks entering the girls lounge. Overfilled with joy the miniaturized girl rushed the the front of the seat cushion she was currently standing on, standing near the edge trying her best not to look down as she called her friends name.

"Great! So go stand over there!" The teen genius smiled as she pointed to the door while she got behind the machine's controls.

"What?! No." Lola said as she stood up.

Ned Bigby Student and author of the only known book of how to survive in middle school was in danger of failing science taught by the evil teacher Mr. Sweeney, and like always he had been promised a reward from his mother if he could keep his grades at a ‘B’ average.

So when Mr. Sweeney himself approached Ned after class and gave him a way to get his grade up by two letter grades from a ‘D’ to an ‘B’ the teen slacker was more than happy to listen to what he had to say for once.

“Mr. Bigby, I had hoped that you had some kind of a plan to keep your grades up in my class. But now I see that I must intervene to keep you from failing.” the teacher said showing that he really wasn’t such a bad guy.

“Great, so what doing I go to do?” Ned asked optimistically unaware of just how hard it be to complete the teacher's task, in fact it might have been the last school assignment the young boy would ever do.

“Complete work on a science fair project that wins at least a spot in the top three.” Mr. Sweeney said casually causing Ned to panic inside, after all there was no way he could beat the science nerds, Evelyn Quang and his friend Simon Nelson Cook.

That was when he got an idea that might assure victory “Could I have a partner help me out on the project?” Ned asked thinking this might be his get out of jail free card, still unaware of the consequences that would follow.

“Well I don’t see why not, provided that you both do an equal share of the work and…” Mr. Sweeney unable to finish his sentence as he watched Ned bolt outside the classroom to get help in passing his class.

In the halls of James K. Polk middle school Ned found Simon Nelson Cook where he could almost always be found, at his locker admiring the beautiful Lisa Zimo from a distance she couldn’t see him practically drooling over her.

“I need your help to win the Science fair next week or Sweeney no give me good grade.” Ned said using incorrect grammar to help speed up his sentences, knowing his friend wasn’t paying full attention to his problem just yet.

Cookie, as he was known as at school closed his locker halfway and asked Ned “And why would I do that when I can win the science fair, impress Lisa, and then go on a date with her?” listing of a plan from his imagination that never seemed to work out in real life.

“Because if you don’t then I’ll tell Lisa all about the camera you set up in her locker.” Ned said threatening his friend becoming desperate to pass science, causing Cookie to agree telling Ned to come over after school.

---A Week Later---

“I’ve done it!” Cookie exclaimed inside the gym 1 hour before the start of the science fair, excited by the completion of his greatest scientific achievement to date “I’ve single handedly created a real life shrink ray!” wishing he could have taken all the recognition for the device.

“Keep it down, do you want Sweeney to hear you!” Ned said in a quiet yelling voice as he pushed Cookie to the side, not wanting the evil teacher to discover Ned hadn’t done any other the work himself as Ned spotted him enter the room.

“Mr. Bigby! Surprising to see you here today, now which of these projects is your’s?” Sweeney asked looking around for some of the worst projects at the fair only assuming that Ned’s entry would not live up to the high expectations he had set a week earlier.

"Right here Mr. Sweeney." Ned said taking a step back and showing off the dubbed shrink ray the Cookie had made for him to use in the fair, even if it did mean that he would more than likely lose.

"A shrink ray, preposterous! Looks like your grades won't be changing anytime soon Mr. Bigby." the evil teacher said not believing at all that another could make a device of such high scientific achievement at his age not even his top students like Simon Nelson Cook.

"Wait Mr. Sweeney I'll show you!" Ned said frantically grabbing the device his movements unknowingly changing the devices settings to 'large area organic shrinking.' as he pointed it at an orange on the table left behind by Cookie to demonstrate use of the device on.

In a flash of light Ned demonstrated that the shrink ray did indeed work... on every kid and teacher in the entire school, when everyone came too they quickly realized that the common space between them and another person(4-5 feet) was now like being across the entire gym from one another.

"Mr. Bigby what have you done!" Mr. Sweeney yelled out at Ned as he quickly came to the conclusion that everyone in the school must have shrunk , meaning that since it was the beginning of the school day that nobody would be coming to save them for quite some time.

Meanwhile at the entrance to the school ____________ walked up unaware that everyone inside their school were now the size of bugs.

As he closed his locker door, Beck swallowed the urge to sigh at the pouting goth in front of him.

"What is it Jade?" He asked, knowing full well what she wanted.

"Take me back." She glared.

"Are you gonna stop being jealous towards literally everything, allow me to have my own life, talk to whomever I choose, pay for the physical damages you've caused to my property, let me have control over my Netflix account, and stop insulting my family and friends?" Beck asked.

In his mind, really in the mind of any rational person, such concessions would be quite reasonable.

"What are you crazy?" The Goth snapped.

As said. In the mind of any rational person.

"Well then no."

Jade looked like she was about to snap before she noticed Cat. The ditzy redhead scratching at her locker door, much like her namesake, as she always did when she forget her combination.

Jade smirked. The sort of smirk that everyone, but Cat, knew heralded chaos. "Ok fine." The goth waved off. "Just let me have this my little boy toy." She said in an obviously false tone as she plucked one of his hairs before walking off, grabbing Cat's arm and dragging away the redhead. Beck briefly thought he heard the word "Sky" but waved it off as he went to see Tori.

"Still trying to get back together?" The Latina asked.

"Whatever her flaws, she's quite consistent in her method." The Canadian sighed. Honestly there were times where he wasn't sure why he'd ever gotten into such a terrible relationship.

"Do you think she'll get violent?"

"If she does, we'll handle her. Jade West has failed at literally everything she's ever done."

Tori gave him a questioning look, hand on her perfect hip, "Just to be clear, by "we" you mean-"

"Yeah I'm asking you to once again swat Jade aside like a fly."

Tori rolled her eyes and smiled. "Fine. Go wait for me in the practice room, just need to get something." She sighed as she handed him the access pass for the room they'd rented out.

"Where would I be without you?" He smiled as he took the pass.

"In jail for ping pong fraud." She deadpanned before she returned her attention to her locker's contents.

"...Okay." He blinked as he walked off.

Still as blunt as that statement had been, it was the truth. And it was precisely why Beck wasn't worried about Jade in the slightest. If Jade was... well jade, then Tori was a flawless diamond. Of all the possible futures, there wasn't one where Jade West could defeat Tori Vega.

He was jolted from his musings when he entered the practice room and stubbed his foot against an instrument case.

"Ah! Why did that hurt so... much... is that box bigger?" He asked. Looking around, he found that it wasn't just the instrument case that was larger but everything else.

No. Everything else was the same size. He was getting smaller.

Further and further down he dwindled until he came to a halt at roughly an inch tall.

"This would make a great Twilight Zone. In fact, I recall that there were several involving either giant or tiny aliens." He said numbly before he took a calming breath. "Ok. Focus on the positives. You're physically fine and Tori's on her way here. She'll know what to do. And... she's wearing a skirt today."

His spirits lifted, Beck began to think about how this might have occurred. The only person who had it out for him right now was Jade and... oh of course. His mind flashed back to his last conversation with his vindictive ex, figuring out why she'd taken his hair and the "Sky" in her conversation with Cat. So Jade had had Cat fish through one of her old Sky Store products for one that could shrink him based on his DNA.

Honestly he wasn't even surprised that Sky Store could shrink people. They probably had the cure for cancer and the secrets of space/time travel locked away somewhere.

But was Jade so self-centred that she would risk his well-being by shrinking him and indulge a crippling addiction of Cat's? Before he even finished the thought, he mentally slapped himself for asking such an obvious question. This was the woman who'd stabbed a baby seal for licking him. To this day, he was still banned from the aquarium.

As he mused on the many public places that Jade had received lifetime bans from, he heard the door opening. To be safe, he ducked behind the instrument case, praying that Tori would walk in.

1) To Beck's relief, it is Tori. It takes very little time for Beck to have Tori notice him who promises to help him. Sneaking past Jade isn't quite as easy though.

2) To Beck's horror, it's Jade who quickly grabs him, eager to redefine what it means to be the Worst Couple. Though if Beck's lucky, Tori might get suspicious of Cat and Jade's behaviour and try to save him.

3) To Beck's surprise, it's Trina. Still, not the worst scenario. Trina was always very well-endowed and her assets are now even bigger at Beck's size.

"What are we even doing here?" Beck and Andre asked wondered why Sinjin and Robbie even needed them around for the project, clearly they were capable of doing it themselves so why have two spear sets of hands they weren't gonna use.

"We're not exactly popular, we're worried no one will pay attention to our protect unless we have you you two draw in a crowd." Sinjin said as Robbie nodded behind him tinkering with the wiring on their tripod lifted invention.

"What can I say, the ladies don't like Robbie. But I still could have brought my Northridge girls in to get everyone interested haha." Rex laughed never missing the opportunity to insult his puppeteer Robbie.

Robbie not saying a word against Rex as Andre smiled "So you needed my good lucks to get people interested." Andre said proudly, obvious to everyone else in the room that Sinjin was speaking of Beck whom every other girl at Hollywood Arts had a crush on.

"So whats this thing do?" Beck asked causally walking around the device just as Robbie had finish tinkering around with it's inner workings, it looked like some kind of weird looking turret.

"This is a matter reducer, it combines atoms while also making the object or person it's used on smaller in the process." Sinjin explained answering Beck's question.

"So why don't you just call it a shrink ray?" Andre was quick to ask the more difficult name bothering the boy who preferred that most things remained easily, much like his natural ability to write songs.

"Because if you were listening it doesn't only shrink things and people, it makes them harder to crush for safety reasons." Robbie said placing Rex atop the device and walking towards the group standing in front of the device's path.

While all four boys attention was grasped in the conversation, Rex slowly and without a sound rolled off the matter reducer hitting several switches before the puppet hit the group.

The sudden *clacking* noise grasping the boys attention just at the point where it was too late to do anytime "It's been activated." Sinjin said causing the other boys to panic.

They all tried running towards the device but were suddenly stunned by a bright light shinning from the device, the light was so intense the boys all had to close their eyes just to avoid going blind.

However when they opened their eyes the 4 boys found themselves looking at the world from a new perspective, in fact they were looking at the entire world from a much smaller perspective now that each of them stood at an inch tall in height.

"We've been shrunk!" Andre yelled out to Beck who somehow even in this situation managed to remain calm "... I wasn't meant to be so puny." he continued before the boys attention was grasped by the sound of someone opening the door.

Who will enter the room?

The boys stood in awe as Tori strolled casually into the room. Each footstep echoing through the room like a small-scale earthquake. “Beck! Andre! Robbie! Uh…..Sinjin?” Tori called into the room as she looked around. The group was supposed to be showing of somekind of project and she wanted to show her support.

After glancing around, Tori spotted a folding chair set up in the back of the room. It had been a long day, so she might as well relax, her friends would be along soon enough. Without any worries, she continued her walk across the room.

As the four boys heard the advancing footsteps, they all scattered like the ants they appeared to be. Fleeing in all directions in a panicked sprint while screaming out in fear. The thundering footfalls neared them, one thunderclap at a time. Soon all the boys were out of Tori’s path, all except Sinjin who had though to take shelter on the chair Tori was moving towards. For him the clomping out of the heavy boot’s rubber soles hitting the tile floor was ground louder and louder. As a shadow blotted out the room’s dull fluorescent lights, the young boy turned and looked up to see the bottom of Tori’s leather boots. The treads were worn down from constant wear, with grass, dirt, and dust clinging to it. The airplane-sized sole hung over him for a split second before it came down with all the weight of the lovely teenage actress behind it. In an instant Sinjin was annihilated, no pain, no body, just a spatter of blood between the leather boot and the cold floor.

“Huh?” Tori wondered aloud as she heard a crunch beneath her foot, she initially thought she had stepped on a bug, she lifted up her foot and saw the blood, "Oops," she remarked innocently.

Then, as she put her foot down, Tori began putting 2 and 2 together in her head. She vaguely recalled Robbie talking about a shrink ray, though she hadn’t quite remembered whether it was one of his puppet shows or an actual project.

“Guys?” She asked, crouching low to the ground and looking around, she felt silly, but she didn’t want to step on anyone else.

Slowly, but surely Robbie, Beck, and Andre crept towards Tori as she knelt down in search of them. The trio had seen what happened to Sinjin, and were fearful to approach at first. Slowly but surely they moved towards their giantess friend. Little did they know, Sinjin's squishing would soon be forgotten when their own torment began. Tori looked between the three boys in utter disbelief, quickly forgetting about the fourth among them currently smashed beneath her boot. Her disbelief was interrupted by the buzzing of her phone as a text came in. She quickly pulled out the phone and read the incoming message, her eyes lighting up like the screen.

“Sorry guys, I don’t have time to chat right now, so you’re coming with me,” Tori explained as she snatched up all the boys one by one. “That was a text from…” She explained as she deposited the boys in a safe place and headed out.

Choice 2: “…a talent agency” (Tori is auditioning for an action-spy movie and must do the audition in costume. Unfortunately she decided to keep Andre in her panties and Robbie and Beck in her bra cups, where they stay for the audition.)

For these reasons she was working extra hard to not only memorize her lines, but the actions of her character throughout the entirety of the play perfectly. She had almost reached her goal and was about to leave Hollywood arts when something unexpected happened.

Tori gagged and clutched her stomach, thinking something she had eaten was about to make a second appearance, perhaps the Sushi she had enjoyed for lunch at Nozu’s, or the cupcakes Cat had made for her.

Strangely however, she didn’t throw up, instead she became very dizzy all of a sudden, deciding to take a seat in a nearby metal folding chair she had set up for her seen. Tori extended her hand out away from her body to feel for the chair, that was before she found it literally hitting her in the face.

“Oww! What the heck?” Tori yelled, shocked by the sudden rush of pain to her face as her body fell back onto the floor. Looking up though she saw that she had nobody to blame but herself as only the singular metal chair she had set up was standing above her.

“Wait, I don’t remember that chair being so tall.” Tori said to herself as she rose back up to her feet to discover that the chair was standing at a height that rivaled her own. At first she assumed that someone was simply playing a trick on her, that was until the chair suddenly double in height right before her eyes.

“Okay! That did not just happen!” Tori yelled, trying to convince herself that she wasn’t going crazy and that the chair in front of her was not growing in size. However a quick look around the room revealed that she was right, the chair was not growing in size, she was somehow shrinking.

“Whoa!” Tori sounded out as the chair grew again from her perspective, making it four times taller than her now.

“Whoa!” she shrunk again, wondering how small she would become before this nightmare ended, the metal chair now about forty feet tall compared to her.

“Whoa!” once again Tori shrunk in size, now one sixteenth the size of something she was easily able to sit one before.

“Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh! ” she shrieked, as she entered the final stages of her shrinking process, getting smaller and smaller in three short bursts until the metallic chair towered above her like a large building. This left Tori at what she could only assume was an inch tall, based off her surroundings and the size of the room, at the very least it appeared to her that she had stopped shrinking.

Before Tori could make her next move and begin her search for someone to help her get back to normal, __________ opened the door to the room she had been practicing in.
