Overwhelmed by a sudden increase in pressure from behind, shoving her face-first into Cat's breast as it stretched out around her before the mountainous tit was checked by the constraints of Cat's bra, causing it to push back until Tori was thoroughly entombed.

What Tori failed to realize was that Cat was Merely laying down across the tiled floor to examine Jade close up. Forgetting all about Tori at the moment, now that she had a much tinier pet to toy with. Jade wasn't even half Tori's size now, Cat could see that she was waving her arms in the air, but couldn't make out what she was trying to say. Only able to make out strained squeaks.

How should Cat handle Jade?

1. Have Tori translate for her, picking Jade up and dropping her into the same bra cup as Tori.

14133122.title: Micro Classmate Recovery

141332.content:
Jade West was furious.

In other breaking news, Superman was weakened by Kryptonite.

In the matter of Jade's "problem", her current inferno of rage was due to, what else, her losing out on the lead role to Tori. She could understand losing out one or two roles but it seemed that everytime she and Tori competed she lost out to the Latina. Well this wasn't going to stand for much longer, this time, Jade was going right to the top to complain about this.

"Sikowitz!" She screamed as she barged into the man's office.

"Oh lord." He muttered as he turned around. "What is it Jade?" He asked with a very fake smile.

"Why did you give Tori the lead role in the play?" She demanded.

"Her audition was better than yours." He said simply as he took out a coconut.

"How so?" She challenged.

"Well she did a flawless British accent, her body language was polite but powerful, and she actually read the right lines." He answered sticking a straw in the fruit. "You did a racist Cockney accent, your stance was aggressive and you didn't even read from the right script. We're doing Evita and you read lines from South Park!"

"Oh so it's favouritism is it?"

Sikowitz rolled his eyes. The smug sense of entitledness was astounding. Just astounding.

"Jade normally I would say that you're a closeted lesbian and your anger at Tori is you trying to work through your feelings for her. After all, your scissor obsession has led to many a theory on the matter." He gave a heavy sigh. "But now, I have to cut right to the heart of it all. You suck."

"WHAT!?" She screamed.

"You heard. The only reason you got all the roles before Tori arrived is that you scared everyone away. The only reason she gets all the leads now is because they're still scared. I have no choice but to cast her. You can't act, you can't dance, and your plays read like a five year old wrote them."

"I have more talent in my pinky toe than Vega has in her entire body." Jade seethed.

"No you really don't." He glared back. "But if you don't like competing with Tori, then why didn't you just transfer to another class? Or just audition for another role?"

Jade fumed as she tried to think up a response. "If my height represented my talent, I'd be two stories tall. I'll get you and Vega." She swore as she stormed out.

"Hmm. There's an idea." Sikowitz smiled as he brought out a crystal ball. "Oh Crystal Ball, show me Tori Vega's height if it reflected her level of talent."

Within the ball, a massive foot stamped down, a city block cracking under its immeasurable weight. "Hmmm. 3,000 foot Tori. Might be slight overkill to prove a point. To say nothing of all the erections. Alright. Show me Jade West's height if it reflected her level of talent." When Sikowitz saw it he laughed. Oh this would cut that spoiled brat down to size.

Meanwhile, Jade had made her way into the hallway and was heading for Tori's locker. She wasn't quite sure what she'd do but it would come to her.

"Ah there it is." She seethed ripping off a pair of scissors off her locker. She paused for a moment as the scissors seemed a bit bigger than usual, and her bag felt a bit heavier, before she shrugged it off.

She couldn't have taken more than two steps before the scissors fell from her hand, suddenly too big to hold. "What the hell?" She demanded before her heavy bookbag dragged her to the floor. "Ok what the fuck is-" She stopped as she saw the ceiling get further and further away from her.

"What? What? WHAT!?" She screamed as everything continued to get bigger and bigger. "This is insane I cannot be shrinking!" Jade shrieked as her shrinking entered its final stages and in five quick bursts, she found herself an inch tall.

And unfortunately, her scissors hadn't shrunk with her, depriving her of a weapon.

Before Jade could decide what to do, she was nearly deafened by the bell going off followed by her heart dropping as she heard her fellow students exit their classrooms and head for the main hallway where she'd had the misfortune of shrinking.

What happens next?

1) Dodging giant feet, Jade pins herself against the wall near Tori's locker, leaving her to swallow her pride and wave down the gigantic Latina for help.

2) As Jade tries to run, she's spotted by Cat who needs a model for her costume design course.
141332.title: A Little Bit of Talent

1413321.content:
With all the athleticism that she could muster (which to be honest was not much), Jade West scrambled for the side of the hallway.

Of course, this was easier said than done as she was quickly knocked off her feet by all the tremors of massive footsteps, converging on her like a herd.

Jade's first obstacle was a massive boot, the wind disturbance wiping up her hair. Looking up, Jade recognized Meredith, the girl that had tried to "steal" Beck from her two years prior. "Watch where you're going you gank!" Jade screamed, only for her voice to be drowned out by the myriad of conversations.

Shaking her head, Jade continued to try and reach the wall only for a shoe to slam into her, sending her flying forward, landing by a pair of gigantic Converse.

Catching her breath, Jade felt her draw drop and her pale skin drain of what little colour it had as she looked up.

Towering above her, like the goddess of the goddesses, was Tori Vega. But not the Tori Vega she saw every day. This was the Tori that haunted her nightmares. Indescribably powerful, capable of readily overwhelming Jade, and beauty beyond compare.

"You know I bet she still weighs less than you." A voice cut into her musings.

Turning her head, Jade saw Sikowitz, only just taller than her, leaning against the wall. "Hello." He waved. "Now yes, I did shrink you. This is just a projection so don't bother attacking it."

"Why the fuck did you shrink me!?" Jade demanded.

"To teach you a lesson." He waved off. "Now I'll make you a deal. If you can get Tori's attention, tell her that she's the bigger woman, and mean it... you'll get your size back."

"And if I don't?"

"You'll stay this size forever and very likely get stepped on." Sikowitz said in a tone that suggested he was very interested in this scenario. "Now before I go, keep in mind that I might have been lying about the whole "get your size back" part." He smiled before the projection vanished.

Before Jade could even process this, she felt the titanic Latina begin to move causing the goth to grab onto the left Converse for dear life.

Holding on was both the hardest and the most embarrassing thing Jade had ever had to do but it paid off within two minutes when Tori sat down in a classroom. With monumental effort, Jade hoisted herself upwards and onto the frayed blue surface of the shoe as she caught her breath.

Listening to her friends' conversation, Jade began to plot revenge as none of them even questioned where she was before the teacher called the class to order.

Jade rolled her eyes and contended herself to lie down on Tori's shoe. There was no way she could get the Latina's attention now. So she might as well get some rest in.

Staring at the bottom of the desk, Jade soon lost track of time before she was suddenly jostled back to awareness as Tori's foot began to tap, likely a sign that the boring lecture had caused Tori to also lose track of time. Of course Jade had no way of knowing that Tori's foot had fallen asleep and she was trying to wake it up.

But being thrown around like a leaf in a storm, these things meant nothing to Jade as she scrambled for the tongue of Tori's shoe, relatively safe from all the quakes.

Using one of the massive laces as a grappling line, Jade managed to reach the top before Tori lifted her whole foot up and slammed it down several times, trying to get some life back into it.

How do the quakes affect Jade?

1) Jade falls backwards into the shoe, ending up beneath the arch of Tori's foot. Safe from the stomping but unable to touch Tori and get her attention.

2) Jade falls forwards and onto the floor. Just as she gets her bearings, Tori's foot begins to descend once again.
1413321.title: The Bigger Woman

14133211.content:
Jade gave a frightened squeak as she fell backwards, slamming into Tori's indestructible skin, stuck on the sock. With a growl, the goth tried to move only to be caught up in another of Tori's massive quakes, tumbling further down into the shoe and into the dark abyss, bouncing off the fabric and back towards the foot.

Jade wasn't quite sure how long she sat there waiting for the end but she soon realized that she was still alive. Recalling some of the health classes she spent eyeing Tori's butt (okay... maybe Sikowitz had a point about her lesbian tendencies), Jade guessed that she'd found herself under the arch of Tori's foot, a theory that was confirmed a second later when she felt the ground lift up and slam back down, the foot never even touching her.

"But this means I can't touch her." Jade realized as she sat down beneath the arch. "So do I wait here and move when I know it's safer or try something now? I don't even know how far the arch extends."

Before Jade could decide she felt her whole world tilt as Tori fought off the last of her foot's fatigue floating upwards and backwards towards the foot before the limb stabilized, its owner finally content with how it felt.

"Maybe I'll just stay here." Jade mused, unaware of how true that statement was. It was only a second later that Jade realized that she was not on the Converse's sole but on the sock. "What the-?" Jade said aloud before she tried to move only to receive a shock that kept her in place. "Ok that did not just happen." The goth complained as she tried to move again only to be met with the same result.

"Static electricity." Jade realized as she futilely thrashed about but remained stuck. On the plus side, now there definitely was no chance of being stepped on. On the downside, this was by far the most humiliating experience of her life. Stuck beneath the foot of the girl she regarded as the biggest threat to her future stardom.

She was really trying not to see this as a metaphor.

In perhaps the sole (XD) stroke of good luck for Jade, she'd managed to wind up trapped during last period. All she had to do was wait for a little while and Tori would see her. And that's what the goth did, simply contended herself to plan revenge on her friends, her ex-boyfriend in particular, for not questioning her whereabouts while the hour ticked by.

As the bell rang and Tori moved away, Jade's thoughts drifted away from shoving Rex up one of Robbie's orifices to why Tori was wearing such a soft, static vulnerable sock before her heart dropped when a muffled version of Cat's signature squeal reached her ears.

This was Friday. When Tori and Cat did their Funny Nugget Show. Two gigantic sleep deprived girls and her little one inch body. She could already picture herself being squeezed into their vaginas.

"I hope Tori's rabbit eats me." Jade cursed, even as she knew she'd never get anywhere near the animal.

1) Jade remains firmly stuck on Tori's sock until she and Cat perform The Funny Nugget Show being noticed and ending up at the whims of her gigantic girly-girl friends.

2) As Tori enters, she scratches an itch through her sock, the motion freeing Jade but leaving her trapped in the shoe. While Jade initially rejoices at being freed and makes plans to climb out, she soon gets a personal reminder of Trina's habit of stealing borrowing Tori's clothing, including her shoes.
14133211.title: Arch de Tori

14133212.content:
As much as Jade tried however, she was unable to keep her footing on the shoe as the quakes continued to build in intensity. With a scream, she lost her grip and tumbled down towards the floor, futilely clawing at the blue fabric before she landed on the floor.

"I'm okay?" Jade gasped as she felt herself over for any injuries, "I'm okay! It's a miracle! It's-" Jade trailed off as her tiny world was overwhelmed by a gigantic shadow, looking up to see Tori's left foot rising above her, ready to drop down at any second.

"No." Jade paled, her voice barely above a whisper as she stared at the faded sole. "No not like this. Please dear god, anything but this." This was all her worse nightmares made manifest, a scenario custom designed to break her ego.

"It can't end like this!" Jade screamed, as she scrambled to escape the shadow only to trip and fall flat on her face. Looking over her shoulder, Jade's face fell once again. All her efforts to become a star, the energy she dedicated to making sure no one else performed, the failed attempts to defeat Tori, her massive "Watch Later" Netflix list. It all ended like this? "No. No. Sikowitz! I know you can hear me. Please you can't just let me-"

If it's any consolation, it happened so fast that Jade felt nothing as she flattened into an unrecognizable pile of organic matter.

Watching from his office, Sikowitz decided that, given the bloody outcome, the best thing to do was to forget any of this had happened and just watch Family Guy. And that's exactly what he did. It was the Y2K episode. He had fun.

As for the rest of Hollywood Arts, Jade's absence was noted but hardly mourned. Without the looming shadow of Jade hanging over everyone's head, more students found the confidence to express themselves and develop their talents, free of fearing a Gothic lunatic attacking them for having skills.

While a police search was briefly considered, Jade's father convinced the LAPD to not bother with that. Nonetheless, the irate Goth's body would eventually, and unknowingly, be found. A month later, while trapped indoors during a particularly rainy day, Tori, having beaten all her video games, decided to clean her shoes and noticed an odd stain on them.

"Meh." The Latina shrugged before she rubbed the soap on it, wiping her one-sided rival off the face of the Earth.

As Jade had reflected in the moments before her demise. It really had been a most appropriate metaphor of all her worst nightmares.

James Diamond was alone in apartment 2J one day playing video games on their flat screen TV when he suddenly heard a knock on the door, rushing to answer it in the hopes that it was the product he had been waiting for.

"Hello, I'm looking for a James Diamond." a rather cute delivery girl smiled, holding a package nearly as big as a shoe box in front of her chest. She looked rather nervous as she placed a clipboard on top of the box, giving James the impression that she hadn't had her job for very long.

"Well it must be your lucky day, here I am." he announced, leaning up against the wall in the hopes that he could use his charm to ask her out.

"Great, can I get your signature here?" She asked, handing James a pen.

"Only if you give me your phone number here?" James replied, almost immediately taking a piece of scrap paper from his back pocket and handing it to her. He always kept a piece of paper on his person for situations just like this, flashing a smile as she looked up at him.

"Sure, you're pretty cute." the young girl admitted, trying not to seem to eager as she scribbled down a number (555-7849) and her name on top as 'Sally'. Meanwhile James signed his name and took the box from the blonde delivery girl and placing it a counter nearby.

"So what did you order?" She asked, handing him the slip of paper with her name and number on it.

"Oh, just the new Cuda man spray. they haven't even started selling it in LA yet so I had it delivered overnight from the factory." James admitted, showing his addiction to follow the latest trend and focus on his looks.

Sally looked at him concerned "Be careful with that stuff. I've heard it has a lot of weird side effects, their always different for each can so you never know what might happen." giving James her fare warning before walking away.

"Please, I can deal with a little itchy skin or whatever side effects this might have." James smiled, as he closed the door and opened his box.

James then took the spray and walked to the center of the room, holding his finger down on the nozzle as he spray his arms and legs. He considered taking a stroll passed The Palm Woods pool at one point before, maybe get some more girls numbers for a multitude of dates down the line.

Next thing he knew as he was spraying near his neck James accidentally inhaled the product through his nose, forcing him to cough for a few moments as he walked around the room searching for something to support his weight. He quickly dropped the can and before he even knew was was going on passed out as a result of a chemical reaction.

---30 minutes later---

A half hour passed before James finally regained consciousness, waking up to unfamiliar surroundings as he rubbed his eyes. When he reopened them he realized what had happened, the delivery girl's prediction had come true. The side effect of the can he ordered had shrunk him.

Worse it that he was standing__________.

1. On top of the exit to the swirly slide, just as Katie enters the apartment to play.

2. In the middle of the floor while Mrs. Knight walks around doing some cleaning.

3. Near the exit, crawling underneath the door and into the hallway to find someone who can help him.

The gigantic tween girl turned the corner to walk towards the swirly slide, her sandal clad feet causing immense quakes for the shrunken pop star in her path with each step they took forward. The shadow of her foot eclipsed his shrunken body, her toes landing inches behind him with a resounding *thud* sound.

This altercation with Katie's feet knocked James onto him back inside the entrance to the swirly slide, but before he could get up to run away Katie grabbed onto the bar located above the swirly slide and swung her legs over James. The shrunken boy panicked, unable to move or speak as he found his vision blocked entirely by the thirteen year old's large butt.

Against his better judgement James obeyed his instincts, which told him to stay still or else he'd become nothing more than a noticeable red stain on Katie's white pants. Making him wonder how he was possibly still alive after becoming the seat of a fifty foot wide ass, each cheek surrounding him bigger than a tour bus in size. Katie's body hit the turn going down the swirly slide, her ass conforming the fit the slide's natural curves, plumbing James from all angles as she approached the exit. Katie clenched her cheeks as she saw the exit before her, unknowingly wrapping James between her jean clad ass-cheeks.

She chocked it up to being a figment of her imagination before she_____________.

143331.content:
"Finally I've done it! The prank to end all pranks!" Logan exclaimed, overflowing with excitement as he looked upon the shrunken chair that had resulted from his newest creation, the shrink ray. "This year, not only will I not prank myself out, I'll be the King of Pranks!"

Just as he said this, Kendall, James, and Carlos burst into the room, slamming the door shut behind them as they did so.

"Phew I think we lost her." James said, relieved to be able to catch his breath.

"Logan, are you done with your 'Ultimate Prank' yet? Katie has been chasing around with marshmallow guns and we have no way of fighting back!" Kendall said, still leaning on the door to prevent them from bursting in. He was determined not to lose to the girls team (consisting of Katie, Jo, Lucy, and Camille) at his own game.

"Yes it's all finished." Logan said, beaming with pride.

"So how's it work?" Carlos asked.

"It's simple." Logan said, walking over to the door where his three band-mates were standing. "All you have to do is wait for the girls to be standing right where we are standing then push the red button on the console."

"You mean this one?" Carlos asked, pressing the button he was pointing to on the mounted shrink ray.

"NO!" Logan yelled, but it was too late. The shrink ray blasted the four band-mates, leaving them bug sized on the floor of their apartment.

"YOU BUILT A SHRINK RAY?" tiny Kendall yelled at the equally tiny Logan. "WHY DIDN'T YOU BUILD LIKE A PIE CANNON?"

"That's so cliche... This prank will put us in the history books!" Logan replied.

"Can that thing even grow us back?" James asked.

"Of course it can!" Logan replied. "We're going to need someone to push the button though.

Right on cue, Katie burst through the door, marshmallow gun in hand. To the tiny band standing at her bare feet, she looked more like the Statue of Liberty.

"I don't care if we end up in the history books" James said "I just don't wanna end up a stain on a 13 year old girl's foot!"

The shrunken boys took off running, not wanting to be crushed on Katie's first step into the apartment. However, Katie wasn't moving. Her eyes were darting around the room, gun drawn, searching for some sign of her brother and his friends.

"Where are those guys....." Katie mumbled, lowering her guard a little at the apparently empty room, but keeping her gun drawn, especially considering the strange device in the middle of the room. That is, until her eyes caught sight of the four little people sprinting towards that device.

"No way..." Katie said, finally dropping her guard. "Kendall? James? Is that you guys?"

Upon hearing their names, the boys stopped in their tracks and turned around to face the titanic tween. Relief washed over them as they realized they wouldn't have to worry about being mistaken for bugs.

Dropping her gun and getting down on her hands and knees, her head hung over the shrunken band as she stared down at them in disbelief. "What happened to you guys?"

Unfortunately, Carlos answered her question "Logan built a shrink ray to shrink you guys for the prank war, but we accidentally used it on ourselves!"

"CARLOS!" all three other boys yelled in unison, clearly used to being mad at their less intelligent friend.

"Oh, so you guys planned on shrinking me and the girls huh? Interesting..." Katie said, clearly annoyed.

"Katie, we really need you to help grow us back." Kendall said, hoping she wouldn't care too much about Carlos's comment.

"Slow down now little bro... It sounds like you guys were plenty willing to shrink us girls. I don't think you guys realize just how dangerous being shrunken is. Maybe I should show you..." Katie said, deep in thought.

"Now Katie, you need to grow us back right now!" Kendall demanded.

"I don't think you're in any position to make demands little brother. I'm in charge now, and you guys are gonna..."

14333232.content:
All seemed to be calm at the Palmwoods one Saturday morning, Lucy Stone leaving her room to head for her daily recording session.

Walking down the halls she found herself thinking "Wow, things sure are quiet around here with the guys on tour.". Although it wasn't a bad change of pace, she rather enjoyed herself these past few days.

Besides, it wasn't like they'd be gone for long. James had texted her last night saying that they'd be back by Tuesday night, Wednesday morning the latest.

She stopped at the elevator, pressing the button and waiting several moments for the *ding* that followed, walking into the metal box as the doors closed behind her.

Lucy couldn't very well explain why but for some reason or another she felt off, normally when she got into the elevator it had at least two or three people already inside. But for some reason it was completely empty.

She choose to ignore this observation since she did live on the one of the upper floors, it was very likely that the elevator would stop to pick up more passengers before she hit the lobby.

She pressed the button for the lobby, setting the elevator in motion. The sound of light music heard behind her, not at all appealing to her taste for rock music.

However this music quickly stopped, accompanied by the flickering of the lights. The elevator stopped completely between floors and Lucy realised she was in trouble.

She could feel a strange weight placed on her body, as if the elevator was going up at a hundred mile per hour. She knew that this was an impossibility, but that didn't help ease her discomfort that something really bad was about to happen.

Between flashes of light before her Lucy would focus her gaze upward, feeling as if they were somehow getting further each time they turned back on.

A few moments passed before the lights turned back on completely, revealing something horrific to Lucy. That she had somehow been shrunk inside of the elevator while it was stopped. Four impossibly large walls were all that stood between Lucy and the outside world, she knew she'd need help from somebody to get her back to normal. Maybe Camile could be of some assistance, with er on again of again relationship with Logan. She'd be the most likely to know if he'd ever invented a growth ray or something that could help her get back to her normal size.

Then, before she knew it the elevator started back up. Heading towards a predetermined floor, meaning that someone had called the elevator. Within seconds she got her answer as to who pressed the button to board as the towering metal doors split to reveal an impossibly large________standing on the other side.

Season 2- Drake: Age 16, Megan: Age 11, Wendy: Age 10, Mindy: Age 16, Josh: Age 16

Drake was hanging out in his room, practicing his guitar skills while drinking Dr. Fizz and watching TRL music videos on MTV.

Occasionally he would place his guitar on the couch next to him to write down note to a song he was working on for his band.

Speaking of which his number one fan Wendy was about to walk into the room with his younger sister Megan.

The two girls each had a box of Campfire Troop cookies to sell, Megan dropping her’s on the table in front of Drake.

“Hey Boob, do us a favor and buy all our campfire cookies.” Megan ordered, expecting Drake to understand to disobeying him would certainly lead to reprisal.

“And, why should I? I’m busy writing a song here.” Drake said sarcastically, wondering why he should be the one to buy all their cookies.

“You do write great songs Drake.” Wendy smiled, obviously still crushing on Drake since he sang to her instead of going on the radio.

“Listen Boob, you do this and I get a new flat screen TV.” Megan said, Thinking Drake might want to help her.

“Fine, I’ll help if we get to put it in our room.” Drake said.

“No way dufus!” Megan responded, angrily stomping out of the room with Wendy following close behind her.

“Bye, Drake my mom’s almost here to pick me up but I’ll see you again soon.” Wendy said.

“Jeez, who got under her skin?” a familiar female voice said, referring to Megan’s attitude.

Drake turned to see Mindy Crenshaw who Mrs. Hayfer had paired her and Josh up for a school project.

Josh who had been quietly doing homework on his bed till now began talking to Mindy, discussing the terms of their assignment.

Drake couldn't understand a lot of the technical terms but it was obvious to him that neither of them was happy that they were partners.

Of course this was to be expected since Mrs. Hayfer was their teacher, a woman who Drake was sure feed of hate and misery.

Inevitably the two began to argue about who was right, or rather who's way was better. Even if the past proved that it was most likely Mindy.

"Whatever, I have to go The Premiere." Josh said, grabbing the keys to the car and exiting the room.

Josh then exited the room, only to be quickly followed by Mindy. Drake sighed, happy to finally be left alone with his guitar.

The young musician then took a sip of his Dr. Fizz and went back to writing music, although after jotting down a few notes he felt strange.

"What's going on?" Drake asked himself, watching as the whole room and his guitar began to grow at an alarming rate.

In a matter of seconds he was only an inch tall on the couch, his guitar alone was now bigger than he remembered their house being.

Who was responsible for this?

Could it have been Megan enacting her revenge so suddenly, his number one fan Wendy or even Mindy who had always disliked him?

Megan felt herself drop the extra inch as suddenly the wooden chair burst into pieces under her full weight, although she still considered her test a success believing that if a wooden chair had been made hard enough to nearly withstand her weight than a person would surely survive.

Later on in the day Josh awoke on a large soft surface having just took the best nap he had every taken only to have his good mood ruined as he looked around to realize that he was no longer on the couch.

“No she went out for a walk so you can let yourself out there(pointing at the door), I’ll be in my lair.” opening the hatch that lead to his bedroom/lair behind the couch.

“Oh and if you see someone with a package on your way out, sign for me.” jumping down the slide, allowing the hatch to close behind him.

Link was just about to leave the Thunderman household when he heard a knock on the door, opening it up to see a delivery man on the other side.

“Evilbay deliver for Max Thunderman.” No doubt buying any other evil invention to use in his future plans to take over the world

“Um, I’ll sign for him.” Link said, taking the package and placing it on the coffee table before curiosity got the better of him.

Link sat down on the couch and opened up the box gently, using his elasticity to open peel the tape without ripping it.

The future stretchy superhero looked around to make sure nobody saw him, especially not Max as he opened the box and looked inside.

It was the shrinking gun that once belonged to a super villain named Professor Atom, a nearly undetectable superhuman who was never physically caught.

“Wow, how on earth did he get this?” hearing about the things Professor Atom did with the device in the past such as shrinking Landmarks and City Hall.

While he was holding the device a loose fuse resulted in him receiving a harsh electric shock, before he heard a noise off in the distance.

He knew it would look suspicious if anyone saw him with the shrinking gun, so he decided it was best to put it back in the box and leave before something went wrong.

Unfortunately he was one step to late to stop the unforeseen consequences of his actions, taking a seat on the couch as he watched the room spin in circles around him.

It then became clear to him what was happening, his body had been affected by the device and it was causing him to shrink in size.

Before he could react further his body began to shrinking at an increasingly alarming height, shaving a foot off his height with every second that passed.

It wasn't long until he was only an inch tall in height, falling onto the soft sofa cushion below him as if it were the worlds largest mattress.

"Great, now what am I gonna do. I'm puny, and if Phoebe see's me like this she's gonna know I touched the device." Link panicked, hearing another noise in the distance like he heard before.

Someone was coming into the living room but who, and from where?

1. Phoebe Thunderman- walks in through the front door and towards the couch, looking forward to taking her shoes off after a long walk and relaxing on the couch.

2. Nora Thunderman- coming downstairs from her room and manages to spot Link just before sitting down on him, deciding that he'd be helpful for her in eliminating her own boredom.

3. Chloe Thunderman- Walking into the house from the backyard after playing with Billy and Nora for the last hour while Max was suppose to be watching them.

14523.content:
It was a seemingly normal day in Swellview, California where we find Henry Hart about to bury an extremely dangerous device.

A shrink ray that would reduce the size of any object living or not to near microscopic sizes, the only drawback was that the effects were irreversible.

This made both Henry and Captain Man very happy that they never brought the device up to human testing, knowing they would have been small forever if they had.

Due to this defect Captain Man instructed Henry to bring the gun to a secure location and bury it somewhere that nobody could find it.

He was all set to bury it when he heard the voice of his best friend Jasper Dunlop, throwing the shrinking gun into the bushes to hide it.

The last thing he wanted was for someone who was as irresponsible as Jasper to find this device, thinking he might accidentally shrink them both.

Images of his younger sister Piper playing with them like living dolls filled his head, making him even more determined to hide the device.

“Oh hey Jasper. What’s up?” Henry asked, not fully hearing what Jasper had said upon walking into the backyard with all the other thoughts filling his head.

“I asked if you wanted to go bowling later tonight.” Jasper said, repeating himself before he noticed Henry's watch beep.

“Oh snap, I gotta go help Cap… I mean, I have to put in a few hours at my job.” Henry lied, after reading an urgent message from Captain Man.

The blonde teen ran out of the backyard without explaining any further, leaving Jasper alone with the shrink ray still hidden in the bushes.

Soon Jasper noticed it as a glint of light coming from the bushes and decided to investigate further, pulling the strange gun like device up to examine it closer.

“What is this thing, some kind of toy?” Jasper thought aloud, thinking it might have belonged to Piper.

“Weird, does it use foam bullets or…” he continued, pointing it at himself as he tried to open the magazine. Accidentally hitting the trigger and firing it directly into his stomach.

“OW! What was that?” He asked, tossing the gun like device back into the bushes before he noticed something even more strange was happening.

Henry’s house, backyard, and everything in it was growing, the ground was getting closer by the second. He was beginning to shrink.

“Whoa, this is so not cool. I’m shrinking!” He yelled, watching as everything around him shot up to unparalleled heights. Soon he had even shrunk to a size smaller than the blades of grass surrounding him, leaving him into the world’s smallest jungle.

“Wow, Henry's family really needs to do some landscaping.” Jasper thought aloud before feeling thunderous quakes occurring one after another.

The shrunken thirteen year old boy looked up, hoping to discover the cause of these tremors. Surprised to see a massive ________ walking towards him.

Who will shrink?

1511.title: Sofia The First

15111.content:
Prince James was the young heir to the kingdom of Enchancia, although he would commonly display behavior not expected of a royal family member unlike his twin sister amber who would confirm to what was exactly expected of her. James though acted much more like his step sister Sofia a new in-line for the throne and addition to the royal family after her mother, now Queen marked the King.

James was out in the courtyard of the castle enjoying a beautiful day when suddenly a ray of light shined down on him from the sky and made him feel strange as a result. Of course many things in this kingdom seemed magical and while many of the strange occurrences had become retinue this was something different in its own right as the ray of light began to shrink Prince James in size.

Prince James looked around quickly to see that there was nobody else around to see him shrink, and thus he stood there shrinking and calling out for help without anyone coming to his aid. Shortly after he stopped shrinking James looked towards the castle gate to see that ________ was just making her way into the courtyard not knowing that James had shrunk.
15111.title: Prince James

151111.content:
Sofia- http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20131...

James looked up towards the castle gate so see that it had opened specifically to let in the newest 8-year old princess of Enchancia and his step-sister Sofia into the courtyard as she began skipping in his direction. Her feet struck the ground with the extreme force each time they hit the ground while she approached James who had started waving his arms in the hopes of getting her attention.

Luckily for James the kind hearted young girl noticed all creatures smaller than herself and saw that some bug sized creature was at risk of being crushed under her flats. Naturally she came to a quick stop one step away from crushing James under the bottom of her royal flat, then she proceeded to get down on her knees to examine the bug sized creature more closely.

James looked up at Sofia as the approximately 175 foot tall princess came down closer to his level "No way, is that James?" she asked surprised to see her step-brother so tiny. "What happened to you?" Sofia asked scooping James up in her palm and bringing him under the gaze of her large blue eyes, she couldn't help but to smile however given how cute he looked at this size reminding her of a doll.

"I don't know I just came out here to play and there was a ray of light, and I need you to bring me to mom and dad so we can fix this." James said flustered to Sofia as he tried to explain as clearly as possible. "But mom and dad left this morning to go to another kingdom for the week." Sofia said sad that she could help James for the time being.

"Oh no so you mean I'll be this small for the next week." James said worried as the situation got increasingly worse. "Don't worry I'll be here making sure you're safe till then, In the meantime lets play I don't mind that your so tiny." Sofia said with a giggle deciding that James could be fun to play with at this size since they could possibly play games that she couldn't play with a normal sized person.

"So what did you have in mind?" James said asking a question he would soon come to regret when he discovers how hard it can be to play a game with the giantess princess. "Well I was hoping we could start out by playing some_____________." Sofia said decided the game her and her shrunken step brother would play.

1. Hop Scotch in the courtyard- Sofia allows James to go first and follows barefoot which leads to him being stuck to the bottom of Sofia's sole which she plays hoping across the drawn out squares.

2. Musical chairs rematch in her room- James beat Sofia the other day in a game of musical chairs and she wants to play another match(set of three games) to try and redeem her lose.
151111.title: Sofia The Giant

1511111.content:
"Are you sure playing hopscotch is such a good idea Sofia?" James asked wondering how he would be able to make it across large squares by taking it on jump at a time while he was only an inch tall. "Awe don't worry James, I'm sure you'll do just fine." Sofia smiled thinking her shrunken step brothers concern over a simple game cute as she started skipping towards the area she had drawn a hop scotch line on in the courtyard.

James soon found his body being flung through the air back and forth while Sofia waved her arms skipping across the courtyard, resulting in the shrunken boy becoming confused and disoriented when Sofia placed him back on the back in front of the first square. "Ok James you're up first." Sofia said getting on her knees and pushing him forward with the back of her fingers.

Sofia watched as James stepped onto the first square with a smile and then proceed to get herself ready to go down the line as well, standing up tall and pulling off her flat so she could hop across and back barefoot. The now barefoot princess positioned herself in front of the first square "Ok, here I go." she smile spreading her feet as she prepared to take the first leap onto the hop scotch line.

The young eight year old girl in the purple gown smiled as she jumped into the air over the first square, putting her feet together as her body came down towards the ground. James still a little dazed after being swung around by Sofia like a rag doll looked up quickly upon noticing a large shadow overcome him "Sofia wait, I'm still..." was all he could say before he pale foot made contact with his body forcing him to the hard ground.

Luckily for James Sofia had removed her flats and the grounds of the castle courtyard where smoother than normal rock, otherwise he would have been completely crushed Under Sofia's foot upon impact. Nevertheless the young girl continued playing neither noticing that she had stepped or feeling him trapped under her foot as she bent her knees and took another jump forward.

James quickly came to realize that Sofia's foot hadn't lifted off of him as she rocketed into the, this could mean only one thing "I'm stuck to Sofia's foot!" he yelled into her foot flesh as she spread her feet apart landing hard on the pavement once more. While painful, the initial shock of hitting the ground was absorbed by Sofia bending her knees as she prepared for the next jump giving James no time to escape her pale foot.

Sofia jumped into the air with a large smile spread across her face, she loved the feeling of playing hopscotch, her bare feet against the pavement, her hair flowing in the wind. However something about today just made it even better as she landed on the ground hard putting all of her weight on the foot James was trapped under.

James screamed out in pain but for some unknown reason didn't feel his bones cracking under the giantess princess naked foot. Was it possible that being shrunken down had made him immune to being crushed like a bug? Regardless of the case to whether on not he could be crushed, James was certain that he could still feel all the pain as if he was being crushed as Sofia pressed forward.

Sofia let loose a childish giggle as she sprung into the air positioning herself to land on the foot James was under once more as if she had completely forgotten that she had brought him here to play and allowed him to start playing first. Sofia landed on the last square and twisted her body around a full one hundred eighty degrees upon landing, grinding James into the ground as she turned.

Next she proceeded to continue hopping back to where she had started the game, splitting her feet to land on two separate Square sparring James from feeling the extreme pain of her full weight on him. Although his relief from the pain would be short lived as Sofia jumped to the next square almost instantly in the hopes of making the return trip faster than she did to the end of the hopscotch line.

James tried hard to remove himself from Sofia's sole before it came crashing back onto the pavement like a meteorite falling from space, pinning James under her foot once more with only two hopes till the end of the game. With quick rapid steps Sofia continued her game jumping hitting the floor, and springing back off the ground with every ounce over her body focused on her foot.

James finding himself underneath the ball of her foot when she land her heel raised clear off the ground, allowing her to finally feel James under her foot. As she walked off the last square remembering that James had been shrunk earlier Sofia checked the bottom of her foot with a concerned face hoping she had crushed James underfoot.

The young eight year old princess was happy to see that the tiny boy remained in one piece "I'm sorry James, I completely forgot to watch out for you because you were so tiny." smiling in the hopes that he would forgive her. Which of course he given the young girls immense size difference over him, not wanting her to leave him helpless to defend himself in the outside world or worse take her frustrations out on him.

"It's ok Sofia can we just play another game, one that doesn't involve your feet." peeling James from her sole with a gleaming smile, before bringing him close to her gigantic face. "Ok James and I know just the way to make it up to you lets go play___________, in my room."
1511111.title: Hopscotch Trample

choices: No(Sofia wins first round with James stuck to her dress)
1511112.content:
“I was really hoping that we could play musical chairs in my room.” Sofia smiled, the shrunken prince not liking the sound of her first game idea.

“Don’t you think I might be a bit small for musical chairs.” James said, trying to suggest that the game might be a bit dangerous for him.

“Not at all, I think your the perfect size. Besides I want a rematch for yesterday.” Sofia smiled, the young princess having lost to her step-brother yesterday when he pushed her off the chair.

“Can’t that wait till I’m big again?” James asked, knowing how slim his chances were of defeating the gigantic Sofia in the childish game.

After all he had never lost a single match against either Sofia or Amber, not even the two step-sisters together could beat James at normal size.

James shrinking was exactly the kind of edge Sofia needed if she wanted to turn the tables on him, knowing she could probably win relatively easy at her size.

“Awe it’s ok if you don’t think you can beat me we’ll play another game.” Sofia teased, knowing she could play of James weaknesses to get what she wanted.

“Oh, wait a minute Sofia. I’ll play one round with you.” James said, trying not to allow the size of his eight year old step-sister intimidate him.

“Perfect, let's go!” Sofia said excitedly, lowering James from under her blue eyes and swinging her arms back and forth as she skipped into the castle.

The young autumn haired princess climbed the circling stairs of the castle up to her room, closing the door behind her and placing James on a waist high table.

“Wait here for a minute.” Sofia leaned in and whispered, her breath alone nearly knocking James over.

The young shrunken boy watched as Sofia dragged a chair to the center of the room, the screeching sound nearly deafening his tiny ears.

Next she prepared music for their game, winding up a music box before placing it on her bed.

“Ok, let’s play!” Sofia called out, skipping towards James as music started to fill the room with a magical melody.

Sofia rushed her hand across the table, grabbing James between her nimble finger before whisking him up into the air.

The young princess placed James on the floor, forcing him to look up at the towering chair which stood nearly as tall as Sofia herself.

Sofia began walking around the chair in a circle leaving James behind, obviously he’d have to climb the chair to get to the seat.

James began heading towards front leg of the gigantic chair, watching as Sofia’s barefeet slapped the ground with each step she took.

It wasn’t long before Sofia had made a full circle around the chair and caught up with James on the floor, not paying any attention to him on the floor.

James kept running not expecting to find himself under the dark shadow cast by Sofia’s foot, watching as her sole fell towards him.

The shrunken prince lunged forward nearly escaping the ball of Sofia’s foot, unfortunately he was to late and found his body caught under the young princess’s toes.

As she carried on the young girl seemed to remain unaware that James had been stepped on, kicking him up into the air as her foot lifted up.

James was sent flying over the chair, landing on the soft surface of the cushion before the music came to a sudden abrupt halt.

A dark shadow appeared over James causing him to look up in a panic, although all he saw was a light shade of purple.

It didn’t take him long to realize that this large blanket of light purple was Sofia’s dress as her butt came down into her seat.

The young eight year old princess bounced off the seat hard, landing on the chair with a thud as it scraped across the floor.

Sofia laughed as her butt came to rest on the chair, thinking that she had one the first round against James while unknowingly sitting on him.

Although when she gets up will he still be there?
1511112.title: Musical Chairs
