*Downstairs In Perry The Platypus's Secret Lair*

"Agent P, thank goodness you've come. Dr. Doofinshmirtz has been using his shrink ray to shrink and collect monuments from all over the city, we need you to get over there and put a stop too it." Major Monogram said through the computer overlooking Perry's desk.

Meanwhile back upstairs Phineas inspected the blueprints Ferb left him as Perry flew his hovercraft out from the top of the tree in the backyard without anyone noticing.

♬Doofinshmirtz Evil Incorporated♬

“Finally the pieces to plan have come to fruition, with my Shrinkinator I will be able to shrink down all the landmarks in the Tri-State Area!” Dr. Doofinshmirtz laughed, while his daughter Vanessa entered the room.

“Hey dad.” The tall dark haired girl said indifferently, walking towards the couch while sending a text message to one of her friends about her dad’s lame plan.

“Wait Vanessa no, don’t sit down there!” Dr. Doofinshmirtz yelled from across the room, his teenage daughter turning her black leather clad ass over a lighthouse her dad had shrunk.

“What's that?” she asked, allowing her butt to fall towards the soft surface of the couch without realizing. The old building crumbling to dust as it was met by Vanessa’s large round bottom, of course the building was empty so she hadn’t hurt anybody.

"Ouch, what did I just sit on?" Vanessa asked herself, looking over her shoulder to see bricks the size of sand scattered around under her butt. She didn't know how to react, a building older than her had just been flattened as if it were nothing under her butt.

Suddenly the door broke down, falling before Dr. Doofinshmirtz to reveal an ordinary looking platypus standing like a human being.

"A platypus?" Doofinshmirtz asked counfused before he saw Perry dawn his signature detective hat "...Perry The Platypus!" he yelled surprised before starting a fight with his arch nemesis.

---after a few minutes---

"Gyurururururur." was the noise Perry made as he kicked Doofinshmirtz into the Shrinkinator, sending a beam of light to the place his inventions usually pointed towards, Phineas & Ferbs house.

Before Phineas knew what had hit him the beam struck him in the back and shrunk him down to no more than an inch tall in height, just below the height of the grass.

That's when ___________ walked into the yard.
15121.title: Shrinking In Summer

151211.content:
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/phin...

“Watcha doin, I was just... Huh?” Isabella said as she entered Phineas’s backyard, surprised to see that she was seemingly talking to herself due to the fact that the yard appeared to be completely empty. Meanwhile only a couple feet away from her purple sneakers her crush looked up at her in shock and awe as she burst through the gate moments after he had been shrunk.

“Hmm, that odd. I don’t remember plans to build a shrink ray on today’s agenda.” Phineas said aloud, pulling out a ‘to do list’ from his back pocket. On that list he saw only one item that needed to be done, building the world’s longest water slide across the entire tri-state area.

Had he been shrunk to extend the length of the ride even further? Or was it truly an accident that he was now this small? Isabella’s confused reaction to the yard being empty pointed to the second as a more likely scenario.

“Phineas, Phineas! Are you back here?” Isabella asked, her gigantic sneakers causing miniature earthquakes with each step she took towards the center of the yard. Stopping less than a foot from the tiny redhead, leaving him standing in the center of her shadow, totally eclipsed by the gigantic Fireside troop leader.

“That’s odd, I just saw Ferb leave so Phineas should still be around here somewhere. I was really hoping we could get some alone time before the others showed up.” Isabella said aloud, unaware that Phineas had heard everything she’d just said. Then again, he was pretty dense when it came to matters of the heart. It was doubtful that he’d understand why she’d want to be alone with him.

“Isabella, down here!” Phineas waved, hoping to get the young hispanic girl’s attention before she unknowingly stepped on him. Looking upward Phineas’s eyes met with Isabella’s plain white panties, hidden underneath the shadow cast by her purple dress.

This time she heard him speak, though it barely came across as a whisper in her ear from the ground between her feet. She looked down in confusion, wonder from which direction the squeaky voice originated, only to see a strange orange bug standing in front of her feet. ‘It couldn’t be’ she thought to herself, kneeling down to get a better view.

“Oh my gosh, Phineas! Is that really you?” Isabella asked, scooping up Phineas from the grassy surface in the blink of an eye. In mere moments the young boy found himself held equal to chest level with the young troop leader, her head held high above him as her dark blue eyes examined him.

Phineas breathed a sigh of relief, thankful for the fact that Isabella was able to spot him so quickly. However he was about to realize that she would not be as helpful as he’d originally hoped, as she opened her mouth once more to say “__________.”

1. “You’re too small to leave lying around, I’ll have to bring you with me to my Fireside Girls troop meeting.” Isabella drops Phineas into her clothing, somewhere that none of the other girls would be able to see him.

2. "You're even cuter at this size, I can't wait to take you back home with me." Isabella brings Phineas back to her home where she can toy with him and express her true feeling for him.
151211.title: Found By Isabella

1513.content: How about Gravity Falls, Kim Possible or ?
1513.title: Gravity Falls/Kim Possible?

15132.content: Who will shrink? How about we start of with Ron Stoppable or the main villain of the series Dr. Dracken?
15132.title: Kim Possible

151321.content:
Ron had been dealing with a lot lately between school, saving the world, and teenage romances between two beautiful girls.

On one hand Ron was interested in his best friend Kim Possible, a spunky redhead on the high school’s cheerleading team who also happens to save the world on a daily basis.

On the other hands Ron had been blissfully unaware of Yori’s crush on him, which Kim had made clear after the Japanese girl returned to her own country.

Ron had only went over Kim’s house today to focus on studying with the heroic redhead, hoping that she could help him pass his final exams.

Fighting evil was good for the world, but that didn’t exactly help the sixteen year old boy recieve high marks in his classes.

Unfortunately for Ron he was intercepted by the youngest members of the Possible family, Kim’s younger twin brothers Jim & Tim.

“Hey Ron, can we get your help real quick.” called Jim’s voice from across the yard, or was it Tim, he always had trouble telling them apart.

“What’s happening little dudes, just popped in to see KP.” walking across the yard, only to see Jim working on a strange looking device.

“Only our Instant Matter Mover.” Tim said excitedly, prompting his brother to help form an explanation for Ron.

“Or we could just call it a teleporter, you know after we test it that is.” Jim said, giving the reason for why he called Ron over to them.

“Wait, you want me to be the one who tests it for you.” Ron said, pointing to himself after getting a signal from one of the young boys.

“Yea, come on it will be fun. We’ll do it one, two, then teleport you inside to Kim.” Tim followed, trying to make this an easy decision for Ron to make.

“Sure, no problem little dudes.” Ron laughed, giving his verbal approval to partake in the young boys experiment.

The boys then hooked their equipment to Ron and turning it on, soon after Ron began to feel funny as he was move from one location to the next molecule by molecule.

The next thing he knew he was waking up on top of a large unfamiliar surface, it wasn’t concrete, grass, or even carpet.

Instead Ron found himself______________.

1. On top of a plate, piled high with Spaghetti and meatballs that Kim Possible herself is about to eat. Referenced to this > http://jackurai.deviantart.com/art/Ron-C...

2. Sitting on the wooded floor of Yori’s dojo just before she begins her fighting exercises, not focused on any bugs that might be dodging her titanic footfalls.

3. Standing on top of a chair in Bonnie’s room, just as she is about to unknowingly sit down of her high school rival’s best friend.
151321.title: Project Testing

choices: Star vs. The Forces of Evil
15133.content: What about Star vs. the Forces of Evil?
15133.title: Star vs. The Forces of Evil

151331.content:
Who will shrink?

Star's magic has always been a little chaotic and unpredictable, something Marco often had to bear witness to. Could Star's magic end up shrinking Marco?

Or maybe it's even worse, Marco isn't the only one whose had to deal with Star's strange magic, maybe his entire high school, save a few girls, gets shrunk down.
151331.title: Marco or Echo Creek

1513311.content:
It was a surprisingly quiet day in the Diaz household. Marco's parents were off on a second honeymoon, none of Ludo's monsters seemed interesting in attacking, and it was all driving Star crazy.

"Marco! I'm bored!" The Mewni princess winded as she pulled at her hair before flopping back on her bed.

Marco hadn't even been in Star's room when she complained to him. Her had just been walking by her door on his way to the kitchen. Lunch wasn't going to make itself after all.

"Never heard you say that before," Marco said as he leaned into her room.

"So bored!" Star lifted up her pillow and screamed into it.

"Don't see how you could be bored with magic?" Marco replied.

"Glosserick is using his vacation days, how am I supposed to find any cool magic in there?" Star said, pointing towards the dusty tome lying on the floor that almost dwarfed its owner.

"That guy has vacation days!?" Marco shouted in shock, more intrigued by that than the now familiar book of spells.

Star continued to groan into her pillow, before rolling over. She rolled an inch to far and fell to the floor with a crash. Marco cringed in response, but Star popped right back up, her hair now wrapped around her head like a scarf. She shook it back to normal.

"Why not just flip through it yourself?" Marco asked, it wouldn't be the first time she'd navigated it without the genie-esque glossary's help.

"Fine..." Star groaned as she fell to her knees in front of the book, she had honestly hoped Marco would give her something more entertaining to do than flip through pages of old, often pointless spells.

Marco shrugged and headed down to the kitchen for lunch, his work there was done. A few minutes later, Marco had a delicious looking sandwich in his hands. He was just about to take a bite when Star came scampering down the stairs.

"Marco, Marco, Marco! Come on! Come see! Found a spell!" She spoke quickly and excitedly.

Marco suddenly felt the magic-slinging princess grab hold of his hoodie and drag him away. His sandwich fell back on his plate before he could even get a bite. His stomach growled angrily as Star dragged him up to her room. He was sat down on the exchange student's bed as she pulled out her wand.

"Ugh....Star! I'm hungry! Can't this wait?"

"Rainbow Dazzling Fun-pocalypse!" Star shouted out as she lifted her wand over head, Marco sometimes had trouble understanding where she came up with all these magic words.

The room was showered in a blinding display of multicolored light. Then, in typical Star Butterfly fashion, things began to go awry. A ray of green light hit Star's mirror causing it to shrink down to the size of a tablet. A ray of red light hit a lamp, causing it to balloon up to three times its size, crushing the feeble desk beneath it. A ray of blue light seemed to glimmer in Marco's direction, blinding him. As he opened his eyes, it seemed like the bed had grown to colossal sizes. Then he saw other furniture had grown with it. Finally, laying eyes on Star, he saw that the hyperactive blonde was now at least a hundred times his size. The blue light must have shrunk him down to a mere inch in height.

"Oooo....weird," Star held out the last word as she twisted around, transfixed by the chaos she had caused. Sure enough, almost everything in Star's room had its size altered in one way or another. The sole exceptions seemed to be Star herself, a pair of her favorite boots setting just by the door, and the football stadium sized bed that Marco was now sitting on.

"Huh? Marco!? Where'd you go?" Star stammered as she glanced around the size-shifted mess of a room.

"Star!!! Over here!" Marco shouted at the top of his lungs from atop the girl's teal bedspread.

"Marco?" Star replied, turning towards her bed, but not seeing a bug-sized boy in a red hoodie.

"Down here!! Help!" Marco cried out, waving his arms to and fro.

Her blue eyes finally fell on the shrunken boy. Her face lit up with a wide grin.

"Aww! Marco, your so cute and tiny," she cooed as she fell to her knees and rested her elbows on the her to either side of Marco.

Marco in turn fell back from the normally light impact. He quickly returned to his feet, trying to still stay in charge, "Star, change me back already?"

"Why? This is the fun I wanted," Star proclaimed, almost innocently.

"I don't want to be this small! Grow me back." Marco groaned.

What is Star's reply?

Choice 1: "Nope." (Star wants to show Marco how much fun they could have with his size. She sets up a game which makes use of his shrunken state. The game turns out to be more fun for Star and more humiliating torment for Marco.)

Choice 2: "Fine." (Star casts another spell to reverse the shrinking effects, only for it to have an unintended effect. Marco remains shrunken, and is teleported somewhere else in the presence of another girl he knows.)
1513311.title: The Effects of Star's Boredom

15133111.content:
"Nope!" cried Star cheerfully.

"Wha- Why not?" Macro moaned back, obviously annoyed at his friend's decision. He did after all, have a sandwich to get back to.

"Because you~" Star poked Marco in the stomach, almost pushing him over "said I should use magic to have fun, and this looks fun!" she said with a smirk.

Marco's stomach growled back "Ugh.. fine. But can we get this over with quickly? I'm getting hungry here!" Marco groaned, defeat in his voice. He didn't want to, but at this size there wasn't much he could do but go along with her 'fun'.

"Yay!" cried Star jumping to her feet "Hmm, but what game should we play?" she thought aloud, stroking her chin.

"Uh, games?" Marco questioned

Star's gaze snapped back to Marco "Yeah.." she jumped on to the bed Landing with Marco between her legs. she grinned down at the tiny boy "...games!"

Marco fell on his back, startled by Star's quick movements, which at this size where admittedly quite scary. Marco gulped "Like what?" he questioned, trying to sound less worried than he actually was. After all; Star was a magical princess from another dimension that fought monsters. when it came to her idea of games? sky's the limit.

Star rubbed her chin, "Hmm... we could... no, not that..." she though long and hard about ideas for what game they could play that where both fun, but not overly dangerous. but mainly fun.

"Oh!" Star snapped her fingers, making Marco jump "We could just do one of my favorite things! Fight!" she looked excitedly at Marco, who gave her a look to say: are you serious?

"Star, your finger is big enough to pin me down all by itself! how would us fighting be fair?" Marco exclaimed, almost not believing what he had just heard.

"Ugh, why'd you gotta ruin my fun Marco" Star said jokingly, before resting her head in her hand to think of another idea, but then she saw Marco. And then her foot. and slowly a grin grew across Star's face.

"Uh oh" muttered Marco spotting this.

"Well, if i'm too big for ya..." Star remarked mockingly "maybe you should wrestle with..." she slowly leaned forward, garbing her ankles "These girls!" she pulled her feet up to Marco, with one on either side of him.

Marco, while startled by this, was mainly just confused. "Uh, what?" he asked looking at the orange and pink striped socked soles either side of him.

Star giggled "If you're too small to fight ME, then fight my feet!" she said excitedly, wiggling her toes.

Before Marco could protest, his stomach growled again, reminding him of that sandwich he oh so wanted to get back to, and how much he wanted to be this small for as little time as possible...

Star leaned in "Well?"

Choice 1: "Fine, whatever gets this over with faster" (Star "fights" Marco with her feet. The game results in Marco being humiliated, but giving Star even more ideas for 'games'.)

Choice 2: "I'm not THAT hungry Star, what other games do you have?" (Star Comes up with another idea for a 'game' that she'll enjoy a lot more than Marco will.)
15133111.title: Star's Shrinking Games

choices: "one of the other girls will take you in."
1513312.content:
It was a normal day at Echo Creek...or at least, as normal as it can be.

Star Butterfly and Marco Diaz were going through the hallways heading to class. Star was going through different spells she found in her spell book and testing them out on different objects, and sometimes, even other students. Marco was there consistently being amazed by the results and yet worried about one of the teachers noticing and getting them in trouble.

"Star, are you really sure that you should be doing this at school? We could get in serious trouble," Marco worriedly told Star.

"Oh, don't worry, Marco. It's not that bad. What could happen?" Star replied.

At that moment, she found a spell that particularly intrigued her, mainly because it didn't say what the results would be. "Oooh," Star smilingly exclaimed. "This looks interesting."

Marco was too concerned about all this. "Star, I really don't think you should-"

"Sunshine Minimize!" Star called out waving her wand in the air.

When the spell was cast, Marco blacked out.

----

When Marco awoke, he noticed that Star was gone,as well as a few of the female students. There were still plenty of others who were waking up, like Ferguson and Alfonso.

"Guys, what happened?" Marco asked them.

"I don't know," Ferguson said. "All I know is that Star cast that spell, I blacked out, and now I woke up."

"Yeah, me too. We have to find out what that spell did. Maybe then we can figure out where Star and some of the other students went."

At that moment, however, the students noticed booming sounds that were getting louder and louder. When they finally stopped, the school felt like it was being picked up by some kind of monster. Suddenly, out the window, they noticed a giant eye staring at them, and understandably, a good amount of the students and teachers screamed. Marco, on the other hand, was curious. He moved closer and recognized who was looking in at them all like a goddess come down to decide their fate.

"STAR?!" Marco screamed.

The eye lit up in excitement.

"Aawww, you guys all look so cute at this size!" Star's echoing voice said. "I was wondering what that spell did."

"Star, what happened?!"

"Isn't it obvious? That spell shrunk the school, and now you're all the size of ants. You know, for a smart kid, you can be pretty dim," Star jokingly told him.

"Can't you change us back?"

"Sorry, I don't know how. But luckily, one of us can take care of you guys until I figure it out."

"Us?"

"Oh, yeah, that spell didn't work on me, obviously, but there are a few others that weren't affected by it. Look."

Marco looked out the window and noticed that Jackie Lynn Thomas, Brittany, and Chantelle were all massive beings along with Star. Marco looked excited at the thought of Jackie bring the one to look after them, but was scared at the thought of Brittany or Chantelle taking the task.

"We've thought it through, Marco," Star explained. "And we've all decided that..."
1513312.title: Echo Creek Academy

151332.content: American Dragon: Jake Long, or Lilo & Stitch: The Series?
151332.title: American Dragon or Lilo & Stitch

1513322.content: How about we start of easy, by shrinking a human from the show?
1513322.title: Lilo & Stitch: The Series

15133222.content:
David Kawena was walking up the dirt road that lead to the Pelekai Residence, also known as the home where Nani and her little sitter Lilo lived. He was planning on having a romantic evening with his girlfriend Nani, one where she didn't have to work or assist Lilo in capturing Stitch's cousins.

Of course he never got mad or even upset at Nani for constantly canceling their plans, he was just happy knowing that his girlfriend was always there to help her kid sister. Little did he know that he was about to have his own encounter with one of the blue experiment's kin, one that will have an undesirable outcome for the young Hawaiian surfer.

His attention was brought to some bushes on his right side as they parted to reveal a purple octopus like creature, which in truth was Experiment 001 aka Shrink. The odd looking creature had purple skin with three legs, two stubby arms, along with two antennas on the back of its head. This was Jumba's first successful creation.

"Hey there little guy. Aren't you a cool little dude?" David smiled, getting down on one knee and scratching the top of it head with a smile on his face. As a surfer he had encountered many species of octopi, but this was definitely the strangest, not to mention the furthest he'd ever seen one up on dry land.

"Do you know any tricks?" He asked, sealing his own fate with no knowledge of this particular experiment's special power. The purple creature then jumped up with a smile cast upon its face, light emanating from the antennae on the top of it's head. This light shot out and hit David square in the chest, causing his surrounding to grow rapidly in height.

Before he knew what had happened, David had been shrunk to only an inch tall in height, no taller than a bug. Shrink then flew off as he often did after shrinking a person, making it less likely that he'd use his power a second time to return him to normal size.

With his new size seeming permanent for the time being David looked around in confusion, unsure of what to do. But before he could make up his own mind the footsteps of an unknown giant girl could be felt vibrating through the ground, turning around he saw __________'s sandals.
15133222.title: Shrunken Surfer

15133223.content: How about Lilo's rival, or maybe you'd like to bring the twenty foot tall Gantu down to size?
15133223.title: Mertle, Gantu?

152.content:
1) Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles(2012)
2) Jimmy Neutron
3) More Choices
152.title: Nick Cartoons

1521.content: Okay, now who in the show will be shrunken down to near bug size?
1521.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles(2012)

15211.content:
Ever since the Turtles had cured April O'Neil's father, Donatello had been working in his lab with feverish zeal, hoping to rediscover the formula for retro-mutagen. It had seemed a relatively straightforward task at first, given that there seemed to be no end to the amounts of pure mutagen he had to work with. Unfortunately for the genius turtle, that was not the case. The mutagen that he had made the antidote from had a plethora of unknown contaminants, and the effects of his attempts to recreate it were...sporadic, to say the least. More than once, the results had ended explosively, destroying all his work and much of his lab equipment.

Of course, other events had distracted him. The turning of Karai, for example, was a huge one. Not only did it lead to many nights of staking out as opposed to research, it now meant that there were two girls living with them in the sewers. April O'Neil often came down to try and help, but whenever she came to sit down and experiment, his thoughts drifted away from the data and towards the lovely girl in front of him. Less often, Karai came down as well -- more out of a perceived obligation to help her father than Donnie's work actually interesting her. And so, the nights where he was alone, when he worked best, grew fewer and more scattered -- though he always made the effort.

It was on one of those rare nights where Donatello believed he had finally found it. This one had the orange color of the original retro-mutagen. A good sign. He slowly, carefully inserted the deep-fried anchovies into the Erlenmeyer flask. The fish fizzed and bubbled in the concoction, slowly dissolving. Then the solution grew brighter. Not a good sign. It began to hiss and rumble. A bad sign. An wisp of orange smoke came out of the top. A very bad sign.

Then there was the explosion.

In terms of the combustions Donnie had experienced, this one was tiny. But as any scientific Ninja Turtle can tell you, it is a very bad idea indeed to mess with mutagen. The acrid orange smoke filled his lungs and burned his skin. His eyes watered as he choked on the fumes of his creation. He stumbled around, blindly trying to find away out, to escape from the suffocation that he was certain to die from. Donatello tripped on a loose cord and fell heavily on a lab stool. His head hit the lip of his desk, just above the iconic purple bandanna. He was knocked out almost instantly. He did not feel the orange cloud expand and eddy around him to fill up his lab, nor did he see it eventually dissipate. More importantly, he did not feel himself diminish, nor did he see the world grow to titanic sizes as he shrank down to the size of a flea on the lab stool. He remained unconscious for another hour.

Around this time, one of the girls came down to see if he had broken the laws of reality again. Not finding him, they decided to poke around his lab, careful not to mess up any of his notes or weird experiments. Eventually, they came across the now-empty Erlenmeyer flask next to the anchovy-less anchovy pizza. Seeing nothing of importance, they continued on to the lab stool. At exactly this point, the flea-sized Donatello, now smaller than a pencil lead, woke up.

Who did he see?

Choice 1: April O'Neil. Donnie's crush will not notice him at first, and instead sit down on the stool, and Donnie...

Choice 2: Karai. The daughter of Splinter will notice him immediately, but she will think he is an insect and brush him off the stool, making him land at her feet, where she will quite possibly try to finish the job.
15211.title: Donnie's Lab Accident

152111.content:
April O'Neil came down to the lab, as she often did on nights like these. She enjoyed talking to Donnie, yes, but there were bigger things she had to think about than that. For one, she was dedicated to finding and developing more anti-mutagen. It had always weighed heavily on her mind that Master Splinter, who had remained a mutant and had lived in the sewers for nearly two decades, had had the chance to become human once more but had spent it on allowing her father, a mutant for about a week, to return to humanity. It was an incredibly selfless act, one which deserved a selfless act in turn.

However, tonight, Donatello apparently wasn't here. She looked around. There were beakers, test tubes, and crucibles filled with strange chemicals that she ought to know the name of but didn't. Honestly, so much of it flew over her head, she had sometimes wondered if she even deserved to work on this. But she could do basic mathematics; scientific conversions; stoichiometry. Sometimes all Donnie needed was an extra pair of hands to fill in tables.

April walked past an empty Erlenmeyer flask and anchovy-less anchovy pizza. There, at the end of the long table, was a clipboard with half-filled calculations, next to a stool. She could do that. April O'Neil grabbed the stool in one hand, pulled it out, and sat down to work.

***

Donnie stirred. What had happened to him? The last the he remembered, he was mixing mutagen when suddenly... it had exploded. Now it looked like he was on some sort of ginormous metal disc. And above him there appeared to be some sort of equally huge table, but...

Then Donatello realized he had shrunk.

He took it remarkably well, only panicking a little. Then, just as he started to calm down again, he heard footsteps, and started panicking again. The footsteps came closer and closer. What if they saw him, but they thought he was a bug? Or worse, what if they didn't see him at all? He looked over the edge of the stool. It was a very, very long way down. There was no way he was going to attempt that by himself. If this person didn't see him, he could stuck on the metal stool for who know how long? Then, Donnie's thoughts were interrupted by a pale hand descending and grabbing the edge of the stool. There was a brief scraping sound as the metal legs scraped against the floor as the unseen giant pulled out the stool. But as the stool was dragged backwards, he realized who it was...April O'Neil!

The tiny turtle called out to his crush. "Hey, April! APRIL! I'm down here! Look! It's me! April! APRIL!"

But if April heard him, she gave no sign of it. By this time, she had pulled the stool fully out and was concentrating more on the table than the metal surface where Donatello was. Donnie was about to try one last time to contact her, but then the two dark columns that were her legs swept around the stool to the other side. Her blue jean short shorts, already large, grew even larger in Donnie's field of vision...

WHUMP!

Donnie was under immense pressure as his crush crushed him under her butt. April may have felt something a little off about the chair, but in comparison with some of the things she had to do for training on a regular basis, a lump on a chair was nothing, so she continued to work. Meanwhile, the teeny turtle squirmed and wormed his way out from under her butt and thought of a different approach.

Donnie tried to scale April's big behind. It seemed to be much more effective than getting crushed under her rear, but when he got to her waistband, he made a misstep and fell down April's panties, eventually getting wedged in between her mammoth cheeks. This finally got his crush's attention, who stuck a hand in her pants and...

Choice One: April scratches her butt, leaving Donatello stuck and at her mercy.

Choice Two: April grabs him and realizes he has shrunk
152111.title: April's (Butt) Crush

15221.content:
One day after school Cindy sneaked into Jimmy Neutron's backyard lab using a piece of his hair she 'borrowed' to see what he had been working on for the science fair, since there was no way she could ever beat him any other way.

She knew that he wouldn't be there for a while since he had seen him leave with Sheen and Carl only a few minutes ago, riding the tube like slide down to his actual lab underground.

While Cindy would never admit it she did secretly have a crush on the genius boy "Is that why I'm doing this?" she asked herself finding it hard to ignore her feelings, little did she know that Jimmy also had a secret crush on her as well.

The young blonde girl pushed these thoughts aside as she opened the mechanical doors revealing the lab to her, like always she couldn't help but to be impressed that someone her age could accomplish all this.

There must have been several dozen machines and mechanisms in here that would easily give Jimmy first place in the school science fair "But, which one's his project?" she found herself asking as she began to wander and pace around the lab.

"Teleporter, Time Machine, Rocket..."Cindy said naming off just a few of the inventions she laid her eyes on, not seeing anything that Jimmy might use in this year's science fair.

Then her eyes met up with the device that would change her plans completely "A Shrink Ray? Hmm if I can't beat Nerdtron at his own game, maybe I can just remove him from the competition." Cindy said displaying a mischievous smile.

Cindy grabbed the ray gun like device and got into position to wait until Jimmy returned to turn the device on it's creator, luckily she wouldn't have to wait long as a computer generated voice said "Access granted: Jimmy Neutron."

Cindy having hidden herself behind the stairs watched as Jimmy walked into the lab, readying the gun for the moment he reached the last step and opened fire on the unsuspecting boy genius.

"Bwahh!" Jimmy yelled out in sudden surprise as he watched his lab rapidly grow in size after being hit with the shrink rays most powerful setting '1 inch tall' meaning he would be reduced to a mere fraction of his normal size.

"Leaping leptons, what happened to me?" Jimmy yelled feeling as small as a mouse before felling some small dramatic quakes approaching him, quickly able to use his whit to identify these quakes as a normal sized person's footsteps.

He turned around expecting to see Carl or Sheen or even one of his parents but nothing could have prepared him who he would see towering over him, it was Cindy Vortex his secret crush who lived across the street.

Jimmy could hardly believe his eyes as he looked up at the skyscraper sized girl "Cindy what are you doing here?" he asked defensively, deducting that she must have been responsible for shrinking him.

"I just needed a little insurance, to ensure that I win the science fair this year and not you." Cindy stated reaching down towards Jimmy with a smile spread across her face.

Jimmy tried to defend himself against Cindy, but at his size it was utterly useless leaving helplessly caught up in Cindy's grip soon after finding himself brought up to the blonde girls face.

"Ok Nerdtron now that I have you just where I want you I think its time we___________"

1. "...take a ride in your rocket." (Cindy drops Jimmy on the rocket seat and sits on him while she takes it out for a spin.)

2. "...my house, Libby's coming over soon." (Brings Jimmy back to her house and puts him somewhere to be unknowingly tortured by Libby.)
15221.title: Cindy's Trap

1523.content: How about Fairly Odd Parents or Danny Phantom?
1523.title: Fairly Odd Parents? Danny Phantom?

152311.content:
Timmy turner left alone in his house while his godparents and parents are gone decided to begin work on a list of things that he should, and in most cases on the list shouldn't wish for.

While the list of things he should wish for was rather short, the list of things that he should under no circumstances wish for was long with each choice making him cringe as he thought about what his life would be like if they ever were to come true.

With his parents at a Chip Skylark concert and Cosmo and Poof at Cosmo's mom's house for the week, Timmy didn't expect anyone to appear in his room for at-least a few hours until Wanda finished some errands.

So when the pink haired fairy woman appeared out of no where behind him in a poof of smoke he was naturally surprised by her sudden appearance, causing him to fall back off of his bed and onto the floor looking up at Wanda floating over his bed.

"Whoops, sorry about that scamp. I was just coming in to see if you needed any quick wishes granted." Wanda said looking down at the paper that Timmy had been writing on simply labeled 'Wishes'.

"Wanda no!" Timmy said trying to stop Wanda as she reached down and picked up the list filled with mostly things he would never wish for, his words not fully heard as Wanda focused on reading the young boy's sloppy handwriting.

"I see you made a list for me, ok. How about we start with making your body nearly indestructible." she announced beginning to grant Timmy's wishes one at a time as pointed her wand at him and fired a pink beam at him.

Timmy could feel as his body began to tighten unable to object further as the beam cut off his ability to speak further as Wanda already began reading his second wish "I wish I was an inch tall." she said waving her glowing wand.

In a few short moments Timmy watched his room grow expediently in size as he was poofed down to the size of a penny in height, falling to the hardwood floor below with a thud thankful that Wanda had at least grated his nearly indestructible body wish first.

Although now Timmy had an entirely different problem since he was now too tiny to reach Wanda's eardrums with the sound of his voice as she continued onto read the rest of the list not sure which one to grant next since several of the situations would negate the others.

"I got to say scamp, some of these wishes are really strange but if that's what you want." Wanda said unknowingly granting Timmy's worst wish idea's possible, coming across _____________ next on the list.
152311.title: Bad Wish List

1523112.content:
"Wow you're handwriting really is awful, that should be added to the list when you get back, although I'm sure you have that covered Wanda said as she came across the only other wish she could read on the list.

"Ahhh here we go." Wanda announced waving her glowing wand once more, sending Timmy away from his room in a puff of smoke.

"Oh no this isn't good!" Timmy said as he took a look at his surrounding s in the place Wanda had sent him, coming to the conclusion that the wish she had chosen to grant for him was the last one he would ever wish for "_____________".
1523112.title: Sent Away

15231121.content:
Timmy was horrified to find himself standing atop the gigantic bed of his evil babysitter Vicky. He had only seen her room on a select few occasions, but it was completely unmistakeable. The Chip Skylark posters were a dead giveaway, not to mention the bag of "babysitting equipment' in the corner that had a skull and crossbones on it. He was truly a prisoner of war trapped in the enemy camp, hoping that Wanda would take a closer look at that sheet and see her mistake. Until then, he would be tiny in Vicky's room, standing next to a giant envelope addressed to Vicky.

As if on cue, the evil teenager burst into the room just as Timmy read her name, immediately noticing the envelope on her bed. Timmy began to scurry away from it, hoping not to catch her attention. Meanwhile, Vicky tore into the envelope and pulled out the letter within, reading it out loud: "Dear Vicky. For some reason doctors have been unable to understand, our son Timmy has mysteriously shrunken to tiny size. As such, we are no longer able to take care of him. We were hoping that from now on, you could babysit him permanently. We will send you $1000 monthly to compensate you for your trouble. If you need us, we'll be in the Bahamas. Thanks, Timmy's Mom and Dad."

As Timmy heard Vicky reading the letter, he realized that this must be part of the wish. Wanda had arranged for his parents to know about the shrinking and made them decide to leave him in Vicky's care so that he truly would be babysat forever.

Vicky lowered the letter from her face in disbelief, unable to believe what she had just read. However, this disbelief quickly faded when she caught size of what she would have previously assumed was a bug scurrying across her bed. Effortlessly snatching it up and bringing it to her face, she found that everything she had just read was true. Timmy Turner, her mortal enemy, was now tiny in her clutches. "Well well twerp. It looks like you and I are going to be spending more time together. A LOT more time together." Vicky said, her mouth contorted into a sinister smile that nearly froze Timmy's blood in his veins.

"Vicky you've gotta help me this is all a mistake!" Timmy yelled, desperate.

"I don't think so twerp. The only mistake was that you were born normal sized in the first place. You were always meant to be a bug. Now you have finally found your calling. Now the only thing to decide is what to do with you..."

1. Vicky comes up with some chores for Timmy to do (rubbing her feet, kissing her ass, etc.)

2. Vicky decides to take the idea of permanently babysitting Timmy literally, deciding to glue him to her bare ass cheek to be crushed under her every time she sits down.
15231121.title: "Vicky Babysits Me Forever"

15231122.content:
Young Timmy Turner knew he should be scared. Already at an inch tall and Wanda had transported him somewhere. He looked around at that fear only grew. There were stark white bars instead of a wall, the floor was covered in newspaper, and his cage was decorated with an oversized water bottle and what looked like a giant waterwheel.

“Is this…..a hamster cage?” Timmy asked himself as he shook at the bars.

Upon closer inspection, the young boy found that a bright red ribbon wrapped around the outside of the cage, with a note attached to it. Suddenly the door to the room the cage was in opened with a creek, Timmy yelled out in fear as one of his worst nightmares walked in. The ten-year old geeky younger sister of his malicious babysitter, it was non-other than Tootie. The braces-wearing girl looked at the cage in genuine surprise and walked towards it. Upon arrival she nearly shrieked with glee when she saw her crush at an inch tall and, furthermore, at her mercy.

“Timmy!” She screamed, nearly deafening the tiny boy. Her eyes then lit up as her gaze fell upon a tag attached to the ribbon, which she then proceeded to read rapidly, “Dear Tootie, this is the best birthday present I could think to give you. XOXO PS: Sorry it’s early.”

Upon finishing the card, Tootie was visibly shaking, having trouble comprehending any sentences. She instead just hopped up and down excitedly, causing the ground to shake. The tremors traveled up the furniture Timmy’s prison was set atop, knocking the tiny boy back on his butt before he could protest against Tootie. Not that he would be able to in the first place, he was simply still horrified that Wanda had granted a wish he was never going to wish in his life time, one in which he was literally owned by his abhorrent admirer, Tootie.

“Oh, I don’t even know what to do first!” Tootie squealed, debating whether to kiss her crush or play around with him.

She opened the door to the cage and began reaching in, her childish fingers making quick grabbing motions as the tiny boy backed towards the hamster wheel, ducking away. He couldn’t go any further as he back hit cold metal, he felt the heat radiating off her fingertips. Then a loud voice called from downstairs, causing Tootie to pull away. She glanced at the door, then back at Timmy, then back at the door, clearly debating whether to stay with Timmy or go see what her sister was calling for. She eventually decided that Vicky might find her tiny new boy toy if she didn’t go downstairs, so in a few quick steps she was out the door.

Timmy heaved a sigh of relief as the geeky ten-year old left him in peace. Looking up, his eyes light up in happiness as he saw his salvation. Tootie had left the door to his cage wide open. The tiny boy stepped up to the opening and glanced around. The room was a mess of toys, mixed together with pictures of him hanging from the wall and some simplistic furniture. Behind him was the prison he had arrived in. Timmy weighed his options, realizing he could be better off in the cage. If he stayed, Tootie would no doubt act upon all the fantasies she ever held for him. Plus he had been a pet before, thanks to some rather poorly phrased wishes, it hardly ever turned out well. Then again the world beyond the cage was an unknown. Though he knew the layout of the house pretty well after Vicky had babysat him there a few times. Though the more worrying part of trying to escape was how Tootie might react if she catches him, or worse, if he runs into Vicky.

Timmy stood there, silently thinking, he didn’t have much time and he quickly made a choice. Whether or not it was the best one didn’t matter as the shrunken boy…

Choice 1: Ducked back into the cage (Tootie quickly returns and finds Timmy just where she left him and proceeds to lovingly continue her advances.)

Choice 2: Snuck out into Tootie’s room (Tootie is out of the room for a bit longer and Timmy is given the opportunity to find a place to hide or else enduring his admirer’s wrath)
15231122.title: Tootie's New Pet

15232.content: Who will shrink, Danny Phenton, Tucker Foley, or Someone Else?
15232.title: Danny Phantom

152321.content:
Danny was just getting home from fighting some ghosts, deciding to fly in through the downstairs lab to avoid being detected by his parents.

He wouldn't have to worry about anyone else being downstairs, even his older sister Jazz since she knew the secret of him being half ghost.

What he didn't know was that something that happened earlier in the day was about end up causing him an enormous amount of trouble.

---2 Hours Ago---

Jack and Maddie Fenton walked into the downstairs lab, Jack had just finished the most recent upgrades on the Fenton Crammer so it would fire more accurately.

Of course Maddie knew that there was nothing wrong with it before Jack got his hands on it, since she herself upgraded it only a few days ago.

However she was willing to overlook his worst qualities such as messing around with her upgraded inventions.

"It can detect any trace of a ghost and shrink it down."Jack said, turning on the device to show off the so called improvement's he made to Maddie.

He then placed the Fenton Crammer down on the counter, setting it to sentry mode so it would shrink anything giving off a ghostly presence.

Suddenly the device came to life, firing and shrinking one of their lab computer's. Then it fired several more times, shrinking a majority of the machines in their lab.

"I think we should leave, and come back later." Maddie said cautiously, pulling Jack away from the device. She simply thought it was one of his classic mistakes, when in fact the device was working perfectly.

---Present---

Danny flew into the lab and noticed immediately that almost all their machines were gone, beginning to wonder if Teknis had struck and stole everything.

Just then the Fenton Crammer kicked on and shot at Danny, hitting him square in the chest.

"Oh no, not again!" he yelled, watching the lab grow around him at an alarming rate. Shrinking to the point where he was only an inch tall in height.

To make matters worse he could hear someone coming down the stairs, he tried to turn invisible and fly off but could do neither since the ray negated his ghost powers.

Leaving him hoping that whoever came down the stairs would be able to find and help him. Who was it?
152321.title: Danny Phan-Tiny

1531.content:
Lets try to start of on a strong note.

How about?

Someone from the Republic side? (A Clone, Jedi, or Senator)

A group made up of both Sith and Jedi? (Dooku, Anikin, Obi-Wan, Mace Windu, General Grievous, Cad Bane, Asajj Ventress, Jar Jar Binks, Newt Gunray, and Rex.)- total of ten.
1531.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars

15313.content:
Separatists and Republic forces meet in battle on the planet of Naboo in the midsts of a Separatists invasion, in fact the invasion was so essential to their plans Count Dooku had arrived on the planet personally to conquer it.

Asajj Ventress, General Grievous, bounty hunter Cad Bane, and of course a large army of Battle Droids came to assist Count Dooku in the large scale takeover of Naboo.

A large battalion of over two hundred B-1 Battle Droids, fifty B-2 Super Battle Droids, and 8 Magna Droids marched into the capital of Theed which was the closest city on Naboo to the underwater city of the Gungans.

Inside a research and development on the west side of the capital Jedi and Sith forces make contact, and after some banter between Count Dooku, Anakin, and Obi-Wan Kenobi the battle ensues.

Red and Blue lasers light up the room from Clone and Droid blasters, casualties from both beginning right way as the Jedi do their best to cover their troops with their Lightsabers.

Captain Rex took cover behind a desk and primed an EMP grenade to take out the enemy Droids, while Magna Droids wielding their Electrostaffs attacked the Jedi.

“What’s wrong dooku can’t fight us yourself?” Obi-Wan said, jumping into the air and defeating three of the eight advanced Droids using remarkable swordplay.

Behind Obi-Wan two other Magna Droids raise their staffs in preparation to strike down the Jedi Master, before they were sliced in half by Anakin Skywalker.

“You haven’t gotten rusty now have you Master?” Anakin said, giving his mentor a hard time after seeing him let down his guard.

“What are you waiting for, get in there and protect me!” Newt Gunray commanded, only interested in saving his own skin in the battle.

“Roger, Roger.” one of the droids said charging the Jedi warriors, only to be sliced in two by Mace Windu’s purple Lightsaber.

“Ventress I believe the time has come for you to enter the battle my young assassin.” Count Dooku commanded, the bald woman jumping into the air and striking Anakin back before activating her weapons.

Obi-Wan turned to help his former Padawan but was unable to after sensing a faint presence behind him along with the whirling of several Lightsabers, turning on his own and blocking an attack.

“General Kenobi, your Lightsaber will make an interesting addition to my collection.” General Grievous stated, as if victory offer a Jedi Master was easy.

“You haven’t defeated me yet.” Obi-Wan declared, using the force to push Grievous back and allow himself room to fight back.

Following this Mace Windu being the strong and silent type in battle leapt into action against Count Dooku himself, Cad Bane flying into the room as instructed and taking out the remaining Clone’s with the exception of Rex in the blink of an eye.

“Stand down Jedi, you’ve been defeated.” Bane said, pointing two guns at Anakin and Obi-wan who were busy with their own battles, the remaining Droids aiming down at them behind him.

“Not if I can help it!” Rex yelled, throwing the EMP grenade and shutting down the internal circuits of the Droids before aiming his weapon and floating bounty hunter.

Finally after a few short minutes the battle between the separatists and the Republic reached a stalemate with neither side having a clear advantage over the overs.

With four separate fights happening towards the center of the room Next Gunray took cover behind Count Dooku for protection, before to door opened behind the Jedi side.

“Oh no.” Anakin said, seeing that it was Representative Jar Jar Binks of the senate attempting to enter the room, trying to fight off Ventress so he could use the force o close the door.

“Mesa here to help you fight.” Jar Jar announced, running into the room and tripping after only one step.

The Gungan representative of Taboo reached out to a nearby counter to try and catch himself, pressing a button under the table with his thumb that normally wouldn’t be pressed.

Suddenly a strange purple gas filled the room from the test chamber in the corner, followed by an alarm and mechanical shutters closed everyone off from the outside world.

The gas was so thin that nobody was immune to it, not even Rex’s helmet or Grievous’s face mask were able to block the gas from entering their lungs and changing them.

“Danger, danger, experimentally agent #314 has been released, danger, danger.(Repeat)” was spoken over the loudspeaker several times.

The gas filled the room until nothing could be seen, although everyone could feel the effect of the gas filling their lungs as the sound off a vacuum could be heard overhead.

Lightsabers, weapon, as well as other things could be felt growing out of their hands, anything that wasn’t organic like clothing, or General Grievous’s armor carved from a creature on a distant world shrunk with them.

When the gas cleared the room appeared empty at a first glance, but in actuality everyone inside had been shrunk down to an inch tall in height.

"My Lightsaber!" Anakin yelled, unable to fight without his weapon which while inactivated was several times his size.

"That's a big clanker." Rex said, walking outside his helmet to see that the cut up and destroyed Droids didn't change in size like the rest of them had.

After a few more apparent observations the group gathered at the center of the room, Assaj Ventress and General Grevious ready to killed Jar Jar for shrinking them.

"Patience..." Count Dooku stepped in, stopping his apprentice and top general from killing anybody just yet.

"We must work with the Jedi if any of us are to escape this ordeal." Dooku finished turning to Anakin, Windu, and Obi-Wan for conformation.

"Or we could just let you stay like this, I think being the size of a bug suits you well." Anakin teased, pointing out that he wasn't willing to help anyone from his side.

Just then a presence could be felt by both the Jedi and the Sith, coming closer to them after hearing the alert as the door beeped and slowly opened.

Who is on the other side.
15313.title: War of the Small

15332.content: Which of the Titans will be shrinking?
15332.title: Teen Titans

153321.content:
Robin, the leader of the Teen Titans was out on the lawn below Titans Tower improving their first line of defense. Sensors that would detect any enemy that stepped foot on their island off the coast of Jump City, along with short range interceptor missiles that would protect against unwanted aerial attacks.

The young boy wonder was crossing some electrical wires that lead back up to the top for of the tower when suddenly they shocked his fingers.

"Ow! That hurt." putting his index finger to his lips before he noticed something odd about his surrounding. Everything around him growing in size at both an incredible and alarming rate, but as he looked around he could clearly see that it was him who was being shrunk.

In less than one minute he had shrunk below the level of the grass, looking up in awe of his now massive surrounding. Titan Tower alone stretching up to unfathomable heights in the sky before him, like a large wall in the shape of a "T" blocking out the sky.

Lucky all of his gear had shrunk with him, including his suit and every gadget held within his utility belt. This would help in getting the attention of any one of his teammate while at his diminished size. Although he might have been too late in approaching them on his own when he noticed footsteps approaching him from behind, shaking the earth to it core with ever step.

Looking over his shoulder Robin saw ______________ clad foot raised above his shrunken body.
153321.title: Robin's Accidental Shrinking

153322.content:
Beast Boy was fiddling around with a machine in Cyborg's lab. It was labeled 'Experimental' and, in a larger font, 'Beast Boy Do Not Touch!'. It was also a ray gun, and had a big, shiny red button surrounded by yellow-and-black striped tape. Beast Boy couldn't resist; he mashed the button enthusiastically. The ray hummed. It whirred. Then it spat out a beam of light which hit Beast Boy square in the forehead. Then it fell silent. The green Titan staggered out of Cyborg's lab. He hadn't bothered to look for what the ray was called or what it did, so he had no way of knowing that he was displaying the first side effect of shrinking -- dizziness.

Robin came walking down the hall, and noticed the shapeshifter milling about aimlessly. He came up to him and said, "Hey, Beast Boy, I need someone to pick up the laundry. Can you do that?" BB, feeling light-headed, simply nodded before heading for the laundry area.

When he got there, he took two baskets and began sorting. The Titans had a mountain of laundry, even when you exempted Cyborg -- who didn't wear clothing for obvious reasons. That left Robin, Beast Boy, and the girls' laundry. The young shapeshifter grabbed clothes by the armful and started shoveling them into the waiting baskets. As he did so, an outside observer would quickly realize why he was rarely tasked with the laundry -- he just sorted the clothes into two piles, one for him and Robin, another for the girls. But after a while, Beast Boy started to feel nauseous -- another of the symptoms of the shrink ray.

By the time he was about three-fifths of the way done with the laundry, the Titan began to feel a splitting headache. The baskets began to swim before his eyes, the dizziness returned and his legs gave out from under him. Beast Boy fell backwards, hitting the floor with a thud, and slipped into unconsciousness.

When Beast Boy came to, everything was larger. Much, much larger. He slowly came to the realization that he had shrunk. While the now-tiny Titan had a panic attack, one of his now-huge friends made their way down the steps. Hoping to get noticed, Beast Boy turned himself into a whale.

Terra came walking down the steps. She saw the half-finished laundry and groaned. "Again, Beast Boy?" She was about to walk over when she saw what appeared to be a large beetle. She raised her boot and stomped on it. When she lifted her foot, the beetle had vanished. "Good riddance" she muttered, grinding her boot on the floor, before walking to the laundry.

Beast Boy had, at the last second, turned into a hummingbird and flown away from the crushing shoe. He then tried to fly to Terra, but he was so tiny that only a gust of wind from the vent nearby allowed him to get close to her. Unfortunately, he arrived just as Terra dumped a load of underwear on the girls' pile. He had just enough time to revert to human form before he was knocked out by the impact. Meanwhile, Terra grabbed the baskets and walked out. She set the girls' basket in the hall with her, Raven, and Starfire's rooms. The other girls came out and grabbed their clean clothes, anxious to get out of their three-day-old outfits.

At this point, Beast Boy stirred, and found himself in...
153322.title: Beast Boy

1533312.content: How about Dexter or Mandark shrink?
1533312.title: Dexter Lab?

153331211.content:
Dexter was hard at work in his underground laboratory. The diminutive genius was hard at work on his "shrink ray", a past invention of his that he had suddenly gained renewed interest in. Being so short, compared to not only his sister, but also to his classmates, had been problematic. Dee Dee's height had allowed the ditz to mindlessly lay waste to many of his greater discovers as a part of her "playtime", meanwhile some of his classmates often picked on him due to his size. Thus the bespectacled boy had hatched what he viewed as an ingenious and flawless plan. He had failed in the past with trying to grow himself, so he would instead shrink everyone else down. There was just a few more calibration he had to make in the targeting system. That was when disaster struck, pink, idiotic disaster.

"Dexter! What're you dooooing?" Dee Dee called as she barged into the young supergenius's lab for the hundredth time.

"Dee Dee! Get out of my labor-a-tory," Dexter replied, still baffled by the fact that his older sister managed to appear just in time to foul everything up.

"Ooooooh! What's this button do?" Dee Dee asked.

Dexter looked up to see his tutu-clad sibling's finger dangerously close to a large red button. The red button in turn connected to the large shrink ray, which Dexter was standing right below. His eyes traced the shrink rays gleaming antenae back and forth along a series of wires to the button his sister was poised to push. He gulped, knowing nothing could stave off his sister's destructive tendencies.

"Boop," Dee Dee said with a giggle as she tapped the button.

A puff of smoke emerged from the machine he had spent the last few hours working on. Dexter released a sigh, wiping his brow, content that he had gotten only a minor setback in comparison to most of Dee Dee's screw-ups with his machines. As if on cue, the shrink ray whirled to life once again, bathing Dexter in a ray of bright light. Dexter became dizzy, momentarily losing his sight completely.

As his vision came back, Dexter saw his lab stretching out before him for miles. He knew he had shrunk. Worst still, he had originally intended to calibrate the shrink ray to remove only a foot or two worth of height from people. Unfortunately, since he hadn't had a chance to input that setting, the machine had defaulted to its last size. Dexter was now a mere inch in height, and yet, as always, things could still get worse.

"Dexter!" Where are you?" Dee Dee called.

The tiny boy heard the ground quake as his sister paced around the lab. He jumped back in fear as one of her pink ballet flats slammed down just before him. From behind his glasses, the tiny boy traced up his Dee Dee's legs, clad in white pantyhose, past the pink tutu and leotard she constantly wore, and up to her face and the blonde pigtails on top. As usual she was completely oblivious to his plight. And yet, with his shrink ray broken, he needed her help.

"Ooooh! Are we playing hide and seek?" Dee Dee asked, speaking mostly to herself at this point.

Without waiting for a response, Dee Dee began to run through Dexter's lab once again. As the clumsy giantess ran amok, she shook the floor below, knocked important items to the floor, and otherwise made a mess of the room. As she rampaged around, Dexter took cover under a nearby table to plan his next move. Would he get help from Dee Dee or search for help else where?

Choice 1: Dee Dee finds Dexter (Assuming he was playing hide and seek with her, Dee Dee takes the shrunken Dexter to her room to play a new game with him.)

Choice 2: Dexter leaves the room in search of help (Dexter escapes the lab via an air vent, only to run into another female character.)

Choice 3: Dexter's shrink ray fires a second shot at his giant robot, making it nearly as tall as Dee-Dee and operational for him at his new size.
153331211.title: The Big Red Button

15333122.content: You can add an option for Alien Force or Omniverse later on but for now I'll add an option for the original.
15333122.title: Ben 10- Original

153331221.content:
During the middle of the summer Ben was walking through the woods having come to the realization that the battle he had faced over the past month and a half only seemed to get more and more difficult.

He was testing out different combinations in the hopes that he could unlock new and more powerful aliens to use in his many fights to come (left right left right right) causing the Omintrix to beep and glow a light green.

Surprised the ten year old boy examined the new design that had appeared on his watch "That's strange." he said realizing that the new design that had popped up didn't seem very alien like, in fact it looked human.

"What could go wrong?" he asked himself before using his hand to slap down the Omnitrix, causing it's true function to activate as Ben's body was bathed in a large ray of light causing his body to transform.

Although the end results weren't exactly what Ben expected when he opened his eyes to see that a giant leaf was now laying in front of him in the dirt, proceeding to look around and see that the entire forest had grown in size.

"Oh great I'm straight up puny, I'm even smaller than 'Grey Matter'(3 inches tall)" Ben said noticing that he himself must have been no taller than 1 inch in height as he began to walk through the woods.

"Man, Gwen would never let me live this down if she saw me like this." Ben said glad that for the time being she was no where to be seen, looking around to see that after shrinking he had lost track of the path he had taken.

Although someone who had seen the green flash of light knew almost exactly where he was, following the source of where it had originated calling his name "Ben, Ben, are you out here?" recognizing the voice immediately making him hope he was wrong given his size compared to a normal sized person.

That's when Ben looked up to see a gigantic _________ walk out from behind a few trees towards him, the quakes created by her feet hitting the ground shaked the ground around him as she looked for one of his aliens.
153331221.title: Omnitrix Malfuction

1533312211.content:
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/ben1...

Ben was surprised to see a large white sneaker crash into the the ground in front of some bushes with a thundering impact, following this occurrence he saw a set of pale white legs clad in even whiter pants emerge from behind the bushes.

Next came a familiar blue cat shirt that clarified for Ben who he was up against was non other than his own ten year old cousin Gwen, the orange haired girl’s eyes observed the environment for any signs of Ben’s aliens to capture him before he could play a childish prank on her.

“What terrible luck!” Ben thought to himself aloud having just mentioned how Gwen would most likely never let him live this down if she ever saw him like this, he’d be stuck with nicknames like ‘larva boy’ and ‘bug juice’ for the rest of his life.

“Ben, where are you? You better not be trying to play some kind of stupid prank on me.” Gwen’s voice echoed as she stepped out into the opening, her white shoes kicking up dirt into dust as she took several steps towards her shrunken cousin.

“Perfect she doesn’t know where I am, this is my chance to escape.” Ben said making a run for a small bush not to far from his position that would help protect him for Gwen’s heavy foot falls, better to be safe than stuck to the bottom of her shoe like discarded bubble gum.

Just the thought alone of being stomped into the dirt repeatedly with each step Gwen took was more than enough reason for him to run for his life, after all she would probably enjoy taking a long walk knowing that her rival cousin was suffering underfoot.

Suddenly Ben looked back over his shoulder after noticing Gwen footsteps had stopped to see that she had taken out the spell-book she had acquired from Charmcaster, “Invenire cognata” she said and a flash of light appeared from the book.

“There you are, you little pest!” Gwen yelled out having used a location spell to find her shrunken cousin, although Ben was still left unsure if she knew what size he was and decided that hiding under the bushes would no longer protect him if Gwen kept using that spell.

Suddenly Ben found himself cut off as a large white object crashed into the dirt blocking his path, the tiny boy didn’t take long to discover that it was Gwen shoe he was looking at, his eyes trailing up her body from bottom to top till his eyes met her gaze.

“Well well what do we have here? Is that a new alien or did you just shrink to the size of your brain?” Gwen asked finding both a way to taunt and insult Ben at the same time as she towered over him, she was even bigger than a fully grown Way Big as she bent over to get a better look at her tiny cousin.

The orange haired girl wrapped her fingers around the tiny Ben as he tried to activate his Omnitrix in the hopes of changing into an alien that could hold off Gwen for the time being , unfortunately it hadn’t yet recharged and he was whisked up into the air.

“So what should I do with you now?” Gwen asked herself as she held Ben at level with the cat symbol on her chest, this gave the young girl a perfect opportunity to get back at her cousin for every single prank he had played on her over the summer using his Omnitrix.

"I know how about I ___________."

1. "...put you too good use." Gwen tells Ben that he's been a constant pain in her ass for two long and that the only way he could ever make it up to her was to get close to the source of her pain and fix it in person. Gwen then drops her tiny cousin down the back of her pants and goes about her day as she usually would returning to the rust bucket and telling Grandpa Max that Ben went on ahead as XLR8.

2. "...let you fight back." Gwen drops Ben back on the dirt and allows him to turn into alien after alien, defeating one after another in a different way than the last using only her body and the size difference between them. After each alien was defeated Gwen would reset the Omnitrix using a spell and demand that Ben turn into his next alien until he was unable to fight back. She would offer this to Ben telling her that if he beat her then she would help him get back to normal, while really just using it as an excuse to play crudely with his tiny body.

3. "...help you find your true calling in life, as an insole." Gwen slips of her sneaker, dropping Ben inside where he quickly gets antiquated with his cousins dirty socked foot. After which she'd go on a nice long walk through the forest, appreciating nature while also torturing Ben underfoot.
1533312211.title: Gwen's Revenge

choices: She refuses, and sets Ben to his first task, rubbing her sore feet
She gives him one more challenge, this time as Grey Matter
She gives him another chance, but in a game not fight
15333122112.content:
"I'm going to give you a chance to fight back little guy. You get three chances to try and fight me. I'm gonna try and pin you down under me. If I succeed three times, then you lose, and you're my property for the rest of your life." Gwen explained, lowering Ben down to the ground in front of her sneaker clad feet.

"No way am I playing your stupid game!" Ben yelled, trying to take a stand against his sadistic cousin.

"Well if you want to forfeit now and become my toy... I'm sure I can find something to do with you. My feet are actually kind of tired. A good foot rub would be lovely. And the best part is, you're small enough that I could slip you inside my shoe to massage me while I walk around." Gwen teased, twisting her foot on the floor tauntingly as she did so.

Ben shuddered at the thought, but Gwen's message was crystal clear. Play for the chance of freedom, or give in to the torture she had planned. "Alright Gwen I'll play your stupid game. Let's get this over with."

"That's what I like to hear dweeb. Listening to your master already." Gwen said, lifting her foot up over her cousin. "Good luck." was the last thing she said before her foot came down rapidly.

Luckily, dozens of alien encounters had forced Ben to develop quick reflexes, and without even thinking about it he slammed his hand on his watch and activated XLR8, his fastest alien. Even so, at his new size his speed only allowed him to just barely dodge the gigantic redhead's foot.

"Good choice Ben. I like a challenge." Gwen snickered, before activating a spell that created a circular force field around the clearing they were currently in, ensuring Ben couldn't merely run away and hide from his evil cousin.

Ben ran as fast as he could, zig zagging left and right in an attempt to trip up Gwen. However, she seemed prepared for every maneuver, constantly right on his tail with her giant white sneakers.

Suddenly, a massive white wall slammed down in front of him, blocking his path. He immediately skidded to a stop, his foot just barely tapping the sneaker clad foot of his giant cousin as he turned around and shot off in the other direction. He barely even got moving before a second foot, identical to the first, blocked his path once more. This time, he had no time to turn around, and slammed into it head on.

"Oof, that must have hurt." Gwen giggled, watching her little cousin fall to the floor, sprawled out from the impact. With a quick pivot of her heel, the toe of her sneaker was on top of his lower body, pinning him to the muddy earth.

Ben struggled to lift the shoe off of him, but to no avail. He sighed in defeat as he realized his cousin had won round 1. As if aware of his defeat, his watch began to beep, timing out and returning him to his human form. Now only his tiny head remained sticking out from under her shoe, and his entire body felt as though it was going to give in under the pressure.

Fortunately, Gwen lifted her foot before Ben turned into nothing more than a squished bug wriggling about in the mud. Without warning, he was lifted into the air by her magic, resulting in him floating before her face.

"Looks like someone got a little muddy. Can't have that. Wouldn't want you to stain my pants." Gwen said, before quickly mouthing a second spell that whisked the goopy muck off of him, leaving his clothes perfectly clean.

"What do you mean you don't want me to stain your pants?" Ben asked, confused.

"Oh you'll see." Gwen replied, before giving her wrist a quick flick, sending her tiny cousin hurtling towards a nearby stump.

Ben slammed head on into the hard wooden surface, sliding along it for a bit before coming to a stop in the middle of the stump. Laying on his back, he was able to watch as his giant cousin sauntered over to the stump, smiling as she inspected his tiny form. She gave the shrunken boy a quick wink before suddenly turning her back to him, revealing her white capri clad butt to her horrified cousin.

"Time for round two. Think fast!" was all Gwen said before allowing herself to fall backwards, her butt on a direct collision course with Ben. Just in the nick of time, Ben managed to slam on his watch, causing a bright flash as he transformed into another alien.

"Oooo Four Arms. Good choice." Gwen teased as she felt her butt meet the four tiny arms of her cousin's strongest alien. "I bet once I win this game and get to keep you forever, Four Arms could give me some really good massages. My glutes really do get sore from riding around in the Rust Bucket all day."

Meanwhile, Ben didn't have time to respond to his cousin's taunting, as all of his focus was on keeping his cousin's giant ass from crushing him. He had two of his four arms on each of her cheeks, and was putting every last ounce of his energy into holding her up. Her doughy flesh was hard to get a good hold of, and each of his hands was seemingly sinking into her flesh. Ben knew this wouldn't last forever though. With each passing second, he could feel his strength faltering as his knees Ben lower and lower, slowly succumbing to her weight. He desperately hoped that she would get off of him before he was overcome by her ass, but naturally he had no such luck. After about 45 seconds, his arms gave out, causing him to fall down onto his back and giving him a split second glimpse of her butt as it quickly came down on top of him.

"Oooowww. You dropped me." Gwen said, annoyed. "At least you were nice enough to break my fall though." Gwen teased, rubbing her butt into the tiny red alien who was cushioning her rear end. "Still, I may need you to kiss my butt later to help it heal." Gwen burst out laughing at the thought of her cousin being forced to kiss her butt, and her desire to win this game grew even stronger.

Ben didn't find any of this funny as he was currently pinned beneath Gwen's giant and surprisingly well toned glutes, unable to see or feel anything what wasn't his cousin's butt or the unforgiving wood of the stump below him. He was sprawled out like a 7 legged starfish as her weight completely dominated him. As she grinned her butt back and forth on his tiny body, he was trapped in the crevice between her two cheeks, dragged along for the ride as first one cheek pushed him, then the other. He silently hoped she would get off of him before his watch timed out, only to hear the familiar beep sequence begin. Before he could even begin to panic, he was once again a human boy, still trapped under his giant cousin.

Human Ben didn't make quite as good of a cushion as alien Ben, so Gwen stood up off the stump, ready for round three. However, when she turned around to look at the stump, she was surprised to find no sign of Ben. That is, until she felt a tiny little man twitching between her ass cheeks.

"As much as I'd love to have you between my ass cheeks Ben, we still have one more round of our game to play." Gwen taunted, effortlessly pulling Ben out of his fleshy prison and dropping him back down on the ground. "Since this is the last round, I'll be nice. No sneak attacks this time. Just choose whatever alien you want."

Ben thought carefully about this decision. before finally deciding on the perfect candidate. Inspiration struck, and Ben looked up at Gwen with a grin as he slammed down on the Omnitrix, ready to turn into the alien he was confident could beat Gwen: Way Big.

Ben felt himself growing as he activated Way Big, confident he would be big enough to overpower his cousin. However, when the growing stopped, he instead found that he was only about as tall as her hips.

"Ohh, so you wanna wrestle do you Ben?" Gwen teased, cracking her knuckles.

Disappointed though he was, Ben charged in, aware this was his last chance to beat his cousin. He braced himself and charged forward, hoping to knock out Gwen's knees. Unfortunately, she had had her fair share of fights with their alien enemies as well, and her reflexes showed that. Her hands met his, initiating a rather one sided grappling session.

"How's it feel to know even your biggest alien is smaller than me?" Gwen laughed, not fully comprehending just how small Ben was until now. She had to admit that Way Bug was strong, and holding him at bay was still a challenge, but there was still no doubt in her mind that she would be the victor of this fight. She just needed an angle of attack...

Meanwhile, it was all Ben could do to keep Gwen at bay. Any attacks he could think of would only result in him being thrown off balance, which was something he could not afford when fighting such a big opponent. He decided his only chance was to drop in low and go for her legs. Taking a deep breath, he released his grip and made his move.

In a flash, it was all over. Anticipating his attack, Gwen leapt into the air and caught Way Big between her legs, twisting him off his feet and driving him into the ground with extreme dexterity. When Ben his the ground, Gwen was right behind him, landing in a split of sorts on his chest. All he could see was her crotch just below his shoulders as he struggled to escape, aware of the consequences of a third loss. Unfortunately, every effort proved fruitless, and before long he was met with the familiar sound of the Omnitrix timing out.

Gwen chose to spare her cousin in this moment, standing up to her full towering height rather than pinning his human form under her crotch. She laughed as he shrank back down to his new size, or as she would put it, his rightful size.

"Well Ben, that's three for three. Looks like I won the game. You know what that means!" Gwen said, excitement building as her mind rushed with possibilities.

"Please Gwen! Reconsider!" Ben begged, no longer caring about his pride after seeing what Gwen could do to him.

"Hmmmm... I suppose I could give you another chance...." Gwen mused. What happens?
15333122112.title: Omnitrix Dominatrix
