1533312222.title: Young Justice: Invasion

15333122222.content:
*This story will take place on a timeline where the six Justice League members who were supposed to stand trial on Rimbor stay on Earth.*

Nightwing was alone early one morning inside the team's cave base on Mount Justice, having pulled an all-nighter decoding enemy intel.

He was busy studying the file's left behind by Aqualad and the Kroloteans after Malina Island was destroyed by a bomb of unknown alien origin.

Luckily for him the Justice League’s advanced alien translator had decrypted more than two third of the intel, giving him knowledge of why the Kroloteans wanted to abduct normal humans.

“It looks like they were looking for something inside of us, there’s no English word for it but the closest translation is *Meta-Gene*, or the human ability to develop superpowers in dangerous situations.” Nightwing said aloud.

“They must have teamed up with The Light in an attempt to duplicate or transfer these powers to people who would serve them.” which could prove disastrous for both the League and the Team.

“I better send this to Captain Atom & Batman for Analysis.” the nineteen year old hero said to himself, forwarding the decrypted data to the Watchtower’s main computer.

“There’s files here on super-powered individuals both hero and villain, but how did they plan to transfer their abilities?” Nightwing asked himself, not noticing any pattern or method described in the text.

“How did The Light get access to DNA from Black Canary, The Atom, and Flash?” realizing that he was looking at the possible schematics that could build an army.

He opened the file for Dr. Ray Palmer AKA The Atom who was earth’s smallest hero, not to mention one of the greatest minds on the planet.

“This doesn’t make any sense, Dr. Palmer uses technology to shrink himself and gain superhuman strength. He doesn’t actually have any powers to copy.” opening a new page that had a circle in the center.

“So why would they have a file for him knowing that?” Placing his hand inside the circle, then by either magic or sorcery Nightwing felt a sharp shock against his palm.

Over the next few moments he watched as the room grew around him at an exponential rate, standing on the floor below the holographic screen he was working on at only an inch tall.

"Oh, that's why. The Kroloteans must have found a way to duplicate Atom's powers from cells they acquired from him while he was shrunk." Nightwing realized, although he had no way of communicating this information with anyone at his size.

"Which mean's I'm stuck like this, perfect. Hopefully someone from the team will com by so I can get their attention." he continued, hoping that he was fortunate enough to also receive Atom's strength.

Just then he felt footsteps vibrating the ground he was standing on, accompanied by a bright light as _________ exited the Zeta beam transporter.

153331222311.content:
Batman was one the trail of a new meta-human who could create new gases out of thin air, he/she had been going from town to town stealing tech from different firms. Although they were always able to escape with the help of their unique powers.

First they escaped from a robotics lab in Washington with the use of a new nerve gas that wasn't easily countered, that was when the case first caught the detective's attention.

Then they managed to give Stargirl and Green Arrow the slip at Lexcorp thanks to the help of a quickly whipped up hallucinogen, it mimicked the effects of Scarecrow's fear toxin by making them see enemies that weren't there. Both heroes were brought to the Watchtower for further evaluation and after several hours were healed.

Finally they escaped Star Labs by creating a smokescreen that gave them them the ability to even The Flash, now Batman had taken a personal investment in the case by staking out the next target, Wayne Enterprises. Following the list of places hit so far it became logical that this would be the next target for creating a miniature fusion generator.

Two hours into his Stakeout Batman heard the alarm bell ringing and swung into action by the end of his grappling hook, crashing through the window in the hopes of catching them off guard.

“Stop right there, if you're smart then you’ll stand down.” Batman said, standing confidently over the broken glass. Having inoculated himself to the gases this mysterious villain had used to defeat his friends before entering the building.

“We’ll see about that Bat-Bug.” a female voice said, a cherry red smile appearing under her cloak leaving her face hidden. She waved her arm and a purple vapor stretch across the room and into his lungs giving her the chance to escape while Batman was distracted.

Finally the smoke cleared and Batman immediately noticed that the room was bigger than before, much bigger in fact. The gas she used must of caused him to shrink in size, much like the powers of The Atom AKA Ray Palmer.

"Gone." he said, scanning the now giant room to see that the thief had vanished completely. Seconds later ____________ responded to the alarm to back Batman up, but will she be able to find the inch tall Batman?
153331222311.title: Inch Tall Batman

153331222331.title: Ed, Edd & Eddy

1533312223312.content:
It had been a week since Eddy was able to come up with a scam on his own, his last one ending with Double D and Ed being grounded for two weeks each.

Because of this fact Eddy had been forced to steal one of Double D's inventions to use in his latest scam which he has titled "Dr. Eddy's amazing shrink stand".

He called it this because the invention that he had borrowed from his nerdy friend was an experimental shrinking gun which Double D had been working on.

His plan was to shrink anything in his room he deemed unnecessary and put it away in a draw for safe keeping, this would keep his room nice and tidy while saving labels.

But while he was grounded Eddy had managed to sneak the device away in the hopes of attaining jawbreaker money, offering to shrink any object for just one quarter.

The young con artist set up the stand near the playground, hoping to draw in the largest crowd and more importantly the largest amount of cash possible.

"Okay, I'm all set up and ready to go. Now all I have to do is make sure this thing works and those suckers will be lining my pockets in no time." Eddy smiled, standing behind the wooden stand with the shrink ray in hand.

On top of the wooden counter sat a glass full of water which Eddy had taken from home so that he'd have some way of testing Double D's invention before using it in his scam.

"I think one inch tall should be small enough to loosen those sucker's piggy banks." Eddy smiled, turning the dial on the device to it's near lowest setting.

Eddy took a set back and held the device close to the glass of water so he wouldn't miss the glass and hit the stand by mistake, not having any idea of how to grow thinks back to normal size after they've been shrunk.

He then pulled down on the trigger and in the blink of an eye he would never see the world in the same way again, the reflective surface of the glass rebounding the beam back into his chest.

In only a matter of seconds Eddy went from standing at four feet tall to no larger than a single inch in size, now standing atop the stand he had designed to con the kids of the Cul-de-sac out of the quarters.

"Wha-What the...?" was all Eddy could say as the wooden table top stretch out to the approximate length of a football field from end to end.

Then, without warning Eddy found himself in the cool shadow of someone he knew. Looking up he saw that it was non other than __________.
1533312223312.title: The Incredible Shrinking Eddy Scam

153331222333131.content:
It was a normal day in Beverly Hills, meaning sunshine, little to no clouds, intense heat, and local teenagers shopping at the mall. One of which was in for a big surprise in the near future, a black haired girl by the name of Mandy.

Mandy was the high school rival of Sam, Clover, and Alex. Doing anything and everything in her power to make their lives more difficult, especially when it came to Clover. She had fought with the blonde teenager over shoes, dresses, even growing to a height of over fifty feet tall and fighting her for the crown in the Miss Beverly Hills Pageant.(http://totallyspies.wikia.com/wiki/Attac...)

The cold-hearted teen made her way into the mall, passed the food court, eventually making her way into a new fashion store that seemed to have opened up shop overnight. Apparently they only sold the best selections from every fashion designer on the planet, quickly attracting Mandy's attention.

She started explored their footwear section and was surprised by the fact that she was the only person in the store, chopping it up to the ideal that she was the only person in Beverley Hills with 'real' fashion sense. In her mind she was the queen and all should bow down before her, little did she realize that she was about to be the one going down.

In the blink of an eye she noticed a strange trail of green lightning shoot out in her direction, nailing her in the chest and knocking her onto the floor. Following this was an odd sensation that made her body tingle from head to toe, something about this feeling seeming familiar in the back of her mind. Of course she couldn't very well remember it completely after having her memory erased by Whoop agents after she terrorized Beverly Hills last month at fifty plus feet tall.

Suddenly the room around her seemed to expand infinitely, but for her that wasn't even the worst part. She had to watch all the designer clothes around grow to sizes that would better fit a giant. Eventually she was small enough that the dresses around her would fall over with her inside, the tiny pockets of the designer jeans able to hold her, and the boots big enough for her to live in.

"What is going on here? What's the big idea?" Mandy asked the massive foot of __________ landed beside her, giving her a direct answer as to what the "big idea" was.
153331222333131.title: Fashion Trap

1533312223332.title: Johnny Test

15333122233321.content:
Susan & Mary Test had called on their younger brother Johnny to be the guinea pig for their latest invention, which was actually just an improvement on their original shrink ray. Some of the improvements they made actually addressed the primal fears of being shrunk, such as increased body density to avoid being crushed if the object or person shrunk were accidentally stepped on.

Another improvement they had made was the addition of a frequency adjuster on the back of the device, allowing it to double as a growth ray and return objects and people to their normal size. This was done as a precautionary measure after Johnny accidentally shrunk himself into a subatomic universe to ensure it never happened again.

“Do I have too?” Johnny asked annoyed as he was pushed into his twin sisters lab, wanting to play the newest version of Smash Badger he had just gotten.

“Yes!” Susan and Mary said in near perfect unison as the metal door closed behind them, trapping Johnny inside their lab.

“This free experiment coupon is good whenever, wherever!” Mary pointed out, holding up a handwritten piece of paper the fiery haired sibling had given them in exchange for them using their scientific knowhow to help him out with something unrelated to the current situation.

“But Dukey and I just got Smash Badger 7 and…” Johnny argued before being cut off by his sisters once more.

“Whenever, wherever, no exceptions!” Susan pointed out, grabbing the device they were suppose to be testing off her workbench and setting it to her and Mary’s agreed settings.

“Okay Johnny, not you might feel a slight tingle.” Mary mused, taking shelter behind a glass shield as Susan aimed the gun like device at their little brother.

In the blink of an eye Susan’s finger pulled back the trigger, sending a beam of green energy into Johnny’s rib cage. His body was propelled into the air as a the sensation of being reduced in size sent shivers down his spine, causing great discomfort and some pain as his molecules were fused together.

“There, that wasn’t so bad now was it ‘little’ bro?” Susan teased as she stepped forward, putting emphasis behind the word little to express how small Johnny look from her point of view. Meanwhile Johnny got a different view of his twin siblings as Susan and Mary walked in front of him. Mary’s olive green sneakers and Susan’s black flats striking the floor of the lab with immense force, creating endless tremors for the shrunken boy as their shadows overlapped on top of him.

“That’s it, a shrink ray? Been there, done that now grow me back to normal so I can go play my new game.” Johnny said, trying his best not to be intimidated by his orange haired sisters towering overhead.

“Oh did we forget to mention that this is kind of a two part experiment, we need to run some tests on you too see if our improvements to our old shrink ray were a success.” Mary said, shooting down any hopes of Johnny being down with this experience anytime soon.

“Yeah, and for our first test we thought it would be fun to have ________ as a test of your endurance.” Susan smiled, unnerving Johnny as her hand reached down for him on the floor.

1. "...Mary sit on you." Susan grabs Johnny and drops him on Mary's seat in front of their computer, holding him while Mary positions herself over the seat. She'd likely describe how uncomfortable her seat usual is and how she hopes Johnny will soften it up for her before she sits down.

2. "...me walk on you." Susan slides off her flats and drops Johnny inside, telling him to stay right where he is as she raises her foot over her footwear. Johnny would try running from her foot, only to end up under then between her toes.

3. "...us toss you out the window to see if you can get back in here." Susan and Mary would carry Johnny to their window and toss the shrunken boy outside, knowing his increased density would prevent him from sustaining damage. But will he get back or be found by someone else?
15333122233321.title: Sunan & Mary's Very Little Brother

153331222333333.content: How about someone from Adventure Time?
153331222333333.title: Adventure Time?

1533312223333331.content:
Finn the Human woke up with a headache. He sat up. "I guess PB's machine really did work this time, huh, Jake...Jake?" But his canine companion was nowhere to be seen. The testing of Princess Bubblegum's teleportation ray was a success -- probably. Finn and Jake had both been hit by the same ray blast, but apparently ended up in separate locations. Whatever happened next, it would be up to Finn alone to deal with it, without his magical shape-shifting friend. For someone so used to being a part of a duo, the effect was...disconcerting.

What Finn did not know was the origin of the machine that Princess Bubblegum had used on him. It contained components from a previously-built shrink ray as well as various other scientific projects done in the Candy Kingdom. If it was successful, it could be used to secretly place tiny, indestructible cameras all over the Candy Kingdom and beyond. The Princess could see anyone, anywhere. The ultimate way to create a secure society.

There was, however, a major problem, as Finn would quickly discover. Some parts worked while others...didn't. While the shrink ray component worked magnificently, and he was rendered immune to fire, snow, sleet, hail, and postal officers, the teleportation was erratic and there was no way to recall things sent off by the machine. The tiny hero was stuck wherever he was. But where was he? He didn't see much of anything from his vantage point in the darkness. The material he was on appeared to be reasonably soft and comfortable. There wasn't enough light to really see where he was, except for a dim glow behind him.

But before he could turn to see where he was, he heard the stomping of feet, growing closer and closer. Finn ran to the edge of the soft material. Below, he sensed there was something hard. He quickly leaped down and tried to run, but was quickly met by an unrelenting, hard wall of darkness. Reeling, he attempted to climb back up the soft surface, only to find the light was much stronger now. Temporarily blinded, Finn stumbled and fell onto the soft surface, crawling under one layer of it for some respite. Throughout all of this, there was one burning question in his mind; where was he, and who was he with?

Choice One: He is in Marceline's closet again, and has just hidden himself in some of her clothing -- clothing she is about to put on!

Choice Two: He has just tucked himself into the throne of the Flame Princess, and she is about to sit down!

154113.content:
“Ugh, where am I?” Hans said, groggily regaining his consciousness after his trial.

“Shh, shh, he’s waking up.” Spoke the familiar voice of Queen Elsa of Arendelle, although her voice was noticeably more cheerful than when he last saw her.

“Whoa, he’s so tiny.” Said Anna, following up her elder sister’s statement.

“Wha-What does she mean by that? I’m tiny?” Hans muttered, recalling his punishment set by the Southern Isles grand council.

“That’s right, I was found guilty of trying to seize control of Arendelle and shrunk as punishment. But where am I?” Hans said aloud, sitting up and opening his eyes to the sight of an enormous Elsa with an equally gigantic Anna standing beside her.

“Hey ladies, it’s nice to see you again. You two sure have gotten big since the last time I saw you.” Hans said, hoping he could talk the Queen and her sister out of planning his execution. Which would likely entail one of them stepping on him like a cockroach beneath their royal footwear.

“Right you are Hans, it is nice to see you again.” Elsa smiled, brushing her white blonde hair to the side with her free hand. Giving Hans a false glimmer of hope that this might all end well for him.

“Oh, so have you forgiven me for the whole ‘trying to kill you’ thing?” Hans asked awkwardly, using air quotes in an attempt to soften the rough history the trio shared.

“Not even close you worm, what my sister meant is that we’re happy to see you again at this size. So we can crush you like a bug if you disobey us.” Anna announced, looking down at the inch tall man who’d lied to her and left her for dead. Crushing any hopes he might have had about living through this ordeal or ever returning to his normal size.

“What do you mean by disobeying you?” Hans asked, sure that he would not like the answer given to him by the giantess sisters.

“We’ve come up with our own punishment for you Prince Hans of the Southern Isles, one that fits the crime you’ve committed.” Elsa smiled, her wicked grin striking fear into the shrunken man’s heart.

“It has been decided that you will never again be allowed to step foot in the Southern Isles again, instead you will be imprisoned here on Arendelle as a servant of the castle until you either die of old age or are crushed like a bug.” Anna declared, smiling alongside her sister at the shrunken man.

“No, you can’t treat me like this. I am a human being and a prince!” Hans exclaimed, yelling at the Queen and Princess of Arendelle as if what he said or felt meant anything to the uninterested girls. Suddenly Elsa’s hand closed up around him, causing Hans to panic as he used his arms and legs together in an attempt to hold off her large fingers from crushing him. But this was a futile effort, leaving Hans trapped inside the angry Ice Queen’s fist.

“Excuse me you little bug, is that anyway to talk towards your new masters. Don’t forget that you’re being punished for attempting to kill us, we’re people too. Big people, who live important lives. Not some insignificant little gnat like you are now, the value of your live was lessened because of your crime. Don’t forget this is our kingdom, if one of us crushes you I’ll simply pardon the murder as an accidental death. I mean you're so small now it’s not like anyone would find it difficult to belief you were stepped on or sat on accidentally.” Elsa said, asserting her dominance over the man who tried to kill both her and her sister Anna.

"Now Anna, I'll allow you too decide what form of punishment this worm will endure today." Elsa announced, dropping Hans into the red haired girl's waiting palm.

What does Anna have in store for Hans punishment for the day?

1. Serving as the Queen's seat cushion while she answer's the requests of the people.

2. Live the last moments of his life as a sprinkle on my Sundae.

3. "Prince's Hans should be executed immediately beneath the feet of the Princess and Queen."

One day during his six year at Hogwarts, Harry Potter was working on a special potion for his Professor Slughorn's class.

He knew that he had to rise above the skill level of the other students if he wanted Dumbledore's plan to work, that's when he decided to make a rather special potion.

Too make this particular potion he would need skills far above the ability of an average Witch or Wizard, luckily he had the Half Blood Prince's journal to guide him.

He had hoped to create a shrinking potion that not of Slughorn's previous students, not even Tom Riddle or Severous Snape(so he thought) was skillful enough to craft.

Harry had brewed it almost perfectly down to the last goblin tear but added too much dragon scale, causing it to literally blow up in his face.

The shrinking Wizard panicked as he tried wiping off the thick liquid that was causing him to shrink even smaller than the potion was designed for.

Before Harry could realized what had happened to him it was already too late, he was no bigger than an inch tall and his room was bigger than the dining hall.

Before he could move an inch Harry heard someone coming up the stairs and soon saw__________ enter the room.

"Harry, Harry are you up here?" Boomed the feminine voice of Harry Potter's best female friend Hermione Granger, well renowned be here instructors as one of the brightest witches Hogwarts had to offer.

"Hermione, I'm down here!" Harry yelled up in the hopes that she would hear him, unable to send a signal to her without the use of his wand.

"Harry, I'm coming in." Hermione announced, her flat clad foot taking it's first step into the room. The wooden floor creaking beneath her feet, sending vibrations through the floorboards all the way to Harry.

"Wait, Hermione!" Harry yelled once more as Hermione continued to walk towards him, her foot coming down only a few inches away from where he was standing. The power of her stomp almost strong enough to knock to shrunken wizard onto his ass on the floor at her feet.

"Huh, that's odd. I thought I heard something." Hermione said aloud, scanning the room for any sign of Harry or Ron's presence.

"Hermione, it's me Harry. I'm on the floor." Harry called, hoping that she would hear him more clearly.

"On the wh- Harry!" Hermione's voice boomed, looking down at her shrunken friend standing between her feet.

"Oh my, Harry! What do you think you're doing down there at that size, I could have stood on you." Hermione stated, frightening Harry with the image of himself being stuck to the bottom of his best friend's footwear.

That's when she spotted the potion's textbook Harry had borrowed for Professor Slughorn's class. She was still jealous that it was the only class Harry or anyone for that matter did better than her in.

"Oh I see, this is all because of that blasted book isn't it?" Hermione asked, her tone changing from concerned for Harry safety to annoyed at her shrunken friend for his continued use of the Half Blood Prince's textbook.

"Well, out with it. Am I right, that that book lead you to shrink yourself? I'm sure I must look absolutely massive to you down there." Hermione stated lifting her flats into the air and stomping them back down on either side of Harry's tiny body, causing powerful tremors to occur.

"Yes, I'm sorry. You and Ginny were right. I should have gotten rid of it." Harry stated, hopinh Hermione would stop making her point clear and elect to help him get back to normal.

“Harry are you up here, might I have a word with you?” called a familiar voice, it was kind yet at the same time indifferent. Harry quickly realized that this was none other than the voice of Luna Lovegood, a talent young witch who started her time at Hogwarts on the same year as Ginny Weasley, one year after Ron, Hermione and Harry first met.

“Harry Potter?” Luna asked again as she wandered into the room, her sneakers sending vibrations through the floorboards that could be felt by Harry on his bed with each step she took towards him.

“How strange, Hermione said Harry came up here not to long ago. I wonder where he’s gone.” Luna announced, confirming in Harry’s mind that it was Hermione who allowed the young Ravenclaw girl access to the Gryffindor living areas.

From Harry’s perspective Luna was bigger than any living creature he’d ever seen, several times the scale of even the largest dragon. Even the Basilisk which Harry fought during his second year was no where near comparison to how utterly massive Luna looked right now. Harry then recalled the fact that Luna was actually one of the shorter girl’s he’d known at Hogwarts since she was just over five feet tall, Ginny, Hermione, and Cho Chang on the other hand were all much closer to five and a half feet tall.

“Strange, I guess I’ll have to look for him some other place then.” Luna declared, notifying Harry that she was about to leave. He couldn’t let her go, by far she was the most likely person at Hogwarts to help him in returning to his normal size. She was one of the nicest people he’d ever met so he was sure he could trust her, calling out her name in the unlikely event that he’d be heard.

“Lunnnnna!” He yelled in as loud a sound he could produce at such a tiny size. But somehow it worked as she stopped in her tracks, her eyes glancing over the room for the source of a strange noise she’d just heard.

“That odd, I could have just sworn I heard…” Luna mumbled to herself before her eyes spotted something moving on top of Harry’s bed. “…Harry Potter!” she said surprised, taking two short steps towards Harry’s bed before kneeling down to greet him at eye level.

"Excuse me for asking this, but how is it that you've become so small? Luna asked, taken back by Harry's shrunken state.

"I haven't the foggiest idea honestly, was hopping you could help me figure that one out quite honestly." Harry said thinking a normal sized person was much better suited to solve the mystery of how he'd been shrunk. "I was making a potion for Professor Slughorn's class when suddenly it blew up in my face, shrinking me to the size I am now. I was sure that I had followed the directions perfectly.

"Hmm, very mysterious." Luna said, looking over Harry's supplies for the potion before coming to a conclusion.

"These scale bare quite the resemblance to those found on a Dabberblimp, you know I saw some earlier this year actually." Luna said, reminding Harry that she was talking to Nearly Neadless Nick and others about such a creature before he took her to Slughorn's dinner party.

"So what's a Dabberblimp?" Harry asked, having never heard of any of the creatures Luna's ever talked about before. However if it meant that he could return to normal size than it would be worth it.

"Well, you see they're aquatic based creatures that use their colorful scales too hunt, luring in prey and shrinking them with a solution they secrete from their skin before swallowing them alive. It's all rather interesting actually." Luna rambled on.

"Is there any way in which you could return me to normal?" Harry asked, unaware of how much he'd dislike Luna's answer.

"Well, actually yes there is. However first you'll need to ___________"

1. Spend several hours under my feet.

2. Get help from someone else. (Drops Harry down the back of her panties while she looks for someone)

3. Be digested by someone.

Ron fantasized about using the shrinking potion on Snape, and 'accidentally' troding on him as he dropped the last ingredient into the caldron. Suddenly the potion started bubbling. Ron cursed loudly. He had forgotten to steam the roots before putting them in. With a loud splat, a huge glob of the potion landed on his book bag. Ron watched in horror as it shrank. He attempted to clear the caldron will a spell, but it backfired. With a bang his caldron burst into a million little pieces. The potion splattered all over his skin and clothes. Ron frantically tried to wipe it off, but his skin was already getting tingly.

Ron swore again as he began to shrink. In a matter of seconds he had dwindled in size to about a half of an inch tall. Ron was now standing on the bench, which now appeared to be the size of the Great Hall. The table top was way above his head and the floor looked like it was at the bottom of a cliff. Although none of these goal seemed feasible if he wasn't able to gain more power, so following in the footsteps of Tom Riddle the young Slytherin boy began his search at the library.

He had been given special access to all off limit area's after joining Delores Umbridge's task force to take down Dumbledore's Army.

What he didn't know was that Hermione who often visited the restricted section thought that if any of the spells used in the tomes would be dangerous, had taken it upon herself to alter the knowledge inside.

During her fifth year at Hogwarts, Muggle born witch and top student in her class Hermione Granger decided to practice in making her own spell to help crush her opponents...literally.

Hermione had spent the past month working on a spell that would shrink an opposing wizard or Death Eater down to only an inch in size, while also draining them of their magically power making it possible more powerful than the three unforgivable curses.

The idea was for her to shrink a Death Eater and capture them in order to extract enemy Intel that could be critical in defeating Voldemort, and one that had been accomplished the enemy could be easily disposed of by being stepped on like a bug rather than being sent to Askaban where they might be freed.

The 16 year old witch had called 15 year old witches Luna Lovegood and Ginny Weasley to bear witness to her spells first crowning achievement, bringing them into her room where she had set up a book about Hogwarts on her study desk to test her shrinking charm on.

Luna picked up the book curious since she had never received one, saying that the Nargles had taken it from her. Ginny made a comment saying "There's not much helpful left in there that you could learn, it's all very basic really." taking the book from her hand and leaving it open on the page of Gryffindor tower, specifically the boys dormitory.

Finally Ginny and Luna backed up as Hermione pronounced the incantation "Reducio!" sending a purple ray of light from her wand into the book, but strangely nothing happened, had her shrinking charm failed?

"Bloody hell! What went wrong?" Hermione asked herself knowing that her spell should have been working perfectly, Ginny and Luna able to see Hermione was upset rushed across the room to comfort her.

"It's ok Hermione you'll get it next time." Luna said her her usual soft sweet tone, "That's right even Dumbledore has had trouble perfecting spells." Ginny said trying to make Hermione feel better.

"Lets go see if Ron and Harry want to get Lunch with us in the main hall and then we'll come back to this." Hermione said deciding to take a break before she went back to try and figure out what made her charm fail.

---10 minutes later---

The girls had walked down the stairs of the girls dormitory and up the boys, while Hermione explained to Luna that Dumbledore had cast a spell himself to turn the girls stair into a slide should a boy try to climb them.

"Mimbulus Mimbletonia." Hermione said to the photo of the fat lady outside the boy's dormitory, having received the password from Harry earlier on in the year.

The photo opened up and allowed the girls access to the room although it appeared as if they were the only ones. "Strange where is everyone?" Luna asked her first step into the room, unknowingly crushing Lee Jordan who had served as commentator during the schools quidditch matches under her foot.

"I'm gonna go look for Ron and Harry in their room." Hermione said heading up the stairs while Ginny decided to take a seat while she waited, heading further into the boys common room after spotting a seemingly empty couch.

Nigel Wolpert a Gryffindor student that was new to Hogwarts and had joined Dumbledore's army just after it had formed a few weeks ago looked up to see the gigantic Weasley girl approaching the couch.

Ginny turned her butt over the shrunken boy and called out to Hermione heading up the stairs "That's fine, we'll just wait here." before allowing herself to fall down to the couch with a hard and heavy bounce flattening Nigel underneath her butt.

Meanwhile Hermione had reached to top of the stairs to see that nobody was around up here either, unaware that Dean Thomas, Neville Longbottom, Seamus Finnigan, Colin Creevey, Fred&George Weasley, Ron Weasley and Harry Potter were all shrunk on the floor as she walked towards them.

The eight tiny students scattered as Hermione's feet stuck the floor with thunderous booming collisions, getting closer by the moment as her eyes darted towards the floor as a result of seeing sudden movement in her peripheral vision.

"Ugh, bugs! Leave it to a bunch of boys to let insects into Gryffindor Tower." Hermione said looking around "Guess it's up to a girl to get rid of them." Hermione said lifting her foot above the closest of her classmates she assumed to be a bug, Colin Creevey.

The tiny Colin ran at the sight of the giant witch raising her black shoe high above him, ready at a moments notice to bring it down and end his life in seconds under her foot.

Colin screamed out from help, hoping that Hermione would hear his pleas for help and spare his life, unfortunately it was too late. The fifth year witch swiftly brought her foot down to the floor in one decisive moment crushing the photography enthusiast without a second thought before Ginny and Luna came up the stairs after hearing a commotion.

Will the girls find out that the seven boys left are Gryffindor students or will they help Hermione crush the remaining few like bugs?
15513221.title: Shrink The Boys

choices: You have Quiditch game today don't you Ginny?
Let's bring them back to Luna's dorm.
Well I'll be taking Seamus and Ron back to my Dorm for a bit of fun.
155132211.content:
The three girls looked down upon the seven boys on the floor at their feet, who in turn were looking up at them with a strange sensation of terror filling their hearts. This was specifically true of Ron and Harry who had just watched Hermione, whom they had known since their first day at Hogwarts, crush someone under her foot.

The boys still couldn't believe what had just happened as one of their best friends for years wiped the blood of a boy from their dorm from underneath her shoe along the floor of the boys bedroom, before then turning her attention towards the other seven boys.

Luna stepped up closer to the group of tiny boys before turning around and looking at Hermione "What going on up here?" she asked in a soft almost sweet tone before Hermione answered "This place is infested with some kind of bugs!" pointing down at the seven remaining boys.

Ginny, not afraid to get her feet dirty, stepped up in front of both Hermione and Luna, the ground shaking as each step she took created a larger and larger quake for the tiny boys at her feet.

The youngest of the Weasley family put her hands on her hips and let out a playful laugh "Ugh leave it to my brothers to attract bugs into the tower." her shadow casting itself over them all as her feet came to rest on the floor in front of them.

At their size Ginny looked as if she were nearly as tall as the Castle of Hogwarts itself (minus fifty feet or so.) as the towering gigantic Weasley girl lifted her foot high above the group ."I'll take them all out in one stomp." she said, striking fear into the tiny boys hearts that froze them where they stood.

Fred, George, and Ron all felt shaken and embarrassed at the thought of having their lives brought to a swift end under the bottom of their youngest sibling's foot like bugs, although that would not stop her from crushing them like insects.

Ginny, who had already proven herself to be the most magically gifted and powerful of her siblings, brought her foot down hard without any remorse whatsoever for the bugs lives about to be crushed under her shoe's sole

"Ginny wait!!!" Luna yelled, causing Ginny to stop dead in her tracks, her foot only an inch or two over the boys as they looked up, covering their ears from Luna's loud voice vibrating through the air, knowing that if she had spoken even a moment later they'd all be stuck to the bottom of Ginny shoe clad foot right about now.

"What it is Luna? I was just about to stomp them out." Ginny said hoping that Luna's reason for stopping her was a good one as she wiggled her toes inside her shoe, finding herself liking the idea of crushing several living creatures in a single swift movement.

"I don't think they're bugs at all." Luna said walking closer, reminding the boys very clearly of the thunderous booms these girls made when their feet came into contact with the floor. Bringing her sweet smiling face down closer to the ground as Ginny's foot retracted, Luna could see that she had been right in her assumption.

Luckily for the boys Luna's mother had practiced in making spells and charms much like Hermione had earlier and always kept an open mind in these situations "Look closely. These are the boys." said Luna making both Ginny and Hermione skeptical since these words had been spoken by 'Loony Luna' herself.

Ginny bent over while Hermione ran towards the boys, her feet hitting the floor in rapid succession creating a long steady quake before her foot landing inches away from the boys nearly crushing Dean Thomas in the process before leaning in to get a closer look herself.

"My gosh, she's right." Hermione said as Ginny looked down upon their frightened faces imagining how terrified they must have been after nearly being crushed under her feet moments ago.

"Are you guys ok? Ginny asked trying to mend how they might feel towards them, but for some reason they seemed more afraid of Hermione who had unbeknownst to Ginny actually crushed someone before their very eyes unlike Ginny who had just nearly crushed them.

"Hermione... you crushed Colin under your foot." Harry said speaking up as the shrunken group's leader in this situation, telling Hermione of her unknown past actions as she thought back to the little bug she had snuffed out of existence upon coming upstairs.

Hermione felt bad for a few moments but it wasn't like she knew him very well "Opps, sorry about that." was all she had to say about the subject knowing that there was nothing she could have done to bring him back. However, there was something she could do to prevent the other boys from suffering the same fate.

Hermione reached into her robe and pulled out her wand, pointing it down at the tiny boys, giving them hope that she might be growing them back to normal size. "Vulnera Sanentur" Hermione said speaking a charm many of the boys knew to be a healing spell.

"Bloody hell Hermione, you can't heal shrinking. You need some kind of growth spell" Ron said to the giant muggle born witch.

"Of course I know that, However until I can find a way to reverse my shrinking charm, you are all going to need to remain this size and the spell I just cast will keep us from accidentally crushing you. Although I advise you remain cautious because it isn't 100% protective and you could still be crushed provided there's enough pressure on you." Hermione said not giving the boys much of a choice in the matter.

"Wait a minute, you did this to us?" Seamus asked unable to believe that even miss Hermione Granger herself was capable of such a thing, creating panicked conversation amongst the boys.

Ginny lifted her foot into the air and stomped her shoe into the ground as hard as she possibly could to restore order "Listen up you ninnies we're trying to help you. If you want to feel free and roam the castle at this size then be my guest, I'm sure the rest of the girls in Gryffindor wouldn't mind crushing a few bugs like you under their feet as well." leaving them with only one option, to trust the girls.

Ginny, Luna, and Hermione stood up to talk about what their next move would be on how to deal with this situation. Before long Luna suggested keeping the boys somewhere that they couldn't be spotted or escape from easily. "You mean like in our shoes?" Hermione asked. "That'd work, except there are seven of them and we only have six feet between us" Hermione said leaving one boy without a place to go.

"Don't worry Hermione I have a special place just for Harry." Ginny said referencing her long time crush on Harry ever since they first met at platform 9 3/4 causing Ginny to spend the entire next summer asking Ron everything about him.

"Ok then, shall we tell them?" Luna asked smiling normally as if having two of the boys trapped under her feet gasping for air under her feet was a rather normal occurrence for her.

In order from left to right Dean Thomas(Luna's left shoe) although he would have much rather wanted to get closer to Ginny's feet since he had a crush on her and would have ended up dating her the next year if he hadn't shrunk, Neville Longbottom(Luna's right shoe), Fred(Ginny's left shoe)& George(Ginny's right shoe) Weasley embarrassed to be standing in front of their sister's shoes knowing they would be humiliated under her feet, Ron Weasley(Hermione's left shoe), and Seamus Finnigan(Hermione's right shoe) lined up to take their place under the giantess witches feet.

At a loss for words the boys simply climbed up the hill side from of the girls shoe and jumping through the holes willingly trapping themselves inside. Neville probably got the worst out of the situation as the girl he had a crush on pushed her smelly sweaty foot onto his puny body.

After a few moments had passed all three girl had readjusted their shoes to their feet, having to admit that the shrunken boys made great insoles. Ginny was probably most pleased with the results as she felt her two older brothers struggling against the ball of her foot, their faces trapped underneath her toes before she turned her attention to Harry.

Ginny having something special in mind for Harry, reached down and picked him up between her fingers effortlessly before bringing him to her bright smiling face. "I've got a special surprise for you Harry." Ginny stated in a somewhat nervous tone as she used her free hand to subtlety peeling her panties, stockings and skirt from her skin allowed fresh cold air to breeze across her cheeks.

Bringing Harry from her face to her but without a word on warning couldn't help but release a single giggle knowing that Hermione and Luna were watching from only a few feet away.

"You'll be staying in my bum." Ginny announced with a thick British accent placed on the word 'bum' as she spoke, letting go of Harry and sending him falling in between her butt-cheeks where he soon became trapped.

Looking up he saw the only entryway and exit route close up as Ginny allowed her clothes to snap back into position, trapping him against her warm flesh. "So what do we do now?" she asked adjusting her panties to make herself more comfortable.

Hermione finally spoke and said...
155132211.title: Hiding Underfoot

1551322111.content:

Ginny trail of thoughts about how great it was that the boys had been accidentally shrunk by Hermione’s voice from behind her “Ginny didn’t you and Harry have a Quidditch game against Ravenclaw today?” she asked seemingly knowing everything as she reminded Ginny of the game starting in half an hour.

“Drat, now I need to play seeker because Harry’s too small.” Ginny exclaimed referring to the shrunken wizard as he struggled against her butt-cheeks, If the rest of the Quidditch team and several other Gryffindor students weren’t out of the commons then a scene surely could have been made regarding the missing students.

Ginny didn’t have much time and would need to begin heading towards the changing rooms immediately if she hoped to make it in time for the start of the first game of the school year after practicing hard since last year while Harry was participating in the Tri-Wizard Tournament.

As Ginny began walking out of the Gryffindor common room with hurried steps, Hermione watched as her younger friends hips moved from left to right with each step she took wondering what it must have been like for Harry at his size.

No matter what Hermione could imagine regarding Harry predicament was no where near accurate regarding the crushing pressure he was experiencing between Ginny’s flesh, after hours and hours of practicing her lower body including her glutes had become very well toned in size and muscle.

Ginny’s Quidditch uniform- http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20090...(HBP_promo)_3.jpg

The smell was absolutely horrible, their surroundings soaked in the young girls foot sweat since she had never washed or cleaned them since she got them about a year earlier, back then she had only bought them and learned to play Quidditch in an attempt to impress Harry.

Although that all seemed to be in the distant past as the 10 players took to the field(5 per team) and flew up, forcing Ginny to realize what it would mean to play the game all the way through to the end with Harry between her butt-cheeks.

Nevertheless Ginny hardened her nerves not being to remove Harry from her panties at this point without people making a fuss, she might also put Hermione and Luna in danger of getting in trouble if anyone discovered they had a total of four boys under their feet as they entered the stands above.

Ginny stepped over her broom and bent over lowering herself onto it from above, Harry inside her panties could feel an ominous chill in the air before feeling a slight sting coming from his scar...danger was coming.

Without warning Ginny came to rest on the broom her butt-crack resting on the center as her cheeks hugged it tightly as she began flying off the ground, luckily for harry she had decided to lean forward a bit more that usual to avoid the risk of Harry finding himself shoved up her butt hole.

At the same time as Harry found himself pinned under the weight of Ginny’s bum as she sat down Fred and George had their worlds turned upside down as Ginny placed her feet on the broom pegs causing both her brothers to slide towards her toes.

As Ginny took off into the air she could see that fifty or sixty feet in front of her flying on a broomstick was her romantic rival for Harry’s affection, Ravenclaw’s seeker was non other than Cho Chang a young Asian witch whom harry had a crush on ever since last year.

This was the chance Ginny had been waiting for, a chance to prove that she was better than Harry’s crush and now she could prove it on the field by beating her in this game .

*Boom* all players attention are drawn towards the sky as a firework like explosion is set of by Dumbledore signifying the start of the game, the players flying around at rapid speeds chasing after Buldger and Quaffle balls sent into the air from below while Ginny and Cho remained still waiting for the golden snitch.

Cho was the first to spot it, her eyes trained to following its movements, her ears skilled in listening for the distinct sound of it’s flapping wings as it flew past her broom, teasing her like it seemed to each and every seeker who played the game.

Ginny followed in pursuit not wanting to lose this game more than any other, hoping that Harry would prove to be some kind of good luck charm. Wanting to reward him if they win to punish him should they fail against Ravenclaw.

Ginny acting quickly on her instincts of how she had learned to play the game pulled her broom up along side Cho's and checked her, forcing her own body against the Asain witches butt.

Harry's surrounding quickly closed in around him with no chance of escaping as Ginny's butt-cheeks, for a split second he had become trapped in an air tight prison of warm flesh nearly causing him to suffocate or become crushed in the process.

Cho bounced back a few feet looked over at the fiery haired girl in pursuit of the golden snitch, realizing that Ginny crashing into her had been on purpose decided to retaliate.

Ginny was about to catch the snitch when suddenly her attention was drawn towards her right side as something was fast approaching, suddenly without much warning or time to block Cho used her larger rear to push Ginny aside.

While this was actually quite painful for Ginny it was much worse for Harry as he face the second head to head collision of his classmates gigantic bottoms slamming into one another.

Ginny stopped dead in her tracks feeling a strange sensation in her lower body, Harry left with nowhere to go when her bottom connected with Cho had send half of Harry's body into her butt hole from his feet up.

Harry kicked and kicked as hard as he could hoping to break his legs free from Ginny's constricting anus, but it was no use. Ginny soon came to the conclusion that she would just have to try her best to ignore Harry's movements for the time being and focus on the game.

Ginny clenched her toes around Fred and George's bodies in the hopes that their movements would distract her long enough from Harry's that she could pull off a victory for Gryffindor.

Ginny looked up just in time to see that Cho's fingertips touch the snitch causing it to fly faster just outside the Asain witches reach and giving Ginny a much needed opportunity to catch up.

Ginny pushed her feet against the stands on her broom, putting more than half of her weight down on her shrunken brothers as she began her race to catch up to Cho.

The snitch luckily circled around Cho giving Ginny significant time to catch up, after a minute of chasing the object that would win the game for either time both girls were neck and neck.

Ginny and Cho both reaching out meaning it was anyone's game at this point, any little thing that distracted the other would giver her opponent an opening for victory.

Who will win?

Ginny Wins/Cho Losses- Ginny brings harry back to Luna and Hermione with some kind of reward.
Ginny Losses/Cho Wins- Ginny either has Hermione use a spell to absorb harry into her flesh and make him a living tattoo on her butt-cheek, or has Luna place him somewhere close to Cho.

"AND RAVENCLAW IS THE WINNER!" Lee Jordan shouted over the magical PA system, announcing the end of the game.

Immediately, the Ravenclaw side of the stands erupted into applause, celebrating their team's victory (it's not like anything in this game matters besides Seekers and the Snitch anyway). The Gryfinndor stands were of course less excited, as many began to walk away in disappointment, wondering what had happened to Harry, their old seeker. The players from both sides lowered their brooms to the ground, which in Ginny's case meant that she no longer had a broom between her ass cheeks driving Harry up into her butt.

Of course, this included her anus, meaning Harry found himself being squeezed by the powerful sphincter far tighter than he had been so far. Not wanting to talk to anyway, Ginny marched off the field in a huff, not even bothering to change out of her Quidditch uniform. Her angry stomps of course meant that her brothers were in even more pain than usual, though being back on the ground proved much less disorienting than flying through the air. While they had no idea where Ginny was going, she had her destination in mind: Hermione's room.

She made the trip up to Hermione's room without even bothering to free Harry from his position in her asshole, where he was stil desperately struggling in an attempt to escape. Not willing to accept her defeat, she instead blamed her loss on Harry's squirms distracting her. Each and every one of his desperate kicks and twists for freedom only further enraged her, causing her to merge her anger and jealousy at Cho with her anger at Harry. By the time she slammed the door of Hermione's room, she knew that some sort of punishment was in order to teach Harry a lesson.

"What happened Ginny?" Hermione asked, having beaten Ginny back to the room from the stands. "You were doing great, you basically had the Snitch!"

"Freaking Cho checked me with that fat ass of hers." Ginny grumbled. "And then Harry got himself jammed up my asshole and wouldn't stop squirming." Still angry, she gave her ass a firm slap, wanting to make sure Harry knew how angry she was.

Harry had actually begun to make headway freeing himself with Ginny standing still, but her slap destroyed any progress e had made. Her cheek swung around and slapped him in the face, driving him right back into the hole he had been fighting for the past half hour.

"Is he still stuck in there?" Luna asked, breaking her silence.

"Yeah he's still stuck." Ginny replied.

"Well let's take care of that now." Hermione said. "Wingardium Leviosa." And with a flick of her wand, Harry was pulled out of Ginny's butt and into the air by a magical force. While relieved to be free from her ass, Harry was positively terrified by the look on the young ginger girl's face as he found himself floating in front of it.

"There you are little bastard." Ginny snarled, grabbing him from the air. "I hope you enjoyed my bumhole, because you've earned yourself a punishment for ruining my game."

Harry couldn't believe his ears. Ginny was blaming HIM for her loss, even though he was the one who suffered in her bum for the entire game. "This isn't my fault Ginny! You're the one who thought it was a good idea to shove me up your bum! If anything this is your fault! And trust me, that Quidditch game in your ass was more of a punishment than anything you could possibly do now!" Harry snapped.

"Little bastard has quite a big mouth." Hermione muttered. "But I'm sure I can find a spell or two that will give him a suitable punishment. Any ideas Ginny?"

"I've got just the thing in mind." Ginny muttered, an evil glint in her eye. "If he thinks my ass is such a punishment, let's see how he likes getting up close with someone else's ass."

"What'd you have in mind?" Luna inquired.

"I was thinking that..."
15513221112.title: Harry's Punishment

155132211123.content:
“Fine, if little Harry here didn’t like being up close and personal with my big bottom than maybe he’d like spending a bit of quality time near your bum.” Ginny smiled, dropping the shrunken boy into Hermione’s open palm.

“Thank you Ginny, I’ll be happy to teach this little bug a lesson or two about how to talk to us girls.” Hermione taunted, unnerving the shrunken wizard.

“I got him, now what?” Luna asked, taking control of Harry’s limbs between her nimble fingers as she dangled his torso high above the ground.

“Now you’re gonna bend his legs forward and force his hands into position to grab his ankles.” Hermione smiled, readying her wand.

The blonde haired Ravenclaw witch did exactly as her Gryffindor friend instructed, bending Harry’s limbs to their furthest extent.

Harry screamed out in pain as Luna’s fingers threatened to break his body in half like a chestnut, meanwhile Ginny sat back enjoying his misery.

“Bloody hell Luna, cut it out!” Harry snapped, sure that Luna would kill him before Hermione cast her spell with her wand pointed down at him.

“Epoximise.” Hermione uttered, her wand glowing bright blue as she cast a charm on Harry’s body.

http://harrypotter.wikia.com/wiki/Epoxim... < Spell Effects.

When the flash of light subsided Harry found himself lying between Luna’s pale white palms, glad that she had stopped pulling on his limbs.

Of course it wasn’t long till he realized the effects of Hermione’s charm, unable to move his limbs on his own.

“Hermione, you’ve taken this way too far!” Harry yelled, as Hermione brought her face above Luna’s open hands.

“Reeeally now, then why don’t you do something to stop me?” the gigantic girl laughed, surprised that Harry could even move with his arms and legs bound together.

“Hermione, reverse this right now or else I’ll…” Harry threatened, before being lifted upwards around the dirty blonde girl’s pointer finger.

“You’ll what? You pathetic little ingrate.” Hermione teased, beginning to twirl Harry around like a loose rubber band hanging of the tip of her finger.

This quickly caused Harry’s arms and legs to stretch out over five times their normal length as he became dizzy, all the result of Hermione simply playing around.

“Now Ginny, I know you absolutely can’t stand him but would you mind holding Harry while I get ready.” Hermione smiled, dropping Harry back into Ginny’s palm.

“Oh, that’s right. I forgot you two were under me.” Hermione giggled after kicking off her shoes, spotting Ron and Seamus trying to breath in fresh air after spending hours trapped under her sweaty stocking clad feet.

“Bloody hell Hermione! What are you doing?” yelled Ron as he watched his female crush shimmy his best friend up her legs, his arms wrapped around her thighs while his legs went between hers.

“I swear Hermione, if I ever get out of here I’ll...Mmphh, mmpph.” Harry yelled, before having his words silenced by Hermione pulling him between her butt-cheeks.

“You’ll what? I’m sorry Harry, I don’t quite get that.” Hermione smiled, giving her rear a shake as she flipped her skirt over to give Ginny and Luna a good look at her new thong.

“Take a good look girls, thongs are prohibited by the school dress code. so you may never see this one again.” Hermione teased, squeezing her glutes together as Luna and Ginny laughed at how pathetic Harry looked.

“Oh, and one more thing.” Hermione announced as she grabbed Harry’s face and pushed it into her buttcrack, giving herself a wedgie.

The blonde witch turned her attention back towards to floor, seeing her panties and fishnet stocking laying next to her shoes.

She then used her toes to pick up her panties and toss them to the side with her foot, followed by reaching down to pick up her stockings and slowly put them on.

“If it’s all the same with you I think I’ll spend a bit of time in the Library, studying as to how we can change them back. Or maybe I’ll just find some more spells to use on them.” Hermione laughed, openly talking about torturing the shrunken boys.

Hermione then brought her foot above her flat as began to slide it inside her footwear, seemingly unphased by the fear that the shrunken boys inside were experiencing.

The stench of her toes was almost too intense to bear as they individual grasped Ron's and Seamus's face and dragged them deep into her flat, trapping them under the ball of her foot.

"Well, I'm off." Hermione waved as she walked out of the room, enjoying not only the freedom that she felt wearing Harry as a thong, but the power that came with continuously stomping her friends underfoot.

Now will will you follow?

1. Hermione who spends some time inside the Library doing research, purposely moving her body in certain ways to make sure Ron, Harry, and Seamus are tortured.

2. Luna as she goes to class with Neville Longbottom and Dean Thomas still trapped under her feet, mindlessly playing with them by kicking her feet around gently, flexing her toes, ect.

info.brief_description: Pick a character and follow them as they shrink around the girls on their show.
info.description:
PLEASE READ 12/30/19, UPDATE TO RULES

The same shows you loved in the previous story and much more with the updates list of the newest shows as of 06/28/15 to bring you a new and more interesting story.

All I ask is that you avoid Males giants, Pets or Animals, Scat or Tiolet, and vomit other than that feel free to get creative and keep additions over 3500 characters long. Furthermore as of 12/30/19, I will be deleting sloppily put together choice chapters immediately. I have enough people telling me to write about certain characters already, and I don't need more dead ends because you want someone else to write about characters for you. ONLY ADD if you are serious about following the rules or you're just wasting time. This story has been out for 4 and a half years now, so you should understand this much. I shouldn't have to log on and delete 3 or more chapters twice a week from people who aren't adding actual content.

Please understand that I don't mean to be rude...okay that's a lie, I meant to be very rude. But if I wasn't doing this then the story would be nearly 5 times longer than it is now, bulked up with dead ends and harder to track down story-lines that would discourage people from reading further. Having 2355 chapters(471*5) isn't worth the trade off of losing what I feel makes this story special and why people seem to love it so much.

Also do your best to make sure that your additions are grammatically correct, and make perfect sense so that people will not only want to read, but will enjoy reading them.

Anyone is capable of writing a great addition if their willing to put a little bit of time and effort into it, and you will indefinitely get better over time.(I mean look at my previous stories and then this one- this one's a clear winner.)

If you see a choice with labelled "Reserved", I ask you do not write that choice without permission from the author. This can work both ways if you write a chapter that you'd really like to do one of the follow up options for, which I will make sure nobody else but you or the person your requesting does.

If you have a questions or comments regarding the story, please feel free to send me an email. I might seem a bit stuck up about how I'd like my story set up but I am more than happy to help with ideas for chapters your interested in writing, letting other know that you are interested in writing a chapter so they don't (Which has happened), ect just keep me in the loop.

I will remove chapters that I feel do not coincide with the guidelines listed above.
